dialogue_line: Do you have cards with any other libraries?

title: A Special Library
dialogue_line: Yes, I have one with my college and one with my local library.

title: A Special Library
dialogue_line: What college do you go to?

title: A Special Library
dialogue_line: UCLA. They have over 10 libraries!

title: A Special Library
dialogue_line: That's one of the great perks of higher education.

title: A Special Library
dialogue_line: Even though I have library cards, I really like this library.

title: A Special Library
dialogue_line: What do you like about it?

title: A Special Library
dialogue_line: I like the foreign language books. That's rare for any library.

title: A Special Library
dialogue_line: Yes, it is! We get people all over the world because of that section.

title: Where Is the Book?
dialogue_line: I really need a book, but I didn't see it on the shelf.

title: Where Is the Book?
dialogue_line: According to the computer, it's not checked out yet.

title: Where Is the Book?
dialogue_line: Then why isn't it on the proper shelf?

title: Where Is the Book?
dialogue_line: It means that someone in this library is holding it right now.

title: Where Is the Book?
dialogue_line: So someone else has the book and plans on checking it out?

title: Where Is the Book?
dialogue_line: Either that or someone took it out of the shelf and misplaced it.

title: Where Is the Book?
dialogue_line: I really need that book.

title: Where Is the Book?
dialogue_line: You're going to have to look everywhere for it.

title: Where Is the Book?
dialogue_line: Can't you just make an announcement asking whoever has the book to come forward?

title: Where Is the Book?
dialogue_line: You are not that special. When it comes to books, it's first come, first serve.

title: Where Is the Book?
dialogue_line: But I need it for school.

title: Where Is the Book?
dialogue_line: I'm sorry, but I can't do anything for you.

title: Tiger Books
dialogue_line: Hi, can you help me find a book on tigers?

title: Tiger Books
dialogue_line: Yes, of course. Is it for a school project?

title: Tiger Books
dialogue_line: Yes, I'm doing an essay on the life of a tiger.

title: Tiger Books
dialogue_line: You're going to want one with a lot of words and less pictures.

title: Tiger Books
dialogue_line: But I want the one with pictures!

title: Tiger Books
dialogue_line: Pictures are pretty, but they won't help you with your essay that much.

title: Tiger Books
dialogue_line: Fine, I admit you're right.

title: Tiger Books
dialogue_line: You can borrow the book with pictures for your own pleasure.

title: Tiger Books
dialogue_line: Yay! I love tigers.

title: Tiger Books
dialogue_line: I have a book that isn't hard to understand, but still has great information.

title: Tiger Books
dialogue_line: Great! You're so helpful.

title: Tiger Books
dialogue_line: It's my job to be helpful.

title: Reserving a Book
dialogue_line: I would like to reserve The Hunger Games.

title: Reserving a Book
dialogue_line: Everyone wants to reserve that book these days.

title: Reserving a Book
dialogue_line: It's really popular, because the movie just came out.

title: Reserving a Book
dialogue_line: You have to pay $1 to reserve the book.

title: Reserving a Book
dialogue_line: What?! That's ridiculous.

title: Reserving a Book
dialogue_line: Like you said, it's popular.

title: Reserving a Book
dialogue_line: I have to think about it then.

title: Reserving a Book
dialogue_line: I personally think $1 is nothing. It's cheaper than buying the book.

title: Reserving a Book
dialogue_line: How much is the book?

title: Reserving a Book
dialogue_line: On the back, it says it's $15. It depends on the bookstore you go to though.

title: Reserving a Book
dialogue_line: Fine, I'll give you a $1.

title: Reserving a Book
dialogue_line: You won't regret it! The book is really good.

title: Late Fees
dialogue_line: I'm sorry, but you can't borrow this book.

title: Late Fees
dialogue_line: What do you mean?

title: Late Fees
dialogue_line: You have not paid your late fees for your overdue books.

title: Late Fees
dialogue_line: I never had any overdue books!

title: Late Fees
dialogue_line: The computer doesn't lie.

title: Late Fees
dialogue_line: What books do I have late fees for?

title: Late Fees
dialogue_line: They're all math books, and according to the system, you still have them.

title: Late Fees
dialogue_line: Oh yeah, I do! I totally forgot about them and left them on my bed.

title: Late Fees
dialogue_line: Once you return them and pay the fee, you can borrow books again.

title: Late Fees
dialogue_line: But I really need to borrow those books now.

title: Late Fees
dialogue_line: I can put them on hold for you.

title: Late Fees
dialogue_line: Yes! You are the best.

title: Borrowing a Book from Another Library
dialogue_line: I'm so frustrated. I can't find any books on my research topic at my library.

title: Borrowing a Book from Another Library
dialogue_line: Why don't you try a different library?

title: Borrowing a Book from Another Library
dialogue_line: I don't want to waste gas money.

title: Borrowing a Book from Another Library
dialogue_line: But you might find your book.

title: Borrowing a Book from Another Library
dialogue_line: What library do you suggest?

title: Borrowing a Book from Another Library
dialogue_line: I suggest the one near my house.

title: Borrowing a Book from Another Library
dialogue_line: That is way too far for me.

title: Borrowing a Book from Another Library
dialogue_line: They have a lot of books. That library has never disappointed me.

title: Borrowing a Book from Another Library
dialogue_line: I have an idea! Why don't you borrow them for me?

title: Borrowing a Book from Another Library
dialogue_line: I don't know about that. What if you lose the books?

title: Borrowing a Book from Another Library
dialogue_line: I won't. I swear on my life.

title: Borrowing a Book from Another Library
dialogue_line: Wow, you're so serious.

title: Checking Out a Book
dialogue_line: This is a great book you're checking out.

title: Checking Out a Book
dialogue_line: You have read it?

title: Checking Out a Book
dialogue_line: Read it? I memorized it! It's one of my favorites.

title: Checking Out a Book
dialogue_line: That's good to know.

title: Checking Out a Book
dialogue_line: You should check out more books.

title: Checking Out a Book
dialogue_line: I can check out more than one?

title: Checking Out a Book
dialogue_line: Of course! It would be crazy if you could only get one book.

title: Checking Out a Book
dialogue_line: That's awesome! I'll be back.

title: Checking Out a Book
dialogue_line: Don't go crazy now. The limit is 15 books.

title: Checking Out a Book
dialogue_line: Don't worry. I'll probably come back with 5 more books.

title: Checking Out a Book
dialogue_line: It's great to see a kid excited about reading.

title: Checking Out a Book
dialogue_line: Yeah, most kids hate reading. They're more into television.

title: Checking Out a Magazine
dialogue_line: Now, you can only check out this magazine for one week.

title: Checking Out a Magazine
dialogue_line: Why one week? I thought the borrowing time was two weeks.

title: Checking Out a Magazine
dialogue_line: That's for books only.

title: Checking Out a Magazine
dialogue_line: Oh, that's weird.

title: Checking Out a Magazine
dialogue_line: Well, it doesn't take that long to finish a magazine.

title: Checking Out a Magazine
dialogue_line: I know, but I like to take my time.

title: Checking Out a Magazine
dialogue_line: I don't make the rules. Would you like to check it out?

title: Checking Out a Magazine
dialogue_line: Yes, I'd like to check it out.

title: Checking Out a Magazine
dialogue_line: Interesting magazine choice. Reading about celebrities is not really smart of you.

title: Checking Out a Magazine
dialogue_line: Don't judge me. I can't read educational stuff all the time.

title: Checking Out a Magazine
dialogue_line: I do! I read Time and National Geographic.

title: Checking Out a Magazine
dialogue_line: Everyone's taste is different.

title: Checking Out a Video
dialogue_line: How long do you want to check that video out for?

title: Checking Out a Video
dialogue_line: One week would be nice.

title: Checking Out a Video
dialogue_line: That will be $5.

title: Checking Out a Video
dialogue_line: What?! I thought I could check out videos for free.

title: Checking Out a Video
dialogue_line: You can check out educational videos for free.

title: Checking Out a Video
dialogue_line: This is bogus.

title: Checking Out a Video
dialogue_line: It's still not a bad price.

title: Checking Out a Video
dialogue_line: Okay, what if I only borrow it for a day?

title: Checking Out a Video
dialogue_line: It will be $2.

title: Checking Out a Video
dialogue_line: Okay, here's $2. So much for a library that services the public.

title: Checking Out a Video
dialogue_line: I hope you enjoy the movie.

title: Checking Out a Video
dialogue_line: For 2 bucks, I'd better love the movie.

title: Checking Books for Damage
dialogue_line: There's a huge rip here.

title: Checking Books for Damage
dialogue_line: But there's tape on it!

title: Checking Books for Damage
dialogue_line: Did you put the tape there?

title: Checking Books for Damage
dialogue_line: No, it was there before.

title: Checking Books for Damage
dialogue_line: I know you're lying to me.

title: Checking Books for Damage
dialogue_line: If you know, then why did you ask if I put the tape on?

title: Checking Books for Damage
dialogue_line: I wanted to see if you were a liar or not.

title: Checking Books for Damage
dialogue_line: How did you know I'm lying?

title: Checking Books for Damage
dialogue_line: Before you check out the book, the librarian checks it for damage.

title: Checking Books for Damage
dialogue_line: Wow, you guys think of everything.

title: Checking Books for Damage
dialogue_line: Yes. Anyways, you owe $10.

title: Checking Books for Damage
dialogue_line: Fine, here you go.

title: Barely Late
dialogue_line: Here are the books I'm returning.

title: Barely Late
dialogue_line: Looks like they're late. The late fee is $5.

title: Barely Late
dialogue_line: Okay, I'm only one minute late.

title: Barely Late
dialogue_line: One minute late, one month late, one year late, it doesn't matter.

title: Barely Late
dialogue_line: Are you kidding me? There's a big difference between one minute and one month.

title: Barely Late
dialogue_line: Look, the point is - they're late.

title: Barely Late
dialogue_line: Screw you! I ain't payin $5.

title: Barely Late
dialogue_line: I guess you'll never borrow another book, magazine, or video here ever again.

title: Barely Late
dialogue_line: It's okay, because I don't even like this library.

title: Barely Late
dialogue_line: This library doesn't like you either!

title: Barely Late
dialogue_line: I am leaving! You are plain rude.

title: Barely Late
dialogue_line: Leave! Nobody wants to see you.

title: Computer Limit
dialogue_line: Miss, you have been using the computer for over an hour now.

title: Computer Limit
dialogue_line: I know, I'm sorry.

title: Computer Limit
dialogue_line: Are you looking for something?

title: Computer Limit
dialogue_line: I'm researching for my project.

title: Computer Limit
dialogue_line: Can you come back tomorrow? Your daily computer limit time is up.

title: Computer Limit
dialogue_line: I don't have a computer at home.

title: Computer Limit
dialogue_line: I'm sorry to hear that, but other people need to use the computer, too.

title: Computer Limit
dialogue_line: My project is due very soon. I need to research.

title: Computer Limit
dialogue_line: How about books? This is a library after all.

title: Computer Limit
dialogue_line: I looked for books on my project. They're not good at all.

title: Computer Limit
dialogue_line: Maybe you don't know how to look for good books. I'll help you.

title: Computer Limit
dialogue_line: Thank you. I appreciate it.

title: Using a Copier
dialogue_line: How much do I need to insert here to make one copy?

title: Using a Copier
dialogue_line: It depends. Do you want your copy in color or black and white?

title: Using a Copier
dialogue_line: I want it in color.

title: Using a Copier
dialogue_line: Then it will be 20 cents per page.

title: Using a Copier
dialogue_line: That's kind of expensive.

title: Using a Copier
dialogue_line: Yeah, but most of us don't have a copy machine of our own.

title: Using a Copier
dialogue_line: I have one, but it's broken.

title: Using a Copier
dialogue_line: That sucks. Well, if money's an issue, you can copy your stuff in black and white.

title: Using a Copier
dialogue_line: No, it has to be color.

title: Using a Copier
dialogue_line: Do you really not have 20 cents?

title: Using a Copier
dialogue_line: I do, but I'm really cheap.

title: Using a Copier
dialogue_line: Well, you don't really have a choice at this point.

title: People at the Printer
dialogue_line: Why is the printer line so long?

title: People at the Printer
dialogue_line: It's finals week.

title: People at the Printer
dialogue_line: Oh yeah, you're right.

title: People at the Printer
dialogue_line: This happens every year, so I got smarter.

title: People at the Printer
dialogue_line: What do you mean?

title: People at the Printer
dialogue_line: I printed my stuff for finals at home.

title: People at the Printer
dialogue_line: Oh, that is smart. I have to get in line now.

title: People at the Printer
dialogue_line: What do you have to print?

title: People at the Printer
dialogue_line: I have to print some notes.

title: People at the Printer
dialogue_line: Good luck. You'll be waiting here for a long time.

title: People at the Printer
dialogue_line: I bet the ink and paper will go out.

title: People at the Printer
dialogue_line: If that happens, you're in trouble.

title: Be Quiet
dialogue_line: Can you please shut up?

title: Be Quiet
dialogue_line: Maybe if you ask nicely, I will!

title: Be Quiet
dialogue_line: This is a library, so you have to shut up.

title: Be Quiet
dialogue_line: I didn't know laughing was a crime.

title: Be Quiet
dialogue_line: It's a crime in the library.

title: Be Quiet
dialogue_line: You're just jealous, because I'm having a good time, and you're not.

title: Be Quiet
dialogue_line: No, that's not it at all.

title: Be Quiet
dialogue_line: I'll shut up if you say you're sorry.

title: Be Quiet
dialogue_line: Sorry for what? If anything, you should say sorry.

title: Be Quiet
dialogue_line: Okay, fine. I'm sorry that your parents didn't teach you how to be nice.

title: Be Quiet
dialogue_line: That does it. I'm getting a librarian.

title: Be Quiet
dialogue_line: Go get one!

title: The Library Restroom
dialogue_line: Do you have a restroom?

title: The Library Restroom
dialogue_line: Only for employees.

title: The Library Restroom
dialogue_line: But I really need to go.

title: The Library Restroom
dialogue_line: I can't let you go. There's a restroom in the market across from us though.

title: The Library Restroom
dialogue_line: That restroom is really dirty. It smells like someone died in there.

title: The Library Restroom
dialogue_line: Fine, I'll take you to our restroom.

title: The Library Restroom
dialogue_line: Yay! Thank you so much.

title: The Library Restroom
dialogue_line: We have to go secretly. If anyone sees you use the restroom, I'll be fired.

title: The Library Restroom
dialogue_line: Don't worry. I will be small and quiet as a mouse.

title: The Library Restroom
dialogue_line: Okay, good. The password is 595. Go quickly before anyone sees you.

title: The Library Restroom
dialogue_line: Thank you for your kindness.

title: The Library Restroom
dialogue_line: You owe me if we ever see each other again.

title: Volunteering at the Library
dialogue_line: You should volunteer at the library with me!

title: Volunteering at the Library
dialogue_line: What's so good about volunteering there?

title: Volunteering at the Library
dialogue_line: It's fun, and you feel good about yourself.

title: Volunteering at the Library
dialogue_line: What do you do there?

title: Volunteering at the Library
dialogue_line: Everyone does different things. I organize events.

title: Volunteering at the Library
dialogue_line: What kind of events?

title: Volunteering at the Library
dialogue_line: Movies, art and crafts, magic shows, and more.

title: Volunteering at the Library
dialogue_line: That does sound fun!

title: Volunteering at the Library
dialogue_line: Do you want to sign up?

title: Volunteering at the Library
dialogue_line: Yeah, how do I sign up?

title: Volunteering at the Library
dialogue_line: I'll get you an application.

title: Studying at the Library
dialogue_line: I can't study at home, because my family talks so loudly.

title: Studying at the Library
dialogue_line: Study at the library.

title: Studying at the Library
dialogue_line: Can you focus in there?

title: Studying at the Library
dialogue_line: Yes, it's always really quiet.

title: Studying at the Library
dialogue_line: I'll go today.

title: Studying at the Library
dialogue_line: Make sure you get a good seat.

title: Studying at the Library
dialogue_line: Are there not enough seats for everyone?

title: Studying at the Library
dialogue_line: It depends on when you go.

title: Studying at the Library
dialogue_line: I'm going at 1:00 a.m.

title: Studying at the Library
dialogue_line: Dude, it's not even open that late.

title: Studying at the Library
dialogue_line: But that's the best time for me.

title: Studying at the Library
dialogue_line: You can always try a cafe. They tend to close late or not at all.

title: Reference Books
dialogue_line: You can't check out this one. It's a reference book.

title: Reference Books
dialogue_line: What does that mean?

title: Reference Books
dialogue_line: It means you can only read it in the library.

title: Reference Books
dialogue_line: But I need it for my essay.

title: Reference Books
dialogue_line: You can take pictures of the pages you need.

title: Reference Books
dialogue_line: I need almost all of them.

title: Reference Books
dialogue_line: You can keep coming back here.

title: Reference Books
dialogue_line: That's so inconvenient.

title: Reference Books
dialogue_line: It is, but they have to be kept here.

title: Reference Books
dialogue_line: I guess I can take pictures of the pages then.

title: Reference Books
dialogue_line: Sorry about the inconvenience.

title: Reference Books
dialogue_line: It is okay. It's not your fault.

title: A Gross Book
dialogue_line: Ew! Look what I found in this book.

title: A Gross Book
dialogue_line: What is that?

title: A Gross Book
dialogue_line: It's a dead bug.

title: A Gross Book
dialogue_line: It's all squished and messy.

title: A Gross Book
dialogue_line: I can't read this book without being disgusted.

title: A Gross Book
dialogue_line: But don't you really want to check out this book?

title: A Gross Book
dialogue_line: I do, but I really can't.

title: A Gross Book
dialogue_line: I'll check it out then.

title: A Gross Book
dialogue_line: You can read it without being disgusted?

title: A Gross Book
dialogue_line: Yeah, I'll just skip that page.

title: A Gross Book
dialogue_line: There could be something really interesting on it.

title: A Gross Book
dialogue_line: Whatever! I'm just going to check out the book.

title: Planning to Transfer
dialogue_line: I'm applying to transfer out of this college.

title: Planning to Transfer
dialogue_line: I'm going to miss you.

title: Planning to Transfer
dialogue_line: Me too. I'll text you every so often.

title: Planning to Transfer
dialogue_line: Why do you want to transfer?

title: Planning to Transfer
dialogue_line: I don't think here it is challenging enough for me.

title: Planning to Transfer
dialogue_line: You can join the honors program!

title: Planning to Transfer
dialogue_line: I did, and it wasn't challenging either.

title: Planning to Transfer
dialogue_line: Alright then. When are you going to start applying?

title: Planning to Transfer
dialogue_line: Next month. I'm already looking at the essay prompts.

title: Planning to Transfer
dialogue_line: Are they challenging?

title: Planning to Transfer
dialogue_line: Yes, but they're kind of fun!

title: Planning to Transfer
dialogue_line: I hope you get into wherever you want to go.

title: What University to Transfer to
dialogue_line: I don't know what university to transfer to.

title: What University to Transfer to
dialogue_line: There's a lot, so it's all about picking what suits your needs.

title: What University to Transfer to
dialogue_line: For starters, I would like a university in a safe area.

title: What University to Transfer to
dialogue_line: Okay, what else are you thinking about?

title: What University to Transfer to
dialogue_line: I want to live close to home.

title: What University to Transfer to
dialogue_line: I think UC Irvine would be good.

title: What University to Transfer to
dialogue_line: I don't think that's good for my major.

title: What University to Transfer to
dialogue_line: What's your major?

title: What University to Transfer to
dialogue_line: I'm majoring in philosophy.

title: What University to Transfer to
dialogue_line: Yeah, you're right. UCI is not good for philosophy.

title: What University to Transfer to
dialogue_line: I also want to go to a college that will increase my job opportunities.

title: What University to Transfer to
dialogue_line: Let's go do some online research.

title: Classes Unrelated to Your Major
dialogue_line: What classes should I take to transfer?

title: Classes Unrelated to Your Major
dialogue_line: You need a little bit of everything.

title: Classes Unrelated to Your Major
dialogue_line: What do you mean?

title: Classes Unrelated to Your Major
dialogue_line: You need to take at least one class in every subject.

title: Classes Unrelated to Your Major
dialogue_line: Do I need to take a math class?

title: Classes Unrelated to Your Major
dialogue_line: Even if your major is Portuguese, you have to take a math class.

title: Classes Unrelated to Your Major
dialogue_line: That's so stupid.

title: Classes Unrelated to Your Major
dialogue_line: It's just to make you more knowledgeable.

title: Classes Unrelated to Your Major
dialogue_line: But I don't even need it!

title: Classes Unrelated to Your Major
dialogue_line: It's been like this for ages.

title: Classes Unrelated to Your Major
dialogue_line: Well, the policy should be changed.

title: Classes Unrelated to Your Major
dialogue_line: It won't. So in the meantime, you should register for a math class.

title: Taking Speech 101
dialogue_line: Why are you taking this class?

title: Taking Speech 101
dialogue_line: I need it to transfer. You?

title: Taking Speech 101
dialogue_line: Me too! I would never take Speech 101 if I didn't need it.

title: Taking Speech 101
dialogue_line: Yeah, I hate public speaking.

title: Taking Speech 101
dialogue_line: Me too! I get so nervous.

title: Taking Speech 101
dialogue_line: I just want this class to be over with.

title: Taking Speech 101
dialogue_line: It's going to be a long semester.

title: Taking Speech 101
dialogue_line: Maybe after this class, we'll love public speaking.

title: Taking Speech 101
dialogue_line: I doubt it!

title: Taking Speech 101
dialogue_line: I don't even know why we have to take this class to transfer.

title: Taking Speech 101
dialogue_line: I guess it's to make us better speakers.

title: Taking Speech 101
dialogue_line: It'll all be worth it when we transfer.

title: Classes Needed for Transfer
dialogue_line: You only need three more classes and you'll be ready to transfer.

title: Classes Needed for Transfer
dialogue_line: Which classes do I need?

title: Classes Needed for Transfer
dialogue_line: You need a history class, a physical science class, and a foreign language class.

title: Classes Needed for Transfer
dialogue_line: Which history class should I take?

title: Classes Needed for Transfer
dialogue_line: The one you're most interested in.

title: Classes Needed for Transfer
dialogue_line: I looked at the course listing, and there's nothing I'm interested in.

title: Classes Needed for Transfer
dialogue_line: In that case, go for the class you would be the least bored of.

title: Classes Needed for Transfer
dialogue_line: I guess I could take European history.

title: Classes Needed for Transfer
dialogue_line: There you go! How about the other classes you need?

title: Classes Needed for Transfer
dialogue_line: I think I'll take physics and French.

title: Classes Needed for Transfer
dialogue_line: I'm glad you know what to take!

title: Classes Needed for Transfer
dialogue_line: Me too. Careful planning is part of what makes up a successful student!

title: College Application Questions
dialogue_line: What are you doing?

title: College Application Questions
dialogue_line: I'm filling out my college application.

title: College Application Questions
dialogue_line: Do you need any help? I applied two years ago.

title: College Application Questions
dialogue_line: Yes, I do need help. Should I put my ethnicity?

title: College Application Questions
dialogue_line: It won't be used for or against you. It's really up to you.

title: College Application Questions
dialogue_line: Also, should I put all of my extracurriculars?

title: College Application Questions
dialogue_line: Put the ones that you were heavily involved in.

title: College Application Questions
dialogue_line: Next question, should I put anything in the "additional information" section?

title: College Application Questions
dialogue_line: If you feel like you need to say something that you didn't mention before, then yes.

title: College Application Questions
dialogue_line: Can I say I got an A when I really just got a B?

title: College Application Questions
dialogue_line: What?! Of course not! They will ask for your transcript.

title: College Application Questions
dialogue_line: Oh, I didn't know that.

title: Applying to Many Universities
dialogue_line: How many universities are you applying to?

title: Applying to Many Universities
dialogue_line: I'm applying to 12 universities.

title: Applying to Many Universities
dialogue_line: Wow! That's a lot!

title: Applying to Many Universities
dialogue_line: I just want a lot of options.

title: Applying to Many Universities
dialogue_line: But it costs a lot of money and time!

title: Applying to Many Universities
dialogue_line: I get fee waivers.

title: Applying to Many Universities
dialogue_line: But how about the time? I mean, applying is a lot of work.

title: Applying to Many Universities
dialogue_line: College applications ask similar questions.

title: Applying to Many Universities
dialogue_line: Good for you. I'm only applying to three universities.

title: Applying to Many Universities
dialogue_line: Which ones are you applying to?

title: Applying to Many Universities
dialogue_line: CSULA, UC Irvine, and Yale.

title: Applying to Many Universities
dialogue_line: I find it hard to believe that you can limit yourself to only three universities.

title: Lying on College Applications
dialogue_line: After seeing your college application, I can tell you're really smart and talented.

title: Lying on College Applications
dialogue_line: Not really, I'm lying about almost everything.

title: Lying on College Applications
dialogue_line: Why?! They're going to find out.

title: Lying on College Applications
dialogue_line: No, they're not! They're not going to check.

title: Lying on College Applications
dialogue_line: Yes, they will. After a college admits you, they'll ask for your transcript.

title: Lying on College Applications
dialogue_line: I didn't know that! How about my extracurriculars?

title: Lying on College Applications
dialogue_line: They'll randomly audit 10% of their applicants.

title: Lying on College Applications
dialogue_line: What does that mean?

title: Lying on College Applications
dialogue_line: The UCs will randomly select 10% of their applicants to provide proof of their extracurriculars.

title: Lying on College Applications
dialogue_line: It's only 10%.

title: Lying on College Applications
dialogue_line: It's not that little! You may be chosen. Be careful.

title: Lying on College Applications
dialogue_line: You're right. It's too risky to lie.

title: Classes Needed for Transfer
dialogue_line: I'm registering for Psych 21, because I need it to transfer.

title: Classes Needed for Transfer
dialogue_line: I need that class too in order to transfer.

title: Classes Needed for Transfer
dialogue_line: But there's only one space left!

title: Classes Needed for Transfer
dialogue_line: That's terrible. My registration time is at 5 p.m.

title: Classes Needed for Transfer
dialogue_line: Darn it! Mine is at 6 p.m.

title: Classes Needed for Transfer
dialogue_line: That sucks. Maybe someone will drop out.

title: Classes Needed for Transfer
dialogue_line: I doubt it. Psych 21 is needed by a lot of people.

title: Classes Needed for Transfer
dialogue_line: Beg the professor?

title: Classes Needed for Transfer
dialogue_line: If I have to.

title: Classes Needed for Transfer
dialogue_line: You should cry! That might work.

title: Classes Needed for Transfer
dialogue_line: I'm planning to. I can cry on demand.

title: Classes Needed for Transfer
dialogue_line: Maybe you should take a theater class instead.

title: A Class Desperately Needed
dialogue_line: I desperately need to take an English class this semester.

title: A Class Desperately Needed
dialogue_line: So does everyone else.

title: A Class Desperately Needed
dialogue_line: It's the only class I need before I transfer.

title: A Class Desperately Needed
dialogue_line: Maybe you can pay someone for their spot.

title: A Class Desperately Needed
dialogue_line: I honestly would do that if someone was willing to give up their spot.

title: A Class Desperately Needed
dialogue_line: What happens if you can't get the class?

title: A Class Desperately Needed
dialogue_line: Then I need to stay at Pasadena City College longer.

title: A Class Desperately Needed
dialogue_line: That would stink.

title: A Class Desperately Needed
dialogue_line: I know, that's why I need that class.

title: A Class Desperately Needed
dialogue_line: You can try taking it at another college.

title: A Class Desperately Needed
dialogue_line: I might do that. The closest community college is a two-hour drive.

title: A Class Desperately Needed
dialogue_line: I'm praying you get the English class.

title: Talking to a Counselor
dialogue_line: I want to transfer, but I don't know where to start.

title: Talking to a Counselor
dialogue_line: Let's start with the basics. What do you want to major in?

title: Talking to a Counselor
dialogue_line: I want to major in biology.

title: Talking to a Counselor
dialogue_line: Then you have to take general education requirements like everyone else.

title: Talking to a Counselor
dialogue_line: What are those requirements exactly?

title: Talking to a Counselor
dialogue_line: I'll give you a sheet listing all of them.

title: Talking to a Counselor
dialogue_line: What else do I have to do?

title: Talking to a Counselor
dialogue_line: You should fulfill some, if not all, of your major requirements.

title: Talking to a Counselor
dialogue_line: Okay, about when will I finish?

title: Talking to a Counselor
dialogue_line: It really depends on how many classes you take and complete per semester.

title: Talking to a Counselor
dialogue_line: I'm planning on taking five classes per semester.

title: Talking to a Counselor
dialogue_line: That's good! You'll be ready to transfer in about two years.

title: A Recommendation Letter (1)
dialogue_line: Hey Professor Lopez, I need a favor.

title: A Recommendation Letter (1)
dialogue_line: What kind of favor?

title: A Recommendation Letter (1)
dialogue_line: Can you write a recommendation letter for me?

title: A Recommendation Letter (1)
dialogue_line: I'm sorry, but I can't.

title: A Recommendation Letter (1)
dialogue_line: Why not? I was a good student.

title: A Recommendation Letter (1)
dialogue_line: Yes, you were. The thing is, I don't know you that well.

title: A Recommendation Letter (1)
dialogue_line: I'll just give you my resume, and you can write about how great I am!

title: A Recommendation Letter (1)
dialogue_line: I can't. I don't think I can write you a good letter.

title: A Recommendation Letter (1)
dialogue_line: But I don't know who else to ask.

title: A Recommendation Letter (1)
dialogue_line: Ask someone who knows you as more than just a student.

title: A Recommendation Letter (1)
dialogue_line: I honestly never had a professor I felt close to.

title: A Recommendation Letter (1)
dialogue_line: Then, you can only hope a professor writes a letter for you regardless of that fact.

title: A Recommendation Letter (2)
dialogue_line: My professor wrote a really bad recommendation letter for me.

title: A Recommendation Letter (2)
dialogue_line: You read his recommendation letter?

title: A Recommendation Letter (2)
dialogue_line: Yeah. I couldn't resist.

title: A Recommendation Letter (2)
dialogue_line: This is why you shouldn't read it. You might not like what you see.

title: A Recommendation Letter (2)
dialogue_line: He wrote such boring things about me.

title: A Recommendation Letter (2)
dialogue_line: What did he write?

title: A Recommendation Letter (2)
dialogue_line: Just that I'm a diligent student who does well.

title: A Recommendation Letter (2)
dialogue_line: At least it was nothing bad. You can always ask another professor.

title: A Recommendation Letter (2)
dialogue_line: I know, but I don't have time.

title: A Recommendation Letter (2)
dialogue_line: When do you need another recommendation letter by?

title: A Recommendation Letter (2)
dialogue_line: I need one by this Friday.

title: A Recommendation Letter (2)
dialogue_line: Oh, wow! Maybe you should just send the one you have now.

title: Personal Statement Workshop
dialogue_line: I'm having trouble with my personal statement.

title: Personal Statement Workshop
dialogue_line: You should go to the personal statement workshop.

title: Personal Statement Workshop
dialogue_line: What is that?

title: Personal Statement Workshop
dialogue_line: It's where a professional will give you tips and revise your personal statement.

title: Personal Statement Workshop
dialogue_line: That sounds helpful.

title: Personal Statement Workshop
dialogue_line: It is. I went to one last week.

title: Personal Statement Workshop
dialogue_line: How was it?

title: Personal Statement Workshop
dialogue_line: The person leading the workshop was an English professor, so it was informative.

title: Personal Statement Workshop
dialogue_line: I'm kind of embarrassed to show my personal statement, though.

title: Personal Statement Workshop
dialogue_line: You shouldn't be.

title: Personal Statement Workshop
dialogue_line: I feel like I'll be laughed at.

title: Personal Statement Workshop
dialogue_line: The workshop will improve your writing. You really should go.

title: Not Accepted to a University
dialogue_line: What's wrong? You look sad.

title: Not Accepted to a University
dialogue_line: I was rejected from my dream school.

title: Not Accepted to a University
dialogue_line: I'm sorry to hear that.

title: Not Accepted to a University
dialogue_line: I feel so stupid. What's wrong with me?

title: Not Accepted to a University
dialogue_line: Nothing. If your dream school doesn't want you, then that's their loss.

title: Not Accepted to a University
dialogue_line: I don't know what to do anymore.

title: Not Accepted to a University
dialogue_line: Look, that school didn't accept you, because you weren't the right fit.

title: Not Accepted to a University
dialogue_line: Is that supposed to make me feel better?

title: Not Accepted to a University
dialogue_line: I'm just saying, why would you want to go to a school that doesn't fit you?

title: Not Accepted to a University
dialogue_line: When you say it like that, I understand you.

title: Not Accepted to a University
dialogue_line: Yeah! Just focus on the schools that do want you.

title: Not Accepted to a University
dialogue_line: You're right! Yale made a mistake rejecting me.

title: Deciding not to Transfer
dialogue_line: I have decided not to transfer.

title: Deciding not to Transfer
dialogue_line: Why not? You kept saying you wanted to.

title: Deciding not to Transfer
dialogue_line: I know, but it's so hard getting accustomed to a new school.

title: Deciding not to Transfer
dialogue_line: That's a terrible reason not to transfer.

title: Deciding not to Transfer
dialogue_line: No, it's a good one. I feel at home here.

title: Deciding not to Transfer
dialogue_line: Sometimes, a new environment is necessary.

title: Deciding not to Transfer
dialogue_line: No, I really like it here. Also, I know what to expect.

title: Deciding not to Transfer
dialogue_line: I still think you're making the wrong choice.

title: Deciding not to Transfer
dialogue_line: Why do you want me to go?

title: Deciding not to Transfer
dialogue_line: I just think this school isn't right for you.

title: Deciding not to Transfer
dialogue_line: That's not for you to decide.

title: Deciding not to Transfer
dialogue_line: I know, but I'm just stating my opinion.

title: Accepted to a University
dialogue_line: I got accepted to all of the schools I applied to.

title: Accepted to a University
dialogue_line: Congrats! You totally deserve it.

title: Accepted to a University
dialogue_line: How many schools did you apply to?

title: Accepted to a University
dialogue_line: I applied to six.

title: Accepted to a University
dialogue_line: What was your first reaction when you got into your dream school?

title: Accepted to a University
dialogue_line: I was shocked. My heart stopped.

title: Accepted to a University
dialogue_line: I know the feeling. It's a great one.

title: Accepted to a University
dialogue_line: It is. I don't even know what school to pick now.

title: Accepted to a University
dialogue_line: Same here. Who knew getting accepted would have problems?

title: Accepted to a University
dialogue_line: It's a good problem!

title: Accepted to a University
dialogue_line: Hey, we should visit schools together.

title: Accepted to a University
dialogue_line: That would be fun!

title: First Day at a New School
dialogue_line: Wow, this place is amazing.

title: First Day at a New School
dialogue_line: Is this your first time here?

title: First Day at a New School
dialogue_line: It's my first day at this school. I just transferred.

title: First Day at a New School
dialogue_line: I see. You're going to love it here.

title: First Day at a New School
dialogue_line: I think I will too.

title: First Day at a New School
dialogue_line: Did you move in yet?

title: First Day at a New School
dialogue_line: Yes, I have an apartment nearby.

title: First Day at a New School
dialogue_line: That's good. What's your first class?

title: First Day at a New School
dialogue_line: My very first class is human biology.

title: First Day at a New School
dialogue_line: I hope it's educational and entertaining.

title: First Day at a New School
dialogue_line: I think it will be.

title: First Day at a New School
dialogue_line: I'll walk you there, since you probably don't know where anything is.

title: Where to Buy Food
dialogue_line: I'm starving!

title: Where to Buy Food
dialogue_line: Me too. Let's get something to eat.

title: Where to Buy Food
dialogue_line: What would you like?

title: Where to Buy Food
dialogue_line: I know! Let's go down to the Farmer's Market.

title: Where to Buy Food
dialogue_line: What do they sell to eat there?

title: Where to Buy Food
dialogue_line: Only the best produce in the city!

title: Where to Buy Food
dialogue_line: What makes it so great?

title: Where to Buy Food
dialogue_line: Well it's all organically grown.

title: Where to Buy Food
dialogue_line: Can't we just go to the supermarket?

title: Where to Buy Food
dialogue_line: No way! Those vegetables don't compare at all!

title: Where to Buy Food
dialogue_line: I don't feel like cooking. Let's get burgers.

title: Where to Buy Food
dialogue_line: Fine, let's get some burgers.

title: How to Cook a Meal
dialogue_line: Can you make dinner for your sister tonight?

title: How to Cook a Meal
dialogue_line: Aw, she only eats macaroni and cheese!

title: How to Cook a Meal
dialogue_line: What's the problem?

title: How to Cook a Meal
dialogue_line: I don't know how to make it.

title: How to Cook a Meal
dialogue_line: It's super easy, just follow the box instructions.

title: How to Cook a Meal
dialogue_line: We're all out of instant macaroni and cheese.

title: How to Cook a Meal
dialogue_line: Well, make it from scratch, then.

title: How to Cook a Meal
dialogue_line: How do I do that?!

title: How to Cook a Meal
dialogue_line: Just cook the pasta, and mix it in cheese, milk, and butter.

title: How to Cook a Meal
dialogue_line: It can't be that easy.

title: How to Cook a Meal
dialogue_line: Cooking isn't hard at all. You can do it.

title: How to Cook a Meal
dialogue_line: If I accidentally burn the house down, it's not my fault.

title: Breakfast
dialogue_line: Did you book the hotel for the trip?

title: Breakfast
dialogue_line: Yes and it comes with something extra!

title: Breakfast
dialogue_line: What would that be, exactly?

title: Breakfast
dialogue_line: Continental breakfast every morning!

title: Breakfast
dialogue_line: Wow! Do you think they serve pancakes?

title: Breakfast
dialogue_line: Oh, with syrup and fresh fruit.

title: Breakfast
dialogue_line: You can't forget the whipped cream!

title: Breakfast
dialogue_line: And freshly brewed coffee!

title: Breakfast
dialogue_line: I can't wait to see it all!

title: Breakfast
dialogue_line: I think I'm more excited for breakfast than the trip.

title: Breakfast
dialogue_line: Well, breakfast is the most important meal of the day.

title: Breakfast
dialogue_line: That's very true.

title: Lunch
dialogue_line: What are we having for lunch?

title: Lunch
dialogue_line: I'm making some sandwiches.

title: Lunch
dialogue_line: Can I make some lemonade to drink?

title: Lunch
dialogue_line: Sure! That'd be great.

title: Lunch
dialogue_line: We just ate breakfast, but I'm already hungry.

title: Lunch
dialogue_line: Me too! It's amazing how hungry I get so soon!

title: Lunch
dialogue_line: I'm really looking forward to those sandwiches.

title: Lunch
dialogue_line: I just realized we're out of bread!

title: Lunch
dialogue_line: I guess lunch will have to be delayed.

title: Lunch
dialogue_line: Can you please go to the store and buy some?

title: Lunch
dialogue_line: Sure! Don't drink all the lemonade!

title: Lunch
dialogue_line: I won't! Come back soon. I'm starving!

title: Dinner
dialogue_line: Have you decided what you're going to order?

title: Dinner
dialogue_line: I think I want to eat a steak today.

title: Dinner
dialogue_line: That sounds delicious!

title: Dinner
dialogue_line: I've been craving one all day.

title: Dinner
dialogue_line: You're making me crave one now!

title: Dinner
dialogue_line: Well, we might as well order the steak now.

title: Dinner
dialogue_line: Actually, I change my mind.

title: Dinner
dialogue_line: What are you having?

title: Dinner
dialogue_line: Shrimp pasta, it looks delicious.

title: Dinner
dialogue_line: Do you mind if I try some of that?

title: Dinner
dialogue_line: Only if you give me some steak!

title: Dinner
dialogue_line: Alright, it's perfect, thanks!

title: Drinks
dialogue_line: I'm so thirsty!

title: Drinks
dialogue_line: You might want to buy something refreshing.

title: Drinks
dialogue_line: I think I'd like a hibiscus tea.

title: Drinks
dialogue_line: It is kind of hot, isn't it?

title: Drinks
dialogue_line: Yes, it is. What'll you get?

title: Drinks
dialogue_line: Same as yours.

title: Drinks
dialogue_line: Awesome, we match!

title: Drinks
dialogue_line: Yeah, I guess we do!

title: Drinks
dialogue_line: Place the order. I'll spot you the money.

title: Drinks
dialogue_line: In that case, I want the biggest size.

title: Drinks
dialogue_line: Don't bite the hand that feeds you!

title: Drinks
dialogue_line: I was only kidding!

title: Fruits
dialogue_line: Why are you eating another apple?

title: Fruits
dialogue_line: You know what they say about apples!

title: Fruits
dialogue_line: No, I'm afraid I don't know.

title: Fruits
dialogue_line: An apple a day keeps the doctor away!

title: Fruits
dialogue_line: Especially if you throw it at him.

title: Fruits
dialogue_line: You should eat fruit; it's good for you.

title: Fruits
dialogue_line: I do eat fruit: just not as often as you do.

title: Fruits
dialogue_line: Eating healthy is wonderful!

title: Fruits
dialogue_line: I don't doubt it, but I still want pizza for lunch.

title: Fruits
dialogue_line: Only if you eat an apple, too.

title: Fruits
dialogue_line: Alright, I'll also eat an apple.

title: Fruits
dialogue_line: That's the spirit! You're healthier already.

title: Salads
dialogue_line: What is that you're eating?

title: Salads
dialogue_line: It's a house salad.

title: Salads
dialogue_line: What order are you waiting for?

title: Salads
dialogue_line: Oh, I'm not waiting for an order to come.

title: Salads
dialogue_line: You mean that's all the lunch you're having?

title: Salads
dialogue_line: Yes, this is my lunch today.

title: Salads
dialogue_line: Are you on a diet?

title: Salads
dialogue_line: No, I just felt like eating a salad.

title: Salads
dialogue_line: It's only got lettuce!

title: Salads
dialogue_line: No. It has cucumbers and carrots, too.

title: Salads
dialogue_line: What's that on the top?

title: Salads
dialogue_line: Steamed chicken. It's delicious!

title: Desserts
dialogue_line: What do you think I should get for dessert?

title: Desserts
dialogue_line: I don't know, look at the menu.

title: Desserts
dialogue_line: Wow! They have icecream, pies, cakes.

title: Desserts
dialogue_line: It looks like a great selection!

title: Desserts
dialogue_line: I don't know what to get!

title: Desserts
dialogue_line: It's kind of hot out. Maybe icecream would be good.

title: Desserts
dialogue_line: Icecream sounds fantastic!

title: Desserts
dialogue_line: How about we go to the icecream parlor down the street?

title: Desserts
dialogue_line: That sounds good to me! Let's go.

title: Desserts
dialogue_line: That pecan pie is calling my name, though.

title: Desserts
dialogue_line: Answer to icecream's call only!

title: Desserts
dialogue_line: You're right! Let's go!

title: Meat
dialogue_line: What kind of meat are you buying?

title: Meat
dialogue_line: I'm just buying some pork shoulders.

title: Meat
dialogue_line: Why did you make them cut it in half?

title: Meat
dialogue_line: It's tenderer if you do it that way.

title: Meat
dialogue_line: Do you need anything else?

title: Meat
dialogue_line: Yes, I need some tenderloin pieces.

title: Meat
dialogue_line: You sure are buying a lot of meat.

title: Meat
dialogue_line: Meat makes you strong!

title: Meat
dialogue_line: And it also tastes amazing!

title: Meat
dialogue_line: Would you like to come over for dinner?

title: Meat
dialogue_line: Sure! I'd like to see how well you cook.

title: Meat
dialogue_line: Alright! You'll find it delicious!

title: Snacks
dialogue_line: Throw away those potato chips!

title: Snacks
dialogue_line: What's so bad about potato chips?

title: Snacks
dialogue_line: They'll rot your insides!

title: Snacks
dialogue_line: Oh, they're not so bad.

title: Snacks
dialogue_line: You should eat a different snack.

title: Snacks
dialogue_line: I think I'll have some frozen yogurt.

title: Snacks
dialogue_line: That is a much better snack!

title: Snacks
dialogue_line: I'd still like to eat potato chips though.

title: Snacks
dialogue_line: You had some yesterday.

title: Snacks
dialogue_line: I don't eat them very often.

title: Snacks
dialogue_line: You can have them later.

title: Snacks
dialogue_line: I guess that sounds pretty fair.

title: Vegetables
dialogue_line: Can you cut the vegetables, please?

title: Vegetables
dialogue_line: How do you want me to cut them?

title: Vegetables
dialogue_line: Cut the potatoes into big chunks.

title: Vegetables
dialogue_line: What about the carrots?

title: Vegetables
dialogue_line: Those you can cut in rounds.

title: Vegetables
dialogue_line: Do I do the same to the celery?

title: Vegetables
dialogue_line: No, you can cut that into strips.

title: Vegetables
dialogue_line: There are so many ways to cut these things!

title: Vegetables
dialogue_line: Yes, there really are!

title: Vegetables
dialogue_line: Can I cut the zucchini into rounds?

title: Vegetables
dialogue_line: That's what I was going to ask you to do.

title: Vegetables
dialogue_line: Great! I'll get started now.

title: Nutrition of Foods
dialogue_line: You really need a more balanced diet!

title: Nutrition of Foods
dialogue_line: It's fine. I eat three times a day.

title: Nutrition of Foods
dialogue_line: All three times and all you eat is fatty foods.

title: Nutrition of Foods
dialogue_line: I'm not always eating junk food!

title: Nutrition of Foods
dialogue_line: Not junk food, just fatty and oily food!

title: Nutrition of Foods
dialogue_line: Try to eat equal amounts of meat and vegetables.

title: Nutrition of Foods
dialogue_line: Why should I measure the portions that way?

title: Nutrition of Foods
dialogue_line: You need to eat enough protein and vitamins!

title: Nutrition of Foods
dialogue_line: Yeah, I'll take your advice.

title: Nutrition of Foods
dialogue_line: You'll feel much healthier.

title: Nutrition of Foods
dialogue_line: I believe you. Thanks for the advice!

title: Ordering Fast Food (1)
dialogue_line: Hi! Can I get a pizza slice, please?

title: Ordering Fast Food (1)
dialogue_line: Sure, is there anything else you'd like?

title: Ordering Fast Food (1)
dialogue_line: I'll also take that bag of chips.

title: Ordering Fast Food (1)
dialogue_line: What size drink would you like?

title: Ordering Fast Food (1)
dialogue_line: A medium soft drink, please.

title: Ordering Fast Food (1)
dialogue_line: Alright, you can go fill it at the fountain.

title: Ordering Fast Food (1)
dialogue_line: Can I also buy this banana, please?

title: Ordering Fast Food (1)
dialogue_line: Certainly. Will that be all?

title: Ordering Fast Food (1)
dialogue_line: Yes, that's all! What is my total?

title: Ordering Fast Food (1)
dialogue_line: Your total is $12.36.

title: Ordering Fast Food (1)
dialogue_line: Thank you! Have a nice day.

title: Ordering Fast Food (1)
dialogue_line: Thank you, you too.

title: Ordering Fast Food (2)
dialogue_line: Where do I go to get my food?

title: Ordering Fast Food (2)
dialogue_line: Just walk around and pick what you want.

title: Ordering Fast Food (2)
dialogue_line: I'll take a sandwich and a pear.

title: Ordering Fast Food (2)
dialogue_line: I think I'll have the same.

title: Ordering Fast Food (2)
dialogue_line: What are you getting to drink?

title: Ordering Fast Food (2)
dialogue_line: I'll just have water.

title: Ordering Fast Food (2)
dialogue_line: Where do we pay for all of this?

title: Ordering Fast Food (2)
dialogue_line: Carry your tray to the cash register.

title: Ordering Fast Food (2)
dialogue_line: This reminds me of the school lunch line.

title: Ordering Fast Food (2)
dialogue_line: Well, it does work the same way.

title: Ordering Fast Food (2)
dialogue_line: Don't forget to grab napkins!

title: Ordering Fast Food (2)
dialogue_line: Thanks for reminding me!

title: Using Coupons
dialogue_line: What are you carrying?

title: Using Coupons
dialogue_line: It's a newspaper with coupons.

title: Using Coupons
dialogue_line: Why do you keep looking at it?

title: Using Coupons
dialogue_line: I'm buying the fruit that is not on sale at Ralphs.

title: Using Coupons
dialogue_line: Is it on sale here?

title: Using Coupons
dialogue_line: No, but it's a bit cheaper.

title: Using Coupons
dialogue_line: Why is it cheaper?

title: Using Coupons
dialogue_line: It's a town supermarket, not a big chain.

title: Using Coupons
dialogue_line: Look! Milk prices rose.

title: Using Coupons
dialogue_line: Lucky for me. I have a coupon for Super Foods.

title: Using Coupons
dialogue_line: I have to start couponing, too.

title: Using Coupons
dialogue_line: You sure save a lot of money!

title: At the Market
dialogue_line: I can't find the jasmine rice!

title: At the Market
dialogue_line: Isn't it in the rice section?

title: At the Market
dialogue_line: No, they don't have it here.

title: At the Market
dialogue_line: Let's check again. Is it this one?

title: At the Market
dialogue_line: No, that's short grain white rice.

title: At the Market
dialogue_line: What about this one? It's longer.

title: At the Market
dialogue_line: No, that's brown rice.

title: At the Market
dialogue_line: How are we supposed to find jasmine rice?

title: At the Market
dialogue_line: Oh, I see more rice in another isle.

title: At the Market
dialogue_line: I found it in the international section.

title: At the Market
dialogue_line: I find it funny that Americans think this rice is exotic!

title: At the Market
dialogue_line: Me, too! But Americans call everything different exotic.

title: Shopping Budget
dialogue_line: Check out my birthday haul!

title: Shopping Budget
dialogue_line: Wow, that's a lot of cash!

title: Shopping Budget
dialogue_line: My relatives were really generous.

title: Shopping Budget
dialogue_line: What are you gonna buy with it?

title: Shopping Budget
dialogue_line: Well, I'm going to save half of it.

title: Shopping Budget
dialogue_line: What?! You could buy so much with this!

title: Shopping Budget
dialogue_line: I know, but I want to save some for later.

title: Shopping Budget
dialogue_line: Well, maybe you can still afford that new video game.

title: Shopping Budget
dialogue_line: No way! I'm going to stretch this money.

title: Shopping Budget
dialogue_line: How are you going to do that?

title: Shopping Budget
dialogue_line: I'm going to buy used games instead.

title: Shopping Budget
dialogue_line: Well, I guess a used game is better than nothing.

title: Where to Buy What
dialogue_line: Do you want to come with me to Walmart?

title: Where to Buy What
dialogue_line: What do you need to buy?

title: Where to Buy What
dialogue_line: I'm out of groceries.

title: Where to Buy What
dialogue_line: Groceries are expensive at Walmart!

title: Where to Buy What
dialogue_line: You really think so?

title: Where to Buy What
dialogue_line: Yes! You should buy groceries at the market.

title: Where to Buy What
dialogue_line: I also need some new blankets.

title: Where to Buy What
dialogue_line: Well, you'd buy that at Walmart.

title: Where to Buy What
dialogue_line: If Walmart sells both, why go to different stores?

title: Where to Buy What
dialogue_line: You'll save money if you do.

title: Where to Buy What
dialogue_line: Why will I save money by going to different stores?

title: Where to Buy What
dialogue_line: Stores have different prices for different things.

title: Making a Shopping List
dialogue_line: I got my roommate today!

title: Making a Shopping List
dialogue_line: That's great! When do you move in?

title: Making a Shopping List
dialogue_line: I move in next week.

title: Making a Shopping List
dialogue_line: Is there anything you have to take?

title: Making a Shopping List
dialogue_line: Yeah, there are a few things.

title: Making a Shopping List
dialogue_line: Write down a list so we can go shopping.

title: Making a Shopping List
dialogue_line: Alright. Here you go, I'm all done!

title: Making a Shopping List
dialogue_line: This is a pretty long list!

title: Making a Shopping List
dialogue_line: There's a lot of stuff I need.

title: Making a Shopping List
dialogue_line: I don't think you need a disco ball.

title: Making a Shopping List
dialogue_line: Of course I do! It goes with the strobe light.

title: Making a Shopping List
dialogue_line: Please write a more practical list.

title: Shopping for New Clothes
dialogue_line: I need new clothes.

title: Shopping for New Clothes
dialogue_line: What kinds of new clothes?

title: Shopping for New Clothes
dialogue_line: I want something stylish.

title: Shopping for New Clothes
dialogue_line: What do you want new clothes for?

title: Shopping for New Clothes
dialogue_line: Well, school starts again in a week.

title: Shopping for New Clothes
dialogue_line: Looking good costs money, though.

title: Shopping for New Clothes
dialogue_line: I know what you mean.

title: Shopping for New Clothes
dialogue_line: The stuff you're looking for is expensive.

title: Shopping for New Clothes
dialogue_line: Yeah, I don't have much money.

title: Shopping for New Clothes
dialogue_line: Maybe you should try bargain shopping.

title: Shopping for New Clothes
dialogue_line: That sounds like something my mom would do.

title: Shopping for New Clothes
dialogue_line: Hey, moms are good at saving money.

title: Trying on a New Outfit
dialogue_line: That is such a cute dress!

title: Trying on a New Outfit
dialogue_line: Thanks! I bought it yesterday.

title: Trying on a New Outfit
dialogue_line: Have you worn it yet?

title: Trying on a New Outfit
dialogue_line: No, I have to accessorize it first!

title: Trying on a New Outfit
dialogue_line: Did you buy everything you needed?

title: Trying on a New Outfit
dialogue_line: Yep! I have a matching belt, a purse, and shoes now!

title: Trying on a New Outfit
dialogue_line: Well, put it on so we can see it!

title: Trying on a New Outfit
dialogue_line: What do you think?

title: Trying on a New Outfit
dialogue_line: It looks nice on you!

title: Trying on a New Outfit
dialogue_line: Are you sure it doesn't make me look fat?

title: Trying on a New Outfit
dialogue_line: No way! It totally flatters your figure.

title: Trying on a New Outfit
dialogue_line: Thanks! I hope my boyfriend likes it, too.

title: Trying on Shoes
dialogue_line: I don't know which size to get.

title: Trying on Shoes
dialogue_line: Why don't you check your shoes?

title: Trying on Shoes
dialogue_line: Sizes are different with each shoe style.

title: Trying on Shoes
dialogue_line: I guess you'll have to measure your foot.

title: Trying on Shoes
dialogue_line: how do I do that?

title: Trying on Shoes
dialogue_line: There's a chart by your chair you put your foot on.

title: Trying on Shoes
dialogue_line: Oh, I found it, thanks.

title: Trying on Shoes
dialogue_line: What size are you?

title: Trying on Shoes
dialogue_line: I'm a size eight.

title: Trying on Shoes
dialogue_line: You have a small shoe size for a man.

title: Trying on Shoes
dialogue_line: It's alright, shoe size doesn't matter.

title: Trying on Shoes
dialogue_line: No. Shoe size does matter.

title: Buy Furniture
dialogue_line: Hey, where are you headed?

title: Buy Furniture
dialogue_line: I'm going to choose some furniture at Ikea.

title: Buy Furniture
dialogue_line: Are you redecorating?

title: Buy Furniture
dialogue_line: Yeah. I'm tired of having mismatched furniture.

title: Buy Furniture
dialogue_line: What are you planning to buy?

title: Buy Furniture
dialogue_line: A couch, a coffee table, and a reading chair.

title: Buy Furniture
dialogue_line: Won't that be expensive?

title: Buy Furniture
dialogue_line: There's a great sale going on right now!

title: Buy Furniture
dialogue_line: Oh, that's great! You'll get good prices.

title: Buy Furniture
dialogue_line: I hope I find what I'm looking for.

title: Buy Furniture
dialogue_line: Will you have it delivered?

title: Buy Furniture
dialogue_line: No. I borrowed a pickup truck from a friend.

title: Buying an Appliance
dialogue_line: I can't believe the coffee maker broke!

title: Buying an Appliance
dialogue_line: Well, it was a pretty old model.

title: Buying an Appliance
dialogue_line: I guess it did last quite a few years.

title: Buying an Appliance
dialogue_line: We should buy a new one.

title: Buying an Appliance
dialogue_line: Do you want to buy the same model?

title: Buying an Appliance
dialogue_line: Maybe it's time we upgrade.

title: Buying an Appliance
dialogue_line: What do you mean by that?

title: Buying an Appliance
dialogue_line: Well, now we can buy a better coffee maker.

title: Buying an Appliance
dialogue_line: What did you have in mind?

title: Buying an Appliance
dialogue_line: Maybe something with more functions!

title: Buying an Appliance
dialogue_line: I would really like an expresso maker.

title: Buying an Appliance
dialogue_line: It's settled, then! We'll buy a new coffee maker!

title: Negotiating a Price
dialogue_line: Excuse me, sir. How much for this lamp?

title: Negotiating a Price
dialogue_line: I'll sell it to you for $50.

title: Negotiating a Price
dialogue_line: Oh, no! That's way too expensive.

title: Negotiating a Price
dialogue_line: What price did you have in mind?

title: Negotiating a Price
dialogue_line: Maybe something closer to one fourth that much.

title: Negotiating a Price
dialogue_line: I might as well give it away for that price!

title: Negotiating a Price
dialogue_line: What about half?

title: Negotiating a Price
dialogue_line: That's still not enough of a profit.

title: Negotiating a Price
dialogue_line: I'll give you $30 for it.

title: Negotiating a Price
dialogue_line: Make it $35 and you've got a deal.

title: Negotiating a Price
dialogue_line: Alright, that sounds good to me.

title: Negotiating a Price
dialogue_line: You sure drive a hard bargain!

title: Scheduling a Delivery
dialogue_line: This is the perfect birthday cake for my son!

title: Scheduling a Delivery
dialogue_line: What day do you need the cake?

title: Scheduling a Delivery
dialogue_line: His party is on Saturday.

title: Scheduling a Delivery
dialogue_line: Would you like to have it delivered?

title: Scheduling a Delivery
dialogue_line: Oh yes, please. Sometime in the morning would be perfect.

title: Scheduling a Delivery
dialogue_line: I can have someone drop it off at 10:30 a.m.

title: Scheduling a Delivery
dialogue_line: That sounds perfect! It's settled.

title: Scheduling a Delivery
dialogue_line: Great! That will be $20 for the cake and $5 for delivery.

title: Scheduling a Delivery
dialogue_line: Can the delivery man enter through the back door?

title: Scheduling a Delivery
dialogue_line: Of course! Just write down your address, please.

title: Scheduling a Delivery
dialogue_line: There, all done! I also wrote my phone number.

title: Scheduling a Delivery
dialogue_line: Alright, thank you! Have a good day!

title: Not Delivered on Time
dialogue_line: Hello, how can I help you?

title: Not Delivered on Time
dialogue_line: I'm calling about your delivery service.

title: Not Delivered on Time
dialogue_line: What seems to be the problem?

title: Not Delivered on Time
dialogue_line: The delivery was scheduled to arrive over an hour ago.

title: Not Delivered on Time
dialogue_line: Your cake has not arrived?

title: Not Delivered on Time
dialogue_line: No, and I am very disappointed.

title: Not Delivered on Time
dialogue_line: I'm sorry about that; we're a bit behind schedule.

title: Not Delivered on Time
dialogue_line: You know I needed that cake an hour ago.

title: Not Delivered on Time
dialogue_line: I understand. I'm sorry for the inconvenience.

title: Not Delivered on Time
dialogue_line: Will the delivery man be here soon?

title: Not Delivered on Time
dialogue_line: Yes, he will. And he will refund you the delivery fee.

title: Not Delivered on Time
dialogue_line: Alright. Thank you.

title: Calling to Reschedule a Time
dialogue_line: Hello, may I please talk to a store manager?

title: Calling to Reschedule a Time
dialogue_line: Yes. What seems to be the problem?

title: Calling to Reschedule a Time
dialogue_line: I scheduled some furniture to be delivered today.

title: Calling to Reschedule a Time
dialogue_line: Would you like to change the delivery time?

title: Calling to Reschedule a Time
dialogue_line: Yes. Something came up and I won't be home until 3 p.m.

title: Calling to Reschedule a Time
dialogue_line: That is not a problem, sir, I'll fix it.

title: Calling to Reschedule a Time
dialogue_line: Thank you. I was worried it had already been dispatched.

title: Calling to Reschedule a Time
dialogue_line: It's no problem at all.

title: Calling to Reschedule a Time
dialogue_line: Please tell the deliverymen to be aware of my dog.

title: Calling to Reschedule a Time
dialogue_line: Does he bite, sir?

title: Calling to Reschedule a Time
dialogue_line: No, but he may trip someone.

title: Calling to Reschedule a Time
dialogue_line: I'll make sure they're on high alert.

title: Getting Things Fixed
dialogue_line: Thank you for coming so quickly.

title: Getting Things Fixed
dialogue_line: What seems to be the problem?

title: Getting Things Fixed
dialogue_line: All the channels suddenly stopped working.

title: Getting Things Fixed
dialogue_line: Did you make sure all the cables are plugged in?

title: Getting Things Fixed
dialogue_line: Yes, I checked and double checked them.

title: Getting Things Fixed
dialogue_line: There may be some kind of signal interference.

title: Getting Things Fixed
dialogue_line: Is there any way you can test that?

title: Getting Things Fixed
dialogue_line: Of course! Give me a moment, please.

title: Getting Things Fixed
dialogue_line: Do you know what the problem is?

title: Getting Things Fixed
dialogue_line: Not quite yet. So you can't change the channels?

title: Getting Things Fixed
dialogue_line: No, not at all.

title: Getting Things Fixed
dialogue_line: Well, you'll be able to once you change the remote batteries.

title: Returning a Defective Item
dialogue_line: Excuse me. I would like to return this.

title: Returning a Defective Item
dialogue_line: What seems to be the problem?

title: Returning a Defective Item
dialogue_line: It's not working correctly.

title: Returning a Defective Item
dialogue_line: When did it start having problems?

title: Returning a Defective Item
dialogue_line: As soon as I took it out of the box.

title: Returning a Defective Item
dialogue_line: I see. Would you like to exchange it?

title: Returning a Defective Item
dialogue_line: No, I think I'd just like my money back.

title: Returning a Defective Item
dialogue_line: Alright. Did you pay with a credit card?

title: Returning a Defective Item
dialogue_line: Yes, I paid with the store credit card.

title: Returning a Defective Item
dialogue_line: I'll return the purchase price to your card.

title: Returning a Defective Item
dialogue_line: Can I get any cash in return?

title: Returning a Defective Item
dialogue_line: No. You now have store credit in your card.

title: Buying a Warranty
dialogue_line: I would like to buy this new laptop, please.

title: Buying a Warranty
dialogue_line: Would you like to buy the warranty?

title: Buying a Warranty
dialogue_line: What is a warranty?

title: Buying a Warranty
dialogue_line: It's something that fixes your machine should it break.

title: Buying a Warranty
dialogue_line: How does it work?

title: Buying a Warranty
dialogue_line: If your laptop breaks, just bring it in and we'll fix it.

title: Buying a Warranty
dialogue_line: How much is the laptop?

title: Buying a Warranty
dialogue_line: It costs $550 without tax.

title: Buying a Warranty
dialogue_line: How much is the warranty?

title: Buying a Warranty
dialogue_line: The warranty is $40 for two years.

title: Buying a Warranty
dialogue_line: I think I'll be fine with just the laptop.

title: Buying a Warranty
dialogue_line: Alright, but you can always change your mind.

title: Using the Warranty
dialogue_line: Hi, I need assistance, please.

title: Using the Warranty
dialogue_line: How can I help you today?

title: Using the Warranty
dialogue_line: My phone refuses to turn on anymore.

title: Using the Warranty
dialogue_line: It looks like it short circuited.

title: Using the Warranty
dialogue_line: Well, I did drop it many times.

title: Using the Warranty
dialogue_line: I'm afraid I can't help you.

title: Using the Warranty
dialogue_line: I guess I'll have to use the warranty.

title: Using the Warranty
dialogue_line: According to your contract, you may choose a new phone.

title: Using the Warranty
dialogue_line: I'll just get the same brand again.

title: Using the Warranty
dialogue_line: Will you need the warranty?

title: Using the Warranty
dialogue_line: No. Just have the phone.

title: Using the Warranty
dialogue_line: Make sure you don't go dropping it!

title: Warranty Expired
dialogue_line: Excuse me; I'd like to use the warranty on my phone.

title: Warranty Expired
dialogue_line: What do you mean use the warranty?

title: Warranty Expired
dialogue_line: The warranty promises a new phone if this one breaks.

title: Warranty Expired
dialogue_line: Did something happen to it?

title: Warranty Expired
dialogue_line: I dropped it and the screen cracked very badly.

title: Warranty Expired
dialogue_line: It says here that your warranty has expired.

title: Warranty Expired
dialogue_line: What! That can't be true!

title: Warranty Expired
dialogue_line: I'm afraid it was only good for a year, sir.

title: Warranty Expired
dialogue_line: What am I supposed to do with a busted phone?

title: Warranty Expired
dialogue_line: Well, if you trade it in, you'll get a discount.

title: Warranty Expired
dialogue_line: Well, I suppose it won't hurt.

title: Warranty Expired
dialogue_line: I suggest you buy a longer warranty on this one, sir.

title: Deciding to buy a Car
dialogue_line: I have finally saved up enough to buy my first car.

title: Deciding to buy a Car
dialogue_line: That's great, dear. Do you have a car in mind?

title: Deciding to buy a Car
dialogue_line: I want a Honda Civic. I like to drive stick.

title: Deciding to buy a Car
dialogue_line: Have you been looking around?

title: Deciding to buy a Car
dialogue_line: Yes, I checked online. I have also been to some dealers.

title: Deciding to buy a Car
dialogue_line: You have to be careful when you go to dealers.

title: Deciding to buy a Car
dialogue_line: I know. They will try to take advantage of people.

title: Deciding to buy a Car
dialogue_line: Yes, you should take somebody that knows about cars.

title: Deciding to buy a Car
dialogue_line: Yeah, I'm going to take Joseph. He knows everything about cars.

title: Deciding to buy a Car
dialogue_line: Good idea. How much are you planning to spend?

title: Deciding to buy a Car
dialogue_line: Wow. Are you going to pay for the car? Or will you be making payments?

title: Deciding to buy a Car
dialogue_line: I was thinking about making payments. I don't want to get stuck without cash.

title: Deciding to buy a Car
dialogue_line: That sounds like a good idea.

title: Where to buy a Used Car
dialogue_line: Hey, Mark. Do you know where I can look for used cars?

title: Where to buy a Used Car
dialogue_line: You could always check online. My friend bought a car from Craigslist.

title: Where to buy a Used Car
dialogue_line: Yeah, I was thinking about that. Do you know any other way?

title: Where to buy a Used Car
dialogue_line: There is a dealership that sells used cars on Atlantic Boulevard.

title: Where to buy a Used Car
dialogue_line: Where is it? I have never seen one.

title: Where to buy a Used Car
dialogue_line: It's on the corner of 7th and Atlantic.

title: Where to buy a Used Car
dialogue_line: Oh, by the Burger King?

title: Where to buy a Used Car
dialogue_line: Yeah. They have a pretty good selection. You should check it out.

title: Where to buy a Used Car
dialogue_line: I'm down. Can you go with me?

title: Where to buy a Used Car
dialogue_line: Sure, I am free tomorrow and Thursday. Shoot me a text.

title: Where to buy a Used Car
dialogue_line: Will do, man. Thanks.

title: Where to buy a Used Car
dialogue_line: Sure thing, bro. You owe me, though.

title: Declining to Buy the Car
dialogue_line: So, what did you think about the car?

title: Declining to Buy the Car
dialogue_line: It was a good test drive, but I need to think it over.

title: Declining to Buy the Car
dialogue_line: Do you have any questions or concerns?

title: Declining to Buy the Car
dialogue_line: I'm sorry, but I don't think I am going to purchase this car.

title: Declining to Buy the Car
dialogue_line: If I may ask, what didn't you like about the car?

title: Declining to Buy the Car
dialogue_line: I don't see myself driving this car.

title: Declining to Buy the Car
dialogue_line: Is it the price? Let me talk to my manager; we might lower the price.

title: Declining to Buy the Car
dialogue_line: It's not the price. I just don't think it's the right fit for me.

title: Declining to Buy the Car
dialogue_line: Would you like to see another car at the dealership?

title: Declining to Buy the Car
dialogue_line: I'm sorry, but I didn't see any other car I liked.

title: Declining to Buy the Car
dialogue_line: Well, thanks for considering our dealership.

title: Declining to Buy the Car
dialogue_line: If I change my mind, I will let you know. Thank you.

title: Detecting a Problem with the Car
dialogue_line: I felt the car's transmission was lagging a bit.

title: Detecting a Problem with the Car
dialogue_line: Really? I haven't felt anything.

title: Detecting a Problem with the Car
dialogue_line: Have you had the transmission checked?

title: Detecting a Problem with the Car
dialogue_line: I took it for a tune-up the other day.

title: Detecting a Problem with the Car
dialogue_line: The mechanic didn't say anything?

title: Detecting a Problem with the Car
dialogue_line: Nope. He told me that the car was in tip-top shape.

title: Detecting a Problem with the Car
dialogue_line: Would you mind if I took it to my mechanic? Just want to be sure.

title: Detecting a Problem with the Car
dialogue_line: Sure, go ahead. Would you like to take it right now?

title: Detecting a Problem with the Car
dialogue_line: Let me check with my mechanic.

title: Detecting a Problem with the Car
dialogue_line: If he is busy, then you can come back tomorrow. I am free.

title: Detecting a Problem with the Car
dialogue_line: He said he is free tomorrow. I guess I can come back tomorrow.

title: Detecting a Problem with the Car
dialogue_line: Great. Feel free to call me at any time.

title: How to Pay for the Used Car
dialogue_line: I really liked this car. How much are you asking for it?

title: How to Pay for the Used Car
dialogue_line: I'm asking for $2,000. It has some minor problems.

title: How to Pay for the Used Car
dialogue_line: Yes, my mechanic told me it was a quick fix.

title: How to Pay for the Used Car
dialogue_line: So, you want to take the car?

title: How to Pay for the Used Car
dialogue_line: Yes, I could write you a check right now.

title: How to Pay for the Used Car
dialogue_line: That sounds good. Could I cash it today?

title: How to Pay for the Used Car
dialogue_line: Yeah, go ahead. It will clear, don't worry.

title: How to Pay for the Used Car
dialogue_line: Didn't mean anything by it.

title: How to Pay for the Used Car
dialogue_line: No, it's cool. I know sometimes you have to wait for a check to clear.

title: How to Pay for the Used Car
dialogue_line: Great. So, could you make it out to Michael Slender?

title: How to Pay for the Used Car
dialogue_line: Sure thing. I'm going to put "Car Payment," under the memo.

title: How to Pay for the Used Car
dialogue_line: Sounds good, man. I will take care of things at the DMV tomorrow.

title: Negotiating a Price with the Owner
dialogue_line: The test drive went well. How much are you asking for?

title: Negotiating a Price with the Owner
dialogue_line: I am selling the car for $10,000.

title: Negotiating a Price with the Owner
dialogue_line: Oh, wow. That's a little steep, don't you think?

title: Negotiating a Price with the Owner
dialogue_line: What were you thinking? Keep in mind, it's in perfect condition.

title: Negotiating a Price with the Owner
dialogue_line: Well, I would want to take it to my mechanic first.

title: Negotiating a Price with the Owner
dialogue_line: From the test drive, what price are you thinking?

title: Negotiating a Price with the Owner
dialogue_line: I was thinking $7,500.

title: Negotiating a Price with the Owner
dialogue_line: I can't do that price. I've put a lot of work into this car.

title: Negotiating a Price with the Owner
dialogue_line: Let's cut to the chase. What's your minimum price?

title: Negotiating a Price with the Owner
dialogue_line: I can let it go for an extra grand.

title: Negotiating a Price with the Owner
dialogue_line: So, you would let it go for $8,500?

title: Negotiating a Price with the Owner
dialogue_line: Yes, that would be fine.

title: Negotiating a Price with a Dealer
dialogue_line: I liked the car, but I am not happy with the price.

title: Negotiating a Price with a Dealer
dialogue_line: I'm sorry, but that's the best we can do.

title: Negotiating a Price with a Dealer
dialogue_line: Could you talk to your manager and have it brought down?

title: Negotiating a Price with a Dealer
dialogue_line: I could try, but it probably won't work.

title: Negotiating a Price with a Dealer
dialogue_line: I can't afford $15,000. The most I can spend is $10,000.

title: Negotiating a Price with a Dealer
dialogue_line: Let me call my manager. He is out of the office.

title: Negotiating a Price with a Dealer
dialogue_line: I can pay it all off now. I don't want to be making payments.

title: Negotiating a Price with a Dealer
dialogue_line: Well, my manager said that we can work with $11,000.

title: Negotiating a Price with a Dealer
dialogue_line: I can't do $11,000. How about $10,500?

title: Negotiating a Price with a Dealer
dialogue_line: Let me check.

title: Negotiating a Price with a Dealer
dialogue_line: Great. I can pay you with a check today.

title: Negotiating a Price with a Dealer
dialogue_line: It seems that $10,500 will work. Let's get the paperwork filled.

title: Test Driving the Car
dialogue_line: How many miles does the car have?

title: Test Driving the Car
dialogue_line: It has 55,150 miles on it.

title: Test Driving the Car
dialogue_line: Let's take it around the block, see what this baby has.

title: Test Driving the Car
dialogue_line: Sure thing. Here are the keys.

title: Test Driving the Car
dialogue_line: The air-conditioning doesn't work?

title: Test Driving the Car
dialogue_line: No, it does not. It's an easy fix though.

title: Test Driving the Car
dialogue_line: Okay. Are there any other problems with it?

title: Test Driving the Car
dialogue_line: Everything should be in order.

title: Test Driving the Car
dialogue_line: The power steering seems to need some fixing.

title: Test Driving the Car
dialogue_line: Why do you say that?

title: Test Driving the Car
dialogue_line: It's hard to turn the steering wheel when turning.

title: Test Driving the Car
dialogue_line: You may take it to a mechanic to make sure.

title: Taking It to the Mechanic
dialogue_line: I checked the whole car, and it has some problems.

title: Taking It to the Mechanic
dialogue_line: What kind of problems does it have?

title: Taking It to the Mechanic
dialogue_line: The brakes need to be replaced, as well as the power steering.
