title: Taking It to the Mechanic
dialogue_line: Is that all? That seems like an easy fix.

title: Taking It to the Mechanic
dialogue_line: That's not all. The alternator seems to be malfunctioning.

title: Taking It to the Mechanic
dialogue_line: How much would it cost me to fix it all?

title: Taking It to the Mechanic
dialogue_line: It'll cost around $300 to $400.

title: Taking It to the Mechanic
dialogue_line: That's not too bad. Is there anything else?

title: Taking It to the Mechanic
dialogue_line: From what I can tell, no. I would recommend buying it.

title: Taking It to the Mechanic
dialogue_line: Let me call the seller, and I will let you know if you can start.

title: Taking It to the Mechanic
dialogue_line: Great. I can start right away, if he gives you the thumbs up.

title: Taking It to the Mechanic
dialogue_line: He said that it's fine. I will be back for the car when you're done.

title: Title Transfer
dialogue_line: So, I can give you the title transfer after you pay me.

title: Title Transfer
dialogue_line: Okay, I can pay you in full today.

title: Title Transfer
dialogue_line: That's great. I have the title transfer here with me.

title: Title Transfer
dialogue_line: Great, what do I need to do?

title: Title Transfer
dialogue_line: I just need you to fill in the information on this form.

title: Title Transfer
dialogue_line: And then you are going to take it to the DMV?

title: Title Transfer
dialogue_line: Yes, you should receive a notice from the DMV in the mail.

title: Title Transfer
dialogue_line: Okay, that sounds good.

title: Title Transfer
dialogue_line: Once you fill out everything, be sure to sign your name at the bottom.

title: Title Transfer
dialogue_line: Will do. When can you take the paper to the DMV?

title: Title Transfer
dialogue_line: I can take it later on today. If not, I can definitely take it tomorrow.

title: Title Transfer
dialogue_line: Awesome. I just want to get everything done fast.

title: Making an Appointment with DMV
dialogue_line: Excuse me, but I'd like to make an appointment for next week.

title: Making an Appointment with DMV
dialogue_line: I can help with that. Did you try doing it over the phone or online?

title: Making an Appointment with DMV
dialogue_line: Yes, but it seemed so confusing.

title: Making an Appointment with DMV
dialogue_line: I know what you mean. They are working on it.

title: Making an Appointment with DMV
dialogue_line: Great. So, I wanted to come in sometime next week.

title: Making an Appointment with DMV
dialogue_line: How does Monday sound?

title: Making an Appointment with DMV
dialogue_line: Monday is no good. Is Wednesday okay?

title: Making an Appointment with DMV
dialogue_line: Yes, Wednesday works. We have these times available.

title: Making an Appointment with DMV
dialogue_line: I can come in at 10 a.m.

title: Making an Appointment with DMV
dialogue_line: Great. I need your name and phone number.

title: Making an Appointment with DMV
dialogue_line: My name is Christopher Clark and my phone number is (555) 323-2465

title: Making an Appointment with DMV
dialogue_line: Great. We will see you on Wednesday.

title: At the Window of DMV
dialogue_line: Hello, I'm here to renew my registration.

title: At the Window of DMV
dialogue_line: Okay, may I please have your renewal notice?

title: At the Window of DMV
dialogue_line: Yes, here it is. Do you need my driver's license?

title: At the Window of DMV
dialogue_line: No, this is fine. It seems you missed your deadline.

title: At the Window of DMV
dialogue_line: Yes, I completely forgot.

title: At the Window of DMV
dialogue_line: Well, it's going to cost you a bit more to renew it.

title: At the Window of DMV
dialogue_line: How much more will it cost?

title: At the Window of DMV
dialogue_line: It was going to be $88, now it's going to be $120.

title: At the Window of DMV
dialogue_line: Well, I guess I'm going to have to be more careful.

title: At the Window of DMV
dialogue_line: It would be a good idea. Have you done the smog check?

title: At the Window of DMV
dialogue_line: No, is that required?

title: At the Window of DMV
dialogue_line: It is this year. You'll have to do it again two years from now.

title: At the Window of DMV
dialogue_line: Can I come back tomorrow?

title: At the Window of DMV
dialogue_line: Yes. Don't wait in line. Come directly to me.

title: Asking about Car Insurance
dialogue_line: Hello, I wanted to ask you about car insurance prices.

title: Asking about Car Insurance
dialogue_line: Sure thing. Please, have a seat.

title: Asking about Car Insurance
dialogue_line: Thank you. I just bought my first car.

title: Asking about Car Insurance
dialogue_line: Great, congratulations! What kind of car is it?

title: Asking about Car Insurance
dialogue_line: It's a 1994 Oldsmobile Cutlass Supreme.

title: Asking about Car Insurance
dialogue_line: Oh, so it's an older make.

title: Asking about Car Insurance
dialogue_line: Yes, but it's in good condition. So, how much would the payments be?

title: Asking about Car Insurance
dialogue_line: Depends. Have you been in any accidents?

title: Asking about Car Insurance
dialogue_line: No, I have not.

title: Asking about Car Insurance
dialogue_line: Have you gotten any driving tickets?

title: Asking about Car Insurance
dialogue_line: Nope. That can affect the insurance rate?

title: Asking about Car Insurance
dialogue_line: At times. Well, everything seems in order. You would have to pay $75 monthly.

title: Asking about Car Insurance
dialogue_line: That sounds great.

title: Buying Insurance
dialogue_line: Welcome to Infinity Insurance.

title: Buying Insurance
dialogue_line: Hello. I am looking to buy insurance for my car.

title: Buying Insurance
dialogue_line: Well, you have come to the right place. Please, sit.

title: Buying Insurance
dialogue_line: I came in the other day, and I spoke with David.

title: Buying Insurance
dialogue_line: Oh, great. Did he take down all your information?

title: Buying Insurance
dialogue_line: Yes. He told me that I had to bring in this paper from the DMV.

title: Buying Insurance
dialogue_line: Great. This should go by real quick, then.

title: Buying Insurance
dialogue_line: David gave me a price yesterday, as well. He told me it would be $75.

title: Buying Insurance
dialogue_line: Yes, that is what we charge for first time drivers.

title: Buying Insurance
dialogue_line: Okay, I would like to make my first payment today.

title: Buying Insurance
dialogue_line: Good. How would you be paying: cash, debit, or credit card?

title: Buying Insurance
dialogue_line: I will be paying debit.

title: Applying for a Driving Permit
dialogue_line: Hello. I am number G85.

title: Applying for a Driving Permit
dialogue_line: How may I help you today?

title: Applying for a Driving Permit
dialogue_line: I would like to apply for my driving permit.

title: Applying for a Driving Permit
dialogue_line: Are you 16 years old? That's the minimum age.

title: Applying for a Driving Permit
dialogue_line: Yes, I am. Here is my ID.

title: Applying for a Driving Permit
dialogue_line: Thank you. May I see your form?

title: Applying for a Driving Permit
dialogue_line: Oh, of course. Would I be able to take the written today?

title: Applying for a Driving Permit
dialogue_line: If you have the $30, then yes, you can take it.

title: Applying for a Driving Permit
dialogue_line: Oh, I must have forgotten my money at home.

title: Applying for a Driving Permit
dialogue_line: Well, you can make an appointment to take it tomorrow.

title: Applying for a Driving Permit
dialogue_line: That sounds like a good idea.

title: Applying for a Driving Permit
dialogue_line: Okay, I will set up the appointment.

title: Taking the Written Test
dialogue_line: Before you take your written test, we need to take your picture.

title: Taking the Written Test
dialogue_line: Okay, where do I go?

title: Taking the Written Test
dialogue_line: I can take the photo. Stand behind the red line, please.

title: Taking the Written Test
dialogue_line: Where do I go to take the test?

title: Taking the Written Test
dialogue_line: Go on the other side of the wall, and pick a stall.

title: Taking the Written Test
dialogue_line: Sounds good. May I have a pencil?

title: Taking the Written Test
dialogue_line: Sure, the pencils are at the front desk.

title: Taking the Written Test
dialogue_line: Where do I obtain the test?

title: Taking the Written Test
dialogue_line: They will give you your test. Remember, eyes on your own test.

title: Taking the Written Test
dialogue_line: Of course. This reminds me of school.

title: Taking the Written Test
dialogue_line: Yeah, we get that a lot.

title: Taking the Written Test
dialogue_line: Will they let me know if I passed the test or not?

title: Taking the Written Test
dialogue_line: Yes, they will let you know after you finish.

title: Learning how to Drive (1)
dialogue_line: The first thing you want to do is fasten your seat belt.

title: Learning how to Drive (1)
dialogue_line: Check. What's next?

title: Learning how to Drive (1)
dialogue_line: Check your mirrors and make sure you can see behind you.

title: Learning how to Drive (1)
dialogue_line: Done. Should I put it in reverse, now?

title: Learning how to Drive (1)
dialogue_line: Yes, ease off the brake slowly.

title: Learning how to Drive (1)
dialogue_line: Okay, I need to turn to leave the parking lot.

title: Learning how to Drive (1)
dialogue_line: Make sure there are no pedestrians walking behind you.

title: Learning how to Drive (1)
dialogue_line: Okay, do I turn the steering wheel to the left?

title: Learning how to Drive (1)
dialogue_line: Yes, make sure you are paying attention to the cars.

title: Learning how to Drive (1)
dialogue_line: Will do. Do I put it in drive now?

title: Learning how to Drive (1)
dialogue_line: Yes, but remember have your foot on the brake and then ease it off.

title: Learning how to Drive (1)
dialogue_line: Wow, this seems easy. Let's go out on the street.

title: Learning how to Drive (2)
dialogue_line: Where should my hands be on the steering wheel?

title: Learning how to Drive (2)
dialogue_line: Your hands should be on 10 and 2.

title: Learning how to Drive (2)
dialogue_line: 10 and 2? What do you mean?

title: Learning how to Drive (2)
dialogue_line: Think of the steering wheel as a clock, and put your hands on 10 and 2.

title: Learning how to Drive (2)
dialogue_line: Oh, okay. What about my eyes? Should I be looking at the signs?

title: Learning how to Drive (2)
dialogue_line: Take a quick glance at the signs, but always look in front.

title: Learning how to Drive (2)
dialogue_line: When do I have to use my horn?

title: Learning how to Drive (2)
dialogue_line: You should use your horn for an emergency.

title: Learning how to Drive (2)
dialogue_line: What about if someone cuts me off?

title: Learning how to Drive (2)
dialogue_line: That's not an appropriate use of your horn.

title: Learning how to Drive (2)
dialogue_line: Am I ready to start driving yet?

title: Learning how to Drive (2)
dialogue_line: No, you need to learn some more of the basics.

title: Failing the Road Test
dialogue_line: Unfortunately, you made a lot of mistakes. I cannot pass you.

title: Failing the Road Test
dialogue_line: What mistakes did I make?

title: Failing the Road Test
dialogue_line: You failed to put your turn signals when turning a corner.

title: Failing the Road Test
dialogue_line: How many mistakes am I allowed?

title: Failing the Road Test
dialogue_line: You are allowed three mistakes. You got five.

title: Failing the Road Test
dialogue_line: Which other mistakes did I make?

title: Failing the Road Test
dialogue_line: You hit the curb when you were parallel parking.

title: Failing the Road Test
dialogue_line: I thought you might have missed that.

title: Failing the Road Test
dialogue_line: No, you also didn't pay attention to some of the signs.

title: Failing the Road Test
dialogue_line: Which signs are you talking about?

title: Failing the Road Test
dialogue_line: You passed a yield sign, and you did not yield.

title: Failing the Road Test
dialogue_line: Can I take the test again?

title: Failing the Road Test
dialogue_line: You can take it again on Monday.

title: Passing the Road Test
dialogue_line: Dad, I passed my driving test!

title: Passing the Road Test
dialogue_line: You did? That's great news!

title: Passing the Road Test
dialogue_line: Where do you want to go first, dad?

title: Passing the Road Test
dialogue_line: You're going to take me out for a ride?

title: Passing the Road Test
dialogue_line: Yes, where do you want to go?

title: Passing the Road Test
dialogue_line: How about we go get you a nice steak dinner?

title: Passing the Road Test
dialogue_line: That sounds great. I could go for a nice steak around now.

title: Passing the Road Test
dialogue_line: Come to the house and pick me up.

title: Passing the Road Test
dialogue_line: Would I be able to drive by myself?

title: Passing the Road Test
dialogue_line: No, you have to drive with someone over the age of 21.

title: Passing the Road Test
dialogue_line: Oh, okay. Well, can we drop off my friend that took me to the DMV?

title: Passing the Road Test
dialogue_line: Sure, we can go drop him off before we leave.

title: Getting the Driver's License
dialogue_line: Finally, I got my driver's license.

title: Getting the Driver's License
dialogue_line: Congratulations! Can I see it?

title: Getting the Driver's License
dialogue_line: Sure. Here it is. I don't like my picture.

title: Getting the Driver's License
dialogue_line: Oh, wow. You blinked.

title: Getting the Driver's License
dialogue_line: Yeah, they didn't want to take another picture.

title: Getting the Driver's License
dialogue_line: I didn't know your middle name was David.

title: Getting the Driver's License
dialogue_line: Oh, no. I didn't want anyone to know.

title: Getting the Driver's License
dialogue_line: Well, you shouldn't have put it on your license.

title: Getting the Driver's License
dialogue_line: I had to. When are you going to get your license?

title: Getting the Driver's License
dialogue_line: I was thinking about going tomorrow to the DMV.

title: Getting the Driver's License
dialogue_line: You want me to take you? I do have my license now.

title: Getting the Driver's License
dialogue_line: Sure! Pick me up from my house at noon.

title: Where to Park on Campus
dialogue_line: Excuse me. This is my first time on campus. Where can I park?

title: Where to Park on Campus
dialogue_line: There are three parking lots on campus.

title: Where to Park on Campus
dialogue_line: Can you point me to the direction of the nearest one?

title: Where to Park on Campus
dialogue_line: Keep driving straight. When you get to the light, make a left.

title: Where to Park on Campus
dialogue_line: Thank you. Do I have to pay?

title: Where to Park on Campus
dialogue_line: The first floor has visitors parking.

title: Where to Park on Campus
dialogue_line: So, do I have to pay? Do they take credit cards?

title: Where to Park on Campus
dialogue_line: Yes, you would have to pay, and they do take credit cards.

title: Where to Park on Campus
dialogue_line: How much does it cost to park?

title: Where to Park on Campus
dialogue_line: I believe it is $3. I could be wrong.

title: Where to Park on Campus
dialogue_line: Oh, okay. Thank you very much.

title: Where to Park on Campus
dialogue_line: You're welcome. Have a nice day.

title: Getting a Parking Ticket
dialogue_line: Sir, is this your car?

title: Getting a Parking Ticket
dialogue_line: Yes, are you giving me a ticket?

title: Getting a Parking Ticket
dialogue_line: Unfortunately, yes, I am. Read the sign.

title: Getting a Parking Ticket
dialogue_line: Which sign? I don't see a sign.

title: Getting a Parking Ticket
dialogue_line: The sign above you, sir.

title: Getting a Parking Ticket
dialogue_line: So, what? It says that we can't park on Mondays.

title: Getting a Parking Ticket
dialogue_line: Yes, it does. Although, it also says that you can't park without a permit.

title: Getting a Parking Ticket
dialogue_line: I didn't see that.

title: Getting a Parking Ticket
dialogue_line: Well, I'm sorry, but I still have to give you the ticket.

title: Getting a Parking Ticket
dialogue_line: Can't you just give me a warning?

title: Getting a Parking Ticket
dialogue_line: I'm sorry, but I already started writing the ticket.

title: Getting a Parking Ticket
dialogue_line: Fine. Give me the ticket. I'll fight it in court.

title: Paying off Parking Tickets
dialogue_line: Dad, I got a parking ticket at school.

title: Paying off Parking Tickets
dialogue_line: Well, you should pay it off as soon as possible.

title: Paying off Parking Tickets
dialogue_line: Where can I pay it off?

title: Paying off Parking Tickets
dialogue_line: You can go to Downtown and go to the court there.

title: Paying off Parking Tickets
dialogue_line: Can I pay it off online?

title: Paying off Parking Tickets
dialogue_line: Yes, you can. Look at the fine. It should give a website.

title: Paying off Parking Tickets
dialogue_line: Oh, okay. Let me go get the ticket. It's in my car.

title: Paying off Parking Tickets
dialogue_line: Hurry, because I need to leave to work.

title: Paying off Parking Tickets
dialogue_line: Oh, wait. I forgot I put it in my wallet.

title: Paying off Parking Tickets
dialogue_line: Well, take it out. Look in the back. It should give you a website.

title: Paying off Parking Tickets
dialogue_line: Yes, it's in the back. Am I going to pay with my debit card?

title: Paying off Parking Tickets
dialogue_line: Yes, do you have the money to pay?

title: Failing to Stop at a Stop Sign
dialogue_line: Do you know why I stopped you?

title: Failing to Stop at a Stop Sign
dialogue_line: No, officer. Why?

title: Failing to Stop at a Stop Sign
dialogue_line: You failed to stop at the stop sign.

title: Failing to Stop at a Stop Sign
dialogue_line: I'm sorry, officer. I didn't see the stop sign.

title: Failing to Stop at a Stop Sign
dialogue_line: Have you had anything to drink?

title: Failing to Stop at a Stop Sign
dialogue_line: No, I have not. Do you need to see my license?

title: Failing to Stop at a Stop Sign
dialogue_line: Yes, I need your license and registration.

title: Failing to Stop at a Stop Sign
dialogue_line: Okay, here is my paperwork.

title: Failing to Stop at a Stop Sign
dialogue_line: I will be back. I need to check your background.

title: Failing to Stop at a Stop Sign
dialogue_line: Sure thing, officer.

title: Failing to Stop at a Stop Sign
dialogue_line: Everything seems to be in order. I'm going to give you a warning.

title: Failing to Stop at a Stop Sign
dialogue_line: Thank you, officer. I'll be more careful.

title: Driving through a Red Light
dialogue_line: Where do you want to go eat?

title: Driving through a Red Light
dialogue_line: I'm not sure. Wait, watch out! The light is red!

title: Driving through a Red Light
dialogue_line: Oh, damn. Well, there I passed it.

title: Driving through a Red Light
dialogue_line: I think there was a cop at the light.

title: Driving through a Red Light
dialogue_line: Can you check? Look behind you.

title: Driving through a Red Light
dialogue_line: I don't see anything. Wait, there is a car turning the corner.

title: Driving through a Red Light
dialogue_line: Is it a police car? Well, is it?

title: Driving through a Red Light
dialogue_line: Oh, no. I think it is.

title: Driving through a Red Light
dialogue_line: Well, hopefully he doesn't stop us.

title: Driving through a Red Light
dialogue_line: Oh, no. He just turned on his lights.

title: Driving through a Red Light
dialogue_line: Damn, I have to pull over.

title: Driving through a Red Light
dialogue_line: Yes, I hope I don't get a ticket.

title: Fighting a Ticket in Court (1)
dialogue_line: Your Honour, I'd like to challenge this ticket.

title: Fighting a Ticket in Court (1)
dialogue_line: What is your reason for challenging this ticket?

title: Fighting a Ticket in Court (1)
dialogue_line: The police officer did not have the right to issue the ticket.

title: Fighting a Ticket in Court (1)
dialogue_line: Can you explain what you mean with that statement?

title: Fighting a Ticket in Court (1)
dialogue_line: I was rightfully parked. He told me that I was parked in a handicap space.

title: Fighting a Ticket in Court (1)
dialogue_line: Well, was it a handicap space?

title: Fighting a Ticket in Court (1)
dialogue_line: It used to be. It is not anymore.

title: Fighting a Ticket in Court (1)
dialogue_line: Well, was there a sign letting you know it was a handicap space?

title: Fighting a Ticket in Court (1)
dialogue_line: No, because the spot has since been removed.

title: Fighting a Ticket in Court (1)
dialogue_line: So, did you explain to the officer that it was no longer a handicap space.

title: Fighting a Ticket in Court (1)
dialogue_line: I tried, but he wouldn't listen. He said I was trying to get away from paying.

title: Fighting a Ticket in Court (1)
dialogue_line: Thank you. I will question the officer, and get his side of the story.

title: Fighting a Ticket in Court (2)
dialogue_line: I can't pay for the ticket.

title: Fighting a Ticket in Court (2)
dialogue_line: Why can't you pay for the ticket?

title: Fighting a Ticket in Court (2)
dialogue_line: Well, I just got laid off from my job.

title: Fighting a Ticket in Court (2)
dialogue_line: Okay, Mr. Richardson. I'm going to give you an alternative.

title: Fighting a Ticket in Court (2)
dialogue_line: What do you mean?

title: Fighting a Ticket in Court (2)
dialogue_line: I am going to have to give you 36 hours of community service.

title: Fighting a Ticket in Court (2)
dialogue_line: Thank you for the opportunity, Your Honor.

title: Fighting a Ticket in Court (2)
dialogue_line: You will report to the nearest community service center.

title: Fighting a Ticket in Court (2)
dialogue_line: They will tell me where to go?

title: Fighting a Ticket in Court (2)
dialogue_line: Yes, they will give you an option of places to go.

title: Fighting a Ticket in Court (2)
dialogue_line: Thank you, Your Honour. I greatly appreciate it.

title: Fighting a Ticket in Court (2)
dialogue_line: You're welcome. I hope you don't plan on returning to this courtroom anytime soon.

title: Paying the Ticket Fine
dialogue_line: So, how much is the ticket going to cost?

title: Paying the Ticket Fine
dialogue_line: Well, it's going to be $200.

title: Paying the Ticket Fine
dialogue_line: $200 for a parking ticket?

title: Paying the Ticket Fine
dialogue_line: Well, it looks like this is your third parking ticket.

title: Paying the Ticket Fine
dialogue_line: Yes, but I haven't gotten one in a couple of months.

title: Paying the Ticket Fine
dialogue_line: This is your third parking ticket this year.

title: Paying the Ticket Fine
dialogue_line: I know. Fine, I will pay the ticket.

title: Paying the Ticket Fine
dialogue_line: How will you be paying the ticket?

title: Paying the Ticket Fine
dialogue_line: I will be paying cash.

title: Paying the Ticket Fine
dialogue_line: So that'll be $200 in cash.

title: Paying the Ticket Fine
dialogue_line: Yes. Let me get you your receipt.

title: Paying the Ticket Fine
dialogue_line: Thank you. Have a nice day.

title: Calling a Traffic School
dialogue_line: Hello. I need to make an appointment.

title: Calling a Traffic School
dialogue_line: Were you mandated by the court to go to traffic school?

title: Calling a Traffic School
dialogue_line: Yes, I was. Does that matter?

title: Calling a Traffic School
dialogue_line: Yes, it does. Let me have your full name.

title: Calling a Traffic School
dialogue_line: It's David Johnson. What days do you have available?

title: Calling a Traffic School
dialogue_line: We have Tuesday, Thursday, and Saturday.

title: Calling a Traffic School
dialogue_line: Oh, okay. I can make it on Thursday. What time should I be in?

title: Calling a Traffic School
dialogue_line: Come in at 9 a.m. if you can't make it during that time, please call.

title: Calling a Traffic School
dialogue_line: Great. I will see you this Thursday.

title: Calling a Traffic School
dialogue_line: Remember to bring your court papers. We will need to sign those.

title: Calling a Traffic School
dialogue_line: I seem to have lost them. Could I go to court to get another copy?

title: Calling a Traffic School
dialogue_line: Yes, go to the court and print them out before you come over.

title: Talking to the Traffic School Instructor
dialogue_line: Thank you for coming in today. I'll see you next week.

title: Talking to the Traffic School Instructor
dialogue_line: Excuse me, instructor. May I speak with you for a moment?

title: Talking to the Traffic School Instructor
dialogue_line: Sure thing, Mr. Davis. What can I help you with?

title: Talking to the Traffic School Instructor
dialogue_line: Well, about next week. I can't make it.

title: Talking to the Traffic School Instructor
dialogue_line: That is a problem. You are mandated by court to attend every week.

title: Talking to the Traffic School Instructor
dialogue_line: I know, but I have a family emergency.

title: Talking to the Traffic School Instructor
dialogue_line: You have to go to the court and ask for an extension.

title: Talking to the Traffic School Instructor
dialogue_line: Do I have to come back over here after?

title: Talking to the Traffic School Instructor
dialogue_line: No, they will give you a make-up date.

title: Talking to the Traffic School Instructor
dialogue_line: Great. Thank you for all your help.

title: Talking to the Traffic School Instructor
dialogue_line: Sure thing. I hope everything is alright.

title: Talking to the Traffic School Instructor
dialogue_line: Thanks. I'll see you next time.

title: A Traffic Incident
dialogue_line: What's going on? What happened?

title: A Traffic Incident
dialogue_line: I'm sorry. I wasn't paying attention.

title: A Traffic Incident
dialogue_line: Well, I'm going to need your information.

title: A Traffic Incident
dialogue_line: Yes, I know. I'm sorry. I was distracted with the car accident.

title: A Traffic Incident
dialogue_line: I figured. Well, here is my information.

title: A Traffic Incident
dialogue_line: Let me get my information. I have it in my car.

title: A Traffic Incident
dialogue_line: Yes, please do that.

title: A Traffic Incident
dialogue_line: Well, it seems like I don't have my insurance card.

title: A Traffic Incident
dialogue_line: How could you not have your insurance information?

title: A Traffic Incident
dialogue_line: I drive another car; I must have left it in that one.

title: A Traffic Incident
dialogue_line: Fine. Let me get your information.

title: A Traffic Incident
dialogue_line: Sure, call me later on today. I will give you my information.

title: A Car Accident
dialogue_line: Hello, officer. I want to report a car accident.

title: A Car Accident
dialogue_line: What was the cause of the accident?

title: A Car Accident
dialogue_line: The other driver had been drinking.

title: A Car Accident
dialogue_line: Are there any casualties?

title: A Car Accident
dialogue_line: No, both drivers are fine.

title: A Car Accident
dialogue_line: Where did the accident take place?

title: A Car Accident
dialogue_line: It's on the corner of Fifth and Vine Street.

title: A Car Accident
dialogue_line: How many people are involved in the accident?

title: A Car Accident
dialogue_line: There are two cars. Each car has two people in the vehicle.

title: A Car Accident
dialogue_line: We will respond as soon as possible.

title: A Car Accident
dialogue_line: Thank you. Can you hurry; it looks like one of the drivers wants to leave.

title: A Car Accident
dialogue_line: We will get there as soon as possible.

title: Calling the Insurance Company
dialogue_line: Hello. I was in an accident earlier today.

title: Calling the Insurance Company
dialogue_line: Okay, did you get the appropriate information from the other driver?

title: Calling the Insurance Company
dialogue_line: Yes, I did. Just tell me what you need.

title: Calling the Insurance Company
dialogue_line: It would be better if you came into the office.

title: Calling the Insurance Company
dialogue_line: When can I come in?

title: Calling the Insurance Company
dialogue_line: You can come in tomorrow. What time works for you?

title: Calling the Insurance Company
dialogue_line: I can make it in tomorrow at noon.

title: Calling the Insurance Company
dialogue_line: Great. Can you give me your full name?

title: Calling the Insurance Company
dialogue_line: Yes, it's David Mark.

title: Calling the Insurance Company
dialogue_line: Okay, Mr. Mark. I have you scheduled for tomorrow at noon.

title: Calling the Insurance Company
dialogue_line: Sounds good. I will see you tomorrow.

title: Calling the Insurance Company
dialogue_line: Please remember to bring in all the information you got from the other driver.

title: How to Find an Apartment (1)
dialogue_line: I'm looking for an apartment. Have you seen any apartments for rent?

title: How to Find an Apartment (1)
dialogue_line: No, I have not. I'll keep an eye out.

title: How to Find an Apartment (1)
dialogue_line: Thank you. That's very helpful of you.

title: How to Find an Apartment (1)
dialogue_line: You're welcome. What kind of an apartment are you looking for?

title: How to Find an Apartment (1)
dialogue_line: An apartment with one bedroom.

title: How to Find an Apartment (1)
dialogue_line: In what city?

title: How to Find an Apartment (1)
dialogue_line: In the city of Pasadena.

title: How to Find an Apartment (1)
dialogue_line: You should try looking in the local newspaper.

title: How to Find an Apartment (1)
dialogue_line: That's a good idea. I'll try that today.

title: How to Find an Apartment (1)
dialogue_line: Let me know if you find any apartments.

title: How to Find an Apartment (1)
dialogue_line: Alright, I'll keep you in the loop.

title: How to Find an Apartment (1)
dialogue_line: Good luck in your search.

title: How to Find an Apartment (2)
dialogue_line: I'm looking for an apartment. Have you seen any apartments for rent?

title: How to Find an Apartment (2)
dialogue_line: No, I have not. I'll keep an eye out.

title: How to Find an Apartment (2)
dialogue_line: Thank you. That's very helpful of you.

title: How to Find an Apartment (2)
dialogue_line: You're welcome. What kind of an apartment are you looking for?

title: How to Find an Apartment (2)
dialogue_line: An apartment with one bedroom.

title: How to Find an Apartment (2)
dialogue_line: In what city?

title: How to Find an Apartment (2)
dialogue_line: In the city of Pasadena.

title: How to Find an Apartment (2)
dialogue_line: You should try looking in the local newspaper.

title: How to Find an Apartment (2)
dialogue_line: That's a good idea. I'll try that today.

title: How to Find an Apartment (2)
dialogue_line: Let me know if you find any apartments.

title: How to Find an Apartment (2)
dialogue_line: Alright, I'll keep you in the loop.

title: How to Find an Apartment (2)
dialogue_line: Good luck in your search.

title: Finding an Apartment
dialogue_line: I found an apartment!

title: Finding an Apartment
dialogue_line: That's great to hear. I congratulate you.

title: Finding an Apartment
dialogue_line: Thank you. I'm so glad I finally found one.

title: Finding an Apartment
dialogue_line: How did you find it?

title: Finding an Apartment
dialogue_line: On the computer.

title: Finding an Apartment
dialogue_line: How did you know to look there?

title: Finding an Apartment
dialogue_line: A friend told me to look online.

title: Finding an Apartment
dialogue_line: Where is the apartment?

title: Finding an Apartment
dialogue_line: In Pasadena.

title: Finding an Apartment
dialogue_line: That's a nice town. How big is the apartment?

title: Finding an Apartment
dialogue_line: It's big enough for me.

title: Finding an Apartment
dialogue_line: You should meet with a Rental Agent.

title: Finding an Apartment
dialogue_line: What for?

title: Finding an Apartment
dialogue_line: To get a professional opinion.

title: Finding an Apartment
dialogue_line: Good idea. Know of any?

title: Finding an Apartment
dialogue_line: You could talk to mine. Here's his business card.

title: Visiting a Rental Agent (1)
dialogue_line: Are you the Rental Agent?

title: Visiting a Rental Agent (1)
dialogue_line: Yes, I am. Welcome to my office.

title: Visiting a Rental Agent (1)
dialogue_line: It's nice to meet you. Thank you.

title: Visiting a Rental Agent (1)
dialogue_line: How did you hear about me?

title: Visiting a Rental Agent (1)
dialogue_line: A friend referred me to you.

title: Visiting a Rental Agent (1)
dialogue_line: Oh really. I'm glad.

title: Visiting a Rental Agent (1)
dialogue_line: He said you were the right person to talk to about renting an apartment.

title: Visiting a Rental Agent (1)
dialogue_line: That's nice to hear. I'm flattered. How can I help you?

title: Visiting a Rental Agent (1)
dialogue_line: I found an apartment in Pasadena, and I wanted a second opinion.

title: Visiting a Rental Agent (1)
dialogue_line: Sure. Do you have the apartment's information?

title: Visiting a Rental Agent (1)
dialogue_line: Yes, I do. Here it is.

title: Visiting a Rental Agent (1)
dialogue_line: Thank you.

title: Visiting a Rental Agent (2)
dialogue_line: Is it a good apartment?

title: Visiting a Rental Agent (2)
dialogue_line: Yes. It seems fine to me.

title: Visiting a Rental Agent (2)
dialogue_line: That's good to hear.

title: Visiting a Rental Agent (2)
dialogue_line: There is only one issue.

title: Visiting a Rental Agent (2)
dialogue_line: What is it?

title: Visiting a Rental Agent (2)
dialogue_line: The landlord is asking for too much money.

title: Visiting a Rental Agent (2)
dialogue_line: What should I do?

title: Visiting a Rental Agent (2)
dialogue_line: Negotiate with him.

title: Visiting a Rental Agent (2)
dialogue_line: I'm not such a good negotiator. Can you do it for me?

title: Visiting a Rental Agent (2)
dialogue_line: For a small fee, I sure can.

title: Visiting a Rental Agent (2)
dialogue_line: Alright, you have the deal.

title: Visiting a Rental Agent (2)
dialogue_line: I'll call him this evening.

title: Asking About the Apartment Location (1)
dialogue_line: Is the location of the apartment a good one?

title: Asking About the Apartment Location (1)
dialogue_line: Yes. I would say so.

title: Asking About the Apartment Location (1)
dialogue_line: Why is that?

title: Asking About the Apartment Location (1)
dialogue_line: The city of Pasadena is generally safe. Have you been there?

title: Asking About the Apartment Location (1)
dialogue_line: Yes, it's relatively calm.

title: Asking About the Apartment Location (1)
dialogue_line: Do have any other concerns about the location?

title: Asking About the Apartment Location (1)
dialogue_line: Is the apartment's location near any shopping areas?

title: Asking About the Apartment Location (1)
dialogue_line: Yes, it is.

title: Asking About the Apartment Location (1)
dialogue_line: What shopping areas?

title: Asking About the Apartment Location (1)
dialogue_line: There is a place called Old Town where a lot of shops are located.

title: Asking About the Apartment Location (1)
dialogue_line: How far away is Old Town from the apartment's location?

title: Asking About the Apartment Location (1)
dialogue_line: Ten minutes away on car.

title: Asking About the Apartment Location (1)
dialogue_line: And on foot?

title: Asking About the Apartment Location (1)
dialogue_line: Twenty minutes on foot.

title: Asking About the Apartment's Location (2)
dialogue_line: The apartment seems nice.

title: Asking About the Apartment's Location (2)
dialogue_line: It sure does.

title: Asking About the Apartment's Location (2)
dialogue_line: I just have a few questions to ask.

title: Asking About the Apartment's Location (2)
dialogue_line: About what?

title: Asking About the Apartment's Location (2)
dialogue_line: The apartment's location.

title: Asking About the Apartment's Location (2)
dialogue_line: Ask away. I'll try my best to answer them.

title: Asking About the Apartment's Location (2)
dialogue_line: Is the location in close proximity to the police department?

title: Asking About the Apartment's Location (2)
dialogue_line: Yes, it is. Only fifteen minutes away.

title: Asking About the Apartment's Location (2)
dialogue_line: What about the fire department?

title: Asking About the Apartment's Location (2)
dialogue_line: Not as close as the police department, but still not far.

title: Asking About the Apartment's Location (2)
dialogue_line: That's good to hear. Thanks for the answers.

title: Asking About the Apartment's Location (2)
dialogue_line: Don't mention it. It was my pleasure to help.

title: Asking About the Neighborhood (1)
dialogue_line: What can you tell me about the neighborhood?

title: Asking About the Neighborhood (1)
dialogue_line: Only good things.

title: Asking About the Neighborhood (1)
dialogue_line: Like what, for example?

title: Asking About the Neighborhood (1)
dialogue_line: The neighborhood is a safe and clean place.

title: Asking About the Neighborhood (1)
dialogue_line: Is there any crime?

title: Asking About the Neighborhood (1)
dialogue_line: There is hardly any crime that is reported.

title: Asking About the Neighborhood (1)
dialogue_line: I wonder why that is.

title: Asking About the Neighborhood (1)
dialogue_line: There is a neighborhood watch that patrols daily.

title: Asking About the Neighborhood (1)
dialogue_line: That explains crime disparity.

title: Asking About the Neighborhood (1)
dialogue_line: Any other questions?

title: Asking About the Neighborhood (1)
dialogue_line: Who are the residents living in the neighborhood?

title: Asking About the Neighborhood (1)
dialogue_line: Mostly families and some retired folks.

title: Asking About the Neighborhood (1)
dialogue_line: Sounds like a pleasant neighborhood.

title: Asking About the Neighborhood (1)
dialogue_line: It really is. I hope you enjoy living there.

title: Asking About the Neighborhood (2)
dialogue_line: I have a few questions regarding the neighborhood.

title: Asking About the Neighborhood (2)
dialogue_line: Alright, let's hear them.

title: Asking About the Neighborhood (2)
dialogue_line: Does the neighborhood look good aesthetically?

title: Asking About the Neighborhood (2)
dialogue_line: Yes, very much so.

title: Asking About the Neighborhood (2)
dialogue_line: That's good news. Can you describe how?

title: Asking About the Neighborhood (2)
dialogue_line: The neighborhood is abundant with plant life.

title: Asking About the Neighborhood (2)
dialogue_line: You mean like trees and bushes?

title: Asking About the Neighborhood (2)
dialogue_line: Yes, and not just any regular trees and bushes. The ones here are beautiful.

title: Asking About the Neighborhood (2)
dialogue_line: Anything else you can describe?

title: Asking About the Neighborhood (2)
dialogue_line: Yes. The streets are nicely paved, and the street lights are quite quaint.

title: Asking About the Neighborhood (2)
dialogue_line: Wow, I could just picture it now.

title: Asking About the Neighborhood (2)
dialogue_line: The neighborhood will look even better in person.

title: Asking About Safety Features
dialogue_line: Tell me about the apartment's safety features.

title: Asking About Safety Features
dialogue_line: What would you like to know?

title: Asking About Safety Features
dialogue_line: Do the front and back door equip with locks?

title: Asking About Safety Features
dialogue_line: But of course, they do.

title: Asking About Safety Features
dialogue_line: What kind of locks do they have?

title: Asking About Safety Features
dialogue_line: The best deadbolt locks in town.

title: Asking About Safety Features
dialogue_line: I'm glad to hear that.

title: Asking About Safety Features
dialogue_line: Rest assured that you will be safe and sound in your new apartment.

title: Asking About Safety Features
dialogue_line: That's comforting to hear. I thank you for your words.

title: Asking About Safety Features
dialogue_line: Not a problem. Do you have any other questions or concerns?

title: Asking About Safety Features
dialogue_line: Let me think for a second.

title: Asking About Safety Features
dialogue_line: Take all the time you need.

title: Asking About Safety Features
dialogue_line: Alright, I got one.

title: Asking About Safety Features
dialogue_line: Okay, let's hear it.

title: Asking About Safety Features
dialogue_line: Does the apartment have an alarm system?

title: Asking About Safety Features
dialogue_line: It in fact does! It's a very important safety feature to have.

title: Asking About a Floor Plan
dialogue_line: Do you have the floor plan to the apartment?

title: Asking About a Floor Plan
dialogue_line: Yes I do. Would you like to take a look at it?

title: Asking About a Floor Plan
dialogue_line: Yes I would, if you don't mind.

title: Asking About a Floor Plan
dialogue_line: Not at all. By all means, take a look for yourself.

title: Asking About a Floor Plan
dialogue_line: Where did you get this piece of paper of the floor plan?

title: Asking About a Floor Plan
dialogue_line: I have access to this kind of information.

title: Asking About a Floor Plan
dialogue_line: I see. Can you help me read this?

title: Asking About a Floor Plan
dialogue_line: Sure I can. What would you like to know?

title: Asking About a Floor Plan
dialogue_line: How big is the living room?

title: Asking About a Floor Plan
dialogue_line: According to the floor plan it is 20 feet long and 15 feet wide.

title: Asking About a Floor Plan
dialogue_line: Oh, so that's what those numbers mean.

title: Asking About a Floor Plan
dialogue_line: Right. This apartment has a good floor plan.

title: Discrimination
dialogue_line: Is there any kind of discrimination committed in the city?

title: Discrimination
dialogue_line: Not that I have witnessed.

title: Discrimination
dialogue_line: What about any reports?

title: Discrimination
dialogue_line: Of discrimination? I wouldn't know, to be honest.

title: Discrimination
dialogue_line: Do you know where I could get access to that kind of information?

title: Discrimination
dialogue_line: Perhaps the police department. What made you ask in the first place?

title: Discrimination
dialogue_line: I was just curious. It never hurts to ask.

title: Discrimination
dialogue_line: I wouldn't worry too much about discrimination.

title: Discrimination
dialogue_line: Why do you say that?

title: Discrimination
dialogue_line: We live in progressive times now.

title: Discrimination
dialogue_line: That doesn't mean discrimination isn't committed in this day and age.

title: Discrimination
dialogue_line: I guess you are right.

title: Scheduling an Apartment Viewing (1)
dialogue_line: Hello, I would like to schedule an appointment to view the apartment.

title: Scheduling an Apartment Viewing (1)
dialogue_line: Sure thing. What is your name?

title: Scheduling an Apartment Viewing (1)
dialogue_line: My name is Lisa.

title: Scheduling an Apartment Viewing (1)
dialogue_line: Okay, Lisa. I have an appointment available at three o'clock.

title: Scheduling an Apartment Viewing (1)
dialogue_line: Three o'clock is just fine. On what day would that be?

title: Scheduling an Apartment Viewing (1)
dialogue_line: I have days available from Saturday through Monday.

title: Scheduling an Apartment Viewing (1)
dialogue_line: Can you do Friday instead?

title: Scheduling an Apartment Viewing (1)
dialogue_line: No, I'm sorry. My son is visiting on Friday.

title: Scheduling an Apartment Viewing (1)
dialogue_line: I understand. In that case, can I come the following day?

title: Scheduling an Apartment Viewing (1)
dialogue_line: Saturday? that's great! See you then.

title: Scheduling an Apartment Viewing (2)
dialogue_line: Good afternoon. Are you the person renting out the apartment?

title: Scheduling an Apartment Viewing (2)
dialogue_line: Yes, I am. What can I do for you?

title: Scheduling an Apartment Viewing (2)
dialogue_line: I'm interested in viewing the apartment.

title: Scheduling an Apartment Viewing (2)
dialogue_line: Alright, would like to make an appointment?

title: Scheduling an Apartment Viewing (2)
dialogue_line: Yes, I very much would.

title: Scheduling an Apartment Viewing (2)
dialogue_line: What time are you available?

title: Scheduling an Apartment Viewing (2)
dialogue_line: Mostly after sundown on weekdays. What days are good for you?

title: Scheduling an Apartment Viewing (2)
dialogue_line: I work in the evenings Monday through Friday. Are you available at any time on the weekends?

title: Scheduling an Apartment Viewing (2)
dialogue_line: I'm available on Sunday. How about three o'clock Sunday afternoon?

title: Scheduling an Apartment Viewing (2)
dialogue_line: That's a perfect time for me.

title: Scheduling an Apartment Viewing (2)
dialogue_line: Great! I'll come over at three on Sunday.

title: Scheduling an Apartment Viewing (2)
dialogue_line: Sure! I'm expecting you.

title: Negotiating the Price (1)
dialogue_line: It's a nice apartment.

title: Negotiating the Price (1)
dialogue_line: I knew you would like it. Who wouldn't?

title: Negotiating the Price (1)
dialogue_line: There is only one issue.

title: Negotiating the Price (1)
dialogue_line: What is it? Is it the next door neighbor?

title: Negotiating the Price (1)
dialogue_line: No, he's great. I was talking about the price.

title: Negotiating the Price (1)
dialogue_line: What about the price? It's a fair price, if I do say so myself.

title: Negotiating the Price (1)
dialogue_line: I think it's a little too high for me. Is there anything you can do for me?

title: Negotiating the Price (1)
dialogue_line: I'm not sure if I can.

title: Negotiating the Price (1)
dialogue_line: Listen, I would be the perfect tenant.

title: Negotiating the Price (1)
dialogue_line: And how is that?

title: Negotiating the Price (1)
dialogue_line: Well, I always make my payments on time. You can check my credit score.

title: Negotiating the Price (1)
dialogue_line: Alright, that's good to hear.

title: Negotiating the Price (1)
dialogue_line: I sleep early, and am very respectable. I also have no pets.

title: Negotiating the Price (1)
dialogue_line: I think I've heard enough. You sound like a good tenant. I'm going to reduce the monthly rent by $100.

title: Negotiating the Price (2)
dialogue_line: Is there anything I can say or do to make you lower the monthly rent?

title: Negotiating the Price (2)
dialogue_line: I doubt it, but let me hear you out.

title: Negotiating the Price (2)
dialogue_line: If you lower the price, I will mow the lawn and trim the hedges every month.

title: Negotiating the Price (2)
dialogue_line: No, I already have someone who does that.

title: Negotiating the Price (2)
dialogue_line: What if I give you the first two months' rent in advance?

title: Negotiating the Price (2)
dialogue_line: No deal. Sorry, kid.

title: Negotiating the Price (2)
dialogue_line: Looks like I can't convince you to lower the rent.

title: Negotiating the Price (2)
dialogue_line: I'm sorry, but that was a good effort.

title: Negotiating the Price (2)
dialogue_line: I guess I'm going to have such a hard time paying rent.

title: Negotiating the Price (2)
dialogue_line: Don't look so down now.

title: Negotiating the Price (2)
dialogue_line: I can't help it.

title: Negotiating the Price (2)
dialogue_line: Alright, you win! I'll lower the price.

title: Going Over the Lease
dialogue_line: I think I'm ready to sign the lease.

title: Going Over the Lease
dialogue_line: Good! Let me just go over some key points.

title: Going Over the Lease
dialogue_line: If you feel the need to do so, then go ahead.

title: Going Over the Lease
dialogue_line: By signing this contract, you are agreeing to rent the apartment for a certain amount of time.

title: Going Over the Lease
dialogue_line: Yes, I am aware of this. The lease is for one year.

title: Going Over the Lease
dialogue_line: Are you ready to make that commitment?

title: Going Over the Lease
dialogue_line: Yes, I am. What else?

title: Going Over the Lease
dialogue_line: No pets in the apartment.

title: Going Over the Lease
dialogue_line: Don't worry. I have no pets.

title: Going Over the Lease
dialogue_line: There'll be a late fee of $20 if you don't pay on time.

title: Going Over the Lease
dialogue_line: I have no problem with that. Where do I sign?

title: Going Over the Lease
dialogue_line: Write your signature here, and your initials here and here.

title: Security Deposit (1)
dialogue_line: Let's discuss the security deposit.

title: Security Deposit (1)
dialogue_line: Do you have the full amount for the deposit?

title: Security Deposit (1)
dialogue_line: I think I do. How much was it again?

title: Security Deposit (1)
dialogue_line: It was a total of $1,000.

title: Security Deposit (1)
dialogue_line: Can you please explain how a security deposit works?

title: Security Deposit (1)
dialogue_line: You don't know? I thought you did.

title: Security Deposit (1)
dialogue_line: I just want to make sure I have it correct.

title: Security Deposit (1)
dialogue_line: The security deposit ensures coverage for any damages you may cause to the apartment at your departure.

title: Security Deposit (1)
dialogue_line: I see. Is that it or is there more to it?

title: Security Deposit (1)
dialogue_line: The security deposit also could be used to help repay any owing rent you may have.

title: Security Deposit (1)
dialogue_line: Okay, that's what I was thinking. Thanks for confirming that information.

title: Security Deposit (1)
dialogue_line: Sure thing. You're welcome.

title: Security Deposit (2)
dialogue_line: This is a great apartment.

title: Security Deposit (2)
dialogue_line: I'm glad you found it to your liking.

title: Security Deposit (2)
dialogue_line: I knew I would, judging from the description I read.

title: Security Deposit (2)
dialogue_line: Are you ready to discuss payment?

title: Security Deposit (2)
dialogue_line: Yes, I think I am.

title: Security Deposit (2)
dialogue_line: You will have to pay for the security deposit.

title: Security Deposit (2)
dialogue_line: Security deposit? What is that for?

title: Security Deposit (2)
dialogue_line: It's simply money you give to me as a kind of insurance in case you cause any damage to the apartment.

title: Security Deposit (2)
dialogue_line: I understand. That makes sense.

title: Security Deposit (2)
dialogue_line: So are you ready to pay the deposit?

title: Security Deposit (2)
dialogue_line: How much are you asking?

title: Security Deposit (2)
dialogue_line: It's at least $1,000 for the security deposit.

title: Security Deposit (2)
dialogue_line: Alright, I could provide that much.

title: Security Deposit (2)
dialogue_line: Perfect! I think we are ready to sign the lease.

title: Policy Towards Pets (1)
dialogue_line: What's your policy towards owning pets in the apartment?

title: Policy Towards Pets (1)
dialogue_line: I usually don't permit any kind of pets.

title: Policy Towards Pets (1)
dialogue_line: Would you be willing to make an exception?

title: Policy Towards Pets (1)
dialogue_line: It depends on the pet. Are you a pet owner?

title: Policy Towards Pets (1)
dialogue_line: I have a few rabbits and hamsters.

title: Policy Towards Pets (1)
dialogue_line: How many exactly?

title: Policy Towards Pets (1)
dialogue_line: I have two rabbits and three hamsters.

title: Policy Towards Pets (1)
dialogue_line: As long as you keep them inside your apartment I don't see why they would be a problem.

title: Policy Towards Pets (1)
dialogue_line: I'm guessing cats and dogs are not permitted?

title: Policy Towards Pets (1)
dialogue_line: Not, they are not. I'm sorry to say.

title: Policy Towards Pets (1)
dialogue_line: Did something happen that made you change your policy towards cats and dogs?

title: Policy Towards Pets (1)
dialogue_line: Yes. A tenant previously owned a dog and the dog attacked another tenant one day.

title: Policy Towards Pets (2)
dialogue_line: Everything seems to be in order. I'm ready to move into the apartment.

title: Policy Towards Pets (2)
dialogue_line: Good, I welcome you to your new home.

title: Policy Towards Pets (2)
dialogue_line: Is there anything else I should know before I start my move?

title: Policy Towards Pets (2)
dialogue_line: Now that you mention it, yes, there is. It's the policy I have on pets.

title: Policy Towards Pets (2)
dialogue_line: Do you allow any kind of pets?

title: Policy Towards Pets (2)
dialogue_line: Only caged pets, I'm sorry to say. I hope this won't be a problem.

title: Policy Towards Pets (2)
dialogue_line: Actually, I might prove to be problematic because I have a cat.

title: Policy Towards Pets (2)
dialogue_line: There lies the problem. I'm sorry, but some of the other tenants have allergies to cats.

title: Policy Towards Pets (2)
dialogue_line: That's too bad. I don't know what I'm going to do with the kitten.

title: Policy Towards Pets (2)
dialogue_line: Perhaps you can give it away. Do you know of anyone who might want a cat?

title: Policy Towards Pets (2)
dialogue_line: No, not really. What about you? Would you like a cat?

title: Policy Towards Pets (2)
dialogue_line: Me? Well, I've never owned a pet before, let alone a cat.

title: Policy Towards Pets (2)
dialogue_line: Cats make great companions. Please take mine. You would be doing me a huge favor.

title: Policy Towards Pets (2)
dialogue_line: Alright, why not? Bring the little fellow next time.

title: Checking the Apartment for Damage (1)
dialogue_line: Can I check the apartment for any damages?

title: Checking the Apartment for Damage (1)
dialogue_line: Absolutely, let me accompany you.

title: Checking the Apartment for Damage (1)
dialogue_line: Did the previous tenant maintain the apartment well?

title: Checking the Apartment for Damage (1)
dialogue_line: For the most part, yes. A few repairs had to be made.

title: Checking the Apartment for Damage (1)
dialogue_line: What kind of repairs?

title: Checking the Apartment for Damage (1)
dialogue_line: Mostly plumbing repairs, but the exterior of the apartment is immaculate.

title: Checking the Apartment for Damage (1)
dialogue_line: Whoa, you weren't kidding. This apartment is in mint condition.

title: Checking the Apartment for Damage (1)
dialogue_line: I wouldn't worry too much about the plumbing.

title: Checking the Apartment for Damage (1)
dialogue_line: It's all in working condition?

title: Checking the Apartment for Damage (1)
dialogue_line: Yes, I guarantee that is. I hired the best plumber in town to fix the minor problems it had.

title: Checking the Apartment for Damage (1)
dialogue_line: That's good to hear. I think I've finished checking the apartment.

title: Checking the Apartment for Damage (1)
dialogue_line: Don't hesitate to notify me of any concerns that may arise.

title: Checking the Apartment for Damages (2)
dialogue_line: Would it be okay if I checked the apartment for any damages?

title: Checking the Apartment for Damages (2)
dialogue_line: That's fine with me. Step inside.

title: Checking the Apartment for Damages (2)
dialogue_line: Thank you. I'll take a quick look around.

title: Checking the Apartment for Damages (2)
dialogue_line: Feel free to take your time.

title: Checking the Apartment for Damages (2)
dialogue_line: Right away I noticed some cracks on the kitchen tile.

title: Checking the Apartment for Damages (2)
dialogue_line: Where? Can you show me?

title: Checking the Apartment for Damages (2)
dialogue_line: Yes. It's right at the corner, next to the sink.

title: Checking the Apartment for Damages (2)
dialogue_line: I see it. I'll have that repaired right away.

title: Checking the Apartment for Damages (2)
dialogue_line: Thank you. That would be great.

title: Checking the Apartment for Damages (2)
dialogue_line: Take a carful look around the apartment, and tell me of anything else that needs tending to.

title: Checking the Apartment for Damages (2)
dialogue_line: Here's something else. These doors are kind of loose.

title: Checking the Apartment for Damages (2)
dialogue_line: It's the screws on them. I'll have the screws replaced as soon as possible.

title: Asking about Public Transportation (1)
dialogue_line: Do any public buses run nearby?

title: Asking about Public Transportation (1)
dialogue_line: Yes, in fact many buses do.

title: Asking about Public Transportation (1)
dialogue_line: Can you tell me where I can catch them?

title: Asking about Public Transportation (1)
dialogue_line: Down the street the 260 bus picks you up and takes you to Los Angeles.

title: Asking about Public Transportation (1)
dialogue_line: How frequently does it pass?

title: Asking about Public Transportation (1)
dialogue_line: That bus passes every 30 minutes.

title: Asking about Public Transportation (1)
dialogue_line: How much is the fare?

title: Asking about Public Transportation (1)
dialogue_line: For most it's two dollars and fifty cents.

title: Asking about Public Transportation (1)
dialogue_line: Is it possible to buy some kind of pass for the bus?

title: Asking about Public Transportation (1)
dialogue_line: Yes, you can. There are daily, weekly, and monthly passes you can purchase.

title: Asking about Public Transportation (1)
dialogue_line: Do you know the cost of them?

title: Asking about Public Transportation (1)
dialogue_line: If I'm not mistaken, it's five dollars for the day, twenty dollars for the week, and fifty for the month.

title: Asking About Public Transportation (2)
dialogue_line: Do you ever take public transportation to get around?

title: Asking About Public Transportation (2)
dialogue_line: Before I frequently did. Not so much anymore. Why do you ask?

title: Asking About Public Transportation (2)
dialogue_line: I wanted some information about the public transportation that is available in the city.

title: Asking About Public Transportation (2)
dialogue_line: I could provide you with some. What would you like to know?

title: Asking About Public Transportation (2)
dialogue_line: What kind of public transportation is there?

title: Asking About Public Transportation (2)
dialogue_line: There is a local shuttle bus that could take you almost anywhere in the city.

title: Asking About Public Transportation (2)
dialogue_line: It does not take you outside the city?

title: Asking About Public Transportation (2)
dialogue_line: Unfortunately it does not. But it's cheaper than other public buses that do.

title: Asking About Public Transportation (2)
dialogue_line: I see. And where is the nearest stop from here?

title: Asking About Public Transportation (2)
dialogue_line: It's really close. Just a block away towards that direction.

title: Asking About Public Transportation (2)
dialogue_line: That way? I see. Thank you.

title: Asking About Public Transportation (2)
dialogue_line: You can't miss it, and you're welcome.

title: Finding an Apartment
dialogue_line: Have you found an apartment?

title: Finding an Apartment
dialogue_line: Yes, I have.

title: Finding an Apartment
dialogue_line: That's great. Where is it at?

title: Finding an Apartment
dialogue_line: It's in downtown. Have you ever been there?

title: Finding an Apartment
dialogue_line: No, but I hear that area could be kind of sketchy.

title: Finding an Apartment
dialogue_line: Don't worry. The apartment is in a pretty safe part of town.

title: Finding an Apartment
dialogue_line: That's a relief. When are you moving?

title: Finding an Apartment
dialogue_line: This weekend, Saturday.

title: Finding an Apartment
dialogue_line: Have you hired any movers?

title: Finding an Apartment
dialogue_line: No, I have not. Know any good movers?

title: Finding an Apartment
dialogue_line: Sure, I'll give you the number to the movers that can help you.

title: Finding an Apartment
dialogue_line: Gee, thanks. I appreciate the favor.

title: Finding an Apartment
dialogue_line: You're welcome.

title: Asking a Friend to Help Move In (1)
dialogue_line: Hey! Did you ever find a new apartment to move into?

title: Asking a Friend to Help Move In (1)
dialogue_line: Yes, I did! The apartment is in a convenient location.

title: Asking a Friend to Help Move In (1)
dialogue_line: Nice! Where is it located?

title: Asking a Friend to Help Move In (1)
dialogue_line: It is in the city of Pasadena and near both my school and job.

title: Asking a Friend to Help Move In (1)
dialogue_line: That's great! It seems you found the perfect place.

title: Asking a Friend to Help Move In (1)
dialogue_line: Thanks. I'm glad too. Could I ask you for a favor?

title: Asking a Friend to Help Move In (1)
dialogue_line: Sure. What is it?

title: Asking a Friend to Help Move In (1)
dialogue_line: Would you be able to help me move into my new apartment tomorrow?

title: Asking a Friend to Help Move In (1)
dialogue_line: Yes, I would be glad to.

title: Asking a Friend to Help Move In (1)
dialogue_line: Awesome! I just need help moving my furniture in.

title: Asking a Friend to Help Move In (1)
dialogue_line: No problem. I'll stop by tomorrow morning.

title: Asking a Friend to Help Move In (1)
dialogue_line: Great. Maybe we can go out for pizza right after we finish.

title: Asking a Friend to Help Move In (2)
dialogue_line: I finally found an apartment to move in.

title: Asking a Friend to Help Move In (2)
dialogue_line: That's great to hear. Kudos to you.

title: Asking a Friend to Help Move In (2)
dialogue_line: Thanks, it wasn't easy finding one.

title: Asking a Friend to Help Move In (2)
dialogue_line: Are you moving in soon?

title: Asking a Friend to Help Move In (2)
dialogue_line: Yes I am. This weekend, in fact.

title: Asking a Friend to Help Move In (2)
dialogue_line: Have you hired any movers?

title: Asking a Friend to Help Move In (2)
dialogue_line: No, I have not.

title: Asking a Friend to Help Move In (2)
dialogue_line: Why not? Don't you know of any in the area?

title: Asking a Friend to Help Move In (2)
dialogue_line: That's not the problem. I don't think I have enough to afford movers.

title: Asking a Friend to Help Move In (2)
dialogue_line: That's too bad. Is there anything I could do to help?

title: Asking a Friend to Help Move In (2)
dialogue_line: Actually, I was going to ask for your help.

title: Asking a Friend to Help Move In (2)
dialogue_line: You're going to need at least one more other person to help you move.

title: Asking a Friend to Help Move In (2)
dialogue_line: You're right about that. So can I count on you to help me?

title: Asking a Friend to Help Move In (2)
dialogue_line: You bet. I would be happy to help you move.

title: Calling a Moving Company (1)
dialogue_line: Hey, were you able to find a new home to move into?

title: Calling a Moving Company (1)
dialogue_line: Yes, I did. Now I just have to move my things over to the new place.

title: Calling a Moving Company (1)
dialogue_line: That's great! I'm glad you found a new place.

title: Calling a Moving Company (1)
dialogue_line: Me too. Have you ever used a moving company before?

title: Calling a Moving Company (1)
dialogue_line: Yes, I have. And the company is not bad.

title: Calling a Moving Company (1)
dialogue_line: I'm planning on moving soon. I have never called a moving company before.

title: Calling a Moving Company (1)
dialogue_line: Oh, I see. You have to call them as soon as possible.

title: Calling a Moving Company (1)
dialogue_line: Really? Why is that?

title: Calling a Moving Company (1)
dialogue_line: Moving companies tend to get booked really fast, especially during the summer.

title: Calling a Moving Company (1)
dialogue_line: That makes sense. I guess I should call a moving company right now.

title: Calling a Moving Company (1)
dialogue_line: Good luck. I hope the move transitions smoothly.

title: Calling a Moving Company (1)
dialogue_line: Thanks you for your advice. See you later!

title: Calling a Moving Company (2)
dialogue_line: Hello, am I calling a moving company? My friend gave me you guys' number.

title: Calling a Moving Company (2)
dialogue_line: Yes, this is indeed a moving company.

title: Calling a Moving Company (2)
dialogue_line: That's a relief. I thought I was dialing the wrong number.

title: Calling a Moving Company (2)
dialogue_line: No, you called the right place. Are you in need of any moving assistance?

title: Calling a Moving Company (2)
dialogue_line: Yes, very much so. I'm moving in one week, and I need a pair of strong and able movers.

title: Calling a Moving Company (2)
dialogue_line: We can provide you with that kind of help.

title: Calling a Moving Company (2)
dialogue_line: That would be fantastic.

title: Calling a Moving Company (2)
dialogue_line: Just give me your information and we'll have you set up in no time.

title: Calling a Moving Company (2)
dialogue_line: Thank you very much.

title: Calling a Moving Company (2)
dialogue_line: You're welcome. The movers we provide will help with all your belongings.

title: Calling a Moving Company (2)
dialogue_line: That's good. I have a lot of stuff.

title: Calling a Moving Company (2)
dialogue_line: Rest assure, that won't be a problem.

title: Where to Put the Furniture (1)
dialogue_line: Please be carful with that.

title: Where to Put the Furniture (1)
dialogue_line: Don't worry, we are professionals. Your furniture is safe in our hands.

title: Where to Put the Furniture (1)
dialogue_line: Thank you. That's reassuring to hear.

title: Where to Put the Furniture (1)
dialogue_line: Now, where do you want this couch?

title: Where to Put the Furniture (1)
dialogue_line: Let me think. Right here is a good spot.

title: Where to Put the Furniture (1)
dialogue_line: Next to the window over there?

title: Where to Put the Furniture (1)
dialogue_line: Yes, that's the spot. You could put it down there.

title: Where to Put the Furniture (1)
dialogue_line: Alright, next we have these end tables. Where do you want them?

title: Where to Put the Furniture (1)
dialogue_line: I want them against this wall please.

title: Where to Put the Furniture (1)
dialogue_line: There you are. Nice and gentle. See, I told you we were professionals.

title: Where to Put the Furniture (1)
dialogue_line: Thank you. I feel more secure now seeing you work.

title: Where to Put the Furniture (1)
dialogue_line: Well, that's good. Let's go get the rest of your furniture.

title: Where to Put the Furniture (2)
dialogue_line: Thanks for helping me move in all my furniture.

title: Where to Put the Furniture (2)
dialogue_line: No problem at all. It's a pleasure.

title: Where to Put the Furniture (2)
dialogue_line: Can you help me decide where to place them?

title: Where to Put the Furniture (2)
dialogue_line: Sure. Where should we start?

title: Where to Put the Furniture (2)
dialogue_line: Let's start with the living room. Where do you suggest we place the couch?

title: Where to Put the Furniture (2)
dialogue_line: Maybe against that wall. Then the television can be placed at the opposite end.

title: Where to Put the Furniture (2)
dialogue_line: Good idea. Let's do that. Thank you for helping.

title: Where to Put the Furniture (2)
dialogue_line: You're welcome. Where would you like to place these bookshelves?

title: Where to Put the Furniture (2)
dialogue_line: I would like it against the wall with the window.

title: Where to Put the Furniture (2)
dialogue_line: Would you like it placed to the right or left side of the window?

title: Where to Put the Furniture (2)
dialogue_line: I would like it placed on the right side.

title: Where to Put the Furniture (2)
dialogue_line: Good choice. Let's move the bookshelf together.

title: Calling the Water Company (1)
dialogue_line: Hello, is this the water company?

title: Calling the Water Company (1)
dialogue_line: Yes it is. How can I help you?

title: Calling the Water Company (1)
dialogue_line: I just moved into my first home. I have a few questions.

title: Calling the Water Company (1)
dialogue_line: Alright. What questions do you have?

title: Calling the Water Company (1)
dialogue_line: What are my payment options?

title: Calling the Water Company (1)
dialogue_line: You can pay online, by mail, or in person at designated areas.

title: Calling the Water Company (1)
dialogue_line: Are you guys responsible for any plumbing problems?

title: Calling the Water Company (1)
dialogue_line: The costumer is responsible for their home plumbing problems.

title: Calling the Water Company (1)
dialogue_line: What information do you need in order to begin my water service?

title: Calling the Water Company (1)
dialogue_line: We will need your full name, social security number, and the address to your home.

title: Calling the Water Company (1)
dialogue_line: Thank you. That is all I need to know.

title: Calling the Water Company (1)
dialogue_line: You're welcome. Thank you for calling. Have a nice day.

title: Calling the Water Company (2)
dialogue_line: You have called the Water Company. How may I assist you?

title: Calling the Water Company (2)
dialogue_line: Hello, I recently moved into my apartment.

title: Calling the Water Company (2)
dialogue_line: Are you calling to activate your billing?

title: Calling the Water Company (2)
dialogue_line: Yes, that's one of the things I'm calling about.

title: Calling the Water Company (2)
dialogue_line: What was the other reason for your calling today?

title: Calling the Water Company (2)
dialogue_line: There is leakage in one of the pipelines. Is there anything you can do about that?

title: Calling the Water Company (2)
dialogue_line: No, I'm sorry. But I could provide you contact with one of our plumbers.

title: Calling the Water Company (2)
dialogue_line: No, that's not necessary, but thank you.

title: Calling the Water Company (2)
dialogue_line: As for your billing, what form of payment would you like to have?

title: Calling the Water Company (2)
dialogue_line: Can I pay online?

title: Calling the Water Company (2)
dialogue_line: Yes, that is a service we do provide for our customers.

title: Calling the Water Company (2)
dialogue_line: Alright, I think I'll go with that form of payment.

title: Greeting the Neighbor (1)
dialogue_line: Hello, neighbor. I would like to personally welcome you to the neighborhood.

title: Greeting the Neighbor (1)
dialogue_line: Thank you. It is a pleasure to meet you.

title: Greeting the Neighbor (1)
dialogue_line: Same here. It's been a few days. How do you like it so far?

title: Greeting the Neighbor (1)
dialogue_line: I like it. It's convenient for both my job and my family.

title: Greeting the Neighbor (1)
dialogue_line: That's good to hear. You'll find this neighborhood to be very peaceful.

title: Greeting the Neighbor (1)
dialogue_line: That's another thing I like about it. My wife thinks the area looks lovely.

title: Greeting the Neighbor (1)
dialogue_line: Are you doing anything tomorrow afternoon?

title: Greeting the Neighbor (1)
dialogue_line: No, why do you ask?

title: Greeting the Neighbor (1)
dialogue_line: I'm having a barbecue in my backyard. I want to invite you and your family.

title: Greeting the Neighbor (1)
dialogue_line: Sure, I'd be happy to join!

title: Greeting the Neighbor (1)
dialogue_line: Alright. Here's my number. I'll see you tomorrow!

title: Greeting the Neighbor (1)
dialogue_line: Thank you. I'll see you then.

title: Greeting the Neighbor (2)
dialogue_line: Greetings, neighbor. How's it going?

title: Greeting the Neighbor (2)
dialogue_line: Hello to you! It's going just fine. Welcome to the neighborhood.

title: Greeting the Neighbor (2)
dialogue_line: Thank you. How long have you been living here?

title: Greeting the Neighbor (2)
dialogue_line: It's going to be my tenth year next month.

title: Greeting the Neighbor (2)
dialogue_line: That's quite some time. Where did you move in from?

title: Greeting the Neighbor (2)
dialogue_line: I was living in San Diego before I moved here.

title: Greeting the Neighbor (2)
dialogue_line: That's interesting. Why did you decide to leave San Diego?

title: Greeting the Neighbor (2)
dialogue_line: I simply felt that it was time for a change.

title: Greeting the Neighbor (2)
dialogue_line: I see. I've had that feeling before.

title: Greeting the Neighbor (2)
dialogue_line: why are you moving here.?

title: Greeting the Neighbor (2)
dialogue_line: Because my new job is in the area.

title: Greeting the Neighbor (2)
dialogue_line: Well, I'll be seeing you around, my new neighbor.

title: Questions about Parking
dialogue_line: Hello. I'm new to the apartments. I have a question.

title: Questions about Parking
dialogue_line: Hello, and welcome. What do you need to know?

title: Questions about Parking
dialogue_line: Is there anything about parking my car that I need to know?

title: Questions about Parking
dialogue_line: You have an assigned parking spot behind the building.

title: Questions about Parking
dialogue_line: Are there other parking spots available?

title: Questions about Parking
dialogue_line: Yes. We have several unassigned spots for visitors.

title: Questions about Parking
dialogue_line: Where are those visitor parking spots located?

title: Questions about Parking
dialogue_line: Behind the building as well.

title: Questions about Parking
dialogue_line: What if all parking spots are filled up?

title: Questions about Parking
dialogue_line: You could park in the streets, but you might be ticketed if you fail to follow rules.

title: Questions about Parking
dialogue_line: Could you show me how to enter the parking area?

title: Questions about Parking
dialogue_line: Yeah, I'll show you. Follow me.

title: Prohibited Parking
dialogue_line: Excuse me, sir?

title: Prohibited Parking
dialogue_line: Yes, is there a problem?

title: Prohibited Parking
dialogue_line: I'm sorry to be the one to tell you, but you can't park here.

title: Prohibited Parking
dialogue_line: You mean right here, where I just parked?

title: Prohibited Parking
dialogue_line: Yes, unfortunately you cannot.

title: Prohibited Parking
dialogue_line: Oh, I was not aware that you couldn't park here.

title: Prohibited Parking
dialogue_line: That's alright. It's a common mistake new residents often make.

title: Prohibited Parking
dialogue_line: Thank you for informing me.

title: Prohibited Parking
dialogue_line: Not a problem. I wouldn't want you to get a parking ticket.

title: Prohibited Parking
dialogue_line: That's so considerate of you. Thank you.

title: Prohibited Parking
dialogue_line: You're welcome. Just keep it in mind for the next time.

title: Prohibited Parking
dialogue_line: Don't worry. I won't forget.

title: Meeting the Mailman
dialogue_line: Good morning. Are you the mailman?

title: Meeting the Mailman
dialogue_line: Good morning to you, and yes, I am. What gave it away?

title: Meeting the Mailman
dialogue_line: Your uniform was a clear indicator.

title: Meeting the Mailman
dialogue_line: That's a good answer. So you're the new tenant?

title: Meeting the Mailman
dialogue_line: Yes, I am. I just moved in last week.

title: Meeting the Mailman
dialogue_line: I extend to you my welcome. How do you like the neighborhood?

title: Meeting the Mailman
dialogue_line: It's absolutely wonderful. Everybody here is so friendly.

title: Meeting the Mailman
dialogue_line: You're not wrong. I haven't come across anybody who wasn't nice.

title: Meeting the Mailman
dialogue_line: Wow, it sounds like I picked the perfect neighborhood to move in to.

title: Meeting the Mailman
dialogue_line: Yup, there's no doubt about that.

title: Meeting the Mailman
dialogue_line: I hope I never move again.

title: Meeting the Mailman
dialogue_line: I have more deliveries to make, so I'll talk to you later.

title: Asking about Local Restaurants
dialogue_line: I sure am hungry.

title: Asking about Local Restaurants
dialogue_line: You should go out and eat.

title: Asking about Local Restaurants
dialogue_line: Do you know of any good places to eat that are around the local area?

title: Asking about Local Restaurants
dialogue_line: I know of a good couple.

title: Asking about Local Restaurants
dialogue_line: Alright, let's hear them. I'm starving.

title: Asking about Local Restaurants
dialogue_line: Let me ask you first, what are you in the mood for?

title: Asking about Local Restaurants
dialogue_line: Well, now that I think about it, I'm not really sure.

title: Asking about Local Restaurants
dialogue_line: Do you like Indian food?

title: Asking about Local Restaurants
dialogue_line: I have never tried it. It sounds interesting.

title: Asking about Local Restaurants
dialogue_line: It's delicious. I would recommend giving it a try.

title: Asking about Local Restaurants
dialogue_line: Indian food it is!

title: Trash and Recycling (1)
dialogue_line: Why do you have so many full trash bags?

title: Trash and Recycling (1)
dialogue_line: I had a party last night. I'm cleaning up now and tossing them away.

title: Trash and Recycling (1)
dialogue_line: Wait! What are you doing?

title: Trash and Recycling (1)
dialogue_line: Throwing these bags into the trash can. Why do you seem concerned?

title: Trash and Recycling (1)
dialogue_line: Did you divide the recyclables from the trash?

title: Trash and Recycling (1)
dialogue_line: No, I didn't. I was a bit lazy to do so.

title: Trash and Recycling (1)
dialogue_line: Don't be lazy. You should do your part in helping the environment.

title: Trash and Recycling (1)
dialogue_line: You're right. It's going to be messy though. Mind giving me a hand?

title: Trash and Recycling (1)
dialogue_line: Sure. I'd be glad to.

title: Trash and Recycling (1)
dialogue_line: Thank you. This is a lot to handle alone.

title: Trash and Recycling (1)
dialogue_line: Don't mention it. After all, one person can make a big difference to the environment.

title: Trash and Recycling (1)
dialogue_line: I'll be sure to be more considerate next time.

title: Trash and Recycling (2)
dialogue_line: Do you know where I could dispose of my trash?

title: Trash and Recycling (2)
dialogue_line: Yeah, there are two different colored trash cans in the back.

title: Trash and Recycling (2)
dialogue_line: Is there a difference between the two?

title: Trash and Recycling (2)
dialogue_line: Well, one is for recycling and the other is for trash.

title: Trash and Recycling (2)
dialogue_line: Can you tell me which color is the one for recycling?

title: Trash and Recycling (2)
dialogue_line: That would be the blue trash can.

title: Trash and Recycling (2)
dialogue_line: And the black trash can is for regular trash?

title: Trash and Recycling (2)
dialogue_line: That is correct.

title: Trash and Recycling (2)
dialogue_line: On what day does the garbage truck come by to pick up the trash?

title: Trash and Recycling (2)
dialogue_line: It comes every Thursday.

title: Trash and Recycling (2)
dialogue_line: Thank you for your help. Take care.

title: Trash and Recycling (2)
dialogue_line: Sure. Don't mention it.

title: Where Is the Laundry Room
dialogue_line: Hello, neighbor. I just moved into the apartments last week. I have a question.

title: Where Is the Laundry Room
dialogue_line: Sure. What do you need to know?

title: Where Is the Laundry Room
