dialogue_line: What did they say? Are you going to get benefits?

title: Reduced Payments
dialogue_line: Yes, but not as much as I thought.

title: Reduced Payments
dialogue_line: What do you mean?

title: Reduced Payments
dialogue_line: I thought I would receive a certain amount per month, but I got less.

title: Reduced Payments
dialogue_line: Why is that?

title: Reduced Payments
dialogue_line: I'm not really sure. It has something to do with how much I earned.

title: Reduced Payments
dialogue_line: They pay benefits based on your income?

title: Reduced Payments
dialogue_line: Yes. I think the more you earn, the more you receive.

title: Reduced Payments
dialogue_line: That's interesting. I didn't know that.

title: Reduced Payments
dialogue_line: I think I may go to the EDD office to ask about it.

title: Reduced Payments
dialogue_line: You should go. What have you got to lose?

title: Looking for Jobs at EDD
dialogue_line: How are you doing?

title: Looking for Jobs at EDD
dialogue_line: Good! What's going on?

title: Looking for Jobs at EDD
dialogue_line: Not too much. I'm on my way to the EDD.

title: Looking for Jobs at EDD
dialogue_line: Wait a minute. I thought you found a job last month.

title: Looking for Jobs at EDD
dialogue_line: I did. I'm not going there to file a claim.

title: Looking for Jobs at EDD
dialogue_line: Then why are you heading out there?

title: Looking for Jobs at EDD
dialogue_line: The EDD is hiring, that's why.

title: Looking for Jobs at EDD
dialogue_line: Wow! That's awesome. That's a very good place to work.

title: Looking for Jobs at EDD
dialogue_line: I know. That's why I'm going.

title: Looking for Jobs at EDD
dialogue_line: The pay is good, and the benefits are excellent.

title: Looking for Jobs at EDD
dialogue_line: Yes, my sister works there.

title: Looking for Jobs at EDD
dialogue_line: Good luck to you. I may have to go there myself now.

title: Talking to People at EDD
dialogue_line: Hello, my name is George.

title: Talking to People at EDD
dialogue_line: Hello, George. How can I help you?

title: Talking to People at EDD
dialogue_line: I'm trying to file a claim online, but I have questions.

title: Talking to People at EDD
dialogue_line: Okay, give me a moment and I'll go over there to help you.

title: Talking to People at EDD
dialogue_line: Hello again. Thanks for coming over.

title: Talking to People at EDD
dialogue_line: It's my pleasure. What are you having trouble with?

title: Talking to People at EDD
dialogue_line: It's this question here. I'm not sure what it is asking for.

title: Talking to People at EDD
dialogue_line: The system is asking for the reason you are no longer working.

title: Talking to People at EDD
dialogue_line: Does that make a difference?

title: Talking to People at EDD
dialogue_line: Yes it does. We review every person's case individually.

title: Talking to People at EDD
dialogue_line: My company went out of business.

title: Talking to People at EDD
dialogue_line: Then just put "Company out of business." You should be okay.

title: Attending a Workshop at EDD
dialogue_line: Good morning. How are you today?

title: Attending a Workshop at EDD
dialogue_line: I'm doing well. Thank you.

title: Attending a Workshop at EDD
dialogue_line: Are you here for our workshop today?

title: Attending a Workshop at EDD
dialogue_line: Yes, as a matter of fact, I am.

title: Attending a Workshop at EDD
dialogue_line: That's wonderful. This will help quite a bit.

title: Attending a Workshop at EDD
dialogue_line: Will you be giving the workshop?

title: Attending a Workshop at EDD
dialogue_line: Yes I will, with a couple of my colleagues.

title: Attending a Workshop at EDD
dialogue_line: How many people are you expecting?

title: Attending a Workshop at EDD
dialogue_line: Not many, unfortunately.

title: Attending a Workshop at EDD
dialogue_line: What do you mean?

title: Attending a Workshop at EDD
dialogue_line: Everyone should attend if possible. This makes filing so easy.

title: Attending a Workshop at EDD
dialogue_line: I'll tell my friend Joseph. He's coming tomorrow.

title: How to prepare for an Interview
dialogue_line: I was hoping you could help me.

title: How to prepare for an Interview
dialogue_line: I'll try. What help do you need?

title: How to prepare for an Interview
dialogue_line: I'm having an interview tomorrow morning. I'm very nervous.

title: How to prepare for an Interview
dialogue_line: That's great! Why are you nervous though?

title: How to prepare for an Interview
dialogue_line: I don't do well in interviews.

title: How to prepare for an Interview
dialogue_line: They can be frightening, but you can do it.

title: How to prepare for an Interview
dialogue_line: I'm afraid they'll ask me something I won't know.

title: How to prepare for an Interview
dialogue_line: You should prepare yourself. Go online, and look at their website.

title: How to prepare for an Interview
dialogue_line: Now why didn't I think of that?

title: How to prepare for an Interview
dialogue_line: It's a good idea to know everything you can about them first.

title: How to prepare for an Interview
dialogue_line: That's an excellent idea! Thanks.

title: How to prepare for an Interview
dialogue_line: You're welcome. If you need more help, give me a call.

title: A News Report on Crime
dialogue_line: Police are still searching for a robbery suspect in San Bernardino.

title: A News Report on Crime
dialogue_line: Where did you hear about this?

title: A News Report on Crime
dialogue_line: I saw it on the news last night.

title: A News Report on Crime
dialogue_line: Did he rob a store or a home?

title: A News Report on Crime
dialogue_line: He robbed a check cashing place.

title: A News Report on Crime
dialogue_line: Did he have a weapon?

title: A News Report on Crime
dialogue_line: He had a gun but he tricked a woman working there to let him in the back.

title: A News Report on Crime
dialogue_line: How did he do that?

title: A News Report on Crime
dialogue_line: He pretended to be blind and the woman felt bad for him.

title: A News Report on Crime
dialogue_line: Why would she feel bad for him?

title: A News Report on Crime
dialogue_line: He said he was thirsty so she opened the back to give him a glass of water.

title: A News Report on Crime
dialogue_line: That's why I don't use check cashing places.

title: About a Robbery
dialogue_line: Did you see the police posters in the neighborhood?

title: About a Robbery
dialogue_line: I haven't seen them. What do they say?

title: About a Robbery
dialogue_line: They say not to leave anything valuable in your cars at night.

title: About a Robbery
dialogue_line: Sometimes I leave my purse in the car.

title: About a Robbery
dialogue_line: Well, the posters say that there has been an increase in car break-ins in our neighborhood.

title: About a Robbery
dialogue_line: Do they have any suspects?

title: About a Robbery
dialogue_line: The police haven't released any details yet.

title: About a Robbery
dialogue_line: I'd better be more careful about what I leave in my car overnight.

title: About a Robbery
dialogue_line: Yeah, you should be on the look out for suspicious people.

title: About a Robbery
dialogue_line: What makes a person look suspicious?

title: About a Robbery
dialogue_line: People looking into cars seems suspicious.

title: About a Robbery
dialogue_line: Maybe I'll park my car in the garage from now on.

title: Being Robbed
dialogue_line: I need to report a robbery.

title: Being Robbed
dialogue_line: Who was robbed?

title: Being Robbed
dialogue_line: I was robbed.

title: Being Robbed
dialogue_line: I'm so sorry. When did this happen?

title: Being Robbed
dialogue_line: It happened 10 minutes ago.

title: Being Robbed
dialogue_line: Where were you robbed?

title: Being Robbed
dialogue_line: Right outside the bank. I had just taken money from the ATM.

title: Being Robbed
dialogue_line: Can you describe the person who robbed you?

title: Being Robbed
dialogue_line: He was wearing dark sunglasses and a Yankees baseball cap.

title: Being Robbed
dialogue_line: How much money did he take from you?

title: Being Robbed
dialogue_line: He took everything I had in my wallet.

title: Being Robbed
dialogue_line: You're going to have to fill out a police report.

title: Witnessing a Robbery
dialogue_line: Can you describe the robbery you saw?

title: Witnessing a Robbery
dialogue_line: It happened right here in front of the bank.

title: Witnessing a Robbery
dialogue_line: Can you describe the suspect?

title: Witnessing a Robbery
dialogue_line: He was tall, wearing sunglasses and a Yankees baseball cap.

title: Witnessing a Robbery
dialogue_line: Did he have any weapons?

title: Witnessing a Robbery
dialogue_line: I didn't see a gun, but he had his hand in his pocket.

title: Witnessing a Robbery
dialogue_line: So he could have had a gun?

title: Witnessing a Robbery
dialogue_line: I suppose so.

title: Witnessing a Robbery
dialogue_line: Did you see which way the suspect went?

title: Witnessing a Robbery
dialogue_line: I was so scared, and was shaking, but I think he went towards the train station.

title: Witnessing a Robbery
dialogue_line: Could you pick the suspect out of a lineup?

title: Witnessing a Robbery
dialogue_line: Only if I'm sure that he can't see me.

title: Reporting a Break-in
dialogue_line: Someone broke into my house.

title: Reporting a Break-in
dialogue_line: How do you know?

title: Reporting a Break-in
dialogue_line: The front window is broken and there is glass everywhere.

title: Reporting a Break-in
dialogue_line: You shouldn't go in the house until we send an officer there.

title: Reporting a Break-in
dialogue_line: I'm already in the house. The house is trashed.

title: Reporting a Break-in
dialogue_line: Don't touch anything until the police get there.

title: Reporting a Break-in
dialogue_line: My new flatscreen tv is gone.

title: Reporting a Break-in
dialogue_line: Is there anything else that is obviously missing?

title: Reporting a Break-in
dialogue_line: I can't tell unless I go further into my house.

title: Reporting a Break-in
dialogue_line: Please wait outside in case the robber is still inside.

title: Reporting a Break-in
dialogue_line: You think he could still be inside?

title: Reporting a Break-in
dialogue_line: It's a possibility. A police car will be there shortly.

title: Picking a Suspect Out of a Line-up
dialogue_line: Do you think you can identify the man you saw robbing the woman outside the bank?

title: Picking a Suspect Out of a Line-up
dialogue_line: I think I remember what he looked like.

title: Picking a Suspect Out of a Line-up
dialogue_line: Please take a look at the six men lined up.

title: Picking a Suspect Out of a Line-up
dialogue_line: Can they see me?

title: Picking a Suspect Out of a Line-up
dialogue_line: No, they cannot see you. This is one-way glass.

title: Picking a Suspect Out of a Line-up
dialogue_line: I see the man who robbed the lady outside the bank.

title: Picking a Suspect Out of a Line-up
dialogue_line: Can you tell us which one he is?

title: Picking a Suspect Out of a Line-up
dialogue_line: It's number three for sure.

title: Picking a Suspect Out of a Line-up
dialogue_line: Number three, please step forward.

title: Picking a Suspect Out of a Line-up
dialogue_line: That's him. You're sure he can't see me?

title: Picking a Suspect Out of a Line-up
dialogue_line: He can't see you. Thanks for your help today.

title: Picking a Suspect Out of a Line-up
dialogue_line: Please don't let him rob anyone else.

title: Answering Questions of the Police
dialogue_line: Can you tell us what you saw?

title: Answering Questions of the Police
dialogue_line: I didn't see much. I was afraid.

title: Answering Questions of the Police
dialogue_line: Why were you afraid?

title: Answering Questions of the Police
dialogue_line: The man had his hand in his pocket like he had a gun.

title: Answering Questions of the Police
dialogue_line: Did you actually see a gun?

title: Answering Questions of the Police
dialogue_line: No, I didn't.

title: Answering Questions of the Police
dialogue_line: Did you see the man take the woman's wallet?

title: Answering Questions of the Police
dialogue_line: I did. I was inside the bank waiting on line.

title: Answering Questions of the Police
dialogue_line: Could you come to the precinct and fill out a witness statement?

title: Answering Questions of the Police
dialogue_line: Is it going to take very long?

title: Answering Questions of the Police
dialogue_line: No, it won't and an officer will drive you home.

title: Answering Questions of the Police
dialogue_line: I guess I can go to the precinct then.

title: Being Pulled Over
dialogue_line: Can I have you license and registration, sir?

title: Being Pulled Over
dialogue_line: What seems to be the problem, officer?

title: Being Pulled Over
dialogue_line: You have no idea why I pulled you over?

title: Being Pulled Over
dialogue_line: I don't have any idea, officer.

title: Being Pulled Over
dialogue_line: You were going 60 miles an hour and the speed limit is only 45.

title: Being Pulled Over
dialogue_line: Sorry, officer. I guess I was in a rush.

title: Being Pulled Over
dialogue_line: Where are you rushing to?

title: Being Pulled Over
dialogue_line: I'm late picking up my kids from school.

title: Being Pulled Over
dialogue_line: I'm going to have to give you a ticket.

title: Being Pulled Over
dialogue_line: Can't you just let me off with a warning? I'll be more careful next time.

title: Being Pulled Over
dialogue_line: You could have caused an accident and never made it to get your kids.

title: Being Pulled Over
dialogue_line: You have a point, officer.

title: Being Arrested
dialogue_line: Open the door, police.

title: Being Arrested
dialogue_line: What's going on?

title: Being Arrested
dialogue_line: We have a warrant for your arrest.

title: Being Arrested
dialogue_line: What's the charge?

title: Being Arrested
dialogue_line: You are being arrested for robbery.

title: Being Arrested
dialogue_line: I didn't rob anyone.

title: Being Arrested
dialogue_line: Tell it to the judge. Turn around, please.

title: Being Arrested
dialogue_line: I know my rights!

title: Being Arrested
dialogue_line: You have the right to remain silent.

title: Being Arrested
dialogue_line: How about my right to a lawyer?

title: Being Arrested
dialogue_line: You can call your attorney after we process you.

title: Being Arrested
dialogue_line: I'm not saying anything else until I speak to a lawyer.

title: Pleading Not Guilty in Court
dialogue_line: How do you plea to the charges?

title: Pleading Not Guilty in Court
dialogue_line: I plead not guilty.

title: Pleading Not Guilty in Court
dialogue_line: There are several witnesses that can testify to you being the robber.

title: Pleading Not Guilty in Court
dialogue_line: I understand that, Your Honour. But I did not do it.

title: Pleading Not Guilty in Court
dialogue_line: There is video surveillance that shows you robbing the victim.

title: Pleading Not Guilty in Court
dialogue_line: I would like to review that evidence, Your Honour.

title: Pleading Not Guilty in Court
dialogue_line: Your attorney can provide you with that evidence.

title: Pleading Not Guilty in Court
dialogue_line: I am sure I can prove my innocence once I see the footage.

title: Pleading Not Guilty in Court
dialogue_line: Would you like to present any of that evidence now?

title: Pleading Not Guilty in Court
dialogue_line: May I confer with my attorney?

title: Pleading Not Guilty in Court
dialogue_line: I can call a half hour recess.

title: Pleading Not Guilty in Court
dialogue_line: I won't need more time than that, Your Honour.

title: Being Set Free
dialogue_line: Given the evidence that has just been provided, the court releases you.

title: Being Set Free
dialogue_line: I'm free to go, Your Honour?

title: Being Set Free
dialogue_line: You are free to go.

title: Being Set Free
dialogue_line: Thank you. I am happy justice has been served.

title: Being Set Free
dialogue_line: The court is pleased as well.

title: Being Set Free
dialogue_line: I don't ever plan to be back in this courtroom, Your Honour.

title: Being Set Free
dialogue_line: I sure hope not.

title: Being Set Free
dialogue_line: Your Honour, I didn't commit the crime I was accused of.

title: Being Set Free
dialogue_line: Do you know how many times I have heard that?

title: Being Set Free
dialogue_line: I'm sure many times, but I mean it.

title: Being Set Free
dialogue_line: Many people say they mean it, and I still see them before me.

title: Being Set Free
dialogue_line: I won't be one of those people.

title: Discussing a Lawsuit against the Police
dialogue_line: I want to file a wrongful arrest lawsuit.

title: Discussing a Lawsuit against the Police
dialogue_line: What proof do you have that you were wrongfully arrested?

title: Discussing a Lawsuit against the Police
dialogue_line: Well, I didn't rob anybody.

title: Discussing a Lawsuit against the Police
dialogue_line: Why were you arrested then?

title: Discussing a Lawsuit against the Police
dialogue_line: I fit the description of the suspect.

title: Discussing a Lawsuit against the Police
dialogue_line: Well, how was that a wrongful arrest?

title: Discussing a Lawsuit against the Police
dialogue_line: They didn't investigate if I had a twin brother or not.

title: Discussing a Lawsuit against the Police
dialogue_line: Do you have a twin brother?

title: Discussing a Lawsuit against the Police
dialogue_line: I have an identical twin brother.

title: Discussing a Lawsuit against the Police
dialogue_line: Did the police find out?

title: Discussing a Lawsuit against the Police
dialogue_line: The police found out when I told them.

title: Discussing a Lawsuit against the Police
dialogue_line: We may have a case then.

title: Talking to a Lawyer
dialogue_line: I would like to hire you to represent me in court.

title: Talking to a Lawyer
dialogue_line: What is the court case about?

title: Talking to a Lawyer
dialogue_line: I'm being accused of robbery.

title: Talking to a Lawyer
dialogue_line: Did you commit the robbery?

title: Talking to a Lawyer
dialogue_line: No! It was my twin brother.

title: Talking to a Lawyer
dialogue_line: Do you have proof of that?

title: Talking to a Lawyer
dialogue_line: I do have proof of that. I also have an airtight alibi.

title: Talking to a Lawyer
dialogue_line: When is the next court date?

title: Talking to a Lawyer
dialogue_line: I have to appear next week.

title: Talking to a Lawyer
dialogue_line: That doesn't give me much time to prepare.

title: Talking to a Lawyer
dialogue_line: I can pay whatever you ask.

title: Talking to a Lawyer
dialogue_line: In that case, let me have my secretary draw up a contract.

title: Filing a Complaint at the Police Station
dialogue_line: I'd like to file a complaint.

title: Filing a Complaint at the Police Station
dialogue_line: Of course you want to file a complaint.

title: Filing a Complaint at the Police Station
dialogue_line: Are you the on-duty supervisor?

title: Filing a Complaint at the Police Station
dialogue_line: I am the on-duty supervisor.

title: Filing a Complaint at the Police Station
dialogue_line: Than you can take my complaint.

title: Filing a Complaint at the Police Station
dialogue_line: What is the nature of your complaint?

title: Filing a Complaint at the Police Station
dialogue_line: My neighbor is illegally dumping garbage in my yard.

title: Filing a Complaint at the Police Station
dialogue_line: Would you like us to send some officers to speak to him?

title: Filing a Complaint at the Police Station
dialogue_line: They already did that and he is still throwing nasty garbage in my yard.

title: Filing a Complaint at the Police Station
dialogue_line: All right, you're going to have to see the community police officer upstairs on the third floor.

title: Filing a Complaint at the Police Station
dialogue_line: They will take my complaint?

title: Filing a Complaint at the Police Station
dialogue_line: Yes, they will take it and conduct a full investigation.

title: Dating in America
dialogue_line: Dating is really complicated.

title: Dating in America
dialogue_line: What makes you say that?

title: Dating in America
dialogue_line: You just can't pick somebody up at a bar anymore.

title: Dating in America
dialogue_line: So what do you do now?

title: Dating in America
dialogue_line: There are dating websites, dating apps, even dating clubs.

title: Dating in America
dialogue_line: My friend set me up on a blind date with my now boyfriend.

title: Dating in America
dialogue_line: I need a friend like that.

title: Dating in America
dialogue_line: I'll help you create an online dating profile.

title: Dating in America
dialogue_line: I'm wary about meeting people online.

title: Dating in America
dialogue_line: It's not that different from meeting a stranger on the street.

title: Dating in America
dialogue_line: Dating sure isn't what it used to be.

title: Dating in America
dialogue_line: I think there are more options now. That's a good thing.

title: Asking for a Date (1)
dialogue_line: what are you doing on Friday night?

title: Asking for a Date (1)
dialogue_line: I was just going to stay in and watch a movie on Netflix.

title: Asking for a Date (1)
dialogue_line: How about you let me take you out to a movie?

title: Asking for a Date (1)
dialogue_line: That would be really nice.

title: Asking for a Date (1)
dialogue_line: We could even grab a bite to eat afterwards.

title: Asking for a Date (1)
dialogue_line: I would really like that.

title: Asking for a Date (1)
dialogue_line: Great! If I pick you up at 6 p.m., would that work?

title: Asking for a Date (1)
dialogue_line: Yeah, that gives me time to change after work.

title: Asking for a Date (1)
dialogue_line: Can I have your phone number so I can call when I'm on my way?

title: Asking for a Date (1)
dialogue_line: That's a great idea. And you should give me your number, too.

title: Asking for a Date (1)
dialogue_line: Okay, I'm really looking forward to Friday.

title: Asking for a Date (1)
dialogue_line: We're going to have a really nice time.

title: Asking for a Date (2)
dialogue_line: I have an extra ticket to the Beyonce concert on Friday.

title: Asking for a Date (2)
dialogue_line: That's nice.

title: Asking for a Date (2)
dialogue_line: I was wondering if you want to come with me?

title: Asking for a Date (2)
dialogue_line: I really like Beyonce, but I'm busy on Friday.

title: Asking for a Date (2)
dialogue_line: Oh, I understand. Maybe we could go out some other time.

title: Asking for a Date (2)
dialogue_line: That's so sweet of you, but I don't think so.

title: Asking for a Date (2)
dialogue_line: Why not?

title: Asking for a Date (2)
dialogue_line: You're not really my type.

title: Asking for a Date (2)
dialogue_line: How do you know if you won't give me a chance?

title: Asking for a Date (2)
dialogue_line: Well, your insistence makes you seem a little desperate.

title: Asking for a Date (2)
dialogue_line: I'm not desperate. I've just liked you for a long time.

title: Asking for a Date (2)
dialogue_line: Again, that's sweet, but I'm not interested.

title: A Blind Date
dialogue_line: Excuse me. Is your name John?

title: A Blind Date
dialogue_line: Yes, and you must be Karen.

title: A Blind Date
dialogue_line: I am. I'm sorry this is the first blind date I've been on.

title: A Blind Date
dialogue_line: Oh, me too. I'm just as nervous.

title: A Blind Date
dialogue_line: Well, that's one thing we have in common already.

title: A Blind Date
dialogue_line: You look just like the picture Jimmy showed me.

title: A Blind Date
dialogue_line: So how long have you known Jimmy?

title: A Blind Date
dialogue_line: We actually used to date.

title: A Blind Date
dialogue_line: Wow, your ex set you up on a blind date?

title: A Blind Date
dialogue_line: He knows I'm a good catch, so he let me get away.

title: Dating a long-time friend (1)
dialogue_line: This is a little awkward.

title: Dating a long-time friend (1)
dialogue_line: I know we've been friends since high school.

title: Dating a long-time friend (1)
dialogue_line: I kind of always had a crush on you.

title: Dating a long-time friend (1)
dialogue_line: Why did you never say so?

title: Dating a long-time friend (1)
dialogue_line: You were dating my friend Katy.

title: Dating a long-time friend (1)
dialogue_line: You always gave me good advice when I was dating her.

title: Dating a long-time friend (1)
dialogue_line: That was so hard to do because I wanted to date you!

title: Dating a long-time friend (1)
dialogue_line: I'm glad we were friends first though.

title: Dating a long-time friend (1)
dialogue_line: Me too. I feel like we know so much about each other.

title: Dating a long-time friend (1)
dialogue_line: We're not starting from scratch.

title: Dating a long-time friend (1)
dialogue_line: No, it's a new stage in our friendship.

title: Dating a long-time friend (1)
dialogue_line: I think all couples should be friends first.

title: Dating a long-time friend (2)
dialogue_line: Are you telling me it's not weird dating Katy after being friends with her for so long?

title: Dating a long-time friend (2)
dialogue_line: It's a little strange since I've known her for so long.

title: Dating a long-time friend (2)
dialogue_line: You also know everyone she dated.

title: Dating a long-time friend (2)
dialogue_line: I've given her advice on guys she's dated.

title: Dating a long-time friend (2)
dialogue_line: Didn't she date your best friend once?

title: Dating a long-time friend (2)
dialogue_line: Yeah, but he stopped being my best friend after I started dating Katy.

title: Dating a long-time friend (2)
dialogue_line: Why is that?

title: Dating a long-time friend (2)
dialogue_line: He thought I had always been after her.

title: Dating a long-time friend (2)
dialogue_line: Had you always been after her?

title: Dating a long-time friend (2)
dialogue_line: Honestly no. I really only liked her as a friend.

title: Dating a long-time friend (2)
dialogue_line: When did that change?

title: Dating a long-time friend (2)
dialogue_line: When I came back from finishing college.

title: Calling After the Date (1)
dialogue_line: Hi John, this is Katy.

title: Calling After the Date (1)
dialogue_line: It's so nice to hear your voice.

title: Calling After the Date (1)
dialogue_line: I just wanted to call you and thank you for the lovely time last Friday.

title: Calling After the Date (1)
dialogue_line: I'm glad you liked the movie.

title: Calling After the Date (1)
dialogue_line: The restaurant you picked was great, too.

title: Calling After the Date (1)
dialogue_line: I wasn't sure you'd be into Greek food.

title: Calling After the Date (1)
dialogue_line: I'm hoping we can do it again soon.

title: Calling After the Date (1)
dialogue_line: I really would like that.

title: Calling After the Date (1)
dialogue_line: I have tickets to a play on Saturday.

title: Calling After the Date (1)
dialogue_line: I really like the theater.

title: Calling After the Date (1)
dialogue_line: Then you'll come with me?

title: Calling After the Date (1)
dialogue_line: It sounds like we have a second date.

title: Calling After the Date (2)
dialogue_line: Hi Katy, this is John.

title: Calling After the Date (2)
dialogue_line: Oh, hey. How are you?

title: Calling After the Date (2)
dialogue_line: I'm great. I wanted to thank you for going out with me last Friday.

title: Calling After the Date (2)
dialogue_line: I'm glad you had a good time.

title: Calling After the Date (2)
dialogue_line: You didn't seem to enjoy it that much.

title: Calling After the Date (2)
dialogue_line: To be honest, I didn't like the movie you picked.

title: Calling After the Date (2)
dialogue_line: I thought a horror movie would be a great way for us to get close to each other.

title: Calling After the Date (2)
dialogue_line: You were a little too hands on.

title: Calling After the Date (2)
dialogue_line: Why don't we try again next weekend?

title: Calling After the Date (2)
dialogue_line: I really don't think so.

title: Calling After the Date (2)
dialogue_line: Are you interested in going out with me again at all?

title: Calling After the Date (2)
dialogue_line: You should probably lose my number.

title: Accepting an Invitation
dialogue_line: Were you invited to Leslie's birthday party dinner?

title: Accepting an Invitation
dialogue_line: I was. I'm really excited about it.

title: Accepting an Invitation
dialogue_line: Would you like to go with me?

title: Accepting an Invitation
dialogue_line: Do you mean as your date?

title: Accepting an Invitation
dialogue_line: Yeah, why not? You and I have been out a few times together.

title: Accepting an Invitation
dialogue_line: This will be the first time we go out in front of friends though.

title: Accepting an Invitation
dialogue_line: Are you embarrassed to be seen with me?

title: Accepting an Invitation
dialogue_line: Not at all. It will be really nice though.

title: Accepting an Invitation
dialogue_line: I'll pick you up at 8:00 then?

title: Accepting an Invitation
dialogue_line: Why not 7:30?

title: Accepting an Invitation
dialogue_line: Why so early?

title: Accepting an Invitation
dialogue_line: It will give us time to pick up a bottle of wine on our way.

title: Rejecting an Invitation
dialogue_line: Were you invited to Barb's birthday party?

title: Rejecting an Invitation
dialogue_line: I was. It should be really fun.

title: Rejecting an Invitation
dialogue_line: Do you have a date for the party?

title: Rejecting an Invitation
dialogue_line: As a matter of fact I don't have.

title: Rejecting an Invitation
dialogue_line: Do you want to have a date for the party?

title: Rejecting an Invitation
dialogue_line: Do you know someone?

title: Rejecting an Invitation
dialogue_line: I was thinking maybe you'd want to go as my date.

title: Rejecting an Invitation
dialogue_line: Oh. I don't think that's a good idea.

title: Rejecting an Invitation
dialogue_line: Why not? You said yourself it would be fun.

title: Rejecting an Invitation
dialogue_line: The party would be fun. Going with you would not be.

title: Rejecting an Invitation
dialogue_line: Wow, that's kind of harsh.

title: Rejecting an Invitation
dialogue_line: At least I'm honest.

title: An Argument (1)
dialogue_line: I thought you were going to cook dinner today.

title: An Argument (1)
dialogue_line: I've been working all day.

title: An Argument (1)
dialogue_line: Yeah, but you work from home. That doesn't count.

title: An Argument (1)
dialogue_line: It sure seems to count when I help pay the bills.

title: An Argument (1)
dialogue_line: You know I pay more bills than you do.

title: An Argument (1)
dialogue_line: That's because you make more money than I do.

title: An Argument (1)
dialogue_line: This is why you should make dinner.

title: An Argument (1)
dialogue_line: You are so sexist.

title: An Argument (1)
dialogue_line: Way to get off topic. This is about you not making dinner.

title: An Argument (1)
dialogue_line: We can make dinner together or order in.

title: An Argument (1)
dialogue_line: What's the point of you working from home but won't take care of the home.

title: An Argument (1)
dialogue_line: You know what? I'm going out to eat by myself.

title: An Argument (2)
dialogue_line: Did you water the plants?

title: An Argument (2)
dialogue_line: I did this morning.

title: An Argument (2)
dialogue_line: It doesn't look like you did.

title: An Argument (2)
dialogue_line: Well, I did. Are you calling me a liar?

title: An Argument (2)
dialogue_line: No. It's just I know sometimes you can be a little lazy.

title: An Argument (2)
dialogue_line: Is this how you normally speak to people you are in a relationship with?

title: An Argument (2)
dialogue_line: This is how I speak to people who are not doing what they are supposed to do.

title: An Argument (2)
dialogue_line: Wow! I am really hurt by how you are talking to me.

title: An Argument (2)
dialogue_line: Maybe you are feeling guilty.

title: An Argument (2)
dialogue_line: No. I'm feeling like I made a mistake.

title: An Argument (2)
dialogue_line: What do you mean?

title: An Argument (2)
dialogue_line: I'm going to go for a walk before I say something I'm going to regret.

title: Stopping the Relationship
dialogue_line: We need to talk.

title: Stopping the Relationship
dialogue_line: Uh oh! It sounds like you are going to break up with me or are pregnant.

title: Stopping the Relationship
dialogue_line: Funny you should mention that.

title: Stopping the Relationship
dialogue_line: Wait! You are pregnant?

title: Stopping the Relationship
dialogue_line: No dummy. I think we need to take a break.

title: Stopping the Relationship
dialogue_line: A break from what?

title: Stopping the Relationship
dialogue_line: A break from seeing each other.

title: Stopping the Relationship
dialogue_line: So, are you breaking up with me?

title: Stopping the Relationship
dialogue_line: Yeah, I'm sorry. This just isn't working out.

title: Stopping the Relationship
dialogue_line: Are you going to give me the "it's not you"?

title: Stopping the Relationship
dialogue_line: No, because it actually is you.

title: Stopping the Relationship
dialogue_line: At least you're honest.

title: Health Insurance
dialogue_line: Do you have health insurance through your job?

title: Health Insurance
dialogue_line: I'm a part-time employee, so that is not part of my benefits package.

title: Health Insurance
dialogue_line: You can buy health insurance based on your income.

title: Health Insurance
dialogue_line: How exactly does that work?

title: Health Insurance
dialogue_line: If you go to healthcare.gov, you can see what plans you are eligible for.

title: Health Insurance
dialogue_line: Then what happens?

title: Health Insurance
dialogue_line: You pay a fee every month and choose a primary care doctor from your plan.

title: Health Insurance
dialogue_line: What is a primary care doctor?

title: Health Insurance
dialogue_line: A primary care doctor is the doctor you visit when you have a headache or for regular check-ups.

title: Health Insurance
dialogue_line: Do I go to my primary care doctor in an emergency?

title: Health Insurance
dialogue_line: No, in an emergency, you just go to the closest emergency room.

title: A Medical Emergency
dialogue_line: This is 911. What is your emergency?

title: A Medical Emergency
dialogue_line: I think my wife just had a stroke or a heart attack.

title: A Medical Emergency
dialogue_line: Can you describe her symptoms?

title: A Medical Emergency
dialogue_line: She is unconscious but breathing. She won't wake up.

title: A Medical Emergency
dialogue_line: We are sending an ambulance right now.

title: A Medical Emergency
dialogue_line: How do you know my address?

title: A Medical Emergency
dialogue_line: We can track it down through our phone system.

title: A Medical Emergency
dialogue_line: How long will it take for the ambulance to get here?

title: A Medical Emergency
dialogue_line: It should be there in less than five minutes, sir.

title: A Medical Emergency
dialogue_line: I think I hear the ambulance coming now.

title: A Medical Emergency
dialogue_line: Please let the paramedics in so they can take your wife to the nearest hospital.

title: A Medical Emergency
dialogue_line: Thank you. I'll open the door.

title: Going to an Emergency Room
dialogue_line: I cut myself pretty badly with a knife. I think I need stitches.

title: Going to an Emergency Room
dialogue_line: Come inside so the triage nurse can stop the bleeding.

title: Going to an Emergency Room
dialogue_line: I was just preparing dinner and my hand slipped.

title: Going to an Emergency Room
dialogue_line: This cut does need stitches, but I stopped the bleeding for now.

title: Going to an Emergency Room
dialogue_line: Will you give me stitches right now?

title: Going to an Emergency Room
dialogue_line: No, since the bleeding has stopped you have to wait in the Emergency Room waiting area.

title: Going to an Emergency Room
dialogue_line: What do I do while waiting?

title: Going to an Emergency Room
dialogue_line: Fill out these registration forms.

title: Going to an Emergency Room
dialogue_line: When will I get my hand stitched up?

title: Going to an Emergency Room
dialogue_line: Here in the ER we take care of people based on how bad their injury is.

title: Going to an Emergency Room
dialogue_line: I was here before many of these other people.

title: Going to an Emergency Room
dialogue_line: Some of them are in worse shape than you.

title: A Stomachache
dialogue_line: I woke up with the worse stomachache.

title: A Stomachache
dialogue_line: Did you try going to the bathroom?

title: A Stomachache
dialogue_line: I went to the bathroom, but that didn't make the pain go away.

title: A Stomachache
dialogue_line: Did you eat anything strange last night? Maybe you have food poisoning.

title: A Stomachache
dialogue_line: No. Because then I would be vomiting.

title: A Stomachache
dialogue_line: Where exactly is the pain?

title: A Stomachache
dialogue_line: It hurts here on my right side.

title: A Stomachache
dialogue_line: That's where it hurt when I had to get my appendix taken out.

title: A Stomachache
dialogue_line: It's probably just gas.

title: A Stomachache
dialogue_line: Did you take any medication?

title: A Stomachache
dialogue_line: I took an antacid an hour ago.

title: A Stomachache
dialogue_line: It should have worked by now. This could be serious.

title: A Toothache
dialogue_line: Why are you holding your mouth?

title: A Toothache
dialogue_line: I think I cracked a tooth. It hurts so much.

title: A Toothache
dialogue_line: Did you look in the mirror?

title: A Toothache
dialogue_line: No, but I can feel a sharp pain when my tongue touches my molars.

title: A Toothache
dialogue_line: That sort of thing can be infected easily.

title: A Toothache
dialogue_line: So what should I do?

title: A Toothache
dialogue_line: You should find an emergency dentist.

title: A Toothache
dialogue_line: That is going to cost so much money.

title: A Toothache
dialogue_line: Yeah, but it's better than being in pain.

title: A Toothache
dialogue_line: Do you think they'll have to pull the tooth?

title: A Toothache
dialogue_line: Maybe they just have to seal it up.

title: A Toothache
dialogue_line: Get me the yellow pages so I can find a nearby emergency dentist.

title: Buying Over-the-Counter Medicine
dialogue_line: I have a really bad headache. What do you recommend?

title: Buying Over-the-Counter Medicine
dialogue_line: You can purchase some over-the-counter pain relievers in aisle 6.

title: Buying Over-the-Counter Medicine
dialogue_line: Do I need a prescription for those?

title: Buying Over-the-Counter Medicine
dialogue_line: No. You just pick whichever brand your prefer and pay for it at the register.

title: Buying Over-the-Counter Medicine
dialogue_line: There are so many choices.

title: Buying Over-the-Counter Medicine
dialogue_line: If you read the labels, you can pick the one that is best for you.

title: Buying Over-the-Counter Medicine
dialogue_line: Is there a difference between the name brand pills and the store brand pills?

title: Buying Over-the-Counter Medicine
dialogue_line: Usually there isn't. Just compare the labels and look for active ingredients.

title: Buying Over-the-Counter Medicine
dialogue_line: The store brand is less expensive.

title: Buying Over-the-Counter Medicine
dialogue_line: Usually it is just as effective.

title: Buying Over-the-Counter Medicine
dialogue_line: I sure hope so because I want to save money and not have a headache.

title: Buying Over-the-Counter Medicine
dialogue_line: I think you can achieve both things.

title: Filling Prescription
dialogue_line: My doctor gave me this prescription.

title: Filling Prescription
dialogue_line: Can I have the paper and your insurance card?

title: Filling Prescription
dialogue_line: How long will this take to be filled?

title: Filling Prescription
dialogue_line: We can have this filled within an hour.

title: Filling Prescription
dialogue_line: Is there any way to fill it faster? I'm in so much pain.

title: Filling Prescription
dialogue_line: Unfortunately there are other prescriptions to fill.

title: Filling Prescription
dialogue_line: What am I supposed to do for the hour?

title: Filling Prescription
dialogue_line: We can call you when the prescription is ready.

title: Filling Prescription
dialogue_line: So I can go home and take a nap.

title: Filling Prescription
dialogue_line: Just leave your number here at the pharmacy and we'll call you.

title: Filling Prescription
dialogue_line: Can I send someone else to pick up the prescription?

title: Filling Prescription
dialogue_line: Your medication is a controlled substance so the person needs to be over 18.

title: Calling about Test Results
dialogue_line: I'm calling to see if the results of some tests I took are in?

title: Calling about Test Results
dialogue_line: I can check for you. Can I have your name, please?

title: Calling about Test Results
dialogue_line: Sure, my name is Willie Foster.

title: Calling about Test Results
dialogue_line: Mr. Foster, your doctor is Dr. Edwards?

title: Calling about Test Results
dialogue_line: Yes, that's right.

title: Calling about Test Results
dialogue_line: Can you tell me when the tests were taken?

title: Calling about Test Results
dialogue_line: I was there last week.

title: Calling about Test Results
dialogue_line: I see your results are in, Mr. Foster.

title: Calling about Test Results
dialogue_line: Great! Can you read them to me?

title: Calling about Test Results
dialogue_line: Actually I cannot. You need to come in and see the doctor.

title: Calling about Test Results
dialogue_line: Are they that bad? Am I dying?

title: Calling about Test Results
dialogue_line: Sir, I'm just the receptionist. Why don't you come and speak to Dr. Edwards?

title: Calling in Sick
dialogue_line: Hello, this is Isabel Foster.

title: Calling in Sick
dialogue_line: Hi, Isabel. Why are you calling? You can just come to my office.

title: Calling in Sick
dialogue_line: I'm actually not in the office right now.

title: Calling in Sick
dialogue_line: You aren't? Well, why not? Is everything okay?

title: Calling in Sick
dialogue_line: Actually everything is not okay. I'm pretty sick.

title: Calling in Sick
dialogue_line: I'm sorry to hear that.

title: Calling in Sick
dialogue_line: I'm not going to make it into the office today.

title: Calling in Sick
dialogue_line: There's no way you can come in, just finish that report?

title: Calling in Sick
dialogue_line: If I come in, I may give everyone what I have.

title: Calling in Sick
dialogue_line: Well, what do you have?

title: Calling in Sick
dialogue_line: I have a really bad stomach flu.

title: Calling in Sick
dialogue_line: Eww yeah, in that case, stay home.

title: Discussing Test Results
dialogue_line: What brings you into my examination room today?

title: Discussing Test Results
dialogue_line: I'm here because your receptionist told me I needed to come in to discuss my test results.

title: Discussing Test Results
dialogue_line: Well, let me take a look at your file.

title: Discussing Test Results
dialogue_line: The receptionist made me nervous when she wouldn't tell me the results over the phone.

title: Discussing Test Results
dialogue_line: Legally she can't tell you the results.

title: Discussing Test Results
dialogue_line: So is it bad, doctor?

title: Discussing Test Results
dialogue_line: Your cholesterol is a little high.

title: Discussing Test Results
dialogue_line: Does that mean I'm going to die.

title: Discussing Test Results
dialogue_line: Let's not exaggerate.

title: Discussing Test Results
dialogue_line: I'm going to be okay?

title: Discussing Test Results
dialogue_line: If you change your diet and exercise more, you will be fine.

title: Discussing Test Results
dialogue_line: I will do whatever it takes to be healthy.

title: Changing an Appointment Time
dialogue_line: I'm calling because I need to reschedule my appointment.

title: Changing an Appointment Time
dialogue_line: What was the original appointment date and time?

title: Changing an Appointment Time
dialogue_line: I am supposed to come in on Thursday at 10 in the morning.

title: Changing an Appointment Time
dialogue_line: Are you Tina Williams?

title: Changing an Appointment Time
dialogue_line: That's me.

title: Changing an Appointment Time
dialogue_line: When would you like to reschedule the appointment for?

title: Changing an Appointment Time
dialogue_line: Can Dr. Harris see me next Tuesday at 10?

title: Changing an Appointment Time
dialogue_line: He doesn't have an opening that day until noon.

title: Changing an Appointment Time
dialogue_line: I'll have to come on my lunch break then.

title: Changing an Appointment Time
dialogue_line: So shall I give you that appointment time?

title: Changing an Appointment Time
dialogue_line: Yeah, put me down for that time.

title: Changing an Appointment Time
dialogue_line: Just let us know 24 hours in advance if you need to cancel or reschedule.

title: Going Home Early Because Of Being Ill
dialogue_line: Can I have a minute?

title: Going Home Early Because Of Being Ill
dialogue_line: What is going on?

title: Going Home Early Because Of Being Ill
dialogue_line: I'm really not feeling very well this afternoon.

title: Going Home Early Because Of Being Ill
dialogue_line: Oh, I'm so sorry to hear that.

title: Going Home Early Because Of Being Ill
dialogue_line: Do you think I can leave the office early?

title: Going Home Early Because Of Being Ill
dialogue_line: Well, I have some medication here on my desk.

title: Going Home Early Because Of Being Ill
dialogue_line: I already took some pills and they really aren't helping.

title: Going Home Early Because Of Being Ill
dialogue_line: It's just that we have the report due today.

title: Going Home Early Because Of Being Ill
dialogue_line: I already gave Dennis what I have so far.

title: Going Home Early Because Of Being Ill
dialogue_line: He knows how to finish it?

title: Going Home Early Because Of Being Ill
dialogue_line: I emailed him detailed instructions.

title: Going Home Early Because Of Being Ill
dialogue_line: All right, go home then, but leave your phone on so we can call you if we have questions.

title: Having a Blood Test in the Lab
dialogue_line: I'm here to have some blood tests done.

title: Having a Blood Test in the Lab
dialogue_line: We take all the samples in the back room, so please follow me.

title: Having a Blood Test in the Lab
dialogue_line: I usually have blood taken at the doctor's office.

title: Having a Blood Test in the Lab
dialogue_line: More and more doctors are outsourcing that to private labs now.

title: Having a Blood Test in the Lab
dialogue_line: It's kind of pain because I have to make another appointment to go somewhere else.

title: Having a Blood Test in the Lab
dialogue_line: I understand, but we are professionals.

title: Having a Blood Test in the Lab
dialogue_line: So you won't mind if I scream when you take blood?

title: Having a Blood Test in the Lab
dialogue_line: Are you a screamer?

title: Having a Blood Test in the Lab
dialogue_line: Sometimes I even faint.

title: Having a Blood Test in the Lab
dialogue_line: I have a very gentle touch.

title: Having a Blood Test in the Lab
dialogue_line: I'm going to close my eyes.

title: Having a Blood Test in the Lab
dialogue_line: Well, first you need to fill out these forms.

title: Having a Cold
dialogue_line: I'm so sick of being sick.

title: Having a Cold
dialogue_line: Have you been taking any medicine?

title: Having a Cold
dialogue_line: I have taken every over-the-counter medicine in the pharmacy.

title: Having a Cold
dialogue_line: Maybe you need a prescription for an antibiotic.

title: Having a Cold
dialogue_line: I went to the doctor, and he says it's viral so no antibiotic will help.

title: Having a Cold
dialogue_line: Have you tried any home remedies?

title: Having a Cold
dialogue_line: What do you suggest?

title: Having a Cold
dialogue_line: You can try sitting in the bathroom with the shower running so it's all steamy.

title: Having a Cold
dialogue_line: What will that do?

title: Having a Cold
dialogue_line: It will help with the congestion.

title: Having a Cold
dialogue_line: Yeah, but I can't sit in the bathroom all day.

title: Having a Cold
dialogue_line: Do it in the morning and before you go to bed.

title: Making a Doctor's Appointment
dialogue_line: I need to make an appointment to see Dr. Taylor.

title: Making a Doctor's Appointment
dialogue_line: Are you already a patient of Dr. Taylor?

title: Making a Doctor's Appointment
dialogue_line: No, this is the first time I've been seeing him.

title: Making a Doctor's Appointment
dialogue_line: What kind of appointment is this?

title: Making a Doctor's Appointment
dialogue_line: It's for my annual physical.

title: Making a Doctor's Appointment
dialogue_line: Can you tell me what insurance you have?

title: Making a Doctor's Appointment
dialogue_line: I have Blue Cross.

title: Making a Doctor's Appointment
dialogue_line: The earliest appointment I can give you is Wednesday, September 3 at 10 in the morning.

title: Making a Doctor's Appointment
dialogue_line: That works for me.

title: Making a Doctor's Appointment
dialogue_line: Please bring in your health insurance cards when you come in on that day.

title: Making a Doctor's Appointment
dialogue_line: Will you send me a reminder in the mail?

title: Making a Doctor's Appointment
dialogue_line: If you give us your phone number, we will remind you the day before.

title: Blood Pressure
dialogue_line: Your blood pressure is very high.

title: Blood Pressure
dialogue_line: What does high blood pressure mean?

title: Blood Pressure
dialogue_line: High blood pressure or hypertension means that there is a lot of pressure on your arteries.

title: Blood Pressure
dialogue_line: That doesn't sound very good.

title: Blood Pressure
dialogue_line: It isn't very good because it means you are at higher risk to develop heart disease.

title: Blood Pressure
dialogue_line: I feel fine, though.

title: Blood Pressure
dialogue_line: High blood pressure is called a silent killer.

title: Blood Pressure
dialogue_line: What causes high blood pressure?

title: Blood Pressure
dialogue_line: It could be the sign of some other diseases.

title: Blood Pressure
dialogue_line: I am already taking medication.

title: Blood Pressure
dialogue_line: You should tell me the medications you are taking because some meds cause high blood pressure.

title: Blood Pressure
dialogue_line: I'd better change my lifestyle.

title: Not Feeling Well
dialogue_line: Wow, you really look terrible.

title: Not Feeling Well
dialogue_line: Thanks a lot. I really feel awful.

title: Not Feeling Well
dialogue_line: I'm a nurse ,so you should tell me your symptoms.

title: Not Feeling Well
dialogue_line: Well, to begin with, my whole body aches.

title: Not Feeling Well
dialogue_line: Have you taken your temperature to see if you have a fever?

title: Not Feeling Well
dialogue_line: I have, and I'm running a slight fever.

title: Not Feeling Well
dialogue_line: Sounds like you may have the flu.

title: Not Feeling Well
dialogue_line: That's impossible because I got my flu shot.

title: Not Feeling Well
dialogue_line: You can still get the flu even if you get vaccinated.

title: Not Feeling Well
dialogue_line: Well, that makes getting the vaccine pointless.

title: Not Feeling Well
dialogue_line: Not really, because you will probably get over it quickly.

title: Not Feeling Well
dialogue_line: I'm going to make some tea and lie down.

title: Physical Check-up
dialogue_line: What brings you in to see me today?

title: Physical Check-up
dialogue_line: I'm here for my annual check-up.

title: Physical Check-up
dialogue_line: Well, the nurse already took your blood pressure and she said it looks a little high.

title: Physical Check-up
dialogue_line: That could be related to my thyroid medication.

title: Physical Check-up
dialogue_line: That could be it. Let me listen to your heartbeat.

title: Physical Check-up
dialogue_line: Does it sound good, doctor?

title: Physical Check-up
dialogue_line: Sounds nice and strong to me.

title: Physical Check-up
dialogue_line: I am concerned about some pain I've been having in my knee.

title: Physical Check-up
dialogue_line: Are you very physically active?

title: Physical Check-up
dialogue_line: I'm training to run the marathon.

title: Physical Check-up
dialogue_line: That puts a lot of pressure on your knees.

title: Physical Check-up
dialogue_line: I hope I don't have to stop training.

title: Seeing a Doctor in an Emergency
dialogue_line: Help! I need the doctor immediately.

title: Seeing a Doctor in an Emergency
dialogue_line: What is the problem, sir?

title: Seeing a Doctor in an Emergency
dialogue_line: I think my wife had a stroke.

title: Seeing a Doctor in an Emergency
dialogue_line: What symptoms does she have?

title: Seeing a Doctor in an Emergency
dialogue_line: Look at her! She is awake, but in a catatonic state.

title: Seeing a Doctor in an Emergency
dialogue_line: How long has she been like this?

title: Seeing a Doctor in an Emergency
dialogue_line: She's been like this since this morning.

title: Seeing a Doctor in an Emergency
dialogue_line: She should be taken to the hospital.

title: Seeing a Doctor in an Emergency
dialogue_line: But this is the doctor's office. You can't help her?

title: Seeing a Doctor in an Emergency
dialogue_line: She needs to see an emergency specialist.

title: Seeing a Doctor in an Emergency
dialogue_line: What can you do for her?

title: Seeing a Doctor in an Emergency
dialogue_line: We are going to have her transferred to the nearest hospital.

title: Taking an X-Ray
dialogue_line: We think your leg may be broken.

title: Taking an X-Ray
dialogue_line: How will you know for sure?

title: Taking an X-Ray
dialogue_line: We're going to take you to Radiology to get it x-rayed now.

title: Taking an X-Ray
dialogue_line: Will the x-ray hurt?

title: Taking an X-Ray
dialogue_line: It's a pain free procedure that allows us to take a picture of your bones.

title: Taking an X-Ray
dialogue_line: Are there any side effects associated with taking an x-ray?

title: Taking an X-Ray
dialogue_line: Diagnostic x-rays are safe as long as they are not overused.

title: Taking an X-Ray
dialogue_line: I've never had an x-ray in my entire life.

title: Taking an X-Ray
dialogue_line: Then you should be fine.

title: Taking an X-Ray
dialogue_line: Can someone be in the room with me?

title: Taking an X-Ray
dialogue_line: Someone can be in the room with you, but not next to you during the x-ray.

title: Taking an X-Ray
dialogue_line: Please go get my wife then.

title: Seeing the Doctor
dialogue_line: I'm so glad you could squeeze me into your schedule today, doctor.

title: Seeing the Doctor
dialogue_line: Sure, what seems to be the problem?

title: Seeing the Doctor
dialogue_line: I was in a small car accident last month, but only recently noticed some neck pain.

title: Seeing the Doctor
dialogue_line: Is there any bruising?

title: Seeing the Doctor
dialogue_line: Not that I can see.

title: Seeing the Doctor
dialogue_line: Show me where the pain is.

title: Seeing the Doctor
dialogue_line: The pain feels like a sharp stabbing followed by a dull throbbing.

title: Seeing the Doctor
dialogue_line: I don't see bruising, but there could be nerve damage.

title: Seeing the Doctor
dialogue_line: So what do I do next?

title: Seeing the Doctor
dialogue_line: I'm going to refer you to a nerve specialist.

title: Seeing the Doctor
dialogue_line: Do you think I can sue?

title: Seeing the Doctor
dialogue_line: Is that what this is all about?

title: Asking the Doctor Questions
dialogue_line: Doctor, I have a few questions I would like to ask.

title: Asking the Doctor Questions
dialogue_line: I'd be happy to answer your questions.

title: Asking the Doctor Questions
dialogue_line: Based on my test results, do you think I should be taking a multi-vitamin?

title: Asking the Doctor Questions
dialogue_line: Your levels are all within the normal range, so just eat vitamin rich food.

title: Asking the Doctor Questions
dialogue_line: I am trying to get pregnant.

title: Asking the Doctor Questions
dialogue_line: Then you should take a pre-natal vitamin.

title: Asking the Doctor Questions
dialogue_line: Those are expensive.

title: Asking the Doctor Questions
dialogue_line: An alternative would be to eat food enriched with Folic Acid.

title: Asking the Doctor Questions
dialogue_line: What foods are enriched with Folic Acid?

title: Asking the Doctor Questions
dialogue_line: Some cereals and breads now are enriched with Folic Acid.

title: Asking the Doctor Questions
dialogue_line: What if I'm staying away from grains?

title: Asking the Doctor Questions
dialogue_line: Then you should take a vitamin with Folic Acid.

title: Taking a Urine Sample
dialogue_line: In order to check for an infection, we are going to need a urine sample.

title: Taking a Urine Sample
dialogue_line: How does that work?

title: Taking a Urine Sample
dialogue_line: Take this little cup, and pee in it.

title: Taking a Urine Sample
dialogue_line: Do I have to fill the whole cup?

title: Taking a Urine Sample
dialogue_line: If you fill it half way, it will be fine.

title: Taking a Urine Sample
dialogue_line: What do I do with the cup?

title: Taking a Urine Sample
dialogue_line: Put it in the plastic bag and leave it on the tray in the bathroom.

title: Taking a Urine Sample
dialogue_line: No one else will take my sample?

title: Taking a Urine Sample
dialogue_line: The nurse will take it when you leave the bathroom.

title: Taking a Urine Sample
dialogue_line: I'm glad I drank some water while I was in the waiting room.

title: Taking a Urine Sample
dialogue_line: We would have given you water and waited until you need to use the bathroom.

title: Taking a Urine Sample
dialogue_line: You don't need to wait because I'm ready to use the bathroom now.

title: How to Stay Healthy
dialogue_line: Do you have any tips on how to stay healthy?

title: How to Stay Healthy
dialogue_line: How do you think I got to look this good at my age?

title: How to Stay Healthy
dialogue_line: Let me guess, you drink a lot of water?

title: How to Stay Healthy
dialogue_line: I drink at least eight glasses a day.

title: How to Stay Healthy
dialogue_line: I bet you exercise every day, too.

title: How to Stay Healthy
dialogue_line: I try, at the very least, to walk 20 minutes a day.

title: How to Stay Healthy
dialogue_line: I didn't think walking was good exercise.

title: How to Stay Healthy
dialogue_line: Walking briskly is great exercise.

title: How to Stay Healthy
dialogue_line: What about eating habits?

title: How to Stay Healthy
dialogue_line: Try to eat as much non-processed stuff as possible.

title: How to Stay Healthy
dialogue_line: What do you mean non-processed?

title: How to Stay Healthy
dialogue_line: If it's in a can, a bag, or a box it's probably processed.

title: Prescribing Medicine
dialogue_line: I saw a commercial about a heart medication.

title: Prescribing Medicine
dialogue_line: You don't have any heart problems.

title: Prescribing Medicine
dialogue_line: I know, but the ad suggested I ask my doctor if that medication was right for me.

title: Prescribing Medicine
dialogue_line: As your doctor, I can tell you that you don't need any heart medication.

title: Prescribing Medicine
dialogue_line: Okay, what about this medication that has the commercial with the couple in the bathtub?

title: Prescribing Medicine
dialogue_line: What about it?

title: Prescribing Medicine
dialogue_line: Can you prescribe that to me?

title: Prescribing Medicine
dialogue_line: The only thing I am prescribing you is an antibiotic for your strep throat.

title: Prescribing Medicine
dialogue_line: What do I do with this piece of paper?

title: Prescribing Medicine
dialogue_line: Take it to the pharmacy, and the pharmacist will give you the antibiotic.

title: Prescribing Medicine
dialogue_line: What if it doesn't work?

title: Prescribing Medicine
dialogue_line: Come back to see me again.

title: Calling to Make a Reservation
dialogue_line: I'd like to make a reservation.

title: Calling to Make a Reservation
dialogue_line: Can you tell me what dates you would like to stay?

title: Calling to Make a Reservation
dialogue_line: I want to stay from April first through the third.

title: Calling to Make a Reservation
dialogue_line: That's two nights. What kind of room would you like?

title: Calling to Make a Reservation
dialogue_line: I'd like an economy room, please.

title: Calling to Make a Reservation
dialogue_line: Do you want two twin beds or one queen bed?

title: Calling to Make a Reservation
dialogue_line: I'll be staying in the room alone, so one queen bed is fine.

title: Calling to Make a Reservation
dialogue_line: That will be a total of $219. I need your credit card number.

title: Calling to Make a Reservation
dialogue_line: I have to pay right now?

title: Calling to Make a Reservation
dialogue_line: We need a credit card so we can hold your reservation.

title: Calling to Make a Reservation
dialogue_line: What if I need to cancel?

title: Calling to Make a Reservation
dialogue_line: You need to let us know 24 hours in advance, or else we charge you regardless.

title: Making an Online Reservation
dialogue_line: I'm going to book our hotel reservation online.

title: Making an Online Reservation
dialogue_line: Are you going to book directly from the hotel website?

title: Making an Online Reservation
dialogue_line: I think if I use a service like Hotels.com, it is cheaper.

title: Making an Online Reservation
dialogue_line: You should compare the websites and see which gives us a better deal.

title: Making an Online Reservation
dialogue_line: It asks us how many nights we are staying.

title: Making an Online Reservation
dialogue_line: You are also going to have to tell them how many adults and children are staying in the room.

title: Making an Online Reservation
dialogue_line: The hotels.com website compares prices for different hotels.

title: Making an Online Reservation
dialogue_line: Pick the one that is cheapest, but has the nicest rooms.

title: Making an Online Reservation
dialogue_line: How can I tell?

title: Making an Online Reservation
dialogue_line: Look at the pictures and also read the reviews.

title: Making an Online Reservation
dialogue_line: How do I pay once I pick a hotel?

title: Making an Online Reservation
dialogue_line: Here, take my credit card.

title: Checking into the Hotel
dialogue_line: I'm checking in.

title: Checking into the Hotel
dialogue_line: What name is the reservation under?

title: Checking into the Hotel
dialogue_line: It is under my name, Michael Roberts.

title: Checking into the Hotel
dialogue_line: Can I see your identification, please?

title: Checking into the Hotel
dialogue_line: Here is my driver's license.

title: Checking into the Hotel
dialogue_line: I have you staying for two nights. Is that correct?

title: Checking into the Hotel
dialogue_line: That's correct.

title: Checking into the Hotel
dialogue_line: I need a credit card for any incidentals.

title: Checking into the Hotel
dialogue_line: I don't plan on using the phone or the mini-bar.

title: Checking into the Hotel
dialogue_line: I still need a credit card though.

title: Checking into the Hotel
dialogue_line: Can I pay cash?

title: Checking into the Hotel
dialogue_line: You will have to pay a $200 cash deposit if you don't want to leave a credit card.

title: Requesting a Wake-up Call
dialogue_line: I have an early meeting, so can I get a wake-up call?

title: Requesting a Wake-up Call
dialogue_line: Sure! What time should we call you?

title: Requesting a Wake-up Call
dialogue_line: Can you call my room at six in the morning?

title: Requesting a Wake-up Call
dialogue_line: Just tell me your room number.

title: Requesting a Wake-up Call
dialogue_line: I'm staying in room 302.

title: Requesting a Wake-up Call
dialogue_line: Okay, Mr. Roberts. We'll call you at 6 a.m.

title: Requesting a Wake-up Call
dialogue_line: What happens if I don't answer?

title: Requesting a Wake-up Call
dialogue_line: Then you'll probably miss your meeting.

title: Requesting a Wake-up Call
dialogue_line: Can I request a second wake-up call?

title: Requesting a Wake-up Call
dialogue_line: What time should we schedule the second wake-up call?

title: Requesting a Wake-up Call
dialogue_line: Call me again at 6:15 a.m. if I don't answer at six.

title: Requesting a Wake-up Call
dialogue_line: So we have one wake-up call at six and a second one fifteen minutes later.

title: Asking the Concierge for Sightseeing Advice
dialogue_line: I have a few hours to explore the city.

title: Asking the Concierge for Sightseeing Advice
dialogue_line: I can make some recommendations for you.

title: Asking the Concierge for Sightseeing Advice
dialogue_line: Great! I want to see some museums.

title: Asking the Concierge for Sightseeing Advice
dialogue_line: Here are some brochures for some local museums. Do you like modern or classic art?

title: Asking the Concierge for Sightseeing Advice
dialogue_line: I like modern art. Are the museums far?

title: Asking the Concierge for Sightseeing Advice
dialogue_line: It depends on which one of the two modern art museums you want to see.

title: Asking the Concierge for Sightseeing Advice
dialogue_line: Where is the closest one?

title: Asking the Concierge for Sightseeing Advice
dialogue_line: Let me show you on the map. This one is in walking distance from the hotel.

title: Asking the Concierge for Sightseeing Advice
dialogue_line: Is the ticket to get in very expensive?

title: Asking the Concierge for Sightseeing Advice
dialogue_line: It's normally $20.

title: Asking the Concierge for Sightseeing Advice
dialogue_line: Does the hotel offer any discount tickets?

title: Asking the Concierge for Sightseeing Advice
dialogue_line: If you buy the ticket here, it will only cost you $15.

title: Asking the Concierge for Restaurant Advice
dialogue_line: Are there any good French restaurants around here?

title: Asking the Concierge for Restaurant Advice
dialogue_line: There are quite a few. I have some menus you can look at.

title: Asking the Concierge for Restaurant Advice
dialogue_line: Which one do you recommend? It's my wife's birthday.

title: Asking the Concierge for Restaurant Advice
dialogue_line: The French Quarter is very romantic.

title: Asking the Concierge for Restaurant Advice
dialogue_line: Is it very expensive?

title: Asking the Concierge for Restaurant Advice
dialogue_line: It is about $50 a person, not including alcohol or tip.

title: Asking the Concierge for Restaurant Advice
dialogue_line: Do I need a reservation?

title: Asking the Concierge for Restaurant Advice
dialogue_line: Yes, but I would be happy to make that reservation for you.

title: Asking the Concierge for Restaurant Advice
dialogue_line: Great! Get us a table for two at 8.

title: Asking the Concierge for Restaurant Advice
dialogue_line: Will you also need transportation to the restaurant?

title: Asking the Concierge for Restaurant Advice
dialogue_line: Can you get a limo to pick us up?

title: Asking the Concierge for Restaurant Advice
dialogue_line: I can do that for $30.

title: Talking to Room Service
dialogue_line: I'd like to order room service, please.

title: Talking to Room Service
dialogue_line: What would you like to order?

title: Talking to Room Service
dialogue_line: I'm really hungry. What are my choices?

title: Talking to Room Service
dialogue_line: There should be a menu in your room.

title: Talking to Room Service
dialogue_line: I have it in front of me. Can I have a cheeseburger deluxe with bacon and fries?

title: Talking to Room Service
dialogue_line: Sure. How do you want your burger?

title: Talking to Room Service
dialogue_line: Bloody, and I want my bacon extra crispy.

title: Talking to Room Service
dialogue_line: Would you like anything to drink?

title: Talking to Room Service
dialogue_line: Can I have a beer?

title: Talking to Room Service
dialogue_line: Are you 21 or older?

title: Talking to Room Service
dialogue_line: I'm way older than 21.

title: Talking to Room Service
dialogue_line: We'll send that to your room in 30 minutes. You can pay upon delivery or we can charge your room.

title: Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (1)
dialogue_line: Hi, I'm calling from room 117, and there is a big problem.

title: Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (1)
dialogue_line: I'm so sorry. What seems to be the issue?

title: Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (1)
dialogue_line: The issue is a huge disgusting cockroach in my bathroom.

title: Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (1)
dialogue_line: Is it just one cockroach?

title: Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (1)
dialogue_line: Yeah, there is only one, but it's the size of my hand!

title: Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (1)
dialogue_line: Why don't you just kill it?

title: Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (1)
dialogue_line: I shouldn't have to kill cockroaches while I'm on vacation.

title: Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (1)
dialogue_line: Do you want me to send someone to kill it for you?

title: Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (1)
dialogue_line: You can send someone, but I also want to be moved to a different room.

title: Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (1)
dialogue_line: I don't know if we have any other rooms available right now.

title: Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (1)
dialogue_line: Well, I'm not staying in this room if there are gigantic roaches sharing it with me.

title: Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (1)
dialogue_line: I'll send someone to your room right away to see if we can move you.

title: Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (2)
dialogue_line: There're a few problems with room 217, and I'd liked to be moved.

title: Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (2)
dialogue_line: Maybe it's a problem we can fix without moving you.

title: Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (2)
dialogue_line: If you can kill the 8 cockroaches I've seen this morning.

title: Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (2)
dialogue_line: Did you say 8 cockroaches? Are you exaggerating just a little?

title: Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (2)
dialogue_line: I know how to count and I took pictures and video with my cell phone.

title: Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (2)
dialogue_line: We can call an exterminator and send him to your room.

title: Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (2)
dialogue_line: Great, and then I'm supposed to breathe in toxins after that?

title: Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (2)
dialogue_line: At least you won't have any more roaches.

title: Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (2)
dialogue_line: You can't be serious right now. Can I speak to your supervisor?

title: Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (2)
dialogue_line: I can transfer your call right now.

title: Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (2)
dialogue_line: Can you also transfer my room?

title: Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (2)
dialogue_line: I'll check to see if we have any vacant rooms we can move you to.

title: Asking about the Hotel Gym
dialogue_line: Is there a gym in this hotel?

title: Asking about the Hotel Gym
dialogue_line: Yes, the fitness center is located on the third floor.

title: Asking about the Hotel Gym
dialogue_line: Is there a charge for me to use it?

title: Asking about the Hotel Gym
dialogue_line: No, it's free to all of our guests.

title: Asking about the Hotel Gym
dialogue_line: Wonderful! Can I go use it right now?

title: Asking about the Hotel Gym
dialogue_line: Unfortunately, the gym is only open from 5 a.m. to 7 p.m. and it's 10 p.m. now.

title: Asking about the Hotel Gym
dialogue_line: I guess I'll use it in the morning then.

title: Asking about the Hotel Gym
dialogue_line: Just use your room key card to get in.

title: Asking about the Hotel Gym
dialogue_line: Are there weight machines?

title: Asking about the Hotel Gym
dialogue_line: The gym has weight machines, some treadmills, and some elliptical machines, too.

title: Asking about the Hotel Gym
dialogue_line: What about a personal trainer?

title: Asking about the Hotel Gym
dialogue_line: No, there are no personal trainers, just the machines.

title: Asking for More Amenities
dialogue_line: There are some amenities missing from my hotel room.

title: Asking for More Amenities
dialogue_line: I'm so sorry to hear that. What is your room number and what's missing?

title: Asking for More Amenities
dialogue_line: I'm in room 143; there is no hairdryer.

title: Asking for More Amenities
dialogue_line: I can send one up to you right away.

title: Asking for More Amenities
dialogue_line: Great! So that I can use that hairdryer, can you also send up shampoo and conditioner?

title: Asking for More Amenities
dialogue_line: There should have been a basket in the bathroom with all that.

title: Asking for More Amenities
dialogue_line: Well, there isn't.

title: Asking for More Amenities
dialogue_line: Anything else I can send up to your room?

title: Asking for More Amenities
dialogue_line: Yes, I need an iron and an ironing board.

title: Asking for More Amenities
dialogue_line: Those aren't in your closet?

title: Asking for More Amenities
dialogue_line: Maybe they are invisible. I don't see them.

title: Asking for More Amenities
dialogue_line: I do apologize. I'll bring them personally.

title: Asking Where to Make a Copy
dialogue_line: Is there a copy machine for guests?

title: Asking Where to Make a Copy
dialogue_line: Yes, we have copy machines in our business center, which is to your right.

title: Asking Where to Make a Copy
dialogue_line: I need to make a color copy.

title: Asking Where to Make a Copy
dialogue_line: There are two black and white machines and one color copier.

title: Asking Where to Make a Copy
dialogue_line: Is there a charge to use the machine?

title: Asking Where to Make a Copy
dialogue_line: The cost per sheet on the color copy machine is 25 cents.

title: Asking Where to Make a Copy
dialogue_line: Does the machine take credit cards?

title: Asking Where to Make a Copy
dialogue_line: No, but I'd be happy to give you change if you have bills.

title: Asking Where to Make a Copy
dialogue_line: I need to make four color copies, so give me change for a dollar.

title: Asking Where to Make a Copy
dialogue_line: The machine also takes one dollar bills, so you don't need change.

title: Asking Where to Make a Copy
dialogue_line: Is there usually a wait for the machines.

title: Asking Where to Make a Copy
dialogue_line: Our business center is pretty empty right now, so you should have the run of the place.

title: Calling to Report a Medical Emergency
dialogue_line: Is there a doctor on call?

title: Calling to Report a Medical Emergency
dialogue_line: What seems to be the problem?

title: Calling to Report a Medical Emergency
dialogue_line: My husband is having chest pain. I think it's a heart attack.

title: Calling to Report a Medical Emergency
dialogue_line: We are calling for an ambulance right now.

title: Calling to Report a Medical Emergency
dialogue_line: I don't need an ambulance, I need a doctor.

title: Calling to Report a Medical Emergency
dialogue_line: We don't have a doctor on duty at the hotel.

title: Calling to Report a Medical Emergency
dialogue_line: I think he is going to die!

title: Calling to Report a Medical Emergency
dialogue_line: The paramedics are on their way.

title: Calling to Report a Medical Emergency
dialogue_line: Is there no one on staff to help us?

title: Calling to Report a Medical Emergency
dialogue_line: Calm down, someone is coming up right now.

title: Calling to Report a Medical Emergency
dialogue_line: Someone is knocking on the door.

title: Calling to Report a Medical Emergency
dialogue_line: Take a deep breath; it may be the paramedics.

title: Calling for a Wireless Connection
dialogue_line: I'm having trouble connecting to the wireless network.

title: Calling for a Wireless Connection
dialogue_line: What network are you trying to connect to?

title: Calling for a Wireless Connection
dialogue_line: I'm trying to connect to the Bay Hotel Network.

title: Calling for a Wireless Connection
dialogue_line: You need to connect to Bay Hotel Guest Network.

title: Calling for a Wireless Connection
dialogue_line: What login do I use?

title: Calling for a Wireless Connection
dialogue_line: Your room number is your login.

title: Calling for a Wireless Connection
dialogue_line: What about the password?

title: Calling for a Wireless Connection
dialogue_line: The password for all guests is "vacationconnect", all one word, all lower case.

title: Calling for a Wireless Connection
dialogue_line: That seems to work. Thanks so much.

title: Calling for a Wireless Connection
dialogue_line: No problem. In the future, refer to the guest folder located by the television.

title: Calling for a Wireless Connection
dialogue_line: I'm so stupid. I didn't even think to look there.

title: Calling for a Wireless Connection
dialogue_line: No problem. That's what we're here for.

title: Requesting More Supplies for the Minibar
dialogue_line: I need someone to come up and restock the minibar in my room.

title: Requesting More Supplies for the Minibar
dialogue_line: Does everything need to be restocked?

title: Requesting More Supplies for the Minibar
dialogue_line: The good stuff needs to be restocked.

title: Requesting More Supplies for the Minibar
dialogue_line: Tell me what's good to you, sir.

title: Requesting More Supplies for the Minibar
dialogue_line: The three mini bottles of Grey Goose were great.

title: Requesting More Supplies for the Minibar
dialogue_line: Do you need the mixers to be restocked, too?

title: Requesting More Supplies for the Minibar
dialogue_line: I just need more cranberry juice to go with the vodka.

title: Requesting More Supplies for the Minibar
dialogue_line: Do any of the snacks need to be restocked?

title: Requesting More Supplies for the Minibar
dialogue_line: Bring a can of the honey roasted nuts.

title: Requesting More Supplies for the Minibar
dialogue_line: You like nuts, sir?

title: Requesting More Supplies for the Minibar
dialogue_line: I'm nuts about nuts.

title: Requesting More Supplies for the Minibar
dialogue_line: Okay, just give me your room number and someone will restock those items.

title: Asking about the Swimming Pool
dialogue_line: Can you tell me where the pool is?

title: Asking about the Swimming Pool
dialogue_line: It's right outside the automatic sliding doors to your left.

title: Asking about the Swimming Pool
dialogue_line: Is it open 24 hours?

title: Asking about the Swimming Pool
dialogue_line: No. The pool is open from 7 a.m. to 10 p.m.

title: Asking about the Swimming Pool
dialogue_line: Where can I get towels for the pool?

title: Asking about the Swimming Pool
dialogue_line: There are wicker baskets by the pool with fresh towels.
