title: Asking about the Swimming Pool
dialogue_line: Is the pool heated?

title: Asking about the Swimming Pool
dialogue_line: We keep the pool heated to 80 degrees.

title: Asking about the Swimming Pool
dialogue_line: How deep is the pool?

title: Asking about the Swimming Pool
dialogue_line: The pool is 3 feet on one end and goes up to 12 feet at the other end.

title: Asking about the Swimming Pool
dialogue_line: How often do they clean the pool?

title: Asking about the Swimming Pool
dialogue_line: It's cleaned every day before it opens.

title: Getting a Taxi via the Front Desk
dialogue_line: I need a cab to the theater district.

title: Getting a Taxi via the Front Desk
dialogue_line: We can get that for you right away.

title: Getting a Taxi via the Front Desk
dialogue_line: Well, I don't need to be there for another hour.

title: Getting a Taxi via the Front Desk
dialogue_line: Would you like to reserve a limo then?

title: Getting a Taxi via the Front Desk
dialogue_line: That seems a bit much for me. Just a regular cab is fine.

title: Getting a Taxi via the Front Desk
dialogue_line: We can't reserve a taxi that far in advance, sir.

title: Getting a Taxi via the Front Desk
dialogue_line: So how do I get a cab in an hour then?

title: Getting a Taxi via the Front Desk
dialogue_line: If you go right outside our lobby when you are ready, a staff member will hail one for you.

title: Getting a Taxi via the Front Desk
dialogue_line: Do I have to tip the guy who gets the cab for me?

title: Getting a Taxi via the Front Desk
dialogue_line: Tips aren't mandatory, but they are appreciated.

title: Getting a Taxi via the Front Desk
dialogue_line: Maybe I'll just hail the cab myself then.

title: Getting a Taxi via the Front Desk
dialogue_line: That's also an option.

title: Checking Out
dialogue_line: I'm ready to check out.

title: Checking Out
dialogue_line: Give me your room key, and tell me your room number, please?

title: Checking Out
dialogue_line: Here's the key. I was in room 250.

title: Checking Out
dialogue_line: Let me print out a copy of all your charges for your review.

title: Checking Out
dialogue_line: This looks right.

title: Checking Out
dialogue_line: Excellent! Will you be paying with the credit card you used when you checked in?

title: Checking Out
dialogue_line: Yeah, just charge the total to that.

title: Checking Out
dialogue_line: I just need your signature and you're all set.

title: Checking Out
dialogue_line: Thanks so much. I had a wonderful stay.

title: Checking Out
dialogue_line: I hope you will stay with us again in the future.

title: Checking Out
dialogue_line: I stay here all the time when I'm in town on business.

title: Checking Out
dialogue_line: In that case, we'll see you soon.

title: Disputing the Bill
dialogue_line: There are some charges on the final bill that are incorrect.

title: Disputing the Bill
dialogue_line: Okay, sir. Can you tell me which ones are in dispute?

title: Disputing the Bill
dialogue_line: I never ordered this movie "The Care Bears Christmas."

title: Disputing the Bill
dialogue_line: Are you sure your kids didn't order it?

title: Disputing the Bill
dialogue_line: I don't have any kids. Besides I was at the theater at that time.

title: Disputing the Bill
dialogue_line: All right, I'll take that charge off your bill. Anything else?

title: Disputing the Bill
dialogue_line: Yeah, I didn't drink 4 bottles of Grey Goose from the minibar.

title: Disputing the Bill
dialogue_line: I remember you calling for more vodka, sir.

title: Disputing the Bill
dialogue_line: Yeah I ordered three more bottles, but I didn't drink any of them.

title: Disputing the Bill
dialogue_line: Maybe you don't remember drinking the additional three bottles?

title: Disputing the Bill
dialogue_line: What are you trying to say, that I'm an alcoholic?

title: Disputing the Bill
dialogue_line: No, sir. I'm just reading what is in our system.

title: Storing Luggage for a Few Hours
dialogue_line: I'm checking out, but is there a place I can store my luggage for a few hours?

title: Storing Luggage for a Few Hours
dialogue_line: Why do you need us to hold your luggage, sir?

title: Storing Luggage for a Few Hours
dialogue_line: My flight doesn't leave for another four hours.

title: Storing Luggage for a Few Hours
dialogue_line: We can hold your luggage, but there is an additional cost associated with that service.

title: Storing Luggage for a Few Hours
dialogue_line: How much is it going to cost me?

title: Storing Luggage for a Few Hours
dialogue_line: It will be $6 an hour.

title: Storing Luggage for a Few Hours
dialogue_line: I'm going to drink at your hotel bar. Can you hook me up?

title: Storing Luggage for a Few Hours
dialogue_line: Unfortunately, sir, we cannot. Shall I take your credit card?

title: Storing Luggage for a Few Hours
dialogue_line: No, forget it. It's cheaper for me to use a locker at the airport.

title: Storing Luggage for a Few Hours
dialogue_line: Those airport lockers are not always safe though.

title: Storing Luggage for a Few Hours
dialogue_line: I'll take my chances.

title: Storing Luggage for a Few Hours
dialogue_line: Good luck with that, sir.

title: To Hold a Parcel for Pick-up
dialogue_line: Can I leave a package here to be picked up?

title: To Hold a Parcel for Pick-up
dialogue_line: Absolutely, sir. What is your name?

title: To Hold a Parcel for Pick-up
dialogue_line: I'm Bill Collins. My room is 108.

title: To Hold a Parcel for Pick-up
dialogue_line: Who will be picking up the package?

title: To Hold a Parcel for Pick-up
dialogue_line: It's my girlfriend, Katie Black.

title: To Hold a Parcel for Pick-up
dialogue_line: She will have to present identification when she picks it up.

title: To Hold a Parcel for Pick-up
dialogue_line: That's fine. I'll let her know.

title: To Hold a Parcel for Pick-up
dialogue_line: What time will she be picking the package up?

title: To Hold a Parcel for Pick-up
dialogue_line: She'll be here after 2 p.m. Is that all right?

title: To Hold a Parcel for Pick-up
dialogue_line: Not a problem at all. Could you just write all the info down?

title: To Hold a Parcel for Pick-up
dialogue_line: Why did I bother telling you everything then?

title: To Hold a Parcel for Pick-up
dialogue_line: Writing it down will make sure that if I'm not here someone will know what to do.

title: Calling to Cancel a Reservation
dialogue_line: I need to cancel a reservation.

title: Calling to Cancel a Reservation
dialogue_line: Can you tell me the name the reservation is under?

title: Calling to Cancel a Reservation
dialogue_line: Sure! The reservation is under the name Carlos Jones.

title: Calling to Cancel a Reservation
dialogue_line: Can you please confirm your billing address?

title: Calling to Cancel a Reservation
dialogue_line: It's 116 Lighthouse Road in Boston.

title: Calling to Cancel a Reservation
dialogue_line: Did you want to reschedule the reservation?

title: Calling to Cancel a Reservation
dialogue_line: No, I need to cancel it outright.

title: Calling to Cancel a Reservation
dialogue_line: So I'm canceling the reservation from March 3 through 5th, correct?

title: Calling to Cancel a Reservation
dialogue_line: That is right.

title: Calling to Cancel a Reservation
dialogue_line: The cancelation will be subject to a $15 cancellation fee.

title: Calling to Cancel a Reservation
dialogue_line: No one told me that when I made the reservation.

title: Calling to Cancel a Reservation
dialogue_line: I'm sorry, sir. You can pay the cancellation fee or be charged for the full stay.

title: Making Plans for the Weekend
dialogue_line: What are you going to do this weekend?

title: Making Plans for the Weekend
dialogue_line: I haven't made any solid plans yet. Why do you ask?

title: Making Plans for the Weekend
dialogue_line: There's this event at a bookstore downtown I was thinking of checking out.

title: Making Plans for the Weekend
dialogue_line: That sounds really interesting.

title: Making Plans for the Weekend
dialogue_line: Yeah, and even if it's not, we can leave and grab a bite.

title: Making Plans for the Weekend
dialogue_line: There are so many nice new places that have opened up downtown.

title: Making Plans for the Weekend
dialogue_line: I know, and have wanted to try them all.

title: Making Plans for the Weekend
dialogue_line: So our meeting time is Saturday at three.

title: Making Plans for the Weekend
dialogue_line: I'll meet you at the bookstore.

title: Making Plans for the Weekend
dialogue_line: It's the bookstore on Spring Street.

title: Making Plans for the Weekend
dialogue_line: We can grab some food and drinks after.

title: Making Plans for the Weekend
dialogue_line: An early dinner sounds great.

title: Going to a Party
dialogue_line: Did you get invited to Wanda's party this Sunday?

title: Going to a Party
dialogue_line: I did. I even went shopping for a new outfit.

title: Going to a Party
dialogue_line: Did you also go shopping for a gift to bring?

title: Going to a Party
dialogue_line: We're supposed to bring gifts?

title: Going to a Party
dialogue_line: Of course! You can't just show up at someone's house empty handed.

title: Going to a Party
dialogue_line: I don't even know what Wanda likes.

title: Going to a Party
dialogue_line: You can buy something that everyone at the party will like.

title: Going to a Party
dialogue_line: It's not everyone's party, it's Wanda's party.

title: Going to a Party
dialogue_line: I mean you can bring a fruit salad or some wine.

title: Going to a Party
dialogue_line: Not everyone drinks wine though.

title: Going to a Party
dialogue_line: I'm just giving you suggestions.

title: Going to a Party
dialogue_line: I guess I'd better go back to the mall.

title: Inviting a Friend to a Birthday Party
dialogue_line: You know my birthday is coming up in three weeks.

title: Inviting a Friend to a Birthday Party
dialogue_line: So you are getting older.

title: Inviting a Friend to a Birthday Party
dialogue_line: Indeed I am, and that's why I'm celebrating with a party.

title: Inviting a Friend to a Birthday Party
dialogue_line: I love parties! When is it going to be?

title: Inviting a Friend to a Birthday Party
dialogue_line: The party is going to be the Saturday before my birthday.

title: Inviting a Friend to a Birthday Party
dialogue_line: Where is the party going to be held?

title: Inviting a Friend to a Birthday Party
dialogue_line: It's going to be at the arcade on Main Street. Will you come?

title: Inviting a Friend to a Birthday Party
dialogue_line: Of course I will be there.

title: Inviting a Friend to a Birthday Party
dialogue_line: Here's an invitation with all of the details.

title: Inviting a Friend to a Birthday Party
dialogue_line: What time does the party start?

title: Inviting a Friend to a Birthday Party
dialogue_line: It starts at 1 p.m.

title: Inviting a Friend to a Birthday Party
dialogue_line: I will be there!

title: Inviting Your Boss to a Dinner Party
dialogue_line: I really want to thank you again for approving that raise.

title: Inviting Your Boss to a Dinner Party
dialogue_line: No problem, Val. You deserve it because of all your hard work.

title: Inviting Your Boss to a Dinner Party
dialogue_line: Regardless, I would like to show my appreciation by inviting you to dinner.

title: Inviting Your Boss to a Dinner Party
dialogue_line: How thoughtful of you, Val.

title: Inviting Your Boss to a Dinner Party
dialogue_line: My husband and I would like to throw a dinner party in your honor.

title: Inviting Your Boss to a Dinner Party
dialogue_line: That would be lovely.

title: Inviting Your Boss to a Dinner Party
dialogue_line: Can you join us this Thursday evening?

title: Inviting Your Boss to a Dinner Party
dialogue_line: Thursday evening works for me.

title: Inviting Your Boss to a Dinner Party
dialogue_line: Please bring your wife.

title: Inviting Your Boss to a Dinner Party
dialogue_line: She'll have to check her schedule, but it should work out.

title: Inviting Your Boss to a Dinner Party
dialogue_line: I'm also inviting the head of the finance department and his wife.

title: Inviting Your Boss to a Dinner Party
dialogue_line: They are a lovely couple.

title: Accepting an Invitation to a Party
dialogue_line: I'm calling because I got the invitation to your party in the mail.

title: Accepting an Invitation to a Party
dialogue_line: I was worried that maybe it got lost.

title: Accepting an Invitation to a Party
dialogue_line: No, it came in the mail yesterday.

title: Accepting an Invitation to a Party
dialogue_line: So, will you be coming to the party?

title: Accepting an Invitation to a Party
dialogue_line: You bet I'll be there.

title: Accepting an Invitation to a Party
dialogue_line: Great! please feel free to bring your family.

title: Accepting an Invitation to a Party
dialogue_line: I was actually looking forward to some time away from them.

title: Accepting an Invitation to a Party
dialogue_line: Regardless if you come with them or solo, please don't bring any gifts.

title: Accepting an Invitation to a Party
dialogue_line: Why is that?

title: Accepting an Invitation to a Party
dialogue_line: My husband is having the whole thing catered.

title: Accepting an Invitation to a Party
dialogue_line: I can at least bring a bottle of wine.

title: Accepting an Invitation to a Party
dialogue_line: That would be nice.

title: Decline an Invitation to a Party
dialogue_line: Did you get the invitation to my party?

title: Decline an Invitation to a Party
dialogue_line: The invitation came in the mail yesterday.

title: Decline an Invitation to a Party
dialogue_line: I was worried it got lost in the mail.

title: Decline an Invitation to a Party
dialogue_line: Unfortunately, I can't go to your party. I wish I could.

title: Decline an Invitation to a Party
dialogue_line: I'm sorry to hear that.

title: Decline an Invitation to a Party
dialogue_line: My mother-in-law is visiting that day.

title: Decline an Invitation to a Party
dialogue_line: I'm really sorry that you can't come.

title: Decline an Invitation to a Party
dialogue_line: If I could sneak out of the house, I would, but my wife would kill me.

title: Decline an Invitation to a Party
dialogue_line: I wouldn't want that on my hands.

title: Decline an Invitation to a Party
dialogue_line: The next party you have, I promise I will be there.

title: Decline an Invitation to a Party
dialogue_line:
What if your mother-in-law visits again?
B; Thankfully, she only comes once a year.

title: Buying Flowers
dialogue_line: I'd like to buy some flowers for my best friend's birthday.

title: Buying Flowers
dialogue_line: What is your friend's favorite color?

title: Buying Flowers
dialogue_line: She loves the color pink.

title: Buying Flowers
dialogue_line: I can make her a bouquet with pink roses.

title: Buying Flowers
dialogue_line: I don't want roses because that seems romantic, not to mention expensive.

title: Buying Flowers
dialogue_line: I can make the bouquet with carnations, lilies, and daisies instead.

title: Buying Flowers
dialogue_line: That sounds friendlier and cheaper.

title: Buying Flowers
dialogue_line: Would you like these to be delivered to your friend?

title: Buying Flowers
dialogue_line: That would be a great surprise.

title: Buying Flowers
dialogue_line: Just fill out this card and include the delivery address.

title: Buying Flowers
dialogue_line: Can you deliver these today?

title: Buying Flowers
dialogue_line: I can have them to your friend before 5 p.m.

title: Choosing a Gift
dialogue_line: I'm so bad at picking out gifts for my husband.

title: Choosing a Gift
dialogue_line: The eternal question of what to get for the man who has everything.

title: Choosing a Gift
dialogue_line: What do you suggest?

title: Choosing a Gift
dialogue_line: Well, is your husband into sports?

title: Choosing a Gift
dialogue_line: He is a huge fan of both soccer and American football.

title: Choosing a Gift
dialogue_line: Well, the football season is about to start. How about a jersey from his favorite team?

title: Choosing a Gift
dialogue_line: That's actually a great idea.

title: Choosing a Gift
dialogue_line: Just tell me what size he is.

title: Choosing a Gift
dialogue_line: He's really tall but slim.

title: Choosing a Gift
dialogue_line: How about a large then?

title: Choosing a Gift
dialogue_line: If it doesn't fit, can I return it?

title: Choosing a Gift
dialogue_line: I'll include a gift receipt so he can return it, too.

title: Greeting a Visitor
dialogue_line: Thank you for coming to my party this evening.

title: Greeting a Visitor
dialogue_line: No, thank you for letting me come as my cousin's guest.

title: Greeting a Visitor
dialogue_line: Any relative of Tina is welcome in my home. Have a seat.

title: Greeting a Visitor
dialogue_line: Thank you. You two know each other for a long time?

title: Greeting a Visitor
dialogue_line: We have. Can I get you something to drink?

title: Greeting a Visitor
dialogue_line: A glass of water will be fine.

title: Greeting a Visitor
dialogue_line: Would you like that with or without ice?

title: Greeting a Visitor
dialogue_line: Without ice is fine.

title: Greeting a Visitor
dialogue_line: We also have a buffet out back.

title: Greeting a Visitor
dialogue_line: Could you show me the way?

title: Greeting a Visitor
dialogue_line: Sure just follow me. I think your cousin is out back.

title: Greeting a Visitor
dialogue_line: You really have a lovely home.

title: Greeting an Old Friend
dialogue_line: It's been so long since I've seen you!

title: Greeting an Old Friend
dialogue_line: I know. You haven't changed a bit.

title: Greeting an Old Friend
dialogue_line: Oh, stop lying. I've gained a little weight.

title: Greeting an Old Friend
dialogue_line: We all have gained some weight.

title: Greeting an Old Friend
dialogue_line: Tell me how the kids are doing.

title: Greeting an Old Friend
dialogue_line: They are doing well, and yours?

title: Greeting an Old Friend
dialogue_line: They are doing so well, growing up so fast.

title: Greeting an Old Friend
dialogue_line: Are you at the same job or are you doing something else?

title: Greeting an Old Friend
dialogue_line: No. I left that place three years ago to start my own business.

title: Greeting an Old Friend
dialogue_line: Congratulations! You always had an independent spirit.

title: Greeting an Old Friend
dialogue_line: Thanks. It's going really well so far.

title: Greeting an Old Friend
dialogue_line: I'd love to hear more about it over a cup of coffee.

title: Accepting Food or Drinks
dialogue_line: Can I get you something to drink?

title: Accepting Food or Drinks
dialogue_line: I would love something to drink.

title: Accepting Food or Drinks
dialogue_line: I have water, juice, ice tea or did you want something stronger?

title: Accepting Food or Drinks
dialogue_line: Something stronger would be great. Do you have wine?

title: Accepting Food or Drinks
dialogue_line: I do. Would you prefer red wine or white wine?

title: Accepting Food or Drinks
dialogue_line: I'd love white, but it depends what kind you have.

title: Accepting Food or Drinks
dialogue_line: I have Chardonnay.

title: Accepting Food or Drinks
dialogue_line: That would be great. I'll take a glass.

title: Accepting Food or Drinks
dialogue_line: Excellent! Should I also bring out some cheese and crackers.

title: Accepting Food or Drinks
dialogue_line: That would go so well with the wine.

title: Accepting Food or Drinks
dialogue_line: Great! Just give me a moment to get that from the kitchen.

title: Accepting Food or Drinks
dialogue_line: You are such a wonderful host.

title: Declining Food or Drinks
dialogue_line: Can I get you something to drink?

title: Declining Food or Drinks
dialogue_line: No, thanks. I just finished a whole bottle of water.

title: Declining Food or Drinks
dialogue_line: You won't mind if I have something then?

title: Declining Food or Drinks
dialogue_line: Of course not.

title: Declining Food or Drinks
dialogue_line: Can I offer you some fruit or cheese?

title: Declining Food or Drinks
dialogue_line: I just had lunch before I came here.

title: Declining Food or Drinks
dialogue_line: I really hope you don't mind if I eat because I haven't had lunch.

title: Declining Food or Drinks
dialogue_line: Go right ahead and do what you normally do.

title: Declining Food or Drinks
dialogue_line: I didn't eat because I assumed you would be joining me.

title: Declining Food or Drinks
dialogue_line: I hope you're not offended.

title: Declining Food or Drinks
dialogue_line: No, I'm not offended at all.

title: Declining Food or Drinks
dialogue_line: Oh, good. I ate before because I didn't want to impose.

title: Gossiping
dialogue_line: Did you hear what happened to Marie?

title: Gossiping
dialogue_line: I have no idea what happened. Is she okay?

title: Gossiping
dialogue_line: She's devastated. Marie and her fiancÃ© called the wedding off.

title: Gossiping
dialogue_line: She was so excited about the wedding. How did you find out?

title: Gossiping
dialogue_line: I saw Marie posting on Facebook; she was sad about losing her love.

title: Gossiping
dialogue_line: What do you think happen?

title: Gossiping
dialogue_line: I think Marie's fiancÃ© is still in love with his ex.

title: Gossiping
dialogue_line: What makes you say that?

title: Gossiping
dialogue_line: Have you seen his Facebook page?

title: Gossiping
dialogue_line: No. What does it say?

title: Gossiping
dialogue_line: He has pictures of him and his so-called ex.

title: Gossiping
dialogue_line: Wow, I feel so bad for Marie.

title: Wedding Discussion
dialogue_line: I always get so emotional at weddings.

title: Wedding Discussion
dialogue_line: Me too, especially when I see the bride and groom kiss.

title: Wedding Discussion
dialogue_line: The bride looked so beautiful.

title: Wedding Discussion
dialogue_line: She did, and the groom looked so dapper in his tux.

title: Wedding Discussion
dialogue_line: I'll see you at the reception in a little bit.

title: Wedding Discussion
dialogue_line: No, you won't, because I wasn't invited.

title: Wedding Discussion
dialogue_line: Oh, I'm so sorry. Maybe your invite was lost in the mail.

title: Wedding Discussion
dialogue_line: It's okay. Why don't you bring me as your plus one?

title: Wedding Discussion
dialogue_line: Actually no, because I'm going with my husband.

title: Wedding Discussion
dialogue_line: Please take pictures so I can see how nice everyone looked.

title: Wedding Discussion
dialogue_line: I'm sure there will be pictures online afterwards.

title: Wedding Discussion
dialogue_line: It's not the same as being there.

title: At Beach
dialogue_line: What a great day to be at the beach.

title: At Beach
dialogue_line: I love the smell of the salt-water air.

title: At Beach
dialogue_line: Are you going to go swimming in that water?

title: At Beach
dialogue_line: You bet. I'm going into the ocean.

title: At Beach
dialogue_line: I actually hate swimming in the ocean.

title: At Beach
dialogue_line: Why do you like the beach then?

title: At Beach
dialogue_line: I like people watching.

title: At Beach
dialogue_line: Do you like doing that at the pool?

title: At Beach
dialogue_line: Yes, but when I go to the pool, I actually swim.

title: At Beach
dialogue_line: So I guess you won't go surfing with me.

title: At Beach
dialogue_line: Nope, but I'll cheer for you from my beach towel.

title: At Beach
dialogue_line: I'd rather do something together like making a sand castle.

title: Visiting a Travel Agent
dialogue_line: Thank you for coming to our travel agency. How can I help you?

title: Visiting a Travel Agent
dialogue_line: I would like to book a trip to Disney World for my family.

title: Visiting a Travel Agent
dialogue_line: Your family will have much fun. When do you want to go?

title: Visiting a Travel Agent
dialogue_line: We want to go during the summer when the kids have off from school.

title: Visiting a Travel Agent
dialogue_line: I suggest early June because it won't rain too much and the park isn't as crowded as later in the season.

title: Visiting a Travel Agent
dialogue_line: Great! let's do the second week in June.

title: Visiting a Travel Agent
dialogue_line: How many adults and how many children will be travelling?

title: Visiting a Travel Agent
dialogue_line: There are two adults and two children.

title: Visiting a Travel Agent
dialogue_line: Do you have an airline preference?

title: Visiting a Travel Agent
dialogue_line: No. I have no preference as long as the flight is non-stop.

title: Visiting a Travel Agent
dialogue_line: Do you want a budget hotel or a luxury hotel?

title: Visiting a Travel Agent
dialogue_line: Can you book something in between?

title: Making a Plane Reservation
dialogue_line: Thank you for calling Eagle Airline.

title: Making a Plane Reservation
dialogue_line: I would like to book a round trip flight from Los Angeles to New York City

title: Making a Plane Reservation
dialogue_line: What date do you want to leave Los Angeles?

title: Making a Plane Reservation
dialogue_line: I want to leave on September 1st.

title: Making a Plane Reservation
dialogue_line: Do you prefer a morning flight?

title: Making a Plane Reservation
dialogue_line: Can you get me on a red-eye out of LAX?

title: Making a Plane Reservation
dialogue_line: I can book you on an overnight flight that will get you into New York City at 6 a.m.

title: Making a Plane Reservation
dialogue_line: Make sure I land in JFK not LaGuardia airport

title: Making a Plane Reservation
dialogue_line: Okay, so I have you on an overnight flight from Los Angeles International Airport leaving at 10 p.m. to JFK.

title: Making a Plane Reservation
dialogue_line: I don't want to have anyone climbing over me to use the bathroom while I sleep, so I want a window seat.

title: Making a Plane Reservation
dialogue_line: I will put you in window seat 13A.

title: Making a Plane Reservation
dialogue_line: Make sure that isn't an exit row because I don't want to have to help in an emergency.

title: Booking a Flight Online
dialogue_line: Let's book a trip to Puerto Rico.

title: Booking a Flight Online
dialogue_line: There are so many online services that let us book from our computer right here at home.

title: Booking a Flight Online
dialogue_line: How will we know we're getting a good deal though?

title: Booking a Flight Online
dialogue_line: If we use a site like Expedia or Priceline, we can find something within our budget.

title: Booking a Flight Online
dialogue_line: Can we book both flights and hotels online?

title: Booking a Flight Online
dialogue_line: Yes, and we can even rent a car as part of our package.

title: Booking a Flight Online
dialogue_line: I just logged onto those websites, so now what?

title: Booking a Flight Online
dialogue_line: Just put the dates you want to travel, where you're traveling from, and where you want to go.

title: Booking a Flight Online
dialogue_line: Wow, there are even reviews from people who stayed at the hotels.

title: Booking a Flight Online
dialogue_line: Yes. You can even see pictures of what the hotel rooms look like.

title: Booking a Flight Online
dialogue_line: We don't get paper tickets though.

title: Booking a Flight Online
dialogue_line: We can print out all the information after we book it online if you want.

title: Buying a Plane Ticket
dialogue_line: I would like to buy a plane ticket to Boston, Massachusetts.

title: Buying a Plane Ticket
dialogue_line: What date would you like to leave and where are you leaving from?

title: Buying a Plane Ticket
dialogue_line: I would like to travel for the Labor Day holiday and I'm leaving from Burbank airport.

title: Buying a Plane Ticket
dialogue_line: We don't have any direct flights from Burbank to Boston's Logan airport.

title: Buying a Plane Ticket
dialogue_line: I don't want to have a long layover.

title: Buying a Plane Ticket
dialogue_line: I can make a reservation for you for a flight that changes planes in Denver.

title: Buying a Plane Ticket
dialogue_line: How long is the layover?

title: Buying a Plane Ticket
dialogue_line: The layover is two hours.

title: Buying a Plane Ticket
dialogue_line: That will give me enough time to grab a bite. Book it.

title: Buying a Plane Ticket
dialogue_line: Do you have a frequent flyer number?

title: Buying a Plane Ticket
dialogue_line: What is that?

title: Buying a Plane Ticket
dialogue_line: If you fly with us enough, you get points to earn towards a free flight.

title: Making a Hotel Reservation
dialogue_line: Good afternoon! This is the Beach Palace Hotel. How can I help you?

title: Making a Hotel Reservation
dialogue_line: Do you have any rooms available for this weekend?

title: Making a Hotel Reservation
dialogue_line: Yes. How many nights will you be staying?

title: Making a Hotel Reservation
dialogue_line: My wife and I would like to stay for two nights.

title: Making a Hotel Reservation
dialogue_line: Do you want a room with a view of the beach?

title: Making a Hotel Reservation
dialogue_line: Is that more expensive?

title: Making a Hotel Reservation
dialogue_line: The room without a view is 200 dollars a night.

title: Making a Hotel Reservation
dialogue_line: How much is a room with a view?

title: Making a Hotel Reservation
dialogue_line: A room with a view is $300 a night.

title: Making a Hotel Reservation
dialogue_line: Is there a room with a partial view?

title: Making a Hotel Reservation
dialogue_line: There is a room with an obstructed view.

title: Making a Hotel Reservation
dialogue_line: I'll take it, but only if it's less than $300.

title: Getting a Passport
dialogue_line: Good afternoon. I want to get a U.S. Passport.

title: Getting a Passport
dialogue_line: Is this your first passport?

title: Getting a Passport
dialogue_line: It is my first U.S. Passport.

title: Getting a Passport
dialogue_line: Did you fill out the application form?

title: Getting a Passport
dialogue_line: I downloaded the form at home and have it here.

title: Getting a Passport
dialogue_line: Did you bring proof of U.S. citizenship?

title: Getting a Passport
dialogue_line: What kind of proof do I need?

title: Getting a Passport
dialogue_line: A birth certificate if you were born in the U.S. or naturalization papers.

title: Getting a Passport
dialogue_line: I'm a new citizen so I have naturalization papers.

title: Getting a Passport
dialogue_line: This is good because it also serves as your identification.

title: Getting a Passport
dialogue_line: What else do I need to provide?

title: Getting a Passport
dialogue_line: I just need $165 and two photographs.

title: Luggage Limits
dialogue_line: Can you tell me what are the luggage limits for this domestic flight?

title: Luggage Limits
dialogue_line: You are allowed one carry-on luggage and one personal item.

title: Luggage Limits
dialogue_line: So I can bring this roll-away suitcase on the plane?

title: Luggage Limits
dialogue_line: Yes. That will fit in the overhead bin so it won't cost you.

title: Luggage Limits
dialogue_line: What is a personal item?

title: Luggage Limits
dialogue_line: Anything that will fit under the seat in front of you is a personal item.

title: Luggage Limits
dialogue_line: Can I bring my really big suitcase on the plane?

title: Luggage Limits
dialogue_line: No. We will have to check that in for $35.

title: Luggage Limits
dialogue_line: That's not included in the cost of the ticket?

title: Luggage Limits
dialogue_line: No. The first checked bag is $35 and another will be an additional $25.

title: Luggage Limits
dialogue_line: When I was younger, everything was included in the price of the ticket.

title: Luggage Limits
dialogue_line: Times have changed.

title: Carry-on Luggage
dialogue_line: You are allowed two carry-on items on this flight.

title: Carry-on Luggage
dialogue_line: Can I bring on this suitcase?

title: Carry-on Luggage
dialogue_line: It looks smaller than 45 inches, so it should fit in the overhead compartment.

title: Carry-on Luggage
dialogue_line: I don't want to put my computer bag in the overhead though.

title: Carry-on Luggage
dialogue_line: The laptop bag can go underneath the seat in front of you.

title: Carry-on Luggage
dialogue_line: It's cold in Buffalo, so can I bring my coat?

title: Carry-on Luggage
dialogue_line: Your coat doesn't count as a carry-on.

title: Carry-on Luggage
dialogue_line: I have a separate bag with a tuna sandwich I just bought.

title: Carry-on Luggage
dialogue_line: The bag of food doesn't count as a carry-on.

title: Carry-on Luggage
dialogue_line: This pillow doesn't fit in my bag either and I need it for the flight.

title: Carry-on Luggage
dialogue_line: You can bring a pillow or blanket, too.

title: Carry-on Luggage
dialogue_line: I forgot my blanket at home.

title: Dropping Off at the Airport
dialogue_line: Can you give me a ride to the airport tomorrow?

title: Dropping Off at the Airport
dialogue_line: Depends on what time you need to be at the airport.

title: Dropping Off at the Airport
dialogue_line: Well, my flight leaves at 10:30 in the morning.

title: Dropping Off at the Airport
dialogue_line: Did you check in online already?

title: Dropping Off at the Airport
dialogue_line: Yes, I checked in and I don't have any bags to check.

title: Dropping Off at the Airport
dialogue_line: So we should leave by 9:00, so you can be there by 9:30.

title: Dropping Off at the Airport
dialogue_line: It's an international flight.

title: Dropping Off at the Airport
dialogue_line: Oh, so you need to be there two hours before your flight.

title: Dropping Off at the Airport
dialogue_line: Can you get me to the airport by 8:30?

title: Dropping Off at the Airport
dialogue_line: That's when I take the kids to school, so no.

title: Dropping Off at the Airport
dialogue_line: So how am I going to get to the airport then?

title: Dropping Off at the Airport
dialogue_line: Guess you'll have to pay for a cab.

title: Picking Up at the Airport
dialogue_line: I'll pick you up at the airport when you come back from your business trip.

title: Picking Up at the Airport
dialogue_line: I'm taking the red-eye, so I land early in the morning.

title: Picking Up at the Airport
dialogue_line: Tell me the airline and terminal number so I know where to get you.

title: Picking Up at the Airport
dialogue_line: I'm taking Jet Air so that's terminal 4.

title: Picking Up at the Airport
dialogue_line: Call me when you land.

title: Picking Up at the Airport
dialogue_line: My flight comes in at 6 a.m., so just wait for me then.

title: Picking Up at the Airport
dialogue_line: Cars aren't allowed to wait outside the terminal for more than a few minutes.

title: Picking Up at the Airport
dialogue_line: I don't want to have to wait at the curb for too long.

title: Picking Up at the Airport
dialogue_line: Well, I don't want to get a ticket.

title: Picking Up at the Airport
dialogue_line: Fine, I'll call you when I'm at the baggage claim.

title: Picking Up at the Airport
dialogue_line: Call me after you get your bags from the baggage claim.

title: Picking Up at the Airport
dialogue_line: Fine, but don't make me wait too long for you.

title: Going through the Customs
dialogue_line: Do you have your customs form?

title: Going through the Customs
dialogue_line: Yes, I filled it out on the plane.

title: Going through the Customs
dialogue_line: I also need your passport.

title: Going through the Customs
dialogue_line: I'm a U.S. citizen.

title: Going through the Customs
dialogue_line: I still need to see your passport.

title: Going through the Customs
dialogue_line: What other documents do you need?

title: Going through the Customs
dialogue_line: Do you have anything to declare?

title: Going through the Customs
dialogue_line: I bought some leather wallets in Morocco.

title: Going through the Customs
dialogue_line: You're going to have to show them to me.

title: Going through the Customs
dialogue_line: Are you going to take then away from me?

title: Going through the Customs
dialogue_line: I'll only confiscate them if they are made of python skin.

title: Going through the Customs
dialogue_line: They are just leather wallets.

title: Talking to a Curbside Agent
dialogue_line: Can I check in here at the curb?

title: Talking to a Curbside Agent
dialogue_line: Sure! Do you have any bags you need to check in?

title: Talking to a Curbside Agent
dialogue_line: I have one suitcase.

title: Talking to a Curbside Agent
dialogue_line: That will be $35.

title: Talking to a Curbside Agent
dialogue_line: Oh, but I paid online already.

title: Talking to a Curbside Agent
dialogue_line: Can I see your ID and I'll check for you.

title: Talking to a Curbside Agent
dialogue_line: Here is my driver's license.

title: Talking to a Curbside Agent
dialogue_line: Sorry about that. You did pay already.

title: Talking to a Curbside Agent
dialogue_line: I told you so.

title: Talking to a Curbside Agent
dialogue_line: Looks like you're leaving out of gate 12A, but check the screens inside.

title: Talking to a Curbside Agent
dialogue_line: Can my mom come with me to the gate?

title: Talking to a Curbside Agent
dialogue_line: Not unless she is flying with you.

title: Talking to a Flight Attendant
dialogue_line: Can I please have a rum and coke?

title: Talking to a Flight Attendant
dialogue_line: You are going to have to wait until we take off and are at a cruising altitude.

title: Talking to a Flight Attendant
dialogue_line: I hate flying though, and I really need something to take the edge off.

title: Talking to a Flight Attendant
dialogue_line: I'm sorry we don't serve anything until after take-off.

title: Talking to a Flight Attendant
dialogue_line: I can pay you in cash.

title: Talking to a Flight Attendant
dialogue_line: We don't take cash on the plane anymore.

title: Talking to a Flight Attendant
dialogue_line: So how can I pay?

title: Talking to a Flight Attendant
dialogue_line: When I come around after we take off, you can pay with a debit or credit card.

title: Talking to a Flight Attendant
dialogue_line: I only have cash.

title: Talking to a Flight Attendant
dialogue_line: See if someone will buy you a drink then.

title: Talking to a Flight Attendant
dialogue_line: Can I smoke a cigarette to relax in the meantime?

title: Talking to a Flight Attendant
dialogue_line: Smoking isn't allowed on flights.

title: Talking to a Seatmate
dialogue_line: Do you hate flying as much as I do?

title: Talking to a Seatmate
dialogue_line: Only when I have chatty seatmates.

title: Talking to a Seatmate
dialogue_line: You look like a business traveler, am I right?

title: Talking to a Seatmate
dialogue_line: I'm in sales, but please excuse me. I have a lot of work to do.

title: Talking to a Seatmate
dialogue_line: Is that computer connected to the airplane wi-fi network?

title: Talking to a Seatmate
dialogue_line: It is, so I can send work to my office even when travelling.

title: Talking to a Seatmate
dialogue_line: I hope they pay you really well.

title: Talking to a Seatmate
dialogue_line: That's really none of your business.

title: Talking to a Seatmate
dialogue_line: Do you have a company credit card?

title: Talking to a Seatmate
dialogue_line: I do because I travel so much.

title: Talking to a Seatmate
dialogue_line: Maybe you can buy me a drink since all I have is cash.

title: Talking to a Seatmate
dialogue_line: I can only pay for business expenses, not alcohol.

title: Ordering Food and Drink
dialogue_line: Can I get you something to eat or drink?

title: Ordering Food and Drink
dialogue_line: I'd like a coffee and a breakfast sandwich.

title: Ordering Food and Drink
dialogue_line: The coffee is complimentary, but the sandwich costs five dollars.

title: Ordering Food and Drink
dialogue_line: So much for a measly sandwich?!

title: Ordering Food and Drink
dialogue_line: Will that be all for you?

title: Ordering Food and Drink
dialogue_line: For now, but if I'm hungry or thirsty later, can I have something else?

title: Ordering Food and Drink
dialogue_line: As long as it's before we land.

title: Ordering Food and Drink
dialogue_line: What else can I have to eat or drink?

title: Ordering Food and Drink
dialogue_line: There is a menu in your seatback pocket.

title: Ordering Food and Drink
dialogue_line: How do I get your attention when I'm ready to order something else?

title: Ordering Food and Drink
dialogue_line: Just press the button above your head with the image of a person.

title: Ordering Food and Drink
dialogue_line: Can I have a copy of my receipt?

title: Missing Connecting Flight
dialogue_line: I missed my connecting flight to Washington D.C.

title: Missing Connecting Flight
dialogue_line: How did you miss your flight?

title: Missing Connecting Flight
dialogue_line: I was sitting in the airport bar and I lost track of time.

title: Missing Connecting Flight
dialogue_line: Well, that's not really our fault.

title: Missing Connecting Flight
dialogue_line: Fine, but what can you do for me?

title: Missing Connecting Flight
dialogue_line: I can put you on the stand-by list.

title: Missing Connecting Flight
dialogue_line: What does that mean?

title: Missing Connecting Flight
dialogue_line: It means that if there are empty seats on the next flight out, you can get on.

title: Missing Connecting Flight
dialogue_line: What if there are no seats?

title: Missing Connecting Flight
dialogue_line: You can buy another ticket.

title: Missing Connecting Flight
dialogue_line: I didn't even buy the first ticket.

title: Missing Connecting Flight
dialogue_line: I guess you have to buy a ticket.

title: Ground Transportation
dialogue_line: I need to get into downtown as quickly as possible.

title: Ground Transportation
dialogue_line: We have many ground transportation options.

title: Ground Transportation
dialogue_line: I don't want to have to share a car with anyone.

title: Ground Transportation
dialogue_line: Then a taxi would probably be the best option.

title: Ground Transportation
dialogue_line: Where can I get a taxi?

title: Ground Transportation
dialogue_line: There is a special taxi line right outside the revolving doors.

title: Ground Transportation
dialogue_line: How much is that going to cost me?

title: Ground Transportation
dialogue_line: The city taxis have a meter so you pay by the mile.

title: Ground Transportation
dialogue_line: Does the fare include the tip?

title: Ground Transportation
dialogue_line: No, How much you tip is up to you.

title: Ground Transportation
dialogue_line: Does the taxi take credit cards?

title: Ground Transportation
dialogue_line: No. Taxis here are cash only.

title: Arranging a Tour of the City
dialogue_line: Where can I get a tour of the city?

title: Arranging a Tour of the City
dialogue_line: We can arrange a tour for you right here at our concierge desk.

title: Arranging a Tour of the City
dialogue_line: How much is the tour?

title: Arranging a Tour of the City
dialogue_line: It depends on what kind of tour you want.

title: Arranging a Tour of the City
dialogue_line: I hear you have a half-day bus tour.

title: Arranging a Tour of the City
dialogue_line: We do, and it is $25 per person.

title: Arranging a Tour of the City
dialogue_line: Can I get off the bus and explore on my own?

title: Arranging a Tour of the City
dialogue_line: You can only do that if you take the all-day bus tour.

title: Arranging a Tour of the City
dialogue_line: Is that more money?

title: Arranging a Tour of the City
dialogue_line: It doubles the price.

title: Arranging a Tour of the City
dialogue_line: That's highway robbery, but book me anyway.

title: Arranging a Tour of the City
dialogue_line: That will be $50 then.

title: Complaining about a Tour
dialogue_line: I want to make a complaint about the all-day bus tour I took yesterday.

title: Complaining about a Tour
dialogue_line: I'm sorry you have a complaint.

title: Complaining about a Tour
dialogue_line: I actually have a few complaints.

title: Complaining about a Tour
dialogue_line: Please tell me what went wrong.

title: Complaining about a Tour
dialogue_line: We were stuck in traffic for an hour.

title: Complaining about a Tour
dialogue_line: Well, that's out of our control.

title: Complaining about a Tour
dialogue_line: The bus had no air conditioning.

title: Complaining about a Tour
dialogue_line: It was 60 degrees out yesterday though.

title: Complaining about a Tour
dialogue_line: I want a full refund.

title: Complaining about a Tour
dialogue_line: I can't give you a full refund since you enjoyed part of the tour.

title: Complaining about a Tour
dialogue_line: How about a partial refund then?

title: Complaining about a Tour
dialogue_line: I will give you a partial refund for the unsatisfactory tour.

title: Sightseeing
dialogue_line: What are some of the best things to see in this city?

title: Sightseeing
dialogue_line: If you want to go sightseeing, we have a tour that leaves from the hotel.

title: Sightseeing
dialogue_line: I'd rather explore the city on my own.

title: Sightseeing
dialogue_line: In that case I can give you a map that highlights some of the best things to see.

title: Sightseeing
dialogue_line: That sounds perfect.

title: Sightseeing
dialogue_line: The map also has coupons attached for some restaurants and shops near the landmarks.

title: Sightseeing
dialogue_line: I love a bargain.

title: Sightseeing
dialogue_line: You can walk around the city, but I'll also give you a subway map in case you want to take the train.

title: Sightseeing
dialogue_line: The subway looks scary in the movies and on TV.

title: Sightseeing
dialogue_line: It isn't scary at all.

title: Sightseeing
dialogue_line: Can I get a subway pass from you?

title: Sightseeing
dialogue_line: No, you'll have to buy that at the train station.

title: Making Alternate Plans
dialogue_line: I'm sorry, but today's bus tour has been canceled because of the weather.

title: Making Alternate Plans
dialogue_line: Now what am I supposed to do?

title: Making Alternate Plans
dialogue_line: The hotel's concierge will be happy to find you tickets to a local theater production.

title: Making Alternate Plans
dialogue_line: I'm not really a theater person.

title: Making Alternate Plans
dialogue_line: How about we get you reservations to one of the city's finest restaurants?

title: Making Alternate Plans
dialogue_line: That sounds good.

title: Making Alternate Plans
dialogue_line: What kind of food do you like?

title: Making Alternate Plans
dialogue_line: I love seafood, especially lobster.

title: Making Alternate Plans
dialogue_line: I'll book you a table at the Lobster Shack restaurant then.

title: Making Alternate Plans
dialogue_line: Will the hotel provide transportation?

title: Making Alternate Plans
dialogue_line: We can get you a cab.

title: Making Alternate Plans
dialogue_line: I'd prefer a limo.

title: Shopping for Souvenirs
dialogue_line: I can't believe today is the last day of our vacation.

title: Shopping for Souvenirs
dialogue_line: We should shop for some souvenirs to bring back home to our friends.

title: Shopping for Souvenirs
dialogue_line: I'd much rather we spend another day seeing the sights.

title: Shopping for Souvenirs
dialogue_line: We can sightsee and buy souvenirs along the way.

title: Shopping for Souvenirs
dialogue_line: Why don't we just buy souvenirs at the airport?

title: Shopping for Souvenirs
dialogue_line: The airport charges way too much for souvenirs.

title: Shopping for Souvenirs
dialogue_line: Our friends won't know the difference.

title: Shopping for Souvenirs
dialogue_line: We will know!

title: Shopping for Souvenirs
dialogue_line: The hotel has postcards in the lobby, I think.

title: Shopping for Souvenirs
dialogue_line: Postcards are to be mailed not given as souvenirs.

title: Shopping for Souvenirs
dialogue_line: Fine! Let's go to the museum gift shop.

title: Shopping for Souvenirs
dialogue_line: That's a great idea.

title: Losing the Wallet and Passport
dialogue_line: Officer, my wallet and passport are gone.

title: Losing the Wallet and Passport
dialogue_line: We'll file a report so that no one else tries to use your passport.

title: Losing the Wallet and Passport
dialogue_line: What about my credit cards?

title: Losing the Wallet and Passport
dialogue_line: You'll have to call the credit card companies and have them cancel the cards.

title: Losing the Wallet and Passport
dialogue_line: How will I get home without a passport?

title: Losing the Wallet and Passport
dialogue_line: You can't get home without a passport.

title: Losing the Wallet and Passport
dialogue_line: So what should I do?

title: Losing the Wallet and Passport
dialogue_line: Call the nearest U.S. Embassy and tell them what happened.

title: Losing the Wallet and Passport
dialogue_line: Will I need to apply for a new passport?

title: Losing the Wallet and Passport
dialogue_line: Most likely you will.

title: Losing the Wallet and Passport
dialogue_line: Is that going to take a long time?

title: Losing the Wallet and Passport
dialogue_line: Just take a copy of this police report and see if that will make the process faster.

title: Being Cautious in a Big City
dialogue_line: You really shouldn't wear all that bling when we go sightseeing today.

title: Being Cautious in a Big City
dialogue_line: Why are you such a scared cat?

title: Being Cautious in a Big City
dialogue_line: You look like you want to be mugged.

title: Being Cautious in a Big City
dialogue_line: Stop nagging me and walk with me to the ATM so I can get a lot of cash out.

title: Being Cautious in a Big City
dialogue_line: You should only carry what you need for the day.

title: Being Cautious in a Big City
dialogue_line: I don't want to have to make multiple trips to the ATM.

title: Being Cautious in a Big City
dialogue_line: If you are robbed, they will take everything though.

title: Being Cautious in a Big City
dialogue_line: Why are you so obsessed with crime?

title: Being Cautious in a Big City
dialogue_line: It's just that criminals look for careless tourists.

title: Being Cautious in a Big City
dialogue_line: You make it sound like every city is dangerous.

title: Being Cautious in a Big City
dialogue_line: Cities have good and bad things.

title: Being Cautious in a Big City
dialogue_line: Well, let's enjoy the good things and not expect the worse.

title: Local Customs
dialogue_line: Come inside and meet my family.

title: Local Customs
dialogue_line: How should I greet them?

title: Local Customs
dialogue_line: They will probably want to hug you.

title: Local Customs
dialogue_line: That's a little awkward.

title: Local Customs
dialogue_line: It's just part of their culture.

title: Local Customs
dialogue_line: Anything else I should prepare myself for before going in?

title: Local Customs
dialogue_line: You should accept something to eat or drink even if you are not hungry or thirsty.

title: Local Customs
dialogue_line: Is that part of the custom?

title: Local Customs
dialogue_line: Yes. If you refuse, it is considered very rude.

title: Local Customs
dialogue_line: I don't want to disrespect your family.

title: Local Customs
dialogue_line: You'd better not disrespect them.

title: Local Customs
dialogue_line: Don't worry, I'll do you a solid.

title: Shuttle Bus at the Airport
dialogue_line: Where can I find the shuttle bus?

title: Shuttle Bus at the Airport
dialogue_line: There're a number of shuttle buses you can take here at the airport.

title: Shuttle Bus at the Airport
dialogue_line: I am looking for the shuttle bus that will take me to the rental car location.

title: Shuttle Bus at the Airport
dialogue_line: Those are out the doors and to the left.

title: Shuttle Bus at the Airport
dialogue_line: Are those shuttle buses free?

title: Shuttle Bus at the Airport
dialogue_line: If you have a reservation with the car rental company, they are.

title: Shuttle Bus at the Airport
dialogue_line: I forgot to make a reservation.

title: Shuttle Bus at the Airport
dialogue_line: The rental car companies have kiosks at the other end of the airport.

title: Shuttle Bus at the Airport
dialogue_line: Maybe I'll just take the shuttle bus to the subway.

title: Shuttle Bus at the Airport
dialogue_line: That shuttle bus is free and is to the right when you exit.

title: Shuttle Bus at the Airport
dialogue_line: Is there a shuttle bus to take me all the way home?

title: Shuttle Bus at the Airport
dialogue_line: There is a company that offers that for a fee.

title: Arriving Home
dialogue_line: There really is no place like home even after a vacation.

title: Arriving Home
dialogue_line: Um honey, did you tell the neighbor to water the plants?

title: Arriving Home
dialogue_line: I thought you did.

title: Arriving Home
dialogue_line: What about the mail, did you tell the neighbor to pick that up?

title: Arriving Home
dialogue_line: So I have to do everything around here?

title: Arriving Home
dialogue_line: What about the cat?

title: Arriving Home
dialogue_line: What about the cat?

title: Arriving Home
dialogue_line: Did you get the neighbor to feed the cat while we were gone?

title: Arriving Home
dialogue_line: Cats are pretty good at taking care of themselves.

title: Arriving Home
dialogue_line: I can't believe you!

title: Arriving Home
dialogue_line: At least no one broke into the house while we were gone.

title: Arriving Home
dialogue_line: Thank goodness for the small miracle.

title: Election Day
dialogue_line: Are you voting?

title: Election Day
dialogue_line: Is Election Day coming up?

title: Election Day
dialogue_line: It is. Election day is the first Tuesday in November.

title: Election Day
dialogue_line: I'm not sure if I'm even registered.

title: Election Day
dialogue_line: Did you fill out a registration form?

title: Election Day
dialogue_line: I did, and I think I got a card in the mail.

title: Election Day
dialogue_line: That's your voter card. So you are all set.

title: Election Day
dialogue_line: Are you going to vote?

title: Election Day
dialogue_line: I am going to vote. Why don't we go together?

title: Election Day
dialogue_line: That's a great idea. I still need to decide who I'm voting for.

title: Election Day
dialogue_line: I received so many mailings from all the candidates.

title: Election Day
dialogue_line: I'm going to go to your house and read them to help me decide.

title: Election System
dialogue_line: Election Day is next Tuesday.

title: Election System
dialogue_line: Did you register to vote?

title: Election System
dialogue_line: How do you register?

title: Election System
dialogue_line: If you are a U.S. citizen, 18 years or older, you can fill out a form.

title: Election System
dialogue_line: What does the form ask you?

title: Election System
dialogue_line: It asks for basic details like your name, address, age, and what political party you want to join.

title: Election System
dialogue_line: Do I have to choose a political party?

title: Election System
dialogue_line: No, that's optional, but if you choose a party, you can vote in certain primaries.

title: Election System
dialogue_line: What happens once I register?

title: Election System
dialogue_line: You'll get a voter card in the mail.

title: Election System
dialogue_line: What good is that?

title: Election System
dialogue_line: It will tell you where your polling place is.

title: Polling Place
dialogue_line: Tomorrow's Election Day, but I don't know where I'm supposed to go vote.

title: Polling Place
dialogue_line: You didn't get a card in the mail telling you where you polling place is?

title: Polling Place
dialogue_line: I think I threw it away. Can't I just go with you?

title: Polling Place
dialogue_line: No. Everyone's polling place is different based on your address.

title: Polling Place
dialogue_line: So how do I know where to go now?

title: Polling Place
dialogue_line: You can check the Board of Elections website.

title: Polling Place
dialogue_line: What if I don't have Internet access?

title: Polling Place
dialogue_line: There's also a phone number you can call.

title: Polling Place
dialogue_line: Where is your polling place?

title: Polling Place
dialogue_line: My polling place is at the recreation center a block away from my house.

title: Polling Place
dialogue_line: Will my polling place be close to where I live?

title: Polling Place
dialogue_line: It should be within walking distance.

title: Absentee Ballot
dialogue_line: I don't think I'll be in town on Election Day.

title: Absentee Ballot
dialogue_line: You can still vote though.

title: Absentee Ballot
dialogue_line: How can I vote if I won't be here?

title: Absentee Ballot
dialogue_line: You can file an absentee ballot.

title: Absentee Ballot
dialogue_line: How do I do that?

title: Absentee Ballot
dialogue_line: You can ask for a mail-in ballot.

title: Absentee Ballot
dialogue_line: What is that?

title: Absentee Ballot
dialogue_line: It's a form you mail in saying who you want to vote for.

title: Absentee Ballot
dialogue_line: Does it count like a regular ballot?

title: Absentee Ballot
dialogue_line: It's just as if you were voting in person.

title: Absentee Ballot
dialogue_line: I'd better ask for one then.

title: Absentee Ballot
dialogue_line: You should do it quickly since it has to be in a week before Election Day.

title: Speaking Negatively about the Candidate
dialogue_line: Are you voting for the same mayoral candidate I am voting for?

title: Speaking Negatively about the Candidate
dialogue_line: There is no way I'm voting for your guy.

title: Speaking Negatively about the Candidate
dialogue_line: Why are you saying that?

title: Speaking Negatively about the Candidate
dialogue_line: Are you kidding? Have you heard him speak?

title: Speaking Negatively about the Candidate
dialogue_line: What do you mean?

title: Speaking Negatively about the Candidate
dialogue_line: I don't agree with his positions.

title: Speaking Negatively about the Candidate
dialogue_line: I think he has a great education plan.

title: Speaking Negatively about the Candidate
dialogue_line: He's going to ruin our schools with his plan.

title: Speaking Negatively about the Candidate
dialogue_line: Come on! How about his jobs plan?

title: Speaking Negatively about the Candidate
dialogue_line: That's even worse than his education plan.

title: Speaking Negatively about the Candidate
dialogue_line: I think you need to give the guy a chance.

title: Speaking Negatively about the Candidate
dialogue_line: The candidate I'm choosing is way better than your guy.

title: Speaking Positively about the Candidate
dialogue_line: I'm really looking forward to casting my vote today.

title: Speaking Positively about the Candidate
dialogue_line: Oh really? Why?

title: Speaking Positively about the Candidate
dialogue_line: I think my candidate will really change the way things are done in our city.

title: Speaking Positively about the Candidate
dialogue_line: How is that?

title: Speaking Positively about the Candidate
dialogue_line: Her education policy will help all students.

title: Speaking Positively about the Candidate
dialogue_line: I'll have to review her policy plan before I vote.

title: Speaking Positively about the Candidate
dialogue_line: You really should. You're a parent.

title: Speaking Positively about the Candidate
dialogue_line: What else do you like about the candidate?

title: Speaking Positively about the Candidate
dialogue_line: Her economic policy will lower the unemployment rate in the city.

title: Speaking Positively about the Candidate
dialogue_line: I've been unemployed for a while.

title: Speaking Positively about the Candidate
dialogue_line: Then you should vote for her.

title: Speaking Positively about the Candidate
dialogue_line: I'll read up on her positions.

title: Fundraising for Campaigns
dialogue_line: Would you be interested in donating to our candidate's campaign today?

title: Fundraising for Campaigns
dialogue_line: Maybe. Can you tell me more about why you are raising money?

title: Fundraising for Campaigns
dialogue_line: Sure! Campaign ads are expensive, so we want to raise money for TV ads.

title: Fundraising for Campaigns
dialogue_line: Some of those ads are so negative though.

title: Fundraising for Campaigns
dialogue_line: You're right, but the new ads are going to be positive.

title: Fundraising for Campaigns
dialogue_line: How much money are you trying to raise?

title: Fundraising for Campaigns
dialogue_line: We need a few thousand dollars

title: Fundraising for Campaigns
dialogue_line: Is this the only way you are raising money?

title: Fundraising for Campaigns
dialogue_line: No. We are doing phone banking and even having an event.

title: Fundraising for Campaigns
dialogue_line: What kind of event?

title: Fundraising for Campaigns
dialogue_line: We are hosting a lunch with the candidate.

title: Fundraising for Campaigns
dialogue_line: I may be interested in donating for that.

title: Volunteering for Campaigns
dialogue_line: I wonder what I can do to get involved in the campaign?

title: Volunteering for Campaigns
dialogue_line: You can volunteer.

title: Volunteering for Campaigns
dialogue_line: What does a campaign volunteer do?

title: Volunteering for Campaigns
dialogue_line: All kinds of things like handing out pamphlets.

title: Volunteering for Campaigns
dialogue_line: Pamphlets about what?

title: Volunteering for Campaigns
dialogue_line: About the candidate and what they stand for.

title: Volunteering for Campaigns
dialogue_line: That sounds like it would be a great way to meet people.

title: Volunteering for Campaigns
dialogue_line: It is. Volunteers also make phone calls and ask for money.

title: Volunteering for Campaigns
dialogue_line: I would feel awkward asking strangers for money.

title: Volunteering for Campaigns
dialogue_line: It's not for you. It's for your candidate.

title: Volunteering for Campaigns
dialogue_line: You have a point.

title: Volunteering for Campaigns
dialogue_line: Volunteering for a campaign is a great experience.

title: Working at the Polling Place
dialogue_line: I'm really excited about my short-term job.

title: Working at the Polling Place
dialogue_line: What's so great about it?

title: Working at the Polling Place
dialogue_line: I'll be working at a polling place.

title: Working at the Polling Place
dialogue_line: What do you do at that job?

title: Working at the Polling Place
dialogue_line: I'll help to make sure voters are voting at the right place and answer basic questions.

title: Working at the Polling Place
dialogue_line: Was the job hard to get?

title: Working at the Polling Place
dialogue_line: Not really. I filled out an application online.

title: Working at the Polling Place
dialogue_line: That's all you had to do?

title: Working at the Polling Place
dialogue_line: There was a mandatory training too, but they paid me for that.

title: Working at the Polling Place
dialogue_line: Does it pay well?

title: Working at the Polling Place
dialogue_line: It pays better than the minimum wage.

title: Working at the Polling Place
dialogue_line: Maybe I'll become a poll worker, too.

title: Asking Questions at the Polling Place
dialogue_line: This is my first time voting and I need some help.

title: Asking Questions at the Polling Place
dialogue_line: I'll be happy to help you. What's your name and address?

title: Asking Questions at the Polling Place
dialogue_line: Here's my identification.

title: Asking Questions at the Polling Place
dialogue_line: You are in the right place.

title: Asking Questions at the Polling Place
dialogue_line: How do you know?

title: Asking Questions at the Polling Place
dialogue_line: Your name is right here. Sign next to the image of your signature.

title: Asking Questions at the Polling Place
dialogue_line: Okay, sign here. Then what?

title: Asking Questions at the Polling Place
dialogue_line: Then you are ready to vote.

title: Asking Questions at the Polling Place
dialogue_line: Where do I do that?

title: Asking Questions at the Polling Place
dialogue_line: You can use that empty booth right behind you.

title: Asking Questions at the Polling Place
dialogue_line: You are so helpful.

title: Asking Questions at the Polling Place
dialogue_line: I'm just doing my job as a poll worker.

title: Meeting Candidate before Voting
dialogue_line: I hope you are on your way to vote right now.

title: Meeting Candidate before Voting
dialogue_line: I am. And I'm actually voting for you!

title: Meeting Candidate before Voting
dialogue_line: Glad to hear that. I appreciate your vote.

title: Meeting Candidate before Voting
dialogue_line: Can I ask you a question?

title: Meeting Candidate before Voting
dialogue_line: That's why I'm out here today.

title: Meeting Candidate before Voting
dialogue_line: Do you really think you can change City Hall?

title: Meeting Candidate before Voting
dialogue_line: I am sure going to try.

title: Meeting Candidate before Voting
dialogue_line: See that's the reason why you have my vote.

title: Meeting Candidate before Voting
dialogue_line: Make sure you tell a friend to vote today.

title: Meeting Candidate before Voting
dialogue_line: Should I tell them to vote for you?

title: Meeting Candidate before Voting
dialogue_line: You don't have to, but it sure would be appreciated.

title: Meeting Candidate before Voting
dialogue_line: Every vote counts.

title: Interviewing a Voter
dialogue_line: I work for the Big City Newspaper, and I'm doing a story on Election Day.

title: Interviewing a Voter
dialogue_line: I read that paper all the time!

title: Interviewing a Voter
dialogue_line: Great! So I can interview you for my story?

title: Interviewing a Voter
dialogue_line: I would love that!

title: Interviewing a Voter
dialogue_line: Did you vote today?

title: Interviewing a Voter
dialogue_line: I'm on my way home from voting now.

title: Interviewing a Voter
dialogue_line: Who did you vote for?

title: Interviewing a Voter
dialogue_line: I voted for our city's first female mayor.

title: Interviewing a Voter
dialogue_line: Were there many people voting?

title: Interviewing a Voter
dialogue_line: I think turnout was pretty low. It's a shame.

title: Interviewing a Voter
dialogue_line: Why do you think that is?

title: Interviewing a Voter
dialogue_line: I think people think all politicians are dishonest.

title: Excitement after Voting
dialogue_line: That was such a rush.

title: Excitement after Voting
dialogue_line: What did you do?

title: Excitement after Voting
dialogue_line: It was my first time voting in an election.

title: Excitement after Voting
dialogue_line: Oh wow! Congratulations, but why is that so exciting for you?

title: Excitement after Voting
dialogue_line: Are you kidding? I just played a role in history.

title: Excitement after Voting
dialogue_line: What if the incumbent wins?

title: Excitement after Voting
dialogue_line: Still, participating in U.S. democracy is great.

title: Excitement after Voting
dialogue_line: Maybe because I've done it so many times, and it doesn't seem like a big deal to me.

title: Excitement after Voting
dialogue_line: I can't wait to vote again next election.

title: Excitement after Voting
dialogue_line: Not everyone votes, so it's good that you take it seriously.

title: Excitement after Voting
dialogue_line: Everyone should take it seriously.

title: Excitement after Voting
dialogue_line: You're a great example.

title: Discussing Who You Voted for
dialogue_line: So, who did you vote for?

title: Discussing Who You Voted for
dialogue_line: I voted for De Blasio.

title: Discussing Who You Voted for
dialogue_line: It's been a while since New York City had a Democrat as a mayor.

title: Discussing Who You Voted for
dialogue_line: It has been too long.

title: Discussing Who You Voted for
dialogue_line: You think so? I'm a Republican.

title: Discussing Who You Voted for
dialogue_line: It's like Obama's campaign. Change is good.

title: Discussing Who You Voted for
dialogue_line: I guess we'll have to wait for the results.

title: Discussing Who You Voted for
dialogue_line: That's true.

title: Discussing Who You Voted for
dialogue_line: May the best person win.

title: Discussing Who You Voted for
dialogue_line: I hope it was my candidate.

title: Discussing Who You Voted for
dialogue_line: What if De Blasio doesn't win?

title: Discussing Who You Voted for
dialogue_line: It's only four years till the next election.

title: Disappointed at the Result
dialogue_line: I'm really bummed that Di Blasio won the election.

title: Disappointed at the Result
dialogue_line: Really? Why is that?

title: Disappointed at the Result
dialogue_line: I think Republican mayors have been good for our city.

title: Disappointed at the Result
dialogue_line: There's too much inequality.

title: Disappointed at the Result
dialogue_line: You think this new mayor will change that?

title: Disappointed at the Result
dialogue_line: You bet he will. It was his campaign promise.

title: Disappointed at the Result
dialogue_line: Politicians make promises all the time. It doesn't mean anything.

title: Disappointed at the Result
dialogue_line: I think you're wrong.

title: Disappointed at the Result
dialogue_line: Mark my words. This will mean more crime.

title: Disappointed at the Result
dialogue_line: Crime has been going down all over the country.

title: Disappointed at the Result
dialogue_line: Thanks to the Democrats.

title: Disappointed at the Result
dialogue_line: I guess we'll have to give the new mayor a chance.

title: Happy with the Result
dialogue_line: Finally we'll have a Democratic mayor in New York City.

title: Happy with the Result
dialogue_line: I don't even know what that is like.

title: Happy with the Result
dialogue_line: Exactly! There hasn't been a Democrat running this city in a long time.

title: Happy with the Result
dialogue_line: I hope he will live up to all his campaign promises.

title: Happy with the Result
dialogue_line: He will. The mayor elect is really sincere.

title: Happy with the Result
dialogue_line: They all seem sincere in the beginning.

title: Happy with the Result
dialogue_line: This is really going to turn the city around.

title: Happy with the Result
dialogue_line: How will that happen?

title: Happy with the Result
dialogue_line: Are your kidding? There will be better schools.

title: Happy with the Result
dialogue_line: The school system is pretty bad right now.

title: Happy with the Result
dialogue_line: There will also be more affordable housing.

title: Happy with the Result
dialogue_line: The city sure could use that.

title: Comments on the New President
dialogue_line: Having a new president will change the course of history.

title: Comments on the New President
dialogue_line: Why do you say that?

title: Comments on the New President
dialogue_line: Well, Obama was our first black president. Now we have our first woman.

title: Comments on the New President
dialogue_line: You think gender matters that much?

title: Comments on the New President
dialogue_line: Absolutely! Women view things differently.

title: Comments on the New President
dialogue_line: You don't think she'll be too soft on foreign policy?

title: Comments on the New President
dialogue_line: No way! Look how she handled things as Secretary of State.

title: Comments on the New President
dialogue_line: That's true. She was tough, but also sympathetic.

title: Comments on the New President
dialogue_line: Exactly. We need someone who is more than just tough.

title: Comments on the New President
dialogue_line: I worry about people being too tough on her.

title: Comments on the New President
dialogue_line: She was a first lady so she knows the ins and outs.

title: Comments on the New President
dialogue_line: She definitely has experience.

title: Going to an Open House
dialogue_line: Hey Richard, are you busy today?

title: Going to an Open House
dialogue_line: I have a couple of errands to run, but I should be done early.

title: Going to an Open House
dialogue_line: If you have time this afternoon, do you want to go with me?

title: Going to an Open House
dialogue_line: Sure! Where are you going?

title: Going to an Open House
dialogue_line: I'm going to an open house in San Gabriel today.

title: Going to an Open House
dialogue_line: I didn't know you were looking for a house.

title: Going to an Open House
dialogue_line: I am not ready to buy today. I'm just checking the market out.

title: Going to an Open House
dialogue_line: That's very smart.

title: Going to an Open House
dialogue_line: I want to see what I can afford.

title: Going to an Open House
dialogue_line: That makes total sense. Count me in.

title: Going to an Open House
dialogue_line: Okay, then I'll pick you up at about 3 p.m. Is that okay?

title: Going to an Open House
dialogue_line: Yes, I should be done by then. Thanks.

title: First Meeting with a Realtor
dialogue_line: Good day! Thanks for meeting with me.

title: First Meeting with a Realtor
dialogue_line: You're welcome, Ms. Thomas. Please sit down.

title: First Meeting with a Realtor
dialogue_line: Thank you. Please call me Jane.

title: First Meeting with a Realtor
dialogue_line: All right! Jane and you can call me Dave.

title: First Meeting with a Realtor
dialogue_line: I am looking to buy a house for myself and my son.

title: First Meeting with a Realtor
dialogue_line: Wonderful! Buying is always a good idea. Do you rent now?

title: First Meeting with a Realtor
dialogue_line: I did, but for the last six-months, I've been living with my mother.

title: First Meeting with a Realtor
dialogue_line: I see. Can I ask you what you do for a living?

title: First Meeting with a Realtor
dialogue_line: I work for the city planning department.

title: First Meeting with a Realtor
dialogue_line: That's a good job. How long have you worked there?

title: First Meeting with a Realtor
dialogue_line: For about three years now.

title: First Meeting with a Realtor
dialogue_line: All right. Let's get started. I'll see what we can do.

title: Pre-Qualifying for a Loan
dialogue_line: The best way to buy a house is to get pre-qualified, Ms. Anderson.

title: Pre-Qualifying for a Loan
dialogue_line: Why is that, Mr. Williams?

title: Pre-Qualifying for a Loan
dialogue_line: By pre-qualifying, you know beforehand which house you can buy.

title: Pre-Qualifying for a Loan
dialogue_line: I thought I would look at houses first.

title: Pre-Qualifying for a Loan
dialogue_line: That's okay too, but you may be wasting your time.

title: Pre-Qualifying for a Loan
dialogue_line: How so, Mr. Williams?

title: Pre-Qualifying for a Loan
dialogue_line: You may find a house you really like, but can't afford it.

title: Pre-Qualifying for a Loan
dialogue_line: Well, that's when I'll negotiate with the seller.

title: Pre-Qualifying for a Loan
dialogue_line: Yes, that's true, but by pre-qualifying, you'll save time, and effort.

title: Pre-Qualifying for a Loan
dialogue_line: How is that?

title: Pre-Qualifying for a Loan
dialogue_line: You will be able to select a home you know you can afford.

title: Pre-Qualifying for a Loan
dialogue_line: Okay. Then we'll try it your way.

title: An Appointment to View Houses
dialogue_line: Hello, this is Sam Jones.

title: An Appointment to View Houses
dialogue_line: Good morning, Mr. Jones. How can I help you?

title: An Appointment to View Houses
dialogue_line: I've been working with one of your realtors. I'd like to view some homes now.

title: An Appointment to View Houses
dialogue_line: Okay. Who have you been working with?

title: An Appointment to View Houses
dialogue_line: I've been working with Ms. Thomas.

title: An Appointment to View Houses
dialogue_line: Oh, she's an excellent realtor. I'll check her calendar.

title: An Appointment to View Houses
dialogue_line: Thank you. I'm very anxious to get started.

title: An Appointment to View Houses
dialogue_line: Are you free this Saturday?

title: An Appointment to View Houses
dialogue_line: I think so. What time?

title: An Appointment to View Houses
dialogue_line: She has time between 1 - 3 p.m. this Saturday, the 12th.

title: An Appointment to View Houses
dialogue_line: I think that will work. Let's do it.

title: An Appointment to View Houses
dialogue_line: I'll be sure to confirm with both of you on Friday. Have a good day.

title: Viewing Houses with a Realtor
dialogue_line: Good evening. I'm glad you could make it.

title: Viewing Houses with a Realtor
dialogue_line: I wouldn't miss this for the world.

title: Viewing Houses with a Realtor
dialogue_line: Okay, let's get started.

title: Viewing Houses with a Realtor
dialogue_line: Sounds fine. I'm glad we're starting here.

title: Viewing Houses with a Realtor
dialogue_line: Yes, this is a great starter house, and it's in a good neighborhood.

title: Viewing Houses with a Realtor
dialogue_line: Do you know anything about the schools?

title: Viewing Houses with a Realtor
dialogue_line: This is part of an award-winning school district.

title: Viewing Houses with a Realtor
dialogue_line: That's what I wanted to hear.

title: Viewing Houses with a Realtor
dialogue_line: Let's take a look inside.

title: Viewing Houses with a Realtor
dialogue_line: Okay, let's do it.

title: Viewing Houses with a Realtor
dialogue_line: I figure we can view at least four homes today, maybe five.

title: Viewing Houses with a Realtor
dialogue_line: That's wonderful. I'm so excited.

title: Do not Like the House (1)
dialogue_line: I think this house will fill all you needs, Mr. Jones.

title: Do not Like the House (1)
dialogue_line: Well, I don't particularly like the neighborhood.

title: Do not Like the House (1)
dialogue_line: I understand your concern, Mr. Jones, but let's take a look inside.

title: Do not Like the House (1)
dialogue_line: Okay, but I'm really concerned about the neighborhood.

title: Do not Like the House (1)
dialogue_line: That's okay, Mr. Jones. We're not married to this home.

title: Do not Like the House (1)
dialogue_line: I guess we can look inside since we're here.

title: Do not Like the House (1)
dialogue_line: Great! Let's go inside. It's a beautiful home.

title: Do not Like the House (1)
dialogue_line: I don't like it already. The porch is too small. I have a big family.

title: Do not Like the House (1)
dialogue_line: All right, Mr. Jones. This may not be the right house for you.

title: Do not Like the House (1)
dialogue_line: That's what I've been trying to tell you.

title: Do not Like the House (1)
dialogue_line: That's okay. I've got more homes to show you.

title: Do not Like the House (1)
dialogue_line: That's good to hear.

title: Do not Like the House (2)
dialogue_line: I hope this neighborhood is more to your liking.

title: Do not Like the House (2)
dialogue_line: Yes, it definitely is.

title: Do not Like the House (2)
dialogue_line: It's a little more money, but I think it's a great fit for you.

title: Do not Like the House (2)
dialogue_line: As long as I can afford it.

title: Do not Like the House (2)
dialogue_line: The porch is very large. I think your family will like it.

title: Do not Like the House (2)
dialogue_line: That's a good place to start.

title: Do not Like the House (2)
dialogue_line: This is the living area. As you can see, it's quite spacious.
