title: Do not Like the House (2)
dialogue_line: Uh huh. I see.

title: Do not Like the House (2)
dialogue_line: And this is the master bedroom.

title: Do not Like the House (2)
dialogue_line: Sorry, it's a beautiful home, but it just doesn't feel right.

title: Do not Like the House (2)
dialogue_line: What's wrong, Mr. Jones?

title: Do not Like the House (2)
dialogue_line: It's the lighting, and it just doesn't feel right, sorry.

title: Find a House You Like
dialogue_line: I'm sorry for being difficult.

title: Find a House You Like
dialogue_line: Not at all. We aim to please.

title: Find a House You Like
dialogue_line: It's just that this will be my family's home. It has to be right.

title: Find a House You Like
dialogue_line: I understand completely.

title: Find a House You Like
dialogue_line: So where is this next home?

title: Find a House You Like
dialogue_line: It's nearby. I think this is the one.

title: Find a House You Like
dialogue_line: I truly hope so.

title: Find a House You Like
dialogue_line: This is it.

title: Find a House You Like
dialogue_line: Wow! I like it.

title: Find a House You Like
dialogue_line: I thought you might.

title: Find a House You Like
dialogue_line: Is this in my price range? If it is, I think I just found my house.

title: Find a House You Like
dialogue_line: It definitely is. Let's go inside.

title: Making an Offer through the Realtor
dialogue_line: Good day, Ms. Andrews. Can we talk?

title: Making an Offer through the Realtor
dialogue_line: Of course, Mr. Johnson. Why don't you come into the office this afternoon?

title: Making an Offer through the Realtor
dialogue_line: That would be fine.

title: Making an Offer through the Realtor
dialogue_line: What's on your mind, Mr. Johnson?

title: Making an Offer through the Realtor
dialogue_line: I want to make an offer on the 1st Avenue home.

title: Making an Offer through the Realtor
dialogue_line: That's great. I'll see you at 2 p.m.

title: Making an Offer through the Realtor
dialogue_line: Hello, Ms. Andrews.

title: Making an Offer through the Realtor
dialogue_line: Hello, Mr. Johnson. You're right on time.

title: Making an Offer through the Realtor
dialogue_line: I like to be prompt, Ms. Andrews.

title: Making an Offer through the Realtor
dialogue_line: That's great. I appreciate that.

title: Making an Offer through the Realtor
dialogue_line: I'm ready to make an offer.

title: Making an Offer through the Realtor
dialogue_line: Okay, let's get started.

title: Discussing a Counter-Offer
dialogue_line: Mr. Lee, the seller has made a counteroffer on his home.

title: Discussing a Counter-Offer
dialogue_line: He did not accept my original offer?

title: Discussing a Counter-Offer
dialogue_line: Technically he did, but he has conditions.

title: Discussing a Counter-Offer
dialogue_line: Okay, what are they?

title: Discussing a Counter-Offer
dialogue_line: He said your offer of $325,000 was a bit short.

title: Discussing a Counter-Offer
dialogue_line: What's his counteroffer?

title: Discussing a Counter-Offer
dialogue_line: He wants $335,000, and he'll throw in the appliances.

title: Discussing a Counter-Offer
dialogue_line: I don't know. Will the appliances have a warranty?

title: Discussing a Counter-Offer
dialogue_line: No. No warranty.

title: Discussing a Counter-Offer
dialogue_line: I'm going to have to think about this, Ms. Phillips.

title: Discussing a Counter-Offer
dialogue_line: Take your time. Counteroffers are common.

title: Discussing a Counter-Offer
dialogue_line: I need to talk to my wife about this. I'll get back to you.

title: Re-offering and Acceptance
dialogue_line: Good morning, Ms. Phillips. I have a second counteroffer.

title: Re-offering and Acceptance
dialogue_line: Okay, Mr. Lee. What is it?

title: Re-offering and Acceptance
dialogue_line: I am willing to raise my offer to $330,000.

title: Re-offering and Acceptance
dialogue_line: What about the appliances?

title: Re-offering and Acceptance
dialogue_line: I'll take the appliances, but I want a limited warranty.

title: Re-offering and Acceptance
dialogue_line: For how long?

title: Re-offering and Acceptance
dialogue_line: I think six-months will suffice.

title: Re-offering and Acceptance
dialogue_line: Well, I know this seller personally. I think we have a deal.

title: Re-offering and Acceptance
dialogue_line: That's great. Are you certain?

title: Re-offering and Acceptance
dialogue_line: I'm very sure. I'll confirm, of course. I think congratulations are in order.

title: Re-offering and Acceptance
dialogue_line: I'll expect your call then. Thanks.

title: Discussing Home Inspection
dialogue_line: This is Joseph Walters, the inspector.

title: Discussing Home Inspection
dialogue_line: Hello, Joseph. I'm the buyer, Mrs. Smith

title: Discussing Home Inspection
dialogue_line: Hello, Mrs. Smith. I've done a preliminary check of the property.

title: Discussing Home Inspection
dialogue_line: That's great! What did you find?

title: Discussing Home Inspection
dialogue_line: There are some issues with this home.

title: Discussing Home Inspection
dialogue_line: For instance?

title: Discussing Home Inspection
dialogue_line: Structurally, the house is sound.

title: Discussing Home Inspection
dialogue_line: That's a good start, Joseph.

title: Discussing Home Inspection
dialogue_line: The plumbing is substandard, the water heater is old, and the roof has issues.

title: Discussing Home Inspection
dialogue_line: You're kidding, right?

title: Discussing Home Inspection
dialogue_line: I wish I was. I'll know more in a couple of days.

title: Discussing Home Inspection
dialogue_line: Okay, keep me informed.

title: Signing Escrow Papers
dialogue_line: It's time to go sign the escrow papers.

title: Signing Escrow Papers
dialogue_line: I'm on my way. Give me a minute.

title: Signing Escrow Papers
dialogue_line: Okay, we have some time.

title: Signing Escrow Papers
dialogue_line: I'm really excited about this. This is our first home.

title: Signing Escrow Papers
dialogue_line: I know. I'm also excited.

title: Signing Escrow Papers
dialogue_line: I'm just glad we came to an agreement with the buyer.

title: Signing Escrow Papers
dialogue_line: Me too. That negotiation was rough.

title: Signing Escrow Papers
dialogue_line: But the realtor told me it was common.

title: Signing Escrow Papers
dialogue_line: That may be true, but I didn't expect it.

title: Signing Escrow Papers
dialogue_line: That doesn't matter now. We got the house.

title: Signing Escrow Papers
dialogue_line: I know! When can we start moving in?

title: Signing Escrow Papers
dialogue_line: Soon, I hope. Really soon.

title: Details of Moving In
dialogue_line: This is it. We can move in starting tomorrow.

title: Details of Moving In
dialogue_line: No way! Really?

title: Details of Moving In
dialogue_line: Yup. We cleared escrow. It's officially ours now.

title: Details of Moving In
dialogue_line: I don't know what to say.

title: Details of Moving In
dialogue_line: It's time to figure out how we're going to move in.

title: Details of Moving In
dialogue_line: Well, I think we should rent a trailer, and move the big stuff first.

title: Details of Moving In
dialogue_line: Yeah, that would make sense.

title: Details of Moving In
dialogue_line: I'll start boxing everything else.

title: Details of Moving In
dialogue_line: I know of a good moving company. My best friend used them last year.

title: Details of Moving In
dialogue_line: Are they affordable?

title: Details of Moving In
dialogue_line: I think so. I'll call them tomorrow morning.

title: Details of Moving In
dialogue_line: I still can't believe that house is ours. It's a great feeling.

title: Ready To Sell the House
dialogue_line: Now that we found our new home, it's time to sell our old one.

title: Ready To Sell the House
dialogue_line: I know. It makes me sad.

title: Ready To Sell the House
dialogue_line: Why is that, Dorothy?

title: Ready To Sell the House
dialogue_line: I don't know. I guess it's because we've lived here so long.

title: Ready To Sell the House
dialogue_line: I know, baby. But it's time to move on.

title: Ready To Sell the House
dialogue_line: Yes, I know. The kids are all grown up now.

title: Ready To Sell the House
dialogue_line: I'll contact our realtor tomorrow.

title: Ready To Sell the House
dialogue_line: Are you going to use the same one?

title: Ready To Sell the House
dialogue_line: No, I don't think so. I think I'll try someone new.

title: Ready To Sell the House
dialogue_line: Why is that?

title: Ready To Sell the House
dialogue_line: No reason, really. I just want to check around. We're in no hurry.

title: Ready To Sell the House
dialogue_line: That's true. I'm good with that.

title: Marketing the House
dialogue_line: It's time to start thinking about marketing our home.

title: Marketing the House
dialogue_line: Won't our realtor do that?

title: Marketing the House
dialogue_line: Yes, of course, but we can make some suggestions.

title: Marketing the House
dialogue_line: What suggestions?

title: Marketing the House
dialogue_line: I definitely want to have a "For Sale" sign on the lawn.

title: Marketing the House
dialogue_line: That's funny. Don't all houses for sale have that?

title: Marketing the House
dialogue_line: No, not really. A lot of homes are just listed on the Internet.

title: Marketing the House
dialogue_line: why do you want the sign then?

title: Marketing the House
dialogue_line: I still think it is an effective tool in selling a house.

title: Marketing the House
dialogue_line: Okay, you're the boss.

title: Marketing the House
dialogue_line: We'll also have a listing online, so we can reach more people.

title: Marketing the House
dialogue_line: Sounds good to me. We should do well then.

title: Setting an Asking Price
dialogue_line: Hi Jennifer, it's Doug.

title: Setting an Asking Price
dialogue_line: Hello, Doug. How can I help you?

title: Setting an Asking Price
dialogue_line: I'm a bit concerned with how to set an asking price for my home.

title: Setting an Asking Price
dialogue_line: Well, you shouldn't worry, Doug. We will set the price accordingly.

title: Setting an Asking Price
dialogue_line: What do you mean?

title: Setting an Asking Price
dialogue_line: We are experts at this. We'll take all factors into consideration.

title: Setting an Asking Price
dialogue_line: Such as what, if I may ask?

title: Setting an Asking Price
dialogue_line: Our formula takes local pricing, comparability, and market trends into consideration.

title: Setting an Asking Price
dialogue_line: That's very thorough.

title: Setting an Asking Price
dialogue_line: We are real estate experts, Doug.

title: Setting an Asking Price
dialogue_line: I think I made the right decision to hire you, Ms. Winters.

title: Setting an Asking Price
dialogue_line: Well, thank you, Doug. It's my pleasure.

title: Signing a Contract with a Realtor
dialogue_line: Hello, Mr. Rogers. How are you today?

title: Signing a Contract with a Realtor
dialogue_line: I'm doing well, Wendy. How are you?

title: Signing a Contract with a Realtor
dialogue_line: I'm great, thanks. So are you ready to make a decision?

title: Signing a Contract with a Realtor
dialogue_line: I certainly am. I'm going with your firm.

title: Signing a Contract with a Realtor
dialogue_line: Oh, that's great news, Mr. Rogers.

title: Signing a Contract with a Realtor
dialogue_line: Okay, so what's next?

title: Signing a Contract with a Realtor
dialogue_line: I have a standard contract we use. You can look it over if you like.

title: Signing a Contract with a Realtor
dialogue_line: Sure I will, but can you give me an overview?

title: Signing a Contract with a Realtor
dialogue_line: It basically reads that you agree to have us act as your agent.

title: Signing a Contract with a Realtor
dialogue_line: I still have the final say on the deal though, right?

title: Signing a Contract with a Realtor
dialogue_line: Of course, you do, Mr. Rogers.

title: Signing a Contract with a Realtor
dialogue_line: I just wanted to be clear on that. Thanks.

title: Home Security During Listing
dialogue_line: I must admit, Ms. Price, I'm concerned about security.

title: Home Security During Listing
dialogue_line: Don't worry, Mr. King. We will provide the security on your home.

title: Home Security During Listing
dialogue_line: What kinds of things do you do?

title: Home Security During Listing
dialogue_line: We make it look like someone is living in your home while it's listed.

title: Home Security During Listing
dialogue_line: How do you do that?

title: Home Security During Listing
dialogue_line: We do several things. We stop deliveries, mow the lawn, and set timers.

title: Home Security During Listing
dialogue_line: Is that all you do?

title: Home Security During Listing
dialogue_line: No, we have our agents drop by from time to time.

title: Home Security During Listing
dialogue_line: Oh, that's good.

title: Home Security During Listing
dialogue_line: Yes, we take home security seriously.

title: Home Security During Listing
dialogue_line: Thanks, Ms. Price. I feel much better now.

title: Home Security During Listing
dialogue_line: You are very welcome. Thank you.

title: Fixing up the Interior
dialogue_line: We should start fixing up the interior of the house, Angela.

title: Fixing up the Interior
dialogue_line: Why is that, Jonathan? Don't we have time?

title: Fixing up the Interior
dialogue_line: Yes, we do, but the sooner, the better.

title: Fixing up the Interior
dialogue_line: I guess so. Where do we start?

title: Fixing up the Interior
dialogue_line: I think the kitchen would be best.

title: Fixing up the Interior
dialogue_line: Why would the kitchen be best?

title: Fixing up the Interior
dialogue_line: I just think it's a very important room.

title: Fixing up the Interior
dialogue_line: Well, yes. I guess we spend a lot of time there.

title: Fixing up the Interior
dialogue_line: We do. Everyone does.

title: Fixing up the Interior
dialogue_line: Okay, what should we do first?

title: Fixing up the Interior
dialogue_line: How about the cabinets? They're not too expensive, and it will look good.

title: Fixing up the Interior
dialogue_line: Sounds good to me. I'll start looking into it tomorrow.

title: Fixing up the Exterior
dialogue_line: It's time to start work.

title: Fixing up the Exterior
dialogue_line: Okay, where do we start?

title: Fixing up the Exterior
dialogue_line: The best place to start is the roof.

title: Fixing up the Exterior
dialogue_line: The roof? Isn't that dangerous?

title: Fixing up the Exterior
dialogue_line: Don't be afraid. As long as we're careful, we'll be alright.

title: Fixing up the Exterior
dialogue_line: But I'm afraid of heights.

title: Fixing up the Exterior
dialogue_line: I'll be there. Like I said, we'll be okay.

title: Fixing up the Exterior
dialogue_line: Okay, I trust you.

title: Fixing up the Exterior
dialogue_line: A good roof is very important. If it leaks, it can ruin the interior.

title: Fixing up the Exterior
dialogue_line: Yes, I know. Remember Uncle Joe's house?

title: Fixing up the Exterior
dialogue_line: I sure do. Let's get started.

title: Fixing up the Exterior
dialogue_line: Okay. I'm ready.

title: Preparing for an Open house
dialogue_line: Good morning, Alice. Today's the big day!

title: Preparing for an Open house
dialogue_line: Yes, it is. Are we ready for this?

title: Preparing for an Open house
dialogue_line: I think so. You know I've been working on the house.

title: Preparing for an Open house
dialogue_line: I know, Richard. I guess I'm just nervous.

title: Preparing for an Open house
dialogue_line: I wouldn't worry, babe. We've worked very hard on this.

title: Preparing for an Open house
dialogue_line: Yes. I know, but still ...

title: Preparing for an Open house
dialogue_line: We cleaned the house, spruced up the yard, and painted the interior.

title: Preparing for an Open house
dialogue_line: I know, Richard. I'm worried about the things we didn't do.

title: Preparing for an Open house
dialogue_line: I think we'll be okay. If something comes up, we'll deal with it then.

title: Preparing for an Open house
dialogue_line: You think of everything.

title: Preparing for an Open house
dialogue_line: No. I don't, Alice. We think of everything.

title: Preparing for an Open house
dialogue_line: You're right. We'll be ready.

title: Accepting an Offer
dialogue_line: Good morning, Mr. Davis.

title: Accepting an Offer
dialogue_line: Good morning, Rudy. How are you today?

title: Accepting an Offer
dialogue_line: I'm doing well, thanks.

title: Accepting an Offer
dialogue_line: So, what have you got for me today?

title: Accepting an Offer
dialogue_line: I have exciting news, Mr. Davis.

title: Accepting an Offer
dialogue_line: What is it? Did someone make an offer?

title: Accepting an Offer
dialogue_line: Yes. I have a serious offer on your house. This may be the one.

title: Accepting an Offer
dialogue_line: How close to the asking price is the offer?

title: Accepting an Offer
dialogue_line: Very close. The offer is at $325,000.

title: Accepting an Offer
dialogue_line: Wow. That's great. That's almost what we listed it for.

title: Accepting an Offer
dialogue_line: There are a couple of conditions though, but they're not too bad.

title: Accepting an Offer
dialogue_line: Okay, I'm all ears. Let's go over them. I'm ready to sell.

title: Counteroffer
dialogue_line: Good day, Thomas. We have an offer on your house.

title: Counteroffer
dialogue_line: That's good! I hope it's better than the last one.

title: Counteroffer
dialogue_line: It is, Thomas.

title: Counteroffer
dialogue_line: Okay, let's hear it.

title: Counteroffer
dialogue_line: The offer is $275,000.

title: Counteroffer
dialogue_line: $275,000! That's $35,000 under the listing.

title: Counteroffer
dialogue_line: I know, Thomas, but I think we should consider it.

title: Counteroffer
dialogue_line: Why would I consider this price?

title: Counteroffer
dialogue_line: We should counteroffer. I think we can work with this buyer.

title: Counteroffer
dialogue_line: I won't take less than $300,000. You know that.

title: Counteroffer
dialogue_line: Let's consider the counteroffer. The house has issues.

title: Counteroffer
dialogue_line: Okay, I listen to you.

title: Rejecting a Counteroffer
dialogue_line: Mr. Smith, we received a counteroffer on your house.

title: Rejecting a Counteroffer
dialogue_line: For which property?

title: Rejecting a Counteroffer
dialogue_line: It's for the lot on 6th Avenue.

title: Rejecting a Counteroffer
dialogue_line: Okay, I've been waiting for this.

title: Rejecting a Counteroffer
dialogue_line: Yes, and I think it is a very good offer.

title: Rejecting a Counteroffer
dialogue_line: Okay, lay it on me.

title: Rejecting a Counteroffer
dialogue_line: The buyer upped his offer to $375,000.

title: Rejecting a Counteroffer
dialogue_line: Are you kidding me? That's still $7,500 below list.

title: Rejecting a Counteroffer
dialogue_line: I know, Mr. Smith, but the market is weak right now.

title: Rejecting a Counteroffer
dialogue_line: I don't care. I'm not losing money on this.

title: Rejecting a Counteroffer
dialogue_line: You won't be losing money, sir.

title: Rejecting a Counteroffer
dialogue_line: I don't care. I'm not selling at that price.

title: Accepting a Counteroffer
dialogue_line: The counteroffer we've been waiting for is here, Mr. Richards.

title: Accepting a Counteroffer
dialogue_line: Finally. It's been nearly three weeks.

title: Accepting a Counteroffer
dialogue_line: Well, these things take some time.

title: Accepting a Counteroffer
dialogue_line: I know, but I wasn't happy with the original offer.

title: Accepting a Counteroffer
dialogue_line: I think you'll be happy with this. The buyer is coming in just below list.

title: Accepting a Counteroffer
dialogue_line: Exactly how much?

title: Accepting a Counteroffer
dialogue_line: They came in at $415,000, with very few conditions.

title: Accepting a Counteroffer
dialogue_line: Wow! That's only $10,000 below list. I didn't expect that.

title: Accepting a Counteroffer
dialogue_line: Neither did I, Mr. Richards.

title: Accepting a Counteroffer
dialogue_line: What are the conditions?

title: Accepting a Counteroffer
dialogue_line: They're not too bad. Mostly just to fix a few minor flaws.

title: Accepting a Counteroffer
dialogue_line: That's great. I think we'll take this counteroffer.

title: Deciding Which Offer to Accept
dialogue_line: Do you have any news for me, Daniel?

title: Deciding Which Offer to Accept
dialogue_line: Yes, sir. I do.

title: Deciding Which Offer to Accept
dialogue_line: That's good to hear. It's been a while since I've heard from you.

title: Deciding Which Offer to Accept
dialogue_line: We not have only one offer for your home, we have two.

title: Deciding Which Offer to Accept
dialogue_line: Are they both serious offers?

title: Deciding Which Offer to Accept
dialogue_line: Yes, sir, they are.

title: Deciding Which Offer to Accept
dialogue_line: Okay, let's go over them.

title: Deciding Which Offer to Accept
dialogue_line: The best one comes from the San Gabriel couple.

title: Deciding Which Offer to Accept
dialogue_line: Why do you say that?

title: Deciding Which Offer to Accept
dialogue_line: The offers are the same in dollars, but they placed no conditions on the sale.

title: Deciding Which Offer to Accept
dialogue_line: Really? They will buy as it is?

title: Deciding Which Offer to Accept
dialogue_line: Yes, sir, they will.

title: Deciding Which Offer to Accept
dialogue_line: Okay. I think we found our buyer then.

title: Deed Transfer
dialogue_line: My dad told me he was going to put his second house in my name.

title: Deed Transfer
dialogue_line: The one on Bronson Street?

title: Deed Transfer
dialogue_line: Yes, that's the one.

title: Deed Transfer
dialogue_line: Wow, that's a nice house.

title: Deed Transfer
dialogue_line: Yes, it is. He wants me to start taking on more responsibilities.

title: Deed Transfer
dialogue_line: Well, that will do it. It's not easy managing a home.

title: Deed Transfer
dialogue_line: I guess not, but I won't be living in it now.

title: Deed Transfer
dialogue_line: So what's he doing?

title: Deed Transfer
dialogue_line: He's just doing a Quit Claim deed.

title: Deed Transfer
dialogue_line: What's that?

title: Deed Transfer
dialogue_line: It's just a deed transfer changing ownership of the home.

title: Deed Transfer
dialogue_line: It's not a sale?

title: Deed Transfer
dialogue_line: No. It's usually done between family members.

title: Preparing to Move Out
dialogue_line: Honey, where are the kitchen utensils?

title: Preparing to Move Out
dialogue_line: I have no idea, Alicia. They're in one of these boxes.

title: Preparing to Move Out
dialogue_line: I can't believe how much work is involved in moving out.

title: Preparing to Move Out
dialogue_line: I didn't expect this, either.

title: Preparing to Move Out
dialogue_line: I hope this is the last time we move in a while.

title: Preparing to Move Out
dialogue_line: Me, too. I thought it was just a matter of calling a moving company, but wow!

title: Preparing to Move Out
dialogue_line: That's just the beginning. Everything has to be organized, and packed first.

title: Preparing to Move Out
dialogue_line: It's a good thing the kids are helping.

title: Preparing to Move Out
dialogue_line: Yes, and your brother, too. His truck has made this easier.

title: Preparing to Move Out
dialogue_line: We've stayed in this house for a long time.

title: Preparing to Move Out
dialogue_line: Yes. It's time to move, but I don't want to go through this again.

title: Preparing to Move Out
dialogue_line: We won't, Alicia. Remember, we got the house we wanted.

title: Moving Day
dialogue_line: I think the movers are here, Brian.

title: Moving Day
dialogue_line: They're here? They are early.

title: Moving Day
dialogue_line: Yes, I know. They're an hour early.

title: Moving Day
dialogue_line: We're not ready yet. I'll tell them to come back.

title: Moving Day
dialogue_line: No, that's okay, dear. I'll go talk to them.

title: Moving Day
dialogue_line: Are you sure?

title: Moving Day
dialogue_line: Yes, they can start loading the furniture while we pack the small stuff.

title: Moving Day
dialogue_line: I guess that's okay.

title: Moving Day
dialogue_line: We'll be fine. Most of the furniture is in the front anyway.

title: Moving Day
dialogue_line: As long as they don't get in our way.

title: Moving Day
dialogue_line: I'll tell them we're not done packing. It should be okay.

title: Moving Day
dialogue_line: It'd better be. They're very early.

title: Choosing a Good Restaurant
dialogue_line: Are you ready for dinner?

title: Choosing a Good Restaurant
dialogue_line: I sure am. Where are we going?

title: Choosing a Good Restaurant
dialogue_line: I thought we could try the new Italian place.

title: Choosing a Good Restaurant
dialogue_line: Oh, that's so heavy.

title: Choosing a Good Restaurant
dialogue_line: That's never bothered you before.

title: Choosing a Good Restaurant
dialogue_line: I know. The food is good, but it's a ton of carbs, and calories.

title: Choosing a Good Restaurant
dialogue_line: But very tasty.

title: Choosing a Good Restaurant
dialogue_line: We should try eating healthier.

title: Choosing a Good Restaurant
dialogue_line: So what do you suggest?

title: Choosing a Good Restaurant
dialogue_line: How about the Thai Hut?

title: Choosing a Good Restaurant
dialogue_line: You know I like that place, too. So what's the difference.

title: Choosing a Good Restaurant
dialogue_line: It's just not as heavy. Let's go there, okay?

title: Making a Reservation
dialogue_line: Are you having dinner with us tonight?

title: Making a Reservation
dialogue_line: Yes I am. I'll be out of work soon.

title: Making a Reservation
dialogue_line: Okay, I'm thinking of the Pasta House.

title: Making a Reservation
dialogue_line: Oh, that place gets crowded. Maybe we should make reservations.

title: Making a Reservation
dialogue_line: That's a good idea. We waited an hour the last time.

title: Making a Reservation
dialogue_line: Yes. It is best to do that first.

title: Making a Reservation
dialogue_line: What time should we set the reservation for?

title: Making a Reservation
dialogue_line: Well, I'll be home by 6 o'clock.

title: Making a Reservation
dialogue_line: Okay, I'll make the call. I'll let you know.

title: Making a Reservation
dialogue_line: That's great, thanks. I hoped they're not booked.

title: Making a Reservation
dialogue_line: We should be able to get a table. I'll call right now.

title: Making a Reservation
dialogue_line: Don't worry about the time. We can eat later if we have to.

title: Being seated at the Restaurant
dialogue_line: Welcome to the Silver Wok. How can I help you?

title: Being seated at the Restaurant
dialogue_line: Hello, I was hoping you have a table.

title: Being seated at the Restaurant
dialogue_line: We should be okay. How many guests?

title: Being seated at the Restaurant
dialogue_line: It's a birthday dinner. We have 12 guests.

title: Being seated at the Restaurant
dialogue_line: Oh, let me check if I have room for you. Your name, please.

title: Being seated at the Restaurant
dialogue_line: I'm Mr. Johnson. I would appreciate it.

title: Being seated at the Restaurant
dialogue_line: Okay, Mr. Johnson. I will have a table soon.

title: Being seated at the Restaurant
dialogue_line: Oh, that's wonderful.

title: Being seated at the Restaurant
dialogue_line: It's near the back. Is that okay?

title: Being seated at the Restaurant
dialogue_line: Yes, I suppose it is. I was hoping for window seating though.

title: Being seated at the Restaurant
dialogue_line: I can accommodate you, but it will take a little more time, sir.

title: Being seated at the Restaurant
dialogue_line: That's okay. We'll wait.

title: Ordering Drinks
dialogue_line: Good Evening. I am Joseph, and I'll be your waiter tonight.

title: Ordering Drinks
dialogue_line: Hello, Joseph.

title: Ordering Drinks
dialogue_line: Can I start you off with some refreshments?

title: Ordering Drinks
dialogue_line: Yes, you can. I'll take a Long Island Iced Tea.

title: Ordering Drinks
dialogue_line: And for the lady?

title: Ordering Drinks
dialogue_line: She will have a vodka martini.

title: Ordering Drinks
dialogue_line: Those are excellent choices. How about the kids?

title: Ordering Drinks
dialogue_line: They will take regular iced teas.

title: Ordering Drinks
dialogue_line: Will there be anything else?

title: Ordering Drinks
dialogue_line: Yes, as a matter of fact. Can you bring me a beer chaser?

title: Ordering Drinks
dialogue_line: Certainly. What kind of beer would you like?

title: Ordering Drinks
dialogue_line: I want something imported. How about something from Mexico?

title: Ordering Appetizers
dialogue_line: Now that you have your beverages, can I offer you some appetizers?

title: Ordering Appetizers
dialogue_line: Yes, that sounds good. What do you have?

title: Ordering Appetizers
dialogue_line: We have a wide selection of tempting appetizers.

title: Ordering Appetizers
dialogue_line: May I see a menu, please?

title: Ordering Appetizers
dialogue_line: Certainly. It's on the regular menu under "Appetizers."

title: Ordering Appetizers
dialogue_line: Can you recommend something?

title: Ordering Appetizers
dialogue_line: Of course. The potato skins are very popular.

title: Ordering Appetizers
dialogue_line: Hmmm. I don't like potatoes much. What else you got?

title: Ordering Appetizers
dialogue_line: How about some stuffed mushrooms, or fried zucchini?

title: Ordering Appetizers
dialogue_line: That sounds better, but I'm still not sold.

title: Ordering Appetizers
dialogue_line: We have an appetizer platter that includes all our selections.

title: Ordering Appetizers
dialogue_line: That sounds excellent. Let's have it.

title: Ordering Main Entree
dialogue_line: Are you ready to order?

title: Ordering Main Entree
dialogue_line: Yes, I think we are, thank you.

title: Ordering Main Entree
dialogue_line: Okay, what can I get you?

title: Ordering Main Entree
dialogue_line: I like the look of that plate on the next table.

title: Ordering Main Entree
dialogue_line: Oh yes, sir. That's our seafood platter.

title: Ordering Main Entree
dialogue_line: What does it come with?

title: Ordering Main Entree
dialogue_line: Fried white fish, shrimp, and scallops, along with fries, and vegetables.

title: Ordering Main Entree
dialogue_line: Does it come with a salad?

title: Ordering Main Entree
dialogue_line: Of course. It comes with the soup of the day, and a green salad.

title: Ordering Main Entree
dialogue_line: What's the soup of the day.

title: Ordering Main Entree
dialogue_line: Today's soup is clam chowder.

title: Ordering Main Entree
dialogue_line: Is that New England, or Manhattan style?

title: Ordering Main Entree
dialogue_line: It is the creamy-white, New England style.

title: Ordering Main Entree
dialogue_line: Oh, that's my favorite. I'll take the soup.

title: Ordering Dessert
dialogue_line: Waiter!

title: Ordering Dessert
dialogue_line: Yes, sir. How can I help you?

title: Ordering Dessert
dialogue_line: That was an excellent meal, but we could not finish.

title: Ordering Dessert
dialogue_line: Would you like a doggy-bag to take your leftovers home?

title: Ordering Dessert
dialogue_line: Yes, please. We would.

title: Ordering Dessert
dialogue_line: And did you leave enough room for dessert?

title: Ordering Dessert
dialogue_line: Dessert? Why yes, I think so.

title: Ordering Dessert
dialogue_line: Here is our dessert menu.

title: Ordering Dessert
dialogue_line: Do you have a house specialty?

title: Ordering Dessert
dialogue_line: Yes, we do. It's the apple pie a la mode.

title: Ordering Dessert
dialogue_line: That sounds good. What kind of ice cream do you have?

title: Ordering Dessert
dialogue_line: Vanilla, French vanilla, chocolate, and strawberry.

title: Ordering Dessert
dialogue_line: I'll take the pie a la mode, but put the ice cream on the side, not on top.

title: Ordering Dessert
dialogue_line: Excellent choice! Okay, ice cream on the side.

title: A mistake by the Waitress
dialogue_line: Here comes our food. I'm so hungry. It looks delicious.

title: A mistake by the Waitress
dialogue_line: Here's your order.

title: A mistake by the Waitress
dialogue_line: Excuse me, but I don't think this order is correct.

title: A mistake by the Waitress
dialogue_line: Really? What did you order?

title: A mistake by the Waitress
dialogue_line: I ordered the fried chicken. This is grilled.

title: A mistake by the Waitress
dialogue_line: Let me check. Oh yes, you did order the fried chicken.

title: A mistake by the Waitress
dialogue_line: Yes, I did. Thank you.

title: A mistake by the Waitress
dialogue_line: Not to worry. I'll get your order out in no time.

title: A mistake by the Waitress
dialogue_line: Please do. Two of us would like to eat at the same time.

title: A mistake by the Waitress
dialogue_line: If you like, I can keep your plate warm while preparing her meal.

title: Making Positive Comments on Food
dialogue_line: Honey, this steak looks delicious.

title: Making Positive Comments on Food
dialogue_line: Yes, it does, Michael. It has a nice color.

title: Making Positive Comments on Food
dialogue_line: Yum, and it's perfectly cooked.

title: Making Positive Comments on Food
dialogue_line: It looks a bit rare. How did you order it?

title: Making Positive Comments on Food
dialogue_line: Medium-rare, as always.

title: Making Positive Comments on Food
dialogue_line: That looks rare to me, dear.

title: Making Positive Comments on Food
dialogue_line: It might be a bit pink on the inside, but I don't care. This is delicious.

title: Making Positive Comments on Food
dialogue_line: That's all that matters, dear.

title: Making Positive Comments on Food
dialogue_line: I have to tell the waiter to send my compliments to the chef.

title: Making Positive Comments on Food
dialogue_line: That would be a nice gesture.

title: Making Positive Comments on Food
dialogue_line: The baked potato is also very tasty.

title: Making Positive Comments on Food
dialogue_line: Well, make sure you tell the chef that also.

title: Making Negative Comments on Food
dialogue_line: Here's your dinner, folks. Enjoy!

title: Making Negative Comments on Food
dialogue_line: Thank you. This looks delicious.

title: Making Negative Comments on Food
dialogue_line: You're welcome.

title: Making Negative Comments on Food
dialogue_line: Excuse me.

title: Making Negative Comments on Food
dialogue_line: Yes, how can I help you?

title: Making Negative Comments on Food
dialogue_line: This salmon steak tastes a little funny.

title: Making Negative Comments on Food
dialogue_line: Funny? In what way?

title: Making Negative Comments on Food
dialogue_line: I don't know for sure, but, I think it might be spoiled.

title: Making Negative Comments on Food
dialogue_line: Not to worry. We will bring you a new steak.

title: Making Negative Comments on Food
dialogue_line: Yes, please do. This one turned my stomach.

title: Making Negative Comments on Food
dialogue_line: Oh, no. Are you okay?

title: Making Negative Comments on Food
dialogue_line: I think so, but I'm not in the mood for dinner now.

title: Making Negative Comments on Food
dialogue_line: That's perfectly alright. We will refund your money.

title: Good Tips for Good Service
dialogue_line: That was an excellent meal. Don't you think so, Judy?

title: Good Tips for Good Service
dialogue_line: Absolutely! I especially liked the dessert.

title: Good Tips for Good Service
dialogue_line: Yes, me too. That chocolate cake was delicious.

title: Good Tips for Good Service
dialogue_line: Here comes our waitress.

title: Good Tips for Good Service
dialogue_line: Hello again, and thank you. That was very good.

title: Good Tips for Good Service
dialogue_line: Yes, the dessert was delicious.

title: Good Tips for Good Service
dialogue_line: I would like the bill, please.

title: Good Tips for Good Service
dialogue_line: Her service and attitude were good also. How much are you tipping her?

title: Good Tips for Good Service
dialogue_line: You're right about the service. I think 20 percent.

title: Good Tips for Good Service
dialogue_line: Twenty percent? That's a bit high, isn't it?

title: Good Tips for Good Service
dialogue_line: I know, but the food was good, and the service was excellent.

title: Good Tips for Good Service
dialogue_line: You're right, dear. She deserves it.

title: Little Tips for Bad Service
dialogue_line: Wow! Our order is sure taking long.

title: Little Tips for Bad Service
dialogue_line: Yes, it is. It's been nearly 45 minutes now.

title: Little Tips for Bad Service
dialogue_line: Well, maybe they're just very busy.

title: Little Tips for Bad Service
dialogue_line: I don't know, dear. I was watching our waiter.

title: Little Tips for Bad Service
dialogue_line: What did you see?

title: Little Tips for Bad Service
dialogue_line: He actually handed in orders for two tables before us.

title: Little Tips for Bad Service
dialogue_line: You mean after he took our order.

title: Little Tips for Bad Service
dialogue_line: Yes. He was goofing off. I could see him from here.

title: Little Tips for Bad Service
dialogue_line: How do you know he did this.

title: Little Tips for Bad Service
dialogue_line: Like I said, I was watching. He forgot our order.

title: Little Tips for Bad Service
dialogue_line: That's terrible.

title: Little Tips for Bad Service
dialogue_line: Yes, well he's not going to get a good tip from me.

title: Talking Positively About a Restaurant
dialogue_line: Have you heard of the new burger place down the street?

title: Talking Positively About a Restaurant
dialogue_line: Yes, I have. Have you tried it yet?

title: Talking Positively About a Restaurant
dialogue_line: It's the bomb. The burgers are so good.

title: Talking Positively About a Restaurant
dialogue_line: Is it expensive?

title: Talking Positively About a Restaurant
dialogue_line: Not really. Not more than most places.

title: Talking Positively About a Restaurant
dialogue_line: What do you like about it?

title: Talking Positively About a Restaurant
dialogue_line: The food is great, and the waitresses bring you food on roller skates.

title: Talking Positively About a Restaurant
dialogue_line: That's like those old-time drive-in places.

title: Talking Positively About a Restaurant
dialogue_line: Yes, it is. Like in the Â‘50s.

title: Talking Positively About a Restaurant
dialogue_line: Wow, I got to go there soon.

title: Talking Positively About a Restaurant
dialogue_line: I would highly recommend it.

title: Talking Positively About a Restaurant
dialogue_line: Thanks. I'll definite go.

title: Talking Negative about a Restaurant
dialogue_line: I just came back from eating at the new steak place.

title: Talking Negative about a Restaurant
dialogue_line: Oh, I've been wanting to go there. How was it?

title: Talking Negative about a Restaurant
dialogue_line: Don't bother going.

title: Talking Negative about a Restaurant
dialogue_line: Really? Why?

title: Talking Negative about a Restaurant
dialogue_line: It was terrible. The food was cold, and the service sucked.

title: Talking Negative about a Restaurant
dialogue_line: Oh, no. I was looking forward to trying it out.

title: Talking Negative about a Restaurant
dialogue_line: Like I said, don't bother.

title: Talking Negative about a Restaurant
dialogue_line: I mean, how bad was the food?

title: Talking Negative about a Restaurant
dialogue_line: It was awful. They got my order wrong, and it was cold.

title: Talking Negative about a Restaurant
dialogue_line: Well, maybe it was just an isolated incident.

title: Talking Negative about a Restaurant
dialogue_line: I don't think so. I spoke to other diners, and they were disappointed, too.

title: Talking Negative about a Restaurant
dialogue_line: I guess that means I have to find another place.

title: At a Fast Food Restaurant
dialogue_line: So what are you ordering?

title: At a Fast Food Restaurant
dialogue_line: I'm not sure. I like their burgers.

title: At a Fast Food Restaurant
dialogue_line: Yeah, me too. Have you tried their fish sandwich?

title: At a Fast Food Restaurant
dialogue_line: Yuck. Yes, I have. I didn't like it.

title: At a Fast Food Restaurant
dialogue_line: Really? Why not?

title: At a Fast Food Restaurant
dialogue_line: It was too greasy. I think I'll get the No. 2 instead.

title: At a Fast Food Restaurant
dialogue_line: What's that?

title: At a Fast Food Restaurant
dialogue_line: That's their bacon burger special.

title: At a Fast Food Restaurant
dialogue_line: Is it good?

title: At a Fast Food Restaurant
dialogue_line: It's very tasty. They use thick bacon.

title: At a Fast Food Restaurant
dialogue_line: Oh, good. Other places use paper-thin bacon.

title: At a Fast Food Restaurant
dialogue_line: I think I like think bacon better.

title: Moving Into a New Neighborhood
dialogue_line: I'm a bit nervous, Charlie.

title: Moving Into a New Neighborhood
dialogue_line: Why, baby?

title: Moving Into a New Neighborhood
dialogue_line: Well, you know, new neighborhood, new surroundings.

title: Moving Into a New Neighborhood
dialogue_line: Change is good, Linda. Before long, you'll feel right at home.

title: Moving Into a New Neighborhood
dialogue_line: I hope so. I guess I'm just used to the old place.

title: Moving Into a New Neighborhood
dialogue_line: I know what you mean, baby, but this is a much better neighborhood.

title: Moving Into a New Neighborhood
dialogue_line: Yes, it is, but it's still something new.

title: Moving Into a New Neighborhood
dialogue_line: We'll be fine. In a month it will feel like home.

title: Moving Into a New Neighborhood
dialogue_line: I hope our neighbors are nice.

title: Moving Into a New Neighborhood
dialogue_line: Me too, but that's not a deal-breaker. This is a much better place.

title: Moving Into a New Neighborhood
dialogue_line: I know, dear. It's just my jitters, that's all.

title: Moving Into a New Neighborhood
dialogue_line: We will get through this, babe.

title: Meeting New Neighbors
dialogue_line: Hi, I'm Janet. I live next door.

title: Meeting New Neighbors
dialogue_line: Oh, hello Janet. I'm Richard, and this is my wife Wendy.

title: Meeting New Neighbors
dialogue_line: We're going to be living side by side; we should make the best of it.

title: Meeting New Neighbors
dialogue_line: I totally agree.

title: Meeting New Neighbors
dialogue_line: My husband will be home soon. He wants to meet you, too.

title: Meeting New Neighbors
dialogue_line: That would be great. I was hoping to make new friends.

title: Meeting New Neighbors
dialogue_line: Me too. I knew the Thompsons for years. They lived where you do now.

title: Meeting New Neighbors
dialogue_line: How long have you lived here?

title: Meeting New Neighbors
dialogue_line: For 25 years. I love this neighborhood.

title: Meeting New Neighbors
dialogue_line: That sounds perfect to us.

title: Nearby Grocery Stores
dialogue_line: I think this new place will work out great.

title: Nearby Grocery Stores
dialogue_line: Why do you say that, Dan?

title: Nearby Grocery Stores
dialogue_line: It seems there's so much nearby.

title: Nearby Grocery Stores
dialogue_line: Like what, baby?

title: Nearby Grocery Stores
dialogue_line: Didn't you see all the grocery stores?

title: Nearby Grocery Stores
dialogue_line: I saw a couple.

title: Nearby Grocery Stores
dialogue_line: There are lots of them, and some specialty shops.

title: Nearby Grocery Stores
dialogue_line: That's great. Like what?

title: Nearby Grocery Stores
dialogue_line: I saw a produce stand, and a butcher market next to each other.

title: Nearby Grocery Stores
dialogue_line: Where was that?

title: Nearby Grocery Stores
dialogue_line: Not far. I'll take you later.

title: Nearby Grocery Stores
dialogue_line: That sounds great. I look forward to it.

title: Find a Church
dialogue_line: I can't believe we're actually moved in.

title: Find a Church
dialogue_line: I know. It's like a dream come true.

title: Find a Church
dialogue_line: We found the stores, and schools. It's time to find a church now.

title: Find a Church
dialogue_line: Yes. I can't believe I forgot about that.

title: Find a Church
dialogue_line: We've been very busy, Marcy. That's okay.

title: Find a Church
dialogue_line: How do we find one?

title: Find a Church
dialogue_line: I guess we can call our old pastor.

title: Find a Church
dialogue_line: That's right. He will know.

title: Find a Church
dialogue_line: It's either that, or check the Internet.

title: Find a Church
dialogue_line: I think I like the pastor idea better.

title: Find a Church
dialogue_line: Yes. He can probably give us the name of the local pastor.

title: Find a Church
dialogue_line: I'm so eager to start now.

title: Find Places to Eat
dialogue_line: There certainly are a lot of places to eat around here.

title: Find Places to Eat
dialogue_line: Yes, there are. Where shall we go tonight?

title: Find Places to Eat
dialogue_line: Why don't we ask our new neighbors for a recommendation?

title: Find Places to Eat
dialogue_line: That's a great idea. They seem very friendly.

title: Find Places to Eat
dialogue_line: Yes, and they have lived here for a long time.

title: Find Places to Eat
dialogue_line: There she is. Let me ask her.

title: Find Places to Eat
dialogue_line: What did she say, honey?

title: Find Places to Eat
dialogue_line: She recommended a couple of places. What are you craving?

title: Find Places to Eat
dialogue_line: How about a nice steak?

title: Find Places to Eat
dialogue_line: Good. She said there was a good steak house about a mile away.

title: Find Places to Eat
dialogue_line: Excellent. Did you ask her if it was expensive.

title: Find Places to Eat
dialogue_line: Yes, I did. She said it was very reasonable. Let's go.

title: The Nearest Mall
dialogue_line: Now that we're settled in, it's time to do some exploring.

title: The Nearest Mall
dialogue_line: I know what you mean. Everything is so new.

title: The Nearest Mall
dialogue_line: I think I saw a shopping mall off the highway.

title: The Nearest Mall
dialogue_line: Was it far?

title: The Nearest Mall
dialogue_line: Not really, but we did move to an isolated place.

title: The Nearest Mall
dialogue_line: Yeah, I know. I didn't figure on this.

title: The Nearest Mall
dialogue_line: Let's go. It's not that far.

title: The Nearest Mall
dialogue_line: Okay, I'll get ready.

title: The Nearest Mall
dialogue_line: Alright, I'll get the car out. It's only about 15 minutes away.

title: The Nearest Mall
dialogue_line: I hope it has a lot of shops.

title: The Nearest Mall
dialogue_line: It looked pretty big.

title: The Nearest Mall
dialogue_line: Okay, let's go.

title: At the Public Library
dialogue_line: Hey, this is a nice library.

title: At the Public Library
dialogue_line: It is. I didn't expect this.

title: At the Public Library
dialogue_line: It doesn't look like much from the outside.

title: At the Public Library
dialogue_line: Didn't you know you can't tell a book by its cover?

title: At the Public Library
dialogue_line: That's funny, babe.

title: At the Public Library
dialogue_line: Anyway, we're going to need to get new library cards.

title: At the Public Library
dialogue_line: I'll go ask about it.

title: At the Public Library
dialogue_line: Okay, I'm going to check the place out.

title: At the Public Library
dialogue_line: I went ahead and applied for a card. You need to do the same.

title: At the Public Library
dialogue_line: I will right now, but look at this exhibit.

title: At the Public Library
dialogue_line: Wow, it's beautiful. What is it?

title: At the Public Library
dialogue_line: I'm not sure, but I'm going to find out.

title: Enrolling a Child in School
dialogue_line: It's time to go, Richard.

title: Enrolling a Child in School
dialogue_line: Okay, Patty. I'm ready.

title: Enrolling a Child in School
dialogue_line: I'm really stoked about this new school. Judy is going to love it.

title: Enrolling a Child in School
dialogue_line: I know. I've heard so many good things about it.

title: Enrolling a Child in School
dialogue_line: Did you make an appointment?

title: Enrolling a Child in School
dialogue_line: No, it wasn't necessary. They're enrolling new students this week.

title: Enrolling a Child in School
dialogue_line: Okay, I just hope there're not too many people.

title: Enrolling a Child in School
dialogue_line: I think we'll be okay. There're not too many cars in the lot.

title: Enrolling a Child in School
dialogue_line: I'm glad we brought her transcripts. I think that will make this smoother.

title: Enrolling a Child in School
dialogue_line: Yes, I'm sure it will. That was a good idea.

title: Enrolling a Child in School
dialogue_line: Okay, let's get this done.

title: Enrolling a Child in School
dialogue_line: I'm ready, babe.

title: Hailing a Cab
dialogue_line: I need to get to the airport by 6 o'clock.

title: Hailing a Cab
dialogue_line: That's in less than 45 minutes. You'll never make it.

title: Hailing a Cab
dialogue_line: I have to try. I was hoping to get the shuttle home.

title: Hailing a Cab
dialogue_line: Why did you wait so long?

title: Hailing a Cab
dialogue_line: It was my boss. He kept us late.

title: Hailing a Cab
dialogue_line: Well, there goes a taxi.

title: Hailing a Cab
dialogue_line: Taxi! Taxi! Darn, someone else got it.

title: Hailing a Cab
dialogue_line: You're going to have a hard time getting a taxi at this hour.

title: Hailing a Cab
dialogue_line: I know, but what can I do? Taxi!

title: Hailing a Cab
dialogue_line: Well, good luck, George. I'm taking the subway.

title: Hailing a Cab
dialogue_line: Okay, have a good weekend. Taxi!

title: Taking a Walk around a Park
dialogue_line: You want to go for a walk?

title: Taking a Walk around a Park
dialogue_line: Sure! Where to?

title: Taking a Walk around a Park
dialogue_line: I was thinking of going to the park.

title: Taking a Walk around a Park
dialogue_line: Isn't it a bit far?

title: Taking a Walk around a Park
dialogue_line: Not really. We'll just take our time. It's very beautiful there.

title: Taking a Walk around a Park
dialogue_line: Okay, let's go.

title: Taking a Walk around a Park
dialogue_line: Look at the swans. Do you see them?

title: Taking a Walk around a Park
dialogue_line: They're gorgeous. Look at how white those plumes are.

title: Taking a Walk around a Park
dialogue_line: And the lake looks so calm.

title: Taking a Walk around a Park
dialogue_line: It does. This was a great idea.

title: Taking a Walk around a Park
dialogue_line: I know. I do this walk often.

title: Taking a Walk around a Park
dialogue_line: I didn't even think it was that far; it's so beautiful.

title: Playing with Kids at the Park
dialogue_line: Let's take the kids to the park.

title: Playing with Kids at the Park
dialogue_line: Hey, that sounds like a good idea!

title: Playing with Kids at the Park
dialogue_line: Yes, the fresh air will do them good.

title: Playing with Kids at the Park
dialogue_line: Yeah, they've been cooped up all week.

title: Playing with Kids at the Park
dialogue_line: It's like summer out today.

title: Playing with Kids at the Park
dialogue_line: Okay, I'll get them ready.

title: Playing with Kids at the Park
dialogue_line: There is so much to do there.

title: Playing with Kids at the Park
dialogue_line: What, like swings, and rides?

title: Playing with Kids at the Park
dialogue_line: Yes, and much more. They're going to love it.

title: Playing with Kids at the Park
dialogue_line: What have you planned?

title: Playing with Kids at the Park
dialogue_line: I was thinking about taking them on a boat ride.

title: Playing with Kids at the Park
dialogue_line: Oh, they'll love that. Can I go too?

title: A New Game

title: A New Game
dialogue_line: It's a new game I downloaded on my iPhone.

title: A New Game
dialogue_line: Is it fun?

title: A New Game
dialogue_line: Yes! I really like competing with my friends.

title: A New Game
dialogue_line: That's right! If you get a higher score, the game gives you prizes.

title: A New Game
dialogue_line: What kinds of prizes?

title: A New Game
dialogue_line: Better equipment for your character, or even weapons.

title: A New Game
dialogue_line: That game sounds like a lot of fun!

title: A New Game
dialogue_line: It really is! You should download it.

title: A New Game
dialogue_line: Alright! Then I can compete against you!

title: A New Game
dialogue_line: In that case, get ready to lose!

title: A Comic Book
dialogue_line: Have you read the new Batman comic issue?

title: A Comic Book
dialogue_line: No. Is it out in stores already?

title: A Comic Book
dialogue_line: Yes. A new shipment arrived just yesterday.

title: A Comic Book
dialogue_line: I'll go get it as soon as my shift is over.

title: A Comic Book
dialogue_line: It's really amazing!

title: A Comic Book
dialogue_line: I love this series. The villains are so cool!

title: A Comic Book
dialogue_line: I know what you mean. They have great backstories!

title: A Comic Book
dialogue_line: I never get tired of reading Batman.

title: A Comic Book
dialogue_line: I wonder if they will make another movie soon.

title: A Comic Book
dialogue_line: I like the comics better than the movies, though.

title: A Comic Book
dialogue_line: Me too, but comics don't have special effects!

title: A Comic Book
dialogue_line: I guess the movies have their perks, too.

title: Anime Series
dialogue_line: Why do you seem so tired today?

title: Anime Series
dialogue_line: I stayed up all night watching that new anime.

title: Anime Series
dialogue_line: You stayed up to watch it again?

title: Anime Series
dialogue_line: I just had to find out what happened next!

title: Anime Series
dialogue_line: I don't think it's good to watch so many cartoons.

title: Anime Series
dialogue_line: Anime series are not cartoons!

title: Anime Series

title: 8. Finding an Error in Your Test Score
dialogue_line: Excuse me, Professor. I think there might be an error in my test score.

title: 8. Finding an Error in Your Test Score
dialogue_line: Sure. Do you think that the total is wrong or that you got something marked wrong that should have been marked right?

title: 8. Finding an Error in Your Test Score
dialogue_line: I think that the percentage is incorrect.

title: 8. Finding an Error in Your Test Score
dialogue_line: Let's just go over all of it to double-check.

title: 8. Finding an Error in Your Test Score
dialogue_line: Sure, let's do it.

title: 8. Finding an Error in Your Test Score
dialogue_line: Here is the answer sheet. Do you see a place where I marked something wrong that should have been right?

title: 8. Finding an Error in Your Test Score
dialogue_line: I don't see any mistakes.

title: 8. Finding an Error in Your Test Score
dialogue_line: OK, now that we've gotten those straightened out, let's total the score.

title: 8. Finding an Error in Your Test Score
dialogue_line: Yes, let's total it.

title: 8. Finding an Error in Your Test Score
dialogue_line: Well, if I total that like this and divide by this number, I get this total. Do you agree?

title: 8. Finding an Error in Your Test Score
dialogue_line: Yes, you're right.

title: 8. Finding an Error in Your Test Score
dialogue_line: Well then, we are all straight. Have a good day and thanks for bringing that to my attention.

title: 8. Finding an Error in Your Test Score
dialogue_line: I was looking at my test score and think that it should be higher.

title: 8. Finding an Error in Your Test Score
dialogue_line: Is the math wrong or the way the answer was marked?

title: 8. Finding an Error in Your Test Score
dialogue_line: I think an answer got marked wrong that should have been marked right.

title: 8. Finding an Error in Your Test Score
dialogue_line: These things can happen; let's double-check the answers first to be sure, all right?

title: 8. Finding an Error in Your Test Score
dialogue_line: That would be great!

title: 8. Finding an Error in Your Test Score
dialogue_line: Look at the answer sheet and compare it to your answers. Do you see any place where I made a mistake in grading?

title: 8. Finding an Error in Your Test Score
dialogue_line: This one right here should be right.

title: 8. Finding an Error in Your Test Score
dialogue_line: Yeah, I see the same thing; now we can do the math and check that, right?

title: 8. Finding an Error in Your Test Score
dialogue_line: Yeah, let's do the math.

title: 8. Finding an Error in Your Test Score
dialogue_line: I count all of the correct answers, total them, and divide by the total. Does this look right to you?

title: 8. Finding an Error in Your Test Score
dialogue_line: Looks pretty good.

title: 8. Finding an Error in Your Test Score
dialogue_line: Thank you for caring enough to check on your scores; keep studying!

title: 8. Finding an Error in Your Test Score
dialogue_line: Could we go over some things, because I think my test score is wrong.

title: 8. Finding an Error in Your Test Score
dialogue_line: What do you think is wrong, the math or the way your answer was scored?

title: 8. Finding an Error in Your Test Score
dialogue_line: Both.

title: 8. Finding an Error in Your Test Score
dialogue_line: I am willing to take a second look because teachers make mistakes, too. Will that work for you?

title: 8. Finding an Error in Your Test Score
dialogue_line: Yeah, I'm ready.

title: 8. Finding an Error in Your Test Score
dialogue_line: Check your answers against the ones on the answer sheet and let me know where you see the mistake.

title: 8. Finding an Error in Your Test Score
dialogue_line: These look strange.

title: 8. Finding an Error in Your Test Score
dialogue_line: Yes, I agree; let's move on to the calculating of the score. Would that be OK?

title: 8. Finding an Error in Your Test Score
dialogue_line: OK, let's do the calculation.

title: 8. Finding an Error in Your Test Score
dialogue_line: We add all of these up and divide by this and that gives us this percentage.

title: 8. Finding an Error in Your Test Score
dialogue_line: I see.

title: 8. Finding an Error in Your Test Score
dialogue_line: Anytime you have a question, please feel free to ask!

dialogue_line: Do you have the notes from last week's class?
