dialogue_line: Did you come late?

title: 9. Borrowing Class Notes
dialogue_line: I couldn't make it.

title: 9. Borrowing Class Notes
dialogue_line: Why is that?

title: 9. Borrowing Class Notes
dialogue_line: I was sick.

title: 9. Borrowing Class Notes
dialogue_line: Oh, okay. Well, here you go.

title: 9. Borrowing Class Notes
dialogue_line: Are these all of them?

title: 9. Borrowing Class Notes
dialogue_line: Oh, wait, here are the rest.

title: 9. Borrowing Class Notes
dialogue_line: Thanks a bunch.

title: 9. Borrowing Class Notes
dialogue_line: Don't mention it.

title: 9. Borrowing Class Notes
dialogue_line: Do you mind if I borrow the notes from last week?

title: 9. Borrowing Class Notes
dialogue_line: Were you here last week?

title: 9. Borrowing Class Notes
dialogue_line: I was unable to make it.

title: 9. Borrowing Class Notes
dialogue_line: How come?

title: 9. Borrowing Class Notes
dialogue_line: I was sick that day, and couldn't make it.

title: 9. Borrowing Class Notes
dialogue_line: Well, here are the notes.

title: 9. Borrowing Class Notes
dialogue_line: Are there any more?

title: 9. Borrowing Class Notes
dialogue_line: Sorry, here you go.

title: 9. Borrowing Class Notes
dialogue_line: Thanks a lot.

title: 9. Borrowing Class Notes
dialogue_line: No problem.

title: 9. Borrowing Class Notes
dialogue_line: Let me get last week's notes.

title: 9. Borrowing Class Notes
dialogue_line: Yeah, sure--you didn't come to class that day?

title: 9. Borrowing Class Notes
dialogue_line: I couldn't come.

title: 9. Borrowing Class Notes
dialogue_line: Why not?

title: 9. Borrowing Class Notes
dialogue_line: I wasn't feeling well.

title: 9. Borrowing Class Notes
dialogue_line: Here they are.

title: 9. Borrowing Class Notes
dialogue_line: Thanks a lot; are these all the notes?

title: 9. Borrowing Class Notes
dialogue_line: Oh, no, this is the rest.

title: 9. Borrowing Class Notes
dialogue_line: Thank you very much.

title: 9. Borrowing Class Notes
dialogue_line: It's no problem at all.

title: . Grading Policy
dialogue_line: I was wondering how you are going to calculate our final grades.

title: . Grading Policy
dialogue_line: Grades are based on many things: homework, attendance, quizzes, mid-term, and final.

title: . Grading Policy
dialogue_line: What counts the most?

title: . Grading Policy
dialogue_line: Actually I look at all of it and let's not forget class participation.

title: . Grading Policy
dialogue_line: Do you grade on a curve or use percentages?

title: . Grading Policy
dialogue_line: Homework, attendance, and quizzes are sixty percent; the mid-term and final are worth twenty percent each.

title: . Grading Policy
dialogue_line: What if we miss something?

title: . Grading Policy
dialogue_line: I will allow one unexcused absence; after that you need to contact me ahead of time.

title: . Grading Policy
dialogue_line: Will you tell us if we are failing during the year?

title: . Grading Policy
dialogue_line: You will be able to track your progress during the year.

title: . Grading Policy
dialogue_line: What do you base our grades on?

title: . Grading Policy
dialogue_line: All of your coursework is important, including everything from attendance and homework to all of your test results for the semester.

title: . Grading Policy
dialogue_line: Does the final count the most?

title: . Grading Policy
dialogue_line: All of it is important; please just do your best at all times.

title: . Grading Policy
dialogue_line: How do you total our scores?

title: . Grading Policy
dialogue_line: The final and mid-term are twenty percent each; homework, attendance, and quizzes are the rest.

title: . Grading Policy
dialogue_line: What if we are out sick?

title: . Grading Policy
dialogue_line: Make sure you contact me as I only allow one unexcused absence.

title: . Grading Policy
dialogue_line: How can we know if we are doing OK during the year?

title: . Grading Policy
dialogue_line: Your grade will not be a surprise; you will know what you need to work on.

title: . Grading Policy
dialogue_line: How do you decide what grade we get?

title: . Grading Policy
dialogue_line: I look at many things: attendance, quizzes, and tests.

title: . Grading Policy
dialogue_line: What is the most important factor?

title: . Grading Policy
dialogue_line: Obviously I look for improvement as we go along, but I would like you to do your best from the beginning.

title: . Grading Policy
dialogue_line: How can we keep track of our grades?

title: . Grading Policy
dialogue_line: The final and midterm are 40 percent of your grade; homework, attendance, and quizzes total 60 percent.

title: . Grading Policy
dialogue_line: What if we can't get to school?

title: . Grading Policy
dialogue_line: You can only miss one class without penalty.

title: . Grading Policy
dialogue_line: If we have a major problem, will you let us know?

title: . Grading Policy
dialogue_line: I will be letting you know during the year if you have a major problem.

title: . Discussing Your Grades with Your Professor
dialogue_line: I'd like to talk to you about my grades.

title: . Discussing Your Grades with Your Professor
dialogue_line: Sure! What exactly do you have questions about?

title: . Discussing Your Grades with Your Professor
dialogue_line: I am worried that I messed up on a test.

title: . Discussing Your Grades with Your Professor
dialogue_line: Well, let me take a look at my grade book. How do YOU think you are doing?

title: . Discussing Your Grades with Your Professor
dialogue_line: I think I am doing great, except for that one test!

title: . Discussing Your Grades with Your Professor
dialogue_line: Well, your scores show that you could do a little better. What do you think you could improve on?

title: . Discussing Your Grades with Your Professor
dialogue_line: I think that I could study a little harder for tests.

title: . Discussing Your Grades with Your Professor
dialogue_line: Fine! Please remember that regular attendance is the most important way to begin.

title: . Discussing Your Grades with Your Professor
dialogue_line: Yes, I know.

title: . Discussing Your Grades with Your Professor
dialogue_line: I'm sure you'll do fine.

title: . Discussing Your Grades with Your Professor
dialogue_line: Could you talk to me for a few minutes about my grades?

title: . Discussing Your Grades with Your Professor
dialogue_line: Step into my office for a moment. What is your concern?

title: . Discussing Your Grades with Your Professor
dialogue_line: Am I failing?

title: . Discussing Your Grades with Your Professor
dialogue_line: Let's go on the computer to see what's up. Do you think you are doing well?

title: . Discussing Your Grades with Your Professor
dialogue_line: I am pretty sure that I am in trouble.

title: . Discussing Your Grades with Your Professor
dialogue_line: I can see that you are trying, but where do you think you could improve?

title: . Discussing Your Grades with Your Professor
dialogue_line: I missed a few classes; I need to make sure I come to school on a regular basis.

title: . Discussing Your Grades with Your Professor
dialogue_line: Having a regular study routine and following it is very important, right?

title: . Discussing Your Grades with Your Professor
dialogue_line: I'll try; it's hard!

title: . Discussing Your Grades with Your Professor
dialogue_line: Thanks for stopping by!

title: . Discussing Your Grades with Your Professor
dialogue_line: Professor, I'm concerned about my grades. Do you have a minute?

title: . Discussing Your Grades with Your Professor
dialogue_line: Of course, how can I help you?

title: . Discussing Your Grades with Your Professor
dialogue_line: I want to know if I am doing OK.

title: . Discussing Your Grades with Your Professor
dialogue_line: Let's pull out your scores so far. Do you think you are doing OK?

title: . Discussing Your Grades with Your Professor
dialogue_line: I am afraid that I might not be doing all that well.

title: . Discussing Your Grades with Your Professor
dialogue_line: I'm seeing that you are doing OK in some areas, but not so well in others.

title: . Discussing Your Grades with Your Professor
dialogue_line: I think I could take better notes and read a little more.

title: . Discussing Your Grades with Your Professor
dialogue_line: You can greatly improve your grades by always reflecting on what you can improve on.

title: . Discussing Your Grades with Your Professor
dialogue_line: I'm working on it!

title: . Discussing Your Grades with Your Professor
dialogue_line: Just do your best and I am sure that you will see improvement.

title: . Talking to Professor about Being Absent
dialogue_line: Excuse me, Professor. I am going to miss next week's class.

title: . Talking to Professor about Being Absent
dialogue_line: Is this something that you could schedule for another time?

title: . Talking to Professor about Being Absent
dialogue_line: No, I have to do this; it's important!

title: . Talking to Professor about Being Absent
dialogue_line: Have you arranged for someone to take notes for you?

title: . Talking to Professor about Being Absent
dialogue_line: I've made arrangements with a friend to help me.

title: . Talking to Professor about Being Absent
dialogue_line: You know that I only allow one absence per semester, don't you?

title: . Talking to Professor about Being Absent
dialogue_line: Yes, I know.

title: . Talking to Professor about Being Absent
dialogue_line: Write down your name and the date on a piece of paper and give it to me.

title: . Talking to Professor about Being Absent
dialogue_line: OK, I can do that.

title: . Talking to Professor about Being Absent
dialogue_line: Well, have a good day off from class.

title: . Talking to Professor about Being Absent
dialogue_line: Professor, I will not be here for our next class meeting.

title: . Talking to Professor about Being Absent
dialogue_line: Is this absolutely necessary?

title: . Talking to Professor about Being Absent
dialogue_line: I tried to work something out, but I really do have to miss one class.

title: . Talking to Professor about Being Absent
dialogue_line: Will you be able to make up the work you missed?

title: . Talking to Professor about Being Absent
dialogue_line: I'm going to be doing a lot of extra reading.

title: . Talking to Professor about Being Absent
dialogue_line: Remember that I will only let you miss one class meeting per semester.

title: . Talking to Professor about Being Absent
dialogue_line: Yes, I remember.

title: . Talking to Professor about Being Absent
dialogue_line: Could you e-mail me this week as a reminder?

title: . Talking to Professor about Being Absent
dialogue_line: Sure, no problem.

title: . Talking to Professor about Being Absent
dialogue_line: Make good use of that day off; you'll only have one this semester!

title: . Talking to Professor about Being Absent
dialogue_line: I have to miss school next week.

title: . Talking to Professor about Being Absent
dialogue_line: Isn't there some way you could work your schedule out to be here?

title: . Talking to Professor about Being Absent
dialogue_line: Unfortunately, this is what I have to do.

title: . Talking to Professor about Being Absent
dialogue_line: How are you going to catch up?

title: . Talking to Professor about Being Absent
dialogue_line: I've got it all covered.

title: . Talking to Professor about Being Absent
dialogue_line: If you miss this class, you will have used up your quota for the semester.

title: . Talking to Professor about Being Absent
dialogue_line: Don't worry, this will be the last class I miss.

title: . Talking to Professor about Being Absent
dialogue_line: Make sure to remind me right before you are absent.

title: . Talking to Professor about Being Absent
dialogue_line: I'll remember.

title: . Talking to Professor about Being Absent
dialogue_line: Enjoy your day off and don't forget to study!

title: . Talking to Professor about Leaving Early
dialogue_line: Professor, I am going to need to leave class early today.

title: . Talking to Professor about Leaving Early
dialogue_line: What is the problem?

title: . Talking to Professor about Leaving Early
dialogue_line: I need to go to the airport to pick up a relative.

title: . Talking to Professor about Leaving Early
dialogue_line: Are you planning on having someone take notes for you?

title: . Talking to Professor about Leaving Early
dialogue_line: Yes, I've got that part covered.

title: . Talking to Professor about Leaving Early
dialogue_line: When, exactly do you need to leave?

title: . Talking to Professor about Leaving Early
dialogue_line: I don't need to leave until the very end of class.

title: . Talking to Professor about Leaving Early
dialogue_line: Fine, but next time try and not have to miss class again.

title: . Talking to Professor about Leaving Early
dialogue_line: Thanks, Professor. See you later!

title: . Talking to Professor about Leaving Early
dialogue_line: See you later! Drive carefully.

title: . Talking to Professor about Leaving Early
dialogue_line: Excuse me, Professor, I have a problem and need to leave class early.

title: . Talking to Professor about Leaving Early
dialogue_line: Why do you have to leave early?

title: . Talking to Professor about Leaving Early
dialogue_line: I am not feeling well.

title: . Talking to Professor about Leaving Early
dialogue_line: Could you make it up by attending my other section this week?

title: . Talking to Professor about Leaving Early
dialogue_line: Yes, it's all taken care of.

title: . Talking to Professor about Leaving Early
dialogue_line: Are you leaving right away or can you stay for a few more minutes?

title: . Talking to Professor about Leaving Early
dialogue_line: I can stay a few more minutes.

title: . Talking to Professor about Leaving Early
dialogue_line: OK, but please make sure that you get all of your make-up work completed.

title: . Talking to Professor about Leaving Early
dialogue_line: Thanks, Professor. I've got it covered!

title: . Talking to Professor about Leaving Early
dialogue_line: Go do what you have to do, but make sure it doesn't happen again.

title: . Talking to Professor about Leaving Early
dialogue_line: I am sorry, but I can't stay until the end of class.

title: . Talking to Professor about Leaving Early
dialogue_line: Where do you need to be that is more important than school?

title: . Talking to Professor about Leaving Early
dialogue_line: I have an appointment.

title: . Talking to Professor about Leaving Early
dialogue_line: Do you have a plan to make up your missed work?

title: . Talking to Professor about Leaving Early
dialogue_line: No, but I'll make sure someone helps me out this week with my missed work.

title: . Talking to Professor about Leaving Early
dialogue_line: Are you going to go right away?

title: . Talking to Professor about Leaving Early
dialogue_line: I am leaving right now.

title: . Talking to Professor about Leaving Early
dialogue_line: All right, but please remember that it is your responsibility to catch up.

title: . Talking to Professor about Leaving Early
dialogue_line: Thanks, Professor. I'll make sure everything gets taken care of.

title: . Talking to Professor about Leaving Early
dialogue_line: Goodbye, and try not to miss any more school.

title: . Talking to a Counselor
dialogue_line: I have an appointment for 1:30.

title: . Talking to a Counselor
dialogue_line: What can I help you with?

title: . Talking to a Counselor
dialogue_line: Well, I have a problem with my class schedule.

title: . Talking to a Counselor
dialogue_line: What is it?

title: . Talking to a Counselor
dialogue_line: It seems that I've been given two classes scheduled at the same time.

title: . Talking to a Counselor
dialogue_line: I can understand the problem with that.

title: . Talking to a Counselor
dialogue_line: Is there any way that you can fix my schedule?

title: . Talking to a Counselor
dialogue_line: No problem, do you want those classes still?

title: . Talking to a Counselor
dialogue_line: Yes, I do.

title: . Talking to a Counselor
dialogue_line: Let me see if I can find one of these classes on another day.

title: . Talking to a Counselor
dialogue_line: Thank you very much.

title: . Talking to a Counselor
dialogue_line: I'm here for my appointment.

title: . Talking to a Counselor
dialogue_line: What can I do for you today?

title: . Talking to a Counselor
dialogue_line: I have an issue with my schedule.

title: . Talking to a Counselor
dialogue_line: Tell me the problem.

title: . Talking to a Counselor
dialogue_line: I have two classes on here that are at the same time.

title: . Talking to a Counselor
dialogue_line: Oh, I see.

title: . Talking to a Counselor
dialogue_line: Can you change that for me?

title: . Talking to a Counselor
dialogue_line: Do you still want both classes?

title: . Talking to a Counselor
dialogue_line: Yes, I would like to keep both classes.

title: . Talking to a Counselor
dialogue_line: I'll try to change one to a different day.

title: . Talking to a Counselor
dialogue_line: I would greatly appreciate that.

title: . Talking to a Counselor
dialogue_line: I was supposed to meet with you at 1:30.

title: . Talking to a Counselor
dialogue_line: Yes, I see. What did you need to see me about?

title: . Talking to a Counselor
dialogue_line: There's a problem with my schedule.

title: . Talking to a Counselor
dialogue_line: What's the problem?

title: . Talking to a Counselor
dialogue_line: Two of my classes occur at the same time.

title: . Talking to a Counselor
dialogue_line: Well, I can see that's a problem.

title: . Talking to a Counselor
dialogue_line: Is it at all possible for you to fix that error?

title: . Talking to a Counselor
dialogue_line: Yes, I can. Would you still like to have both of these classes?

title: . Talking to a Counselor
dialogue_line: I want to keep both of them, if that's possible.

title: . Talking to a Counselor
dialogue_line: Well, let me find you one of these classes on a different day.

title: . Talking to a Counselor
dialogue_line: Thanks a lot.

title: . Adding a Class
dialogue_line: I am unsure how to add a class and need help.

title: . Adding a Class
dialogue_line: I have an opening. Do you have an add sheet for me to sign?

title: . Adding a Class
dialogue_line: Yes, I have an add sheet.

title: . Adding a Class
dialogue_line: After I sign it, you must take it to the Admissions and Records Office to add the class. Do you know where that is?

title: . Adding a Class
dialogue_line: No, I'm not sure.

title: . Adding a Class
dialogue_line: When you cross the quad, the office is right in front of you. Go inside and follow the signs to the correct line.

title: . Adding a Class
dialogue_line: Thanks. I understand what to do now.

title: . Adding a Class
dialogue_line: It should be easy to find. After you add the class, check with me in a few weeks to make sure that you are on my roll sheet.

title: . Adding a Class
dialogue_line: That sounds good.

title: . Adding a Class
dialogue_line: Good, just make sure that you do the same thing if you ever need to drop a class. Good luck!

title: . Adding a Class
dialogue_line: Professor, can you help me add your class?

title: . Adding a Class
dialogue_line: You have to bring me an add sheet to sign. Do you have one?

title: . Adding a Class
dialogue_line: No, I will have to get an add sheet.

title: . Adding a Class
dialogue_line: You must take the signed add slip to the Admissions and Records Office to add the class. Do you know where that is?

title: . Adding a Class
dialogue_line: No, I don't know where that is.

title: . Adding a Class
dialogue_line: The office is in front of you as you cross the quad. The signs in the hallway will tell you where you need to be.

title: . Adding a Class
dialogue_line: I think I can find it.

title: . Adding a Class
dialogue_line: You'll find it easily. Make sure you add the class and then we will look at the roll sheet later to make sure that you were added on.

title: . Adding a Class
dialogue_line: Thank you for letting me add your class.

title: . Adding a Class
dialogue_line: To drop a class, you need to do the same thing with a drop slip. Good luck!

title: . Adding a Class
dialogue_line: I am not sure how to add a class.

title: . Adding a Class
dialogue_line: Do you have an add sheet for me to sign?

title: . Adding a Class
dialogue_line: I'll bring one next time.

title: . Adding a Class
dialogue_line: When you get the signed add slip, you must take it to the Admissions and Records Office or you will not be added. Can you find the office?

title: . Adding a Class
dialogue_line: I think I know where it is.

title: . Adding a Class
dialogue_line: Across the courtyard on the right is the office. Follow the signs to the correct line. Is that clear?

title: . Adding a Class
dialogue_line: Thank you for your directions. It's clear.

title: . Adding a Class
dialogue_line: You can't miss it. Add the class and then come back. We'll check later to make sure you are on the roll sheet.

title: . Adding a Class
dialogue_line: That's great. Thank you so much.

title: . Adding a Class
dialogue_line: Do the same thing with a drop slip if you ever need to drop a class. Good luck!

title: . Date and Time of a Field Trip
dialogue_line: When are we leaving for our field trip?

title: . Date and Time of a Field Trip
dialogue_line: Our science field trip is next Monday at 8:00 in the morning. Can you mark that on your calendar?

title: . Date and Time of a Field Trip
dialogue_line: Yes, I will write that down.

title: . Date and Time of a Field Trip
dialogue_line: That will be Monday, December 2nd. We need to start loading the buses half an hour early, so plan to arrive at 7:30.

title: . Date and Time of a Field Trip
dialogue_line: Yes, I will be there on time.

title: . Date and Time of a Field Trip
dialogue_line: We will return 6 days later on December 8th. Will someone be picking you up?

title: . Date and Time of a Field Trip
dialogue_line: Yes, someone is coming to get me.

title: . Date and Time of a Field Trip
dialogue_line: The return bus will leave the campground at 5:00 p.m. and return to campus 3 hours later at 8:00 p.m.

title: . Date and Time of a Field Trip
dialogue_line: What should we bring with us?

title: . Date and Time of a Field Trip
dialogue_line: I am going to post all of that information on the geology club web page. Check it out when you get a chance. See you Monday!

title: . Date and Time of a Field Trip
dialogue_line: Can you tell me what the date and time of our field trip is?

title: . Date and Time of a Field Trip
dialogue_line: We are leaving on our science field trip at 8:00 a.m. next Monday. Do you have something to write that down on?

title: . Date and Time of a Field Trip
dialogue_line: Yes, I can write that on my calendar.

title: . Date and Time of a Field Trip
dialogue_line: That will be on the second of December. Be there Â½ an hour early to get your bags on the bus. Do you understand?

title: . Date and Time of a Field Trip
dialogue_line: Yes, I understand.

title: . Date and Time of a Field Trip
dialogue_line: The bus will bring you back 6 days later on December 8th. Is someone coming to get you?

title: . Date and Time of a Field Trip
dialogue_line: No, I don't have a ride yet.

title: . Date and Time of a Field Trip
dialogue_line: We will be leaving the campground at 5:00 in the evening and arrive at our campus at 8:00 p.m. Any more questions?

title: . Date and Time of a Field Trip
dialogue_line: How much will the trip cost?

title: . Date and Time of a Field Trip
dialogue_line: I put all of that information in the packet. I'll give you another copy if you need one. See you on Monday!

title: . Date and Time of a Field Trip
dialogue_line: What date will our field trip be on?

title: . Date and Time of a Field Trip
dialogue_line: The science field trip is next Monday at 8 o'clock in the morning. Do you want to make note of that on your calendar?

title: . Date and Time of a Field Trip
dialogue_line: Yes, I will make note of that.

title: . Date and Time of a Field Trip
dialogue_line: Next Monday is December 2nd. The buses will leave at 8, but we must begin loading at 7:30.

title: . Date and Time of a Field Trip
dialogue_line: Be there half an hour early.

title: . Date and Time of a Field Trip
dialogue_line: You might want to tell whoever is picking you up that you will return on December 8th. Do you have a ride?

title: . Date and Time of a Field Trip
dialogue_line: Yes, someone is picking me up.

title: . Date and Time of a Field Trip
dialogue_line: To get back to campus by 8:00 p.m., we will be leaving the campsite at 5:00 p.m. Do you have any more questions?

title: . Date and Time of a Field Trip
dialogue_line: Not at the momentÂ—maybe later, though.

title: . Date and Time of a Field Trip
dialogue_line: All of the extra information that you need is on the bulletin board in the hallway. See you on Monday!

title: . Where to Buy Lunch

title: . Where to Buy Lunch

title: . Where to Buy Lunch
dialogue_line: I know the perfect place!

title: . Where to Buy Lunch

title: . Where to Buy Lunch
dialogue_line: That would be great.

title: . Where to Buy Lunch
dialogue_line: Glad you asked me to join you. This will be fun!

title: . Where to Buy Lunch
dialogue_line: Man, I'm hungry. Do you know a good place to have lunch?

title: . Where to Buy Lunch
dialogue_line: Yes, I know a great place. What types of food do you like?

title: . Where to Buy Lunch
dialogue_line: Mexican, Japanese or Chinese would be great.

title: . Where to Buy Lunch
dialogue_line: Oh, I know a place where you might like to eat.

title: . Where to Buy Lunch
dialogue_line: Is it close by?

title: . Where to Buy Lunch
dialogue_line: It's down a block on the right; can I show you the way?

title: . Where to Buy Lunch
dialogue_line: OK, I'd love the company.

title: . Where to Buy Lunch
dialogue_line: This will work out well. I'm getting hungry just thinking about it.

title: . Where to Buy Lunch
dialogue_line: Let's have some lunch; do you know of a great restaurant somewhere?

title: . Where to Buy Lunch
dialogue_line: I'm hungry, too. What types of food sound good?

title: . Where to Buy Lunch
dialogue_line: Maybe just a quick sandwich, salad, or something.

title: . Where to Buy Lunch
dialogue_line: I have a great idea of where you might like to go.

title: . Where to Buy Lunch
dialogue_line: Can we walk there?

title: . Where to Buy Lunch
dialogue_line: It's on the second floor. May I join you?

title: . Where to Buy Lunch
dialogue_line: Of course! Let's go.

title: . Where to Buy Lunch
dialogue_line: Let's hurry. I'm starving!

title: . Using a Vending Machine
dialogue_line: Can you help me figure out how to use this machine?

title: . Using a Vending Machine
dialogue_line: Yes, I would be happy to help. What do you want to buy?

title: . Fighting a Parking Ticket
dialogue_line: Hey, I got this parking ticket; can you help me figure a way out of it?

title: . Fighting a Parking Ticket
dialogue_line: First of all, did you park somewhere too long or in the wrong spot?

title: . Fighting a Parking Ticket
dialogue_line: I was there too long.

title: . Fighting a Parking Ticket
dialogue_line: Was the area clearly labeled with the time limit and all?

title: . Fighting a Parking Ticket
dialogue_line: Yeah, I saw it.

title: . Fighting a Parking Ticket
dialogue_line: You will need to convince the judge that you couldn't see the signs.

title: . Fighting a Parking Ticket
dialogue_line: Yeah, I understand.

title: . Fighting a Parking Ticket
dialogue_line: Whatever you do, you need to be respectful and polite to the judge.

title: . Fighting a Parking Ticket
dialogue_line: Yeah, you're right.

title: . Fighting a Parking Ticket
dialogue_line: Just try to talk to him about how IF you made a mistake that it won't happen again.

title: . Fighting a Parking Ticket
dialogue_line: OK, I will.

title: . Fighting a Parking Ticket
dialogue_line: Good luck!

dialogue_line: Man, I got another parking ticket. I am so unlucky--what can I do?

dialogue_line: Was your car where it wasn't supposed to be, or did you stay there too long?

title: . Fighting a Parking Ticket
dialogue_line: I could tell what I was supposed to do.

title: . Fighting a Parking Ticket
dialogue_line: I guess not.

title: . Fighting a Parking Ticket
dialogue_line: Try brown-nosing the judge, but don't be too obvious about it.

title: . Fighting a Parking Ticket
dialogue_line: Sure, if it will help.

title: . Fighting a Parking Ticket
dialogue_line: Try and convince him that something was labeled wrong or something.

title: . Fighting a Parking Ticket
dialogue_line: Sounds good!

title: . Fighting a Parking Ticket
dialogue_line: Give it your best shot; it might work.

title: . Fighting a Parking Ticket
dialogue_line: I don't know how to fight a parking ticket.

title: . Fighting a Parking Ticket

title: . Fighting a Parking Ticket

title: . Fighting a Parking Ticket

title: . Fighting a Parking Ticket

title: . Fighting a Parking Ticket
dialogue_line: If it might work, I'll go for it!

title: . Fighting a Parking Ticket

title: . Fighting a Parking Ticket
dialogue_line: I can see how that might work.

title: . Fighting a Parking Ticket

title: . Fighting a Parking Ticket

title: . Fighting a Parking Ticket

title: Dating Discussion
dialogue_line: Do you enjoy going on dates?

dialogue_line: Yes. I find dates to be a lot of fun.

title: 6. An Argument
dialogue_line: John, I was talking to the travel agent about where we might be taking our vacation this year.

dialogue_line: I am going fishing in Alaska with my friend, Mark.

dialogue_line: What's wrong with heading out with Mark for vacation?

title: 6. An Argument
dialogue_line: You and I have been together for a whole year, and our vacation time should be about the two of us!

title: 6. An Argument
dialogue_line: Really? Who made that rule up?

title: 6. An Argument

title: 6. An Argument
dialogue_line: Are you kidding me?

title: 6. An Argument
dialogue_line: You know what? You and I had no plans, so I made plans with Mark. What's the problem?

title: 6. An Argument
dialogue_line: We have been together for a year and usually, people who've been together a year, take their vacation together.

title: 6. An Argument
dialogue_line: I don't think that I ever heard of that rule before. Any more rules that you would like to tell me about?

title: 6. An Argument
dialogue_line: Go on your vacation with Mark and when you come back, why don't you just move in with him as well!

title: 6. An Argument

title: . Discrimination
dialogue_line: Good morning, is this the Renter's Hotline?

title: . Discrimination
dialogue_line: Yes, what can I help you with?

title: . Discrimination
dialogue_line: I have a question about discrimination in housing.

title: . Discrimination
dialogue_line: What type of discrimination?

title: . Discrimination
dialogue_line: I think that he doesn't want to rent to me because of my race.

title: . Discrimination
dialogue_line: What made you think that your race was a problem?

title: . Discrimination
dialogue_line: He seemed OK talking to me on the phone, but seemed to change his mind when he saw me in person.

title: . Discrimination
dialogue_line: What else made you feel he was discriminating against you?

title: . Discrimination
dialogue_line: Well, he had a 25 unit apartment building and everyone I saw there was his same race.

title: . Discrimination
dialogue_line: Racial discrimination is very hard to prove, but if you would like to come down, we can go over a checklist that can help you build a case.

title: . Discrimination
dialogue_line: I would like to speak with someone in the Housing Department.

title: . Discrimination
dialogue_line: You have reached the right area. Can I help you with something?

title: . Discrimination
dialogue_line: I think that I may have experienced discrimination in trying to rent an apartment.

title: . Discrimination
dialogue_line: Can you be specific as to what type of discrimination?

title: . Discrimination
dialogue_line: I felt that he didn't like me because I wasn't the same race that he was.

title: . Discrimination
dialogue_line: How come you feel it was race that was the issue?

title: . Discrimination
dialogue_line: When I showed up on his doorstep, he seemed bothered by my appearance.

title: . Discrimination
dialogue_line: Is there anything else that made you feel he was using race as a factor in who he rented to?

title: . Discrimination
dialogue_line: As I walked through the apartment building all I saw were people who were the same race as the manager.

title: . Discrimination
dialogue_line: It is not easy to prove racial discrimination, but please go to our website which can help you file a formal complaint.

title: . Discrimination
dialogue_line: Hello, is this the Legal Advice Line?

title: . Discrimination
dialogue_line: You are in the right department. What can I do for you?

title: . Discrimination
dialogue_line: I think that the landlord where I am trying to rent an apartment may be discriminating against me.

title: . Discrimination
dialogue_line: Discrimination is a pretty broad term. What type, specifically?

title: . Discrimination
dialogue_line: I have a feeling that he will not consider my application because of my race.

title: . Discrimination
dialogue_line: Are you sure that race was the issue? What makes you feel this way?

title: . Discrimination
dialogue_line: When he saw me in person, he seemed bothered by me although I seemed to be under consideration when I e-mailed him.

title: . Discrimination
dialogue_line: Do you have any proof that he would not rent to you because of your race?

title: . Discrimination
dialogue_line: I didn't see one person in that whole building who wasn't the same race as the manager.

title: . Discrimination
dialogue_line: It is difficult to prove racial discrimination, but you may file a formal complaint in our office.

title: . Policy Towards Pets
dialogue_line: I was wondering if you allow pets in this building.

title: . Policy Towards Pets
dialogue_line: We do allow some pets, but you must pay an additional five hundred dollar security deposit.

title: . Policy Towards Pets
dialogue_line: What kind of pets do you allow?

title: . Policy Towards Pets
dialogue_line: You may keep either one cat or one dog.

title: . Policy Towards Pets
dialogue_line: Can cats and dogs be outside?

title: . Policy Towards Pets
dialogue_line: Cats can be outside, but we want them collared or tagged so we know who they belong to. Dogs must be on a leash and are not allowed in the flowerbeds.

title: . Policy Towards Pets
dialogue_line: Are there any special places nearby that I can walk my dog?

title: . Policy Towards Pets
dialogue_line: There is a dog park down the block.

title: . Policy Towards Pets
dialogue_line: Do many other tenants in this building have pets?

title: . Policy Towards Pets
dialogue_line: Not too many, but you shouldn't have any trouble finding someone to share walks with.

title: . Policy Towards Pets
dialogue_line: What is your policy towards tenants keeping pets?

title: . Policy Towards Pets
dialogue_line: You may have a pet, but you have to pay an extra two hundred dollar cleaning deposit.

title: . Policy Towards Pets
dialogue_line: How many pets can we have?

title: . Policy Towards Pets
dialogue_line: You may have only one pet. You can have either a small dog or a cat.

title: . Policy Towards Pets
dialogue_line: What is the policy as to where the pets can be outside?

title: . Policy Towards Pets
dialogue_line: We ask that you keep your cats indoors or on your balcony. Dogs need to be walked to the street or park.

title: . Policy Towards Pets
dialogue_line: Where can I walk my dog?

title: . Policy Towards Pets
dialogue_line: There is a park down the street, but you must keep your dog on a leash.

title: . Policy Towards Pets
dialogue_line: How many other people have pets around here?

title: . Policy Towards Pets
dialogue_line: We have quite a few pet owners here, so if you need help finding a veterinarian, just ask around.

title: . Policy Towards Pets
dialogue_line: Are renters allowed to have pets?

title: . Policy Towards Pets
dialogue_line: We allow a small well-behaved pet, but you need to sign an agreement saying you'll pay for any damages.

title: . Policy Towards Pets
dialogue_line: Do you allow both cats and dogs?

title: . Policy Towards Pets
dialogue_line: We only allow a medium or small dog or a cat.

title: . Policy Towards Pets
dialogue_line: Are there any special areas where animals are allowed or not allowed?

title: . Policy Towards Pets
dialogue_line: Cats are to be kept indoors at all times. Dogs must be on a leash and with the owner when outdoors.

title: . Policy Towards Pets
dialogue_line: Are there places where I can take my dog for a run?

title: . Policy Towards Pets
dialogue_line: There are quite a few hiking trails nearby.

title: . Policy Towards Pets
dialogue_line: Are there a lot of pets in this building?

title: . Policy Towards Pets
dialogue_line: We don't have a lot of pet owners, but there are a few around if you have any questions about local pet supplies and dog parks.

title: . Checking the Apartment for Anything Damaged

title: . Checking the Apartment for Anything Damaged

title: . Checking the Apartment for Anything Damaged
dialogue_line: I'm glad to know that you think the apartment is so nice.

title: . Checking the Apartment for Anything Damaged
dialogue_line: It's absolutely incredible. I'll take it.

title: . Checking the Apartment for Anything Damaged
dialogue_line: What are your thoughts on the apartment?

title: . Checking the Apartment for Anything Damaged
dialogue_line: I think that it's absolutely gorgeous.

title: . Checking the Apartment for Anything Damaged

title: . Checking the Apartment for Anything Damaged

title: . Checking the Apartment for Anything Damaged

title: . Checking the Apartment for Anything Damaged

title: . Checking the Apartment for Anything Damaged
dialogue_line: It is. I love it.

title: . Asking a Friend to Help Move In

title: . Asking a Friend to Help Move In
dialogue_line: Everything's fine with me. How about you?

title: . Asking a Friend to Help Move In

title: . Asking a Friend to Help Move In
dialogue_line: Yeah, I remember.

title: . Asking a Friend to Help Move In
dialogue_line: Do you think you could help me move?

title: . Asking a Friend to Help Move In
dialogue_line: Sure, that shouldn't be a problem. When?

title: . Asking a Friend to Help Move In
dialogue_line: Are you busy this Saturday?

title: . Asking a Friend to Help Move In
dialogue_line: I don't think I have any plans.

title: . Asking a Friend to Help Move In
dialogue_line: Is 10 o'clock okay with you?

title: . Asking a Friend to Help Move In
dialogue_line: That'll be fine. I'll see you then.

title: . Asking a Friend to Help Move In
dialogue_line: What's going on?

title: . Asking a Friend to Help Move In
dialogue_line: Things are fine with me. What's going on with you?

title: . Asking a Friend to Help Move In
dialogue_line: Would you help me?

title: . Asking a Friend to Help Move In
dialogue_line: Help you with what?

title: . Asking a Friend to Help Move In
dialogue_line: You do know I'm getting ready to move, right?

title: . Asking a Friend to Help Move In
dialogue_line: I remember you telling me.

title: . Asking a Friend to Help Move In
dialogue_line: Do you mind helping me move in?

title: . Asking a Friend to Help Move In
dialogue_line: I can help you with that.

title: . Asking a Friend to Help Move In
dialogue_line: Is this Saturday okay for you?

title: . Asking a Friend to Help Move In
dialogue_line: I'm free this Saturday.

title: . Asking a Friend to Help Move In
dialogue_line: Can you come help me at 10:00?

title: . Asking a Friend to Help Move In
dialogue_line: That's perfect. I will see you on Saturday.

title: . Asking a Friend to Help Move In
dialogue_line: What are you doing?

title: . Asking a Friend to Help Move In
dialogue_line: Nothing much. What's up with you?

title: . Asking a Friend to Help Move In
dialogue_line: Actually, I was wondering if you could help me with something.

title: . Asking a Friend to Help Move In
dialogue_line: What would you like me to help you with?

title: . Asking a Friend to Help Move In
dialogue_line: You know I'm going to be moving in soon?

title: . Asking a Friend to Help Move In
dialogue_line: You told me already.

title: . Asking a Friend to Help Move In
dialogue_line: I was just wondering if you could help me move in.

title: . Asking a Friend to Help Move In
dialogue_line: I can help you with that.

title: . Asking a Friend to Help Move In
dialogue_line: Do you have plans on Saturday?

title: . Asking a Friend to Help Move In
dialogue_line: No, I don't think so.

title: . Asking a Friend to Help Move In
dialogue_line: How does 10 am sound to you?

title: . Asking a Friend to Help Move In
dialogue_line: Saturday at 10:00? I can do that.

title: . Calling a Moving Company
dialogue_line: How are you doing today?

title: . Calling a Moving Company
dialogue_line: Great. Thanks for asking.

title: . Calling a Moving Company
dialogue_line: Would you like our assistance with a move?

title: . Calling a Moving Company
dialogue_line: Yes, actually I would.

title: . Calling a Moving Company
dialogue_line: What would you like us to move for you?

title: . Calling a Moving Company
dialogue_line: I need you to move my furniture.

dialogue_line: Where will we be moving it to?

title: . Calling a Moving Company
dialogue_line: You'll be taking it to the house I just bought.

title: . Calling a Moving Company
dialogue_line: All right. I just need both addresses, and we will take care of the moving for you.

title: . Calling a Moving Company
dialogue_line: Excellent. Thank you very much.

dialogue_line: How are you?

title: . Calling a Moving Company
dialogue_line: I am doing well.

dialogue_line: Did you need us to move something for you?

dialogue_line: I need it moved from my apartment.

title: . Calling a Moving Company
dialogue_line: Where would you like us to move the furniture to?

title: . Calling a Moving Company

title: . Calling a Moving Company
dialogue_line: All I need is a little more information, and we'll take care of the rest.

title: . Calling a Moving Company
dialogue_line: Sounds great. I'm glad you could help me.

title: . Calling a Moving Company
dialogue_line: How are you doing?

title: . Calling a Moving Company
dialogue_line: I'm fine, thank you.

title: . Calling a Moving Company
dialogue_line: Did you need our help with a move?

title: . Calling a Moving Company
dialogue_line: Yes, I do need your help with a move.

dialogue_line: What can we move for you?

title: . Calling a Moving Company
dialogue_line: I need all my furniture moved.

title: . Calling a Moving Company
dialogue_line: Will we be picking the furniture up from an apartment or a house?

title: . Calling a Moving Company
dialogue_line: You'll be taking it from my old apartment.

title: . Calling a Moving Company
dialogue_line: Are we moving the furniture to a house or an apartment?

title: . Calling a Moving Company
dialogue_line: To my new house.

title: . Calling a Moving Company
dialogue_line: We can do the move for you, but first I'm going to need some more information.

title: . Calling a Moving Company
dialogue_line: Thanks a lot. I'll give you all the information you need.

title: . Calling the Water Company
dialogue_line: Is this the water company?

title: . Calling the Water Company
dialogue_line: This is the water company. May I help you?

title: . Calling the Water Company
dialogue_line: As a matter of fact, you can.

title: . Calling the Water Company

title: . Calling the Water Company

dialogue_line: Yes. Can I assist you with something?

title: . Calling the Water Company
dialogue_line: I certainly hope so.

title: . Calling the Water Company

title: . Calling the Water Company

dialogue_line: I'm moving in this Saturday.

title: . Calling the Water Company
dialogue_line: We can help you with that.

dialogue_line: Do I need to give you any information?

title: . Calling the Water Company
dialogue_line: You need to give me your full name, social, and the address of your new house.

title: . Calling the Water Company
dialogue_line: I need to speak with someone from the water company.

title: . Calling the Water Company
dialogue_line: Is there something that I can do for you?

title: . Calling the Water Company
dialogue_line: Actually, there is something I need help with.

title: . Calling the Water Company
dialogue_line: How may I assist you?

title: . Calling the Water Company
dialogue_line: I'm going to be moving in a few days.

title: . Calling the Water Company
dialogue_line: How can I assist you with your move?

title: . Calling the Water Company
dialogue_line: My water needs to be turned on.

title: . Calling the Water Company
dialogue_line: Okay, when exactly will you need this done?

title: . Calling the Water Company
dialogue_line: I need the water turned on no later than Saturday evening.

title: . Calling the Water Company
dialogue_line: I can have it turned on for you by then.

title: . Calling the Water Company
dialogue_line: What information do I need to give you to have that done?

title: . Calling the Water Company
dialogue_line: What I need is your social security number, full name, and your new address.

title: . Where to Put the Furniture
dialogue_line: Thank you for helping me move.

title: . Where to Put the Furniture
dialogue_line: Don't mention it. Where do you want all your furniture?

title: . Where to Put the Furniture
dialogue_line: Okay, I want you to put the sofa in the living room.

title: . Where to Put the Furniture
dialogue_line: Would you like me to put it anywhere special?

title: . Where to Put the Furniture
dialogue_line: No, up against the wall is just fine.

title: . Where to Put the Furniture
dialogue_line: Where would you like this table?

title: . Where to Put the Furniture
dialogue_line: That table should go in the dining room.

title: . Where to Put the Furniture
dialogue_line: Would you like me to put it anywhere in particular?

title: . Where to Put the Furniture
dialogue_line: You can place it right in the center of the room.

title: . Where to Put the Furniture
dialogue_line: How are things looking so far?

title: . Where to Put the Furniture
dialogue_line: I think the furniture looks nice in here.

title: . Where to Put the Furniture
dialogue_line: You're absolutely right.

title: . Where to Put the Furniture
dialogue_line: I appreciate all your help with this move.

title: . Where to Put the Furniture
dialogue_line: It's the least I could do. Tell me where to put your furniture.

title: . Where to Put the Furniture
dialogue_line: That sofa should go in the living room.

title: . Where to Put the Furniture

title: . Where to Put the Furniture

title: . Where to Put the Furniture

title: . Where to Put the Furniture
