title: . Where to Put the Furniture
dialogue_line: What do you think? How does it look in here so far?

title: . Where to Put the Furniture
dialogue_line: I love the way things are looking.

title: . Where to Put the Furniture
dialogue_line: That's exactly what I was thinking.

title: . Where to Put the Furniture
dialogue_line: I really am thankful for you helping me move.

title: . Where to Put the Furniture
dialogue_line: It's no problem. Just let me know where you want me to put everything.

title: . Where to Put the Furniture
dialogue_line: I would like you to put that sofa in the living room.

title: . Where to Put the Furniture
dialogue_line: Is there any particular place you want it?

title: . Where to Put the Furniture
dialogue_line: Set it against that far wall.

title: . Where to Put the Furniture
dialogue_line: What do you want me to do with this table?

title: . Where to Put the Furniture
dialogue_line: That's the dining-room table of course, silly.

title: . Where to Put the Furniture
dialogue_line: Where in the room do you want it?

title: . Where to Put the Furniture
dialogue_line: It would look best in the center of the room.

title: . Where to Put the Furniture
dialogue_line: Do you like where everything is so far?

title: . Where to Put the Furniture
dialogue_line: Everything looks great.

title: . Where to Put the Furniture
dialogue_line: Yeah, I agree.

title: . Greeting a Neighbor
dialogue_line: Hello, it's nice to meet you.

title: . Greeting a Neighbor
dialogue_line: It's great meeting you too.

title: . Greeting a Neighbor
dialogue_line: Did you just move in?

title: . Greeting a Neighbor
dialogue_line: I moved in this past weekend.

title: . Greeting a Neighbor
dialogue_line: I had no idea that house was sold.

title: . Greeting a Neighbor
dialogue_line: I had to buy. The first time I saw it, I fell in love.

title: . Greeting a Neighbor
dialogue_line: It is a beautiful house.

title: . Greeting a Neighbor
dialogue_line: Have you been living here long?

title: . Greeting a Neighbor
dialogue_line: About 20 years now.

title: . Greeting a Neighbor
dialogue_line: Wow! That's a long time.

title: . Greeting a Neighbor
dialogue_line: Hopefully we will be neighbors for a lot longer.

title: . Greeting a Neighbor
dialogue_line: I love this house too much to ever move.

title: . Greeting a Neighbor
dialogue_line: It is very nice meeting you.

title: . Greeting a Neighbor
dialogue_line: I'm happy to meet you also.

title: . Greeting a Neighbor
dialogue_line: When did you get moved in?

title: . Greeting a Neighbor
dialogue_line: Just this past weekend.

title: . Greeting a Neighbor
dialogue_line: I didn't even know the house got sold.

title: . Greeting a Neighbor
dialogue_line: I absolutely love this house, so I had to buy it.

title: . Greeting a Neighbor
dialogue_line: I understand, because the house is extraordinary.

title: . Greeting a Neighbor
dialogue_line: How many years have you been living in your house?

title: . Greeting a Neighbor
dialogue_line: I've been living here for over 20 years.

title: . Greeting a Neighbor
dialogue_line: Twenty years? That is a very long time.

title: . Greeting a Neighbor
dialogue_line: I hope that we remain neighbors for a while longer.

title: . Greeting a Neighbor
dialogue_line: I could never move out of this house.

title: . Greeting a Neighbor
dialogue_line: Hey, nice to meet you.

title: . Greeting a Neighbor
dialogue_line: It's nice to meet you too.

title: . Greeting a Neighbor
dialogue_line: When exactly did you move into the house?

title: . Greeting a Neighbor
dialogue_line: I finished moving in this last weekend.

title: . Greeting a Neighbor
dialogue_line: I didn't realize that the house was bought.

title: . Greeting a Neighbor
dialogue_line: Yeah, I saw the house and just fell in love with it.

title: . Greeting a Neighbor
dialogue_line: It was impossible to pass up.

title: . Greeting a Neighbor
dialogue_line: So, how long have you been living here?

title: . Greeting a Neighbor
dialogue_line: Twenty years and counting.

title: . Greeting a Neighbor
dialogue_line: That's great to hear.

title: . Greeting a Neighbor
dialogue_line: I sure hope that you stay here for that long.

title: . Greeting a Neighbor
dialogue_line: I'd be crazy to ever move out.

title: . Prohibited Parking
dialogue_line: Is there anything specific that I should know about where to park my car?

title: . Prohibited Parking
dialogue_line: You have an assigned place in the back of the building with your apartment number on it.

title: . Prohibited Parking
dialogue_line: Are there any other spots available to me?

title: . Prohibited Parking
dialogue_line: You will see several visitor and unmarked spots. These are available on a first-come basis.

title: . Prohibited Parking
dialogue_line: What if there is nothing else available?

title: . Prohibited Parking
dialogue_line: You can park on the street, but you have to pay attention to the rules.

title: . Prohibited Parking
dialogue_line: What are the rules?

title: . Prohibited Parking
dialogue_line: Most of the laws are posted on the signs, but you also cannot park anywhere on the street between two and six in the morning.

title: . Prohibited Parking
dialogue_line: Are the parking tickets expensive around here?

title: . Prohibited Parking
dialogue_line: Parking tickets are very expensive, and if you don't pay them they may tow your car away.

title: . Prohibited Parking
dialogue_line: What are the rules about where I should park?

title: . Prohibited Parking
dialogue_line: Your assigned space is in the back where I marked it on the map.

title: . Prohibited Parking
dialogue_line: Can I park anywhere else in the parking lot?

title: . Prohibited Parking
dialogue_line: There are a few spots back there for visitors. They are unassigned.

title: . Prohibited Parking
dialogue_line: Where can my guests park if all of those spots are gone?

title: . Prohibited Parking
dialogue_line: You can park on the street, but you can get ticketed for failing to follow the rules.

title: . Prohibited Parking
dialogue_line: How will I know what the rules are?

title: . Prohibited Parking
dialogue_line: Just pay attention to street cleaning days and limits on the hours you can park out there.

title: . Prohibited Parking
dialogue_line: Are parking citations costly?

title: . Prohibited Parking
dialogue_line: Yes, parking tickets can be extremely expensive.

title: . Prohibited Parking
dialogue_line: Where can I park my car?

title: . Prohibited Parking
dialogue_line: You have one assigned place right beside your own apartment.

title: . Prohibited Parking
dialogue_line: Are there any other open spots available in the parking lot?

title: . Prohibited Parking
dialogue_line: Your guests can park in a visitor or unmarked spot if one is available.

title: . Prohibited Parking
dialogue_line: Is there any place else to park if the spots are all gone?

title: . Prohibited Parking
dialogue_line: There is always street parking, but you must obey the laws about parking out there.

title: . Prohibited Parking
dialogue_line: Do they post the rules anywhere?

title: . Prohibited Parking
dialogue_line: The rules for parking are all clearly posted. Just follow them and you'll be OK.

title: . Prohibited Parking
dialogue_line: Do you have to pay a large fine for a parking ticket?

title: . Prohibited Parking
dialogue_line: You don't want to get a parking ticket. You have better things to spend your money on!

title: . Trash and Recycling
dialogue_line: Can you tell me where we are supposed to take our trash?

title: . Trash and Recycling
dialogue_line: Put it in the dumpster next to that stairway.

title: . Trash and Recycling
dialogue_line: What day do they pick the trash up?

title: . Trash and Recycling
dialogue_line: They empty the trash every Wednesday.

title: . Trash and Recycling
dialogue_line: Are we supposed to mix our recyclables in, or sort them?

title: . Trash and Recycling
dialogue_line: We are supposed to sort our recyclables.

title: . Trash and Recycling
dialogue_line: Is there a special container for recyclables?

title: . Trash and Recycling
dialogue_line: You should have a blue container in your kitchen. Empty that into the blue bin downstairs.

title: . Trash and Recycling
dialogue_line: What about plant material?

title: . Trash and Recycling
dialogue_line: Anything that can be composted goes into the bin with the green lid.

title: . Trash and Recycling
dialogue_line: I need a little help about where to dump my trash bags.

title: . Trash and Recycling
dialogue_line: Put them in the parking lot dumpster near the parking spaces.

title: . Trash and Recycling
dialogue_line: When is trash day?

title: . Trash and Recycling
dialogue_line: Trash day is Wednesday.

title: . Trash and Recycling
dialogue_line: Do they sort our recyclables, or do we do it?

title: . Trash and Recycling
dialogue_line: They expect us to take out our recyclables.

title: . Trash and Recycling
dialogue_line: Do we put our recyclables in a separate bin?

title: . Trash and Recycling
dialogue_line: Just take all of your recyclables to the blue bin downstairs.

title: . Trash and Recycling
dialogue_line: Is there a special bin for yard waste?

title: . Trash and Recycling
dialogue_line: All material to be composted goes into the bin with the green lid.

title: . Trash and Recycling
dialogue_line: Where are the dumpsters located in this building?

title: . Trash and Recycling
dialogue_line: Right now they are in the front of the building for pickup.

title: . Trash and Recycling
dialogue_line: When do the dumpsters get emptied?

title: . Trash and Recycling
dialogue_line: They usually get emptied Wednesday, unless there is a holiday in there somewhere.

title: . Trash and Recycling
dialogue_line: Are there separate containers for recyclables?

title: . Trash and Recycling
dialogue_line: We don't mix our recyclables with regular trash.

title: . Trash and Recycling
dialogue_line: What does the container for recyclables look like?

title: . Trash and Recycling
dialogue_line: All of your recyclables go into the blue bin.

title: . Trash and Recycling
dialogue_line: How about composting materials?

title: . Trash and Recycling
dialogue_line: We have a great composting program that uses the bin with the green lid.

title: . Laundry Room Rules and Hours
dialogue_line: So where are the laundry rooms located?

title: . Laundry Room Rules and Hours
dialogue_line: There is a laundry room located at the end of each hallway.

title: . Laundry Room Rules and Hours
dialogue_line: Can I use them at any time?

title: . Laundry Room Rules and Hours
dialogue_line: All laundry rooms are locked at eleven at night and re-open at seven in the morning.

title: . Laundry Room Rules and Hours
dialogue_line: Do they use change?

title: . Laundry Room Rules and Hours
dialogue_line: You should bring quarters for the washer and dryer.

title: . Laundry Room Rules and Hours
dialogue_line: Can you buy detergent in the laundry room?

title: . Laundry Room Rules and Hours
dialogue_line: Yes, there are detergent dispensers in the laundry room.

title: . Laundry Room Rules and Hours
dialogue_line: Are there rules in the laundry room?

title: . Laundry Room Rules and Hours
dialogue_line: Yes, if you leave your laundry in the machine unattended, people can just take it out and put it on a table so they may use the machine.

title: . Laundry Room Rules and Hours
dialogue_line: Does every floor have a laundry room?

title: . Laundry Room Rules and Hours
dialogue_line: Each hallway has a laundry room located near the stairway.

title: . Laundry Room Rules and Hours
dialogue_line: Are they open for use around the clock?

title: . Laundry Room Rules and Hours
dialogue_line: The laundry room near the recreation center is open twenty-four hours a day. The rest have posted hours.

title: . Laundry Room Rules and Hours
dialogue_line: Do I need to bring coins with me?

title: . Laundry Room Rules and Hours
dialogue_line: The washers and dryers require correct change, but there is a change machine in the laundry room.

title: . Laundry Room Rules and Hours
dialogue_line: Are there any detergent dispensers in the laundry room?

title: . Laundry Room Rules and Hours
dialogue_line: Yes, but they are expensive.

title: . Laundry Room Rules and Hours
dialogue_line: Are there any specific rules about doing laundry?

title: . Laundry Room Rules and Hours
dialogue_line: Yes, you are only supposed to tie up three machines at a time for your own use, so that the other machines are available for other tenants.

title: . Laundry Room Rules and Hours
dialogue_line: Do you have a lot of laundry rooms?

title: . Laundry Room Rules and Hours
dialogue_line: We have many laundry rooms. Your closest one is next to the pool.

title: . Laundry Room Rules and Hours
dialogue_line: Are there any certain hours we can use them.

title: . Laundry Room Rules and Hours
dialogue_line: All of the laundry rooms can be used whenever you need to use them.

title: . Laundry Room Rules and Hours
dialogue_line: What type of payment do they require?

title: . Laundry Room Rules and Hours
dialogue_line: If you bring dollar bills, you will be in great shape.

title: . Laundry Room Rules and Hours
dialogue_line: Is there any place to buy laundry detergent in the laundry room.

title: . Laundry Room Rules and Hours
dialogue_line: There are detergent dispensers in the laundry room but it is cheaper to buy it across the street at the market.

title: . Laundry Room Rules and Hours
dialogue_line: Is there anything I should know about the rules of the laundry room?

title: . Laundry Room Rules and Hours
dialogue_line: Yes, we ask that you please clean up after yourself as in wiping up spilled detergent or cleaning out lint screens.

title: . Neighbors and Help
dialogue_line: Hi, I am your new neighbor and was wondering if I could ask you a question or two.

title: . Neighbors and Help
dialogue_line: Hi! I would be happy to answer any questions you might have.

title: . Neighbors and Help
dialogue_line: Everyone here seems very friendly.

title: . Neighbors and Help
dialogue_line: Yes, many of us have lived here a long time and know each other well.

title: . Neighbors and Help
dialogue_line: How long have you lived here?

title: . Neighbors and Help
dialogue_line: I have lived in this building for ten years.

title: . Neighbors and Help
dialogue_line: When I get settled, would you consider giving me a list of places you use, like cleaners and grocery stores?

title: . Neighbors and Help
dialogue_line: I can help you with that. Would you like to go to the local farmer's market with me this morning?

title: . Neighbors and Help
dialogue_line: That would be great!

title: . Neighbors and Help
dialogue_line: Fine. I'll knock on your door around ten o'clock then.

title: . Neighbors and Help
dialogue_line: Hi, I am your new neighbor and would like to ask you about a few things.

title: . Neighbors and Help
dialogue_line: Hi, nice to meet you. Sure, ask me anything you need to know.

title: . Neighbors and Help
dialogue_line: So far, everyone that I've met seems so helpful.

title: . Neighbors and Help
dialogue_line: We all seem to get along pretty well.

title: . Neighbors and Help
dialogue_line: Have you lived here a very long time?

title: . Neighbors and Help
dialogue_line: I first moved here ten years ago.

title: . Neighbors and Help
dialogue_line: I am having trouble figuring out the best places to shop and such.

title: . Neighbors and Help
dialogue_line: I am a pretty good source for all of that information. You could go to the local farmer's market with me today if you wish.

title: . Neighbors and Help
dialogue_line: I would love to go with you!

title: . Neighbors and Help
dialogue_line: I'll be leaving around ten o'clock. I'll pick you up.

title: . Neighbors and Help
dialogue_line: Hi, I just moved in next door and have a few questions.

title: . Neighbors and Help
dialogue_line: Hello, and welcome to our building. I would be happy to help you with your questions.

title: . Neighbors and Help
dialogue_line: You all seem like a very pleasant group of tenants.

title: . Neighbors and Help
dialogue_line: We all try and help each other out when we can.

title: . Neighbors and Help
dialogue_line: When did you first move here?

title: . Neighbors and Help
dialogue_line: I have lived here for quite awhile. Ten years!

title: . Neighbors and Help
dialogue_line: I am not from around here, and I don't know where basic services are.

title: . Neighbors and Help
dialogue_line: I could help you find everything you need. Would you be interested in going to the local farmer's market with me?

title: . Neighbors and Help
dialogue_line: What a great opportunity to get oriented to the neighborhood!

title: . Neighbors and Help
dialogue_line: It starts around ten. Just meet me in the parking lot around 9:45, and I'll take you there.

title: . Visitors and Extra Tenants
dialogue_line: I have a question about extra people living with me in my apartment.

title: . Visitors and Extra Tenants
dialogue_line: You may have one roommate, but they need to have an approved application on file with us.

title: . Visitors and Extra Tenants
dialogue_line: What about overnight guests?

title: . Visitors and Extra Tenants
dialogue_line: An occasional overnight guest is not a problem.

title: . Visitors and Extra Tenants
dialogue_line: How many days could I have an extra guest?

title: . Visitors and Extra Tenants
dialogue_line: We usually consider any guest who stays over a week to be a possible problem.

title: . Visitors and Extra Tenants
dialogue_line: Will I have to pay extra for roommates or visitors?

title: . Visitors and Extra Tenants
dialogue_line: If you are given permission for extended visitors, you may be charged extra.

title: . Visitors and Extra Tenants
dialogue_line: Can my guests use the pool and laundry room?

title: . Visitors and Extra Tenants
dialogue_line: Your guests may use the pool and laundry facilities, but you must be with them at all times.

title: . Visitors and Extra Tenants
dialogue_line: Can I have roommates in my apartment?

title: . Visitors and Extra Tenants
dialogue_line: You may have one roommate, but they need to pass a credit check.

title: . Visitors and Extra Tenants
dialogue_line: Can overnight guests stay with me?

title: . Visitors and Extra Tenants
dialogue_line: You may have an overnight guest, but they may not stay for an extended period of time.

title: . Visitors and Extra Tenants
dialogue_line: How long could my friends and family stay with me without it being a problem?

title: . Visitors and Extra Tenants
dialogue_line: No one can stay with you for over a week without special permission.

title: . Visitors and Extra Tenants
dialogue_line: Will I owe extra money for more people staying in my apartment?

title: . Visitors and Extra Tenants
dialogue_line: You are not charged extra for a roommate or short-term guests.

title: . Visitors and Extra Tenants
dialogue_line: If I have visitors, may they use the pool?

title: . Visitors and Extra Tenants
dialogue_line: Your short-term guests may use the facilities with you present.

title: . Visitors and Extra Tenants
dialogue_line: What about roommates in my apartment?

title: . Visitors and Extra Tenants
dialogue_line: You may have one roommate, but their name must appear on the lease.

title: . Visitors and Extra Tenants
dialogue_line: Can I have someone visit me for a short period of time?

title: . Visitors and Extra Tenants
dialogue_line: We understand that a family member or friend may visit from time to time. Just make sure that they are not moving in with you.

title: . Visitors and Extra Tenants
dialogue_line: How many days could a friend stay without it being a problem?

title: . Visitors and Extra Tenants
dialogue_line: You cannot have an extra tenant for over a week, unless we give you special permission.

title: . Visitors and Extra Tenants
dialogue_line: Will I be charged extra money for having roommates or visitors?

title: . Visitors and Extra Tenants
dialogue_line: A roommate or a short-term guest would not cost you anything extra.

title: . Visitors and Extra Tenants
dialogue_line: Can my family and friends use the facilities when they visit me?

title: . Visitors and Extra Tenants
dialogue_line: Your guests may not use the facilities unless you are with them.

title: . Locked Out
dialogue_line: I need your help with something.

title: . Locked Out
dialogue_line: What's wrong?

title: . Locked Out
dialogue_line: I somehow locked myself out of my apartment.

title: . Locked Out
dialogue_line: How did you lock yourself out?

title: . Locked Out
dialogue_line: I'm really not sure.

title: . Locked Out
dialogue_line: Where's your key?

title: . Locked Out
dialogue_line: I locked it inside the house.

title: . Locked Out
dialogue_line: I do have a spare key to your door.

title: . Locked Out
dialogue_line: May I use it, please?

title: . Locked Out
dialogue_line: Okay, but once you get in, bring my key right back.

title: . Locked Out
dialogue_line: I will, and thank you so much.

title: . Locked Out
dialogue_line: Make sure to keep your key with you next time.

title: . Locked Out
dialogue_line: Could you help me?

title: . Locked Out
dialogue_line: What happened?

title: . Locked Out
dialogue_line: I'm locked out of my apartment.

title: . Locked Out
dialogue_line: What did you do to lock yourself out?

title: . Locked Out
dialogue_line: I have no idea.

title: . Locked Out
dialogue_line: You don't have your key?

title: . Locked Out
dialogue_line: It's inside of my apartment.

title: . Locked Out
dialogue_line: I have a key to your apartment.

title: . Locked Out
dialogue_line: Could I borrow it for just a second?

title: . Locked Out
dialogue_line: All right. Bring it back when you're done.

title: . Locked Out
dialogue_line: Great, thanks a lot.

title: . Locked Out
dialogue_line: I hope you'll be more careful next time.

title: . Locked Out
dialogue_line: I really need you to do something for me.

title: . Locked Out
dialogue_line: What's the problem?

title: . Locked Out
dialogue_line: I can't get into my apartment.

title: . Locked Out
dialogue_line: How'd you manage that?

title: . Locked Out
dialogue_line: I don't know.

title: . Locked Out
dialogue_line: Do you know where your key is?

title: . Locked Out
dialogue_line: It's inside my apartment.

title: . Locked Out
dialogue_line: I have a spare key.

title: . Locked Out
dialogue_line: Will you let me use it to get inside?

title: . Locked Out
dialogue_line: Sure. Remember to give it back when you're finished.

title: . Locked Out
dialogue_line: I appreciate this.

title: . Locked Out
dialogue_line: No problem. Try not to lock yourself out again.

title: . Noisy Neighbors
dialogue_line: Those neighbors of mine are so noisy!

title: . Noisy Neighbors
dialogue_line: Yes, I can hear them. What is that pounding sound?

title: . Noisy Neighbors
dialogue_line: I think that they are hammering nails to hang pictures.

title: . Noisy Neighbors
dialogue_line: How often do you hear them making noise?

title: . Noisy Neighbors
dialogue_line: They play their music really loud, and I can hear it.

title: . Noisy Neighbors
dialogue_line: Have you spoken to them about the noise problem?

title: . Noisy Neighbors
dialogue_line: No, I haven't spoken with them about it.

title: . Noisy Neighbors
dialogue_line: What else do you hear that bothers you?

title: . Noisy Neighbors
dialogue_line: I hear a lot of plumbing sounds, like the toilet flushing and the dishwasher running.

title: . Noisy Neighbors
dialogue_line: If this continues, I would speak to the manager.

title: . Noisy Neighbors
dialogue_line: I am really losing patience with my noisy neighbors!

title: . Noisy Neighbors
dialogue_line: They are noisy, all right. What do you think is making that sound?

title: . Noisy Neighbors
dialogue_line: I think they are hammering some new flooring down in their living room.

title: . Noisy Neighbors
dialogue_line: Do they usually make a lot of noise?

title: . Noisy Neighbors
dialogue_line: I can hear music through the walls all the time.

title: . Noisy Neighbors
dialogue_line: Do you ever tell your neighbors about the noise problem?

title: . Noisy Neighbors
dialogue_line: No, I don't know them very well.

title: . Noisy Neighbors
dialogue_line: Are there any other sounds that you can hear?

title: . Noisy Neighbors
dialogue_line: I hear them talking loudly a lot, and their television is really loud.

title: . Noisy Neighbors
dialogue_line: I would talk to the manager if the noise continues.

title: . Noisy Neighbors
dialogue_line: Those noisy neighbors of mine are driving me crazy!

title: . Noisy Neighbors
dialogue_line: Yes, they are very noisy. What do you think they are doing in there?

title: . Noisy Neighbors
dialogue_line: Someone said they are installing some countertops in their kitchen.

title: . Noisy Neighbors
dialogue_line: Is there usually a lot of noise coming from over there?

title: . Noisy Neighbors
dialogue_line: Whenever they play music, I can hear it coming through the walls.

title: . Noisy Neighbors
dialogue_line: Do your neighbors know that you can hear them?

title: . Noisy Neighbors
dialogue_line: I mentioned it to them once.

title: . Noisy Neighbors
dialogue_line: Are you ever disturbed by other sounds?

title: . Noisy Neighbors
dialogue_line: They have a lot of noisy parties that get out of hand.

title: . Noisy Neighbors
dialogue_line: I think that you should talk with the manager to see if he can help you.

title: . Asking the Neighbor Not to Make Noise
dialogue_line: I was meaning to talk to you about something.

title: . Asking the Neighbor Not to Make Noise
dialogue_line: What's going on?

title: . Asking the Neighbor Not to Make Noise
dialogue_line: Were you having a party in your apartment last Friday?

title: . Asking the Neighbor Not to Make Noise
dialogue_line: Yes, I had a little party.

title: . Asking the Neighbor Not to Make Noise
dialogue_line: It was very loud.

title: . Asking the Neighbor Not to Make Noise
dialogue_line: I didn't intend on being too loud.

title: . Asking the Neighbor Not to Make Noise
dialogue_line: It's fine if you want to have people over, but I couldn't sleep with the noise.

title: . Asking the Neighbor Not to Make Noise
dialogue_line: I really do apologize for all the noise.

title: . Asking the Neighbor Not to Make Noise
dialogue_line: Next time, do you think that you could keep it down?

title: . Asking the Neighbor Not to Make Noise
dialogue_line: Will do.

title: . Asking the Neighbor Not to Make Noise
dialogue_line: Thank you very much.

title: . Asking the Neighbor Not to Make Noise
dialogue_line: Okay, and once again I'm sorry for keeping you up.

title: . Asking the Neighbor Not to Make Noise
dialogue_line: May I talk to you?

title: . Asking the Neighbor Not to Make Noise
dialogue_line: What's up?

title: . Asking the Neighbor Not to Make Noise
dialogue_line: Did you have a party Friday?

title: . Asking the Neighbor Not to Make Noise
dialogue_line: I did have a few people over.

title: . Asking the Neighbor Not to Make Noise
dialogue_line: It was way too loud.

title: . Asking the Neighbor Not to Make Noise
dialogue_line: I didn't realize I was making a lot of noise.

title: . Asking the Neighbor Not to Make Noise
dialogue_line: I couldn't sleep with how loud it was.

title: . Asking the Neighbor Not to Make Noise
dialogue_line: I'm sorry for being so loud.

title: . Asking the Neighbor Not to Make Noise
dialogue_line: Could you try not to be so loud the next time?

title: . Asking the Neighbor Not to Make Noise
dialogue_line: I'll make sure to do that for you.

title: . Asking the Neighbor Not to Make Noise
dialogue_line: Thanks, I would appreciate it.

title: . Asking the Neighbor Not to Make Noise
dialogue_line: Let me apologize again for the noise.

title: . Asking the Neighbor Not to Make Noise
dialogue_line: We really need to talk.

title: . Asking the Neighbor Not to Make Noise
dialogue_line: What do we need to talk about?

title: . Asking the Neighbor Not to Make Noise
dialogue_line: Was there a party going on in your apartment on Friday?

title: . Asking the Neighbor Not to Make Noise
dialogue_line: I did throw a party on Friday.

title: . Asking the Neighbor Not to Make Noise
dialogue_line: You were quite loud.

title: . Asking the Neighbor Not to Make Noise
dialogue_line: I really didn't mean to be loud.

title: . Asking the Neighbor Not to Make Noise
dialogue_line: I don't mind if you have company, of course, but the noise made it difficult for me to sleep.

title: . Asking the Neighbor Not to Make Noise
dialogue_line: I am sorry if my party kept you up.

title: . Asking the Neighbor Not to Make Noise
dialogue_line: It's all right, but next time could you try to keep it down?

title: . Asking the Neighbor Not to Make Noise
dialogue_line: I will try to.

title: . Asking the Neighbor Not to Make Noise
dialogue_line: Thank you, because that would be great.

title: . Asking the Neighbor Not to Make Noise
dialogue_line: You're welcome, and I apologize for the inconvenience.

title: . Poor Area Lighting
dialogue_line: I would like to speak with the manager about some safety concerns.

title: . Poor Area Lighting
dialogue_line: This is the manager. What can I do for you?

title: . Poor Area Lighting
dialogue_line: I was parking my car last night in the garage area, and it was very dark out there.

title: . Poor Area Lighting
dialogue_line: Is this the first time you noticed this?

title: . Poor Area Lighting
dialogue_line: The lighting has always been bad, but it seems to be getting worse.

title: . Poor Area Lighting
dialogue_line: We are trying to save electricity, so we put in new energy-saving bulbs. Maybe that was the problem.

title: . Poor Area Lighting
dialogue_line: Whatever the problem is, it needs to be fixed.

title: . Poor Area Lighting
dialogue_line: Why do you feel this is so unsafe?

title: . Poor Area Lighting
dialogue_line: It is unsafe because it allows people to hide in there and jump people and rob them.

title: . Poor Area Lighting
dialogue_line: I will go out there after dark and check it out. Thanks for bringing it to my attention.

title: . Poor Area Lighting
dialogue_line: Could I speak with the property manager about a problem I had last night?

title: . Poor Area Lighting
dialogue_line: I am the property manager. What was the problem that you experienced?

title: . Poor Area Lighting
dialogue_line: Have you noticed that the lighting in the garage area is almost nonexistent?

title: . Poor Area Lighting
dialogue_line: Has this been a problem for you in the past?

title: . Poor Area Lighting
dialogue_line: I just moved here recently, so I really don't know how long it has been like this.

title: . Poor Area Lighting
dialogue_line: Maybe some of the bulbs were burned out.

title: . Poor Area Lighting
dialogue_line: All I know it that it feels very unsafe out there at night.

title: . Poor Area Lighting
dialogue_line: Do you really think it is that unsafe to have a few dark patches here and there?

title: . Poor Area Lighting
dialogue_line: It is unsafe because a rapist could hide in there and attack women.

title: . Poor Area Lighting
dialogue_line: I will have the night manager look into it. Thank you for telling me about it.

title: . Poor Area Lighting
dialogue_line: I had a problem last night in the parking lot and would like to speak to the manager.

title: . Poor Area Lighting
dialogue_line: This is the manager speaking. How can I help you?

title: . Poor Area Lighting
dialogue_line: I got out of my car in the parking area, and the area was not lit very well.

title: . Poor Area Lighting
dialogue_line: How long have you noticed this problem?

title: . Poor Area Lighting
dialogue_line: This is the first time that I noticed it.

title: . Poor Area Lighting
dialogue_line: Maybe you were just parking in a shadowy area.

title: . Poor Area Lighting
dialogue_line: Regardless of the cause, the problem needs to be taken care of.

title: . Poor Area Lighting
dialogue_line: I am not sure that having a few shadows here and there is such a problem.

title: . Poor Area Lighting
dialogue_line: It is unsafe because people can't see where they are walking and could have an accident.

title: . Poor Area Lighting
dialogue_line: When it gets dark tonight, I will take a look. I appreciate your concern.

title: . Recreation Area Problems
dialogue_line: Could I speak with the manager about some problems in the pool area?

title: . Recreation Area Problems
dialogue_line: Sure, what seems to be the problem?

title: . Recreation Area Problems
dialogue_line: My apartment is next to the pool, and there seems to be some really late-night partying going on out there.

title: . Recreation Area Problems
dialogue_line: The hours for the pool are eight in the morning to ten at night. Is the noise that you are hearing later than that?

title: . Recreation Area Problems
dialogue_line: Yes, sometimes people are in the Jacuzzi at midnight!

title: . Recreation Area Problems
dialogue_line: Did you call the night manager?

title: . Recreation Area Problems
dialogue_line: No, I didn't really know if anyone was around that late.

title: . Recreation Area Problems
dialogue_line: I am going to give you my number to call if it happens again.

title: . Recreation Area Problems
dialogue_line: Thank you for your help.

title: . Recreation Area Problems
dialogue_line: You are welcome. I will be sending letters to tenants to remind them of the rules.

title: . Recreation Area Problems
dialogue_line: I had some concerns about the pool and Jacuzzi area and would like to speak with someone.

title: . Recreation Area Problems
dialogue_line: I can help you with that. What are you having problems with?

title: . Recreation Area Problems
dialogue_line: I live right next to the pool, and late at night it is really noisy out there!

title: . Recreation Area Problems
dialogue_line: There is not supposed to be anyone in the pool area after ten o'clock at night. Are you noticing people out there any later?

title: . Recreation Area Problems
dialogue_line: I've heard people out there at one in the morning!

title: . Recreation Area Problems
dialogue_line: Did you contact anyone?

title: . Recreation Area Problems
dialogue_line: No, I just waited until now to tell you.

title: . Recreation Area Problems
dialogue_line: I will give you the direct line to call to report this when it is happening

title: . Recreation Area Problems
dialogue_line: I appreciate your help.

title: . Recreation Area Problems
dialogue_line: You are welcome. Evidently a few people need some reminders.

title: . Recreation Area Problems
dialogue_line: I was wondering if I could speak to someone about some concerns of mine with the pool area.

title: . Recreation Area Problems
dialogue_line: I can answer any questions that you might have. What are your concerns?

title: . Recreation Area Problems
dialogue_line: I enjoy living next to the pool, but it gets really loud out there at night.

title: . Recreation Area Problems
dialogue_line: The pool is supposed to be closed after 10:00. Are you saying that people are partying later than that?

title: . Recreation Area Problems
dialogue_line: There have been parties out there that haven't ended until two in the morning!

title: . Recreation Area Problems
dialogue_line: Did you call the front desk?

title: . Recreation Area Problems
dialogue_line: Yes, I tried, but no one picked up.

title: . Recreation Area Problems
dialogue_line: You can have my personal line to call if this happens again. Do not hesitate to call.

title: . Recreation Area Problems
dialogue_line: Thank you for taking care of this for me.

title: . Recreation Area Problems
dialogue_line: Thank you for bringing it to my attention. We will send reminder memos to help people remember what the rules are.

title: . Fumigation and Relocation for a Night
dialogue_line: Hi. I wanted to talk to you about the letter we received about fumigating the building.

title: . Fumigation and Relocation for a Night
dialogue_line: Yes, I would be happy to help you with that. What do you need to know?

title: . Fumigation and Relocation for a Night
dialogue_line: Do we have to leave our apartment on the day they do it?

title: . Fumigation and Relocation for a Night
dialogue_line: You will have to vacate your apartment for a 36-hour period.

title: . Fumigation and Relocation for a Night
dialogue_line: Will you be paying for our hotel room?

title: . Fumigation and Relocation for a Night
dialogue_line: Yes, I will be paying for all the rooms.

title: . Fumigation and Relocation for a Night
dialogue_line: What if I want to stay at a different hotel?

title: . Fumigation and Relocation for a Night
dialogue_line: I received a group rate at this hotel, but I will pay the equivalent price if you bring me a receipt.

title: . Fumigation and Relocation for a Night
dialogue_line: What if I stay with friends?

title: . Fumigation and Relocation for a Night
dialogue_line: If you do not stay in a hotel, I will give you fifty dollars for the inconvenience.

title: . Fumigation and Relocation for a Night
dialogue_line: Is there anything else we have to do?

title: . Fumigation and Relocation for a Night
dialogue_line: Yes, your letter also mentions what food you need to remove.

title: . Fumigation and Relocation for a Night
dialogue_line: Good morning. I had some questions about the fumigation letter we received.

title: . Fumigation and Relocation for a Night
dialogue_line: I am here to answer your questions. What do you need clarification on?

title: . Fumigation and Relocation for a Night
dialogue_line: Will I have to find somewhere else to go on that day?

title: . Fumigation and Relocation for a Night
dialogue_line: You cannot stay in your apartment for 36 hours while it is being fumigated.

title: . Fumigation and Relocation for a Night
dialogue_line: Are you going to pay us for the hotel room you mentioned in your letter?

title: . Fumigation and Relocation for a Night
dialogue_line: The rooms have already been reserved and paid for.

title: . Fumigation and Relocation for a Night
dialogue_line: If I don't like that hotel, can I stay somewhere else?

title: . Fumigation and Relocation for a Night
dialogue_line: I got a great deal at this hotel, but you can choose a room of equal or less value at another hotel.

title: . Fumigation and Relocation for a Night
dialogue_line: I have my pets to think of and I'd rather stay with my parents.

title: . Fumigation and Relocation for a Night
dialogue_line: You will be given fifty dollars for the night.

title: . Fumigation and Relocation for a Night
dialogue_line: What else do we need to think about?

title: . Fumigation and Relocation for a Night
dialogue_line: The letter also tells you about storing and removing your food.

title: . Fumigation and Relocation for a Night
dialogue_line: Hello. Could you help me understand a few things about the fumigation letter?

title: . Fumigation and Relocation for a Night
dialogue_line: It would be my pleasure to help you. What is your question?

title: . Fumigation and Relocation for a Night
dialogue_line: Can I still stay in my apartment while they are doing this?

title: . Fumigation and Relocation for a Night
dialogue_line: You and your pets will have to leave your apartment for 36 hours.

title: . Fumigation and Relocation for a Night
dialogue_line: Are you putting us up in the hotel you mentioned, or do we have to pay for it?

title: . Fumigation and Relocation for a Night
dialogue_line: We will be paying for the rooms.

title: . Fumigation and Relocation for a Night

title: 41. Calling the Police about a Burglary

title: 5. Detecting a Problem with the Car

title: 5. Detecting a Problem with the Car

dialogue_line: I just wasn't sure what to look for.

title: 5. Detecting a Problem with the Car
dialogue_line: The first thing you do is look for any signs of wear both inside and out. We will also look at the body for signs of major repair.

title: 5. Detecting a Problem with the Car
dialogue_line: Someone told me that I could go online and see if the car is listed as having been in a major accident.

title: 5. Detecting a Problem with the Car
dialogue_line: Yes, that's right. Next, we will turn on the engine and I will check under the hood to look at the hoses and belts.

title: 5. Detecting a Problem with the Car
dialogue_line: Should we take the car for a drive?

dialogue_line: Yes, but before we pull away, let's check to make sure that the radio, turn signals, lights, and seats all work properly.

title: 5. Detecting a Problem with the Car
dialogue_line: As I am driving what should I be checking?

title: 5. Detecting a Problem with the Car
dialogue_line: You want to make sure that the brakes don't pull to one side and that the car has good alignment and acceleration.

title: 5. Detecting a Problem with the Car
dialogue_line: Thanks for your help.

dialogue_line: You are welcome. Enjoy driving your car!

title: 5. Detecting a Problem with the Car
dialogue_line: I don't know much about cars.

dialogue_line: We need to look inside and outside for signs of an accident or major damage. Also, we need to look for wear on the tires.

title: 5. Detecting a Problem with the Car
dialogue_line: If I go online I can also check to see if the car has been involved in a major accident.

title: 5. Detecting a Problem with the Car

title: 5. Detecting a Problem with the Car
dialogue_line: Will you take a drive with me to check handling?

title: 5. Detecting a Problem with the Car
dialogue_line: A test drive would be good. But first let's make sure that the turn signals, radio, lights, and seats work properly.

dialogue_line: I appreciate you helping me figure out what to look for.

title: 5. Detecting a Problem with the Car
dialogue_line: My pleasure. This seems to be a solid car and a good choice for you.

title: 5. Detecting a Problem with the Car
dialogue_line: I want to buy this used car, but I need help figuring out if there are any problems with it.

title: 5. Detecting a Problem with the Car
dialogue_line: I can help you with that. Drive the car over by the garage and we'll check it out.

title: 5. Detecting a Problem with the Car
dialogue_line: I know some things to look for, but I know there are other special things to look for.

title: 5. Detecting a Problem with the Car
dialogue_line: Always start with looking for signs of major damage that may have been repaired and also check tire wear.

title: 5. Detecting a Problem with the Car
dialogue_line: If the car has been in a major accident, that should have been recorded online.

title: 5. Detecting a Problem with the Car
dialogue_line: Right. All major accidents should have been recorded. Next start the car up, pop the hood, and we'll take a look at the belts and hoses.

title: 5. Detecting a Problem with the Car
dialogue_line: I would like for you to take a test drive with me.

title: 5. Detecting a Problem with the Car
dialogue_line: We'll do that in a minute, but first we should check that the radio, turn signals, and all of the lights work properly.

title: 5. Detecting a Problem with the Car
dialogue_line: As we drive, what am I checking for?

title: 5. Detecting a Problem with the Car
dialogue_line: You want to make sure that the alignment is good, that the engine accelerates smoothly, and that the car can safely brake to a stop.

title: 5. Detecting a Problem with the Car
dialogue_line: I like knowing what to look for when buying a used car and appreciate the help.

title: 5. Detecting a Problem with the Car
dialogue_line: This car is in good shape and should give you no major problems. Enjoy it!

title: 6. How to Pay for the Used Car
dialogue_line: I am buying a used car and don't know much about financing it.

title: 6. How to Pay for the Used Car
dialogue_line: I can help you. Do you have a down payment?

title: 6. How to Pay for the Used Car
dialogue_line: Yes, I have saved up three thousand dollars for a down payment.

title: 6. How to Pay for the Used Car
dialogue_line: Good, because you will not be able to get a loan without putting some money down on the car.

title: 6. How to Pay for the Used Car
dialogue_line: I don't know where exactly to get a loan.

title: 6. How to Pay for the Used Car
dialogue_line: Other than friends or family, you can go to a bank, credit union, or use the dealer financing if you bought the car off a car lot.

title: 6. How to Pay for the Used Car
dialogue_line: What is the best choice for financing?

title: 6. How to Pay for the Used Car
dialogue_line: It depends. The worst financing deal is usually at the dealer, but they will oftentimes give you a loan when a bank turns you down.

title: 6. How to Pay for the Used Car
dialogue_line: What do I need to have with me when I apply for the loan?

title: 6. How to Pay for the Used Car
dialogue_line: You will need a recent pay stub and a copy of the pink slip for the car. Before the loan is complete, you will need to show proof of insurance. Good luck!

title: 6. How to Pay for the Used Car
dialogue_line: Can you help me learn about financing options for a used car?

title: 6. How to Pay for the Used Car
dialogue_line: I would love to help you with what I know. I am assuming that you have a down payment.

title: 6. How to Pay for the Used Car
dialogue_line: Yes, I already borrowed some money from my parents for the down payment.

title: 6. How to Pay for the Used Car
dialogue_line: That will work. A bank or finance company will not loan you money without a down payment.

title: 6. How to Pay for the Used Car
dialogue_line: I am not sure who will loan money to me.

title: 6. How to Pay for the Used Car
dialogue_line: You can apply for a loan at a bank, credit union, or approach the used car dealer who sold you the car. You might also try family and friends.

title: 6. How to Pay for the Used Car
dialogue_line: Who offers the best interest rate?

title: 6. How to Pay for the Used Car
dialogue_line: A credit union will usually give you the best interest rate, but the dealer will almost always give you some type of loan.

title: 6. How to Pay for the Used Car
dialogue_line: Do I need any documents when I apply for a car loan?

title: 6. How to Pay for the Used Car
dialogue_line: Be sure that you take a recent pay stub and a copy of the pink slip. You will have a few days to produce proof of insurance. Enjoy your new car!

title: 6. How to Pay for the Used Car
dialogue_line: I need help figuring out how to pay for a used car that I am thinking of buying.

title: 6. How to Pay for the Used Car
dialogue_line: I would be happy to help you. Have you saved up a down payment?

title: 6. How to Pay for the Used Car
dialogue_line: I will be getting money from selling my old car.

title: 6. How to Pay for the Used Car
dialogue_line: You really need that money so that a bank or finance company will loan you the rest of the money that you need.

title: 6. How to Pay for the Used Car
dialogue_line: Who gives loans out to people wanting to buy cars?

title: 6. How to Pay for the Used Car
dialogue_line: Usually people go to a bank, credit union, or, if they bought the car at a car lot, they might use the dealer finance company.

title: 6. How to Pay for the Used Car
dialogue_line: What is the best place to get financing?

title: 6. How to Pay for the Used Car
dialogue_line: The dealer will charge you a higher interest rate, but sometimes they are your only choice if you are just starting out.

title: 6. How to Pay for the Used Car
dialogue_line: Will I need some documentation when I apply for the loan?

title: 6. How to Pay for the Used Car
dialogue_line: Just make sure that you bring them your last pay stub and a copy of the pink slip. You can then work on getting insured. Enjoy your new car!

title: 7. Making an Appointment with the DMV
dialogue_line: I need to go to the DMV and don't know how to make an appointment with them.

title: 7. Making an Appointment with the DMV
dialogue_line: First of all you need to figure out if you really need to be there in person. Sometimes you can take care of your business at the Automobile Club or at the DMV website.

title: 7. Making an Appointment with the DMV
dialogue_line: If I do need to go in, how can I make an appointment?

title: 7. Making an Appointment with the DMV
dialogue_line: You can either make an appointment by going online or by calling the phone number listed on their website.

title: 7. Making an Appointment with the DMV
dialogue_line: What if I just show up there?

title: 7. Making an Appointment with the DMV
dialogue_line: If you have all day to wait and a good book to read, that might work for you.

title: 7. Making an Appointment with the DMV
dialogue_line: Is the DMV open on Saturdays?

title: 7. Making an Appointment with the DMV
dialogue_line: Due to state budget cuts, the DMV is no longer open on Saturdays.

title: 7. Making an Appointment with the DMV
dialogue_line: I think that you have just convinced me to join the Automobile Club!

title: 7. Making an Appointment with the DMV
dialogue_line: Yes, the Automobile Club takes all the pain out of DMV transactions!

title: 7. Making an Appointment with the DMV
dialogue_line: How can I make an appointment at the DMV?

title: 7. Making an Appointment with the DMV
dialogue_line: You could check the DMV website or see if the Automobile Club could help you. Many things can be taken care of without actually going in to the DMV in person.

title: 7. Making an Appointment with the DMV
dialogue_line: How do I make an appointment if I have to actually go in?

title: 7. Making an Appointment with the DMV
dialogue_line: You have two choices. You can call them at the number listed on their website or you can contact them online.

title: 7. Making an Appointment with the DMV
dialogue_line: Can I just walk in and get help?

title: 7. Making an Appointment with the DMV
dialogue_line: Without an appointment, you will be waiting for many hours. I would not advise it.

title: 7. Making an Appointment with the DMV
dialogue_line: Can I take care of this on a Saturday?

title: 7. Making an Appointment with the DMV
dialogue_line: Unfortunately, the DMV is no longer open on Saturdays.

title: 7. Making an Appointment with the DMV
dialogue_line: It probably would be easier for me to join the Automobile Club.

title: 7. Making an Appointment with the DMV
dialogue_line: The Automobile Club has many benefits, and taking care of your DMV transactions is one of the best benefits.

title: 7. Making an Appointment with the DMV
dialogue_line: Can you help me figure out how to make an appointment with the DMV?

title: 7. Making an Appointment with the DMV
dialogue_line: I would try to avoid going in to the DMV in person. If you are a member of the Automobile Club, they oftentimes can take care of things for you or you can try the DMV website.

title: 7. Making an Appointment with the DMV
dialogue_line: It would be nice not to have to go in but if I have to, how do I make an appointment?

title: 7. Making an Appointment with the DMV
dialogue_line: The easiest way to contact them is online, but they also have a phone number listed on the website if you prefer to call them on the phone.

title: 7. Making an Appointment with the DMV
dialogue_line: What do they do if you just show up with no appointment?

title: 7. Making an Appointment with the DMV
dialogue_line: That is not a good way to go. You could be left waiting for many hours and there is no guarantee that they will see you at all!

title: 7. Making an Appointment with the DMV
dialogue_line: What about going to the DMV on Saturday?

title: 7. Making an Appointment with the DMV
dialogue_line: For a while the DMV was open on Saturday, but not anymore.

title: 7. Making an Appointment with the DMV
dialogue_line: I think that the Automobile Club idea was a good suggestion.

title: 7. Making an Appointment with the DMV
dialogue_line: You should check out the Automobile Club. I think you would enjoy being a member.

title: 8. Negotiating a Price with a Student
dialogue_line: This car is exactly what I want!

title: 8. Negotiating a Price with a Student
dialogue_line: I am glad that you like it. I've had good experiences with this car.

title: 8. Negotiating a Price with a Student
dialogue_line: So, how much do you want for the car?

title: 8. Negotiating a Price with a Student
dialogue_line: Well, the price in the paper was five thousand dollars.

title: 8. Negotiating a Price with a Student
dialogue_line: Yes, I know, but I think that might be a little high for this car.

title: 8. Negotiating a Price with a Student
dialogue_line: I might be able to come down a little on the price.

title: 8. Negotiating a Price with a Student
dialogue_line: How about selling the car for four thousand?

title: 8. Negotiating a Price with a Student
dialogue_line: No, that's way less than I could accept. However, I could accept forty-five hundred.

title: 8. Negotiating a Price with a Student
dialogue_line: That sounds fair to me.

title: 8. Negotiating a Price with a Student
dialogue_line: It's a deal then. Thank you!

title: 8. Negotiating a Price with a Student
dialogue_line: I really love this car!

title: 8. Negotiating a Price with a Student
dialogue_line: Great! I was hoping that it would go to a driver who appreciates it.

title: 8. Negotiating a Price with a Student
dialogue_line: How much are you willing to take for the car?

title: 8. Negotiating a Price with a Student
dialogue_line: As I am sure you noticed, the price on the window is five thousand dollars.

title: 8. Negotiating a Price with a Student
dialogue_line: Don't you think you could come down a bit on the price?

title: 8. Negotiating a Price with a Student
dialogue_line: You seem like a nice person. Maybe I could lower the price a bit.

title: 8. Negotiating a Price with a Student
dialogue_line: Would you sell it to me for four thousand?

title: 8. Negotiating a Price with a Student
dialogue_line: I am thinking more in the line of four thousand five hundred.

title: 8. Negotiating a Price with a Student
dialogue_line: I'll take it then!

title: 8. Negotiating a Price with a Student
dialogue_line: Perfect! That works for both of us.

title: 8. Negotiating a Price with a Student
dialogue_line: I am definitely interested in buying this car.

title: 8. Negotiating a Price with a Student
dialogue_line: Wonderful! It's good to find a person who really needs this car.

title: 8. Negotiating a Price with a Student
dialogue_line: What is the price for this car?

title: 8. Negotiating a Price with a Student
dialogue_line: The price I listed on eBay was five thousand dollars.

title: 8. Negotiating a Price with a Student
dialogue_line: I was thinking that maybe you might be willing to lower the price a bit.

title: 8. Negotiating a Price with a Student
dialogue_line: You know I just got a good deal on my new car. I think I can afford to knock a little off of this car.

title: 8. Negotiating a Price with a Student
dialogue_line: I was thinking that four thousand would be a good price.

title: 8. Negotiating a Price with a Student
dialogue_line: I couldn't go that low, but I could sell it for forty-five hundred.

title: 8. Negotiating a Price with a Student
dialogue_line: That would work well for me.

title: 8. Negotiating a Price with a Student
dialogue_line: It's done then. I've enjoyed doing business with you.

title: 9. Negotiating a Price with a Dealer
dialogue_line: How much does this car cost?

title: 9. Negotiating a Price with a Dealer
dialogue_line: Well, come on in and we'll sit down and discuss that right now. How much do you want to pay?

title: 9. Negotiating a Price with a Dealer
dialogue_line: I really was just wondering what the price is.

title: 9. Negotiating a Price with a Dealer
dialogue_line: Well, figuring in tax, license, dealer prep, and registration, I can let this car go for fifteen thousand dollars.

title: 9. Negotiating a Price with a Dealer
dialogue_line: I was thinking a little lower than that.

title: 9. Negotiating a Price with a Dealer
dialogue_line: Whoa! Let's keep talking here. I am sure we can work something out. What price are you thinking is fair?

title: 9. Negotiating a Price with a Dealer
dialogue_line: I was thinking more like thirteen thousand dollars.

title: 9. Negotiating a Price with a Dealer
dialogue_line: You know, you look like you are a sweet kid. I'll give it to you for fourteen thousand dollars.

title: 9. Negotiating a Price with a Dealer
dialogue_line: That would be a good price if the car was in great shape, but it is registered as having been in an accident.

title: 9. Negotiating a Price with a Dealer
dialogue_line: OK, thirteen thousand seven hundred and fifty, and that's my final offer.

title: 9. Negotiating a Price with a Dealer
dialogue_line: If I want to buy this car, what will it cost me?

title: 9. Negotiating a Price with a Dealer
dialogue_line: Let me get my contract out, and we'll figure that out for you right now.

title: 9. Negotiating a Price with a Dealer
dialogue_line: Can't you just tell me what it costs?

title: 9. Negotiating a Price with a Dealer
dialogue_line: You know, I am prepared to offer you a great deal today on that car. With tax, license, registration, and dealer prep, the total will be fifteen thousand dollars.

title: 9. Negotiating a Price with a Dealer
dialogue_line: Fine, I'll come back later with my father, who is a lawyer, and we can talk then.

title: 9. Negotiating a Price with a Dealer
dialogue_line: I am sure that we can work something out. What price were you thinking would be a good deal for you?

title: 9. Negotiating a Price with a Dealer
dialogue_line: Thirteen thousand would be more like it.

title: 9. Negotiating a Price with a Dealer
dialogue_line: Fourteen thousand for this car is a good price. For that I am practically giving it away.

title: 9. Negotiating a Price with a Dealer
dialogue_line: Normally that would be a good price, but that car has been in an accident.

title: 9. Negotiating a Price with a Dealer
dialogue_line: Yes, I see your point. Thirteen thousand seven hundred and fifty is my final offer.

title: 9. Negotiating a Price with a Dealer
dialogue_line: How much money for this car?

title: 9. Negotiating a Price with a Dealer
dialogue_line: Yes, that car is beautiful, isn't it? Come on inside and we'll discuss the price.

title: 9. Negotiating a Price with a Dealer
dialogue_line: I just want to know the price.

title: 9. Negotiating a Price with a Dealer
dialogue_line: Fifteen thousand out the door! What a deal! That will, of course, include tax, license, registration, and dealer prep.

title: 9. Negotiating a Price with a Dealer
dialogue_line: I appreciate your help, and I'll see you later.

title: 9. Negotiating a Price with a Dealer
dialogue_line: Oh, you look like a smart person. What price would be fair to you?

title: 9. Negotiating a Price with a Dealer
dialogue_line: I think that thirteen thousand would be fair for this car.

title: 9. Negotiating a Price with a Dealer
dialogue_line: I can see that you are a smart buyer. Fourteen thousand is my best price.

title: 9. Negotiating a Price with a Dealer
dialogue_line: If the car hadn't been in an accident, that would be a good price, but it has a few minor problems.

title: 9. Negotiating a Price with a Dealer
dialogue_line: Thirteen thousand seven hundred and fifty is my final offer.

title: . Test Driving the Car
dialogue_line: This car has a nice smooth ride, even on the freeway.

title: . Test Driving the Car

title: . Title Transfer
dialogue_line: Now I've decided to buy this car, how do I transfer the title to myself?

title: . Title Transfer
dialogue_line: Actually, your best bet is to contact the Automobile Club or to go to the DMV website.

title: . Title Transfer
dialogue_line: Basically, what will I need to do?

title: . Title Transfer
dialogue_line: Both buyer and seller need to transfer the ownership by filling out a Change of Ownership form and signing over the Certificate of Title, which will be either pink or rainbow.

title: . Title Transfer
dialogue_line: Will I have to pay any fees?

title: . Title Transfer
dialogue_line: All of the transfer fees are the responsibility of the buyer.

title: . Title Transfer
dialogue_line: How much will it cost to transfer the title?

title: . Title Transfer
dialogue_line: The DMV has a special formula that they use to calculate the fees. They will figure it out for you.

title: . Title Transfer
dialogue_line: Do I need a Smog Certificate?

title: . Title Transfer
dialogue_line: No, only if your car was manufactured before 1975.

title: . Title Transfer
dialogue_line: Where do I take my forms?

title: . Title Transfer
dialogue_line: You can take them to the DMV. You have ten days to complete the process.

title: . Title Transfer
dialogue_line: I don't really know all that much about the paperwork involved in buying a used car.

title: . Title Transfer
dialogue_line: If you are a member of the Automobile Club, they can help guide you through the process, or just go to the DMV website.

title: . Title Transfer
dialogue_line: What is the big picture of what I will need to take care of?

title: . Title Transfer
dialogue_line: The car has a pink or rainbow Certificate of Title, which both the buyer and seller need to sign. They also both need to fill out theChange of Ownership form.

title: . Title Transfer
dialogue_line: Who pays the fees to transfer the ownership?

title: . Title Transfer
dialogue_line: The buyer must pay all of the fees.

title: . Title Transfer
dialogue_line: Will it be really expensive to transfer the title?

title: . Title Transfer
dialogue_line: The DMV will calculate the fees for you when you submit the paperwork.

title: . Title Transfer
dialogue_line: What about a Smog Certificate?

title: . Title Transfer
dialogue_line: No, your car was built after 1974, so you will be fine.

title: . Title Transfer
dialogue_line: Where can I turn in my forms?

title: . Title Transfer
dialogue_line: If you are a member of the Automobile Club, you can turn in your forms to them.

title: . Title Transfer
dialogue_line: Can you help me figure out how to transfer the title of the car I wish to buy so it will be registered in my name?

title: . Title Transfer
dialogue_line: You can go to the DMV website for information or, if you are a member of the Automobile Club, they can be very helpful.

title: . Title Transfer
dialogue_line: Can you just fill me in on what needs to be done?

title: . Title Transfer
dialogue_line: When you both fill out and sign a Change of Ownership form and sign the Certificate of Title, the ownership will be transferred.

title: . Title Transfer
dialogue_line: Are there any fees involved?

title: . Title Transfer
dialogue_line: As the buyer, you are responsible for all of the fees.

title: . Title Transfer
dialogue_line: How much money will I have to pay to transfer the title?

title: . Title Transfer
dialogue_line: The only way to calculate the fee is to turn your paperwork in to the DMV, and they will figure it out for you.

title: . Title Transfer
dialogue_line: Do I need to take the car in for a Smog Certificate?

title: . Title Transfer
dialogue_line: No, your car is a newer model, so you won't need one.

title: . Title Transfer
dialogue_line: Whom do I give my forms to when they are completed?

title: . Title Transfer
dialogue_line: Check online for special situations, but usually you can mail your forms in to the DMV.

title: . Where to Buy a Used Car
dialogue_line: Where is the best place to buy a used car?

title: . Where to Buy a Used Car
dialogue_line: I have always purchased my used cars from an advertisement in the paper, but actually you have many options.

title: . Where to Buy a Used Car
dialogue_line: Where else could I look for a car?

title: . Where to Buy a Used Car
dialogue_line: You could look on the Internet. Craigslist is best, as most of the cars listed there are sold locally.

title: . Where to Buy a Used Car
dialogue_line: What would be best if I wanted to actually go see a lot of used cars that are for sale?

title: . Where to Buy a Used Car
dialogue_line: The best place is CarMax, which is a very large used car lot.

title: . Where to Buy a Used Car
dialogue_line: Where is CarMax?

title: . Where to Buy a Used Car
dialogue_line: There are many of them. You can look on the Internet or in the phone book for the one closest to you.

title: . Where to Buy a Used Car
dialogue_line: How about the listings on the college bulletin board?

title: . Where to Buy a Used Car
dialogue_line: Actually, that is not a bad way to go, especially near the end of a semester as students are moving away.

title: . Where to Buy a Used Car
dialogue_line: Can you help me figure out the best place to buy a used car?

title: . Where to Buy a Used Car
dialogue_line: There are a lot of different ways to go. I bought my last one from an advertisement in the paper.

title: . Where to Buy a Used Car
dialogue_line: What are my other options for looking for a used car?

title: . Where to Buy a Used Car
dialogue_line: Internet listings are good. Craigslist is pretty good because most of the cars are sold locally.

title: . Where to Buy a Used Car
dialogue_line: I think that I might actually like to see many used cars together so I can compare them.

title: . Where to Buy a Used Car
dialogue_line: The biggest used car lot is CarMax. I would check that place out.

title: . Where to Buy a Used Car

dialogue_line: Look in the phone book or on the Internet for the one closest to you. There are a lot of them.

title: . Where to Buy a Used Car
dialogue_line: Have you ever seen the listings on the school bulletin board?

dialogue_line: The school bulletin board can have some great deals, as many students sell their cars before they return home or as they get better paying jobs.

title: . Where to Buy a Used Car
dialogue_line: Where did you buy your last used car?

title: . Where to Buy a Used Car
dialogue_line: I found my last one in an advertisement in the newspaper, but there are a lot of other places to look for used cars.

title: . Where to Buy a Used Car
dialogue_line: Besides an advertisement, what else could I do to find a used car?

title: . Where to Buy a Used Car
dialogue_line: My friend bought his used car off of Craigslist. It works out better than eBay because the cars listed are located close by.

title: . Where to Buy a Used Car

title: . Where to Buy a Used Car
dialogue_line: Go to CarMax if you want to see the largest selection of used cars in one place.

dialogue_line: CarMax has many car lots in many cities. For the one closest to you, check out the Internet or phone book.

title: . Where to Buy a Used Car
