title: . Calling a Traffic School to Make an Appointment
dialogue_line: I would like to take a driver's course.

title: . Calling a Traffic School to Make an Appointment
dialogue_line: Would you like to make an appointment?

title: . Calling a Traffic School to Make an Appointment
dialogue_line: Why do I need an appointment?

title: . Calling a Traffic School to Make an Appointment
dialogue_line: You need to sign the paperwork.

title: . Calling a Traffic School to Make an Appointment
dialogue_line: Can I do that right now?

title: . Calling a Traffic School to Make an Appointment
dialogue_line: When can you come in?

title: . Calling a Traffic School to Make an Appointment
dialogue_line: How about 9 o'clock tomorrow morning?

title: . Calling a Traffic School to Make an Appointment
dialogue_line: I'll schedule you for then.

title: . Calling a Traffic School to Make an Appointment
dialogue_line: Thanks for all your help.

title: . Calling a Traffic School to Make an Appointment
dialogue_line: What do you need today?

title: . Calling a Traffic School to Make an Appointment
dialogue_line: I need to take a few classes.

title: . Calling a Traffic School to Make an Appointment
dialogue_line: What kind of classes would you like to take?

title: . Calling a Traffic School to Make an Appointment
dialogue_line: How about a driver's course?

title: . Calling a Traffic School to Make an Appointment
dialogue_line: You're going to need to make an appointment.

title: . Calling a Traffic School to Make an Appointment
dialogue_line: I don't understand why I need to make an appointment.

title: . Calling a Traffic School to Make an Appointment
dialogue_line: You need to make one to come down and fill out your paperwork.

title: . Calling a Traffic School to Make an Appointment
dialogue_line: I'd like to make one now if I could.

title: . Calling a Traffic School to Make an Appointment
dialogue_line: Sure you can; when would you like to come in?

title: . Calling a Traffic School to Make an Appointment
dialogue_line: I'd like to come in tomorrow morning at 9:00.

title: . Calling a Traffic School to Make an Appointment
dialogue_line: That'll be fine.

title: . Calling a Traffic School to Make an Appointment
dialogue_line: That's great. Thank you very much.

title: . Talking to the Traffic School Instructor
dialogue_line: What can I do for you today?

title: . Talking to the Traffic School Instructor
dialogue_line: I have a question.

title: . Talking to the Traffic School Instructor
dialogue_line: What do you need to know?

title: . Talking to the Traffic School Instructor
dialogue_line: I need to take the driver's course. How many hours do I need?

title: . Talking to the Traffic School Instructor
dialogue_line: It depends on what you're trying to do with the completion of the course.

title: . Talking to the Traffic School Instructor
dialogue_line: I need to get my license.

title: . Talking to the Traffic School Instructor
dialogue_line: You're going to need to complete six hours.

title: . Talking to the Traffic School Instructor
dialogue_line: How many hours a day can I do?

title: . Talking to the Traffic School Instructor
dialogue_line: You can do two hours a day for three days.

title: . Talking to the Traffic School Instructor
dialogue_line: That's all I need to do to finish?

title: . Talking to the Traffic School Instructor
dialogue_line: Yes, that's all you need to do.

title: . Talking to the Traffic School Instructor
dialogue_line: Thanks. I'll get back to you.

title: . Talking to the Traffic School Instructor
dialogue_line: What can I help you with?

title: . Talking to the Traffic School Instructor
dialogue_line: May I ask you something?

title: . Talking to the Traffic School Instructor
dialogue_line: What's your question?

title: . Talking to the Traffic School Instructor
dialogue_line: How many hours behind the wheel do I need?

title: . Talking to the Traffic School Instructor
dialogue_line: What do you need to take it for?

title: . Talking to the Traffic School Instructor
dialogue_line: I'm trying to get my license.

title: . Talking to the Traffic School Instructor
dialogue_line: You need six hours.

title: . Talking to the Traffic School Instructor
dialogue_line: Can I do all six hours in one day?

title: . Talking to the Traffic School Instructor
dialogue_line: You have to do it in three days.

title: . Talking to the Traffic School Instructor
dialogue_line: That's all I have to do?

title: . Talking to the Traffic School Instructor
dialogue_line: That's everything.

title: . Talking to the Traffic School Instructor
dialogue_line: Well, that's a relief.

title: . Talking to the Traffic School Instructor
dialogue_line: May I help you?

title: . Talking to the Traffic School Instructor
dialogue_line: I needed to ask you a question.

title: . Talking to the Traffic School Instructor
dialogue_line: Ask away.

title: . Talking to the Traffic School Instructor
dialogue_line: How many hours of the behind-the-wheel course do I need to take?

title: . Talking to the Traffic School Instructor
dialogue_line: Why do you need to take the course?

title: . Talking to the Traffic School Instructor
dialogue_line: I want to get my license.

title: . Talking to the Traffic School Instructor
dialogue_line: You have to do six hours behind the wheel.

title: . Talking to the Traffic School Instructor
dialogue_line: How many days do I need to finish the course?

title: . Talking to the Traffic School Instructor
dialogue_line: You can't finish in less than three days.

title: . Talking to the Traffic School Instructor
dialogue_line: Is that all?

title: . Talking to the Traffic School Instructor
dialogue_line: There's nothing else to it.

title: . Talking to the Traffic School Instructor
dialogue_line: That sounds easy enough.

title: . A Traffic Incident
dialogue_line: Hey man, you hit my car.

title: . A Traffic Incident
dialogue_line: I really didn't mean to.

title: . A Traffic Incident
dialogue_line: It doesn't matter, because you damaged my car.

title: . A Traffic Incident
dialogue_line: It looks okay to me.

title: . A Traffic Incident
dialogue_line: Look what you did to my rear bumper.

title: . A Traffic Incident
dialogue_line: What's wrong with it?

title: . A Traffic Incident
dialogue_line: My bumper is smashed in.

title: . A Traffic Incident
dialogue_line: I didn't do that.

title: . A Traffic Incident
dialogue_line: Your front bumper is just as damaged.

title: . A Traffic Incident
dialogue_line: If you'd just give me your number and insurance, then I'll handle it.

title: . A Traffic Incident
dialogue_line: Here. I'd better get a call from you.

title: . A Traffic Incident
dialogue_line: Don't worry.

title: . A Traffic Incident
dialogue_line: You ran into my car.

title: . A Traffic Incident
dialogue_line: That was my fault. I'm sorry.

title: . A Traffic Incident
dialogue_line: You messed up my car.

title: . A Traffic Incident
dialogue_line: I don't see any damage.

title: . A Traffic Incident
dialogue_line: My rear bumper is messed up.

title: . A Traffic Incident
dialogue_line: I don't see anything wrong with it.

title: . A Traffic Incident
dialogue_line: It's smashed in.

title: . A Traffic Incident
dialogue_line: That's not my fault.

title: . A Traffic Incident
dialogue_line: The same thing is wrong with your bumper.

title: . A Traffic Incident
dialogue_line: I'll take care of everything. I just need your phone number and insurance.

title: . A Traffic Incident
dialogue_line: I need your information too.

title: . A Traffic Incident
dialogue_line: Here you go.

title: . A Traffic Incident
dialogue_line: Why'd you run into me?

title: . A Traffic Incident
dialogue_line: I didn't mean to. It was an accident.

title: . A Traffic Incident
dialogue_line: You have completely damaged my car.

title: . A Traffic Incident
dialogue_line: I did not. It looks perfectly fine.

title: . A Traffic Incident
dialogue_line: You don't see what happened to my bumper?

title: . A Traffic Incident
dialogue_line: What did I do to it?

title: . A Traffic Incident
dialogue_line: You smashed my bumper in with your car.

title: . A Traffic Incident
dialogue_line: I really don't think that I did that.

title: . A Traffic Incident
dialogue_line: Your bumper looks exactly the same.

title: . A Traffic Incident
dialogue_line: Look, just give me your insurance and number and I'll take care of it.

title: . A Traffic Incident
dialogue_line: Give me your information, in case I don't hear from you.

title: . A Traffic Incident
dialogue_line: Trust me.

title: . A Car Accident
dialogue_line: Was there an accident on the freeway today?

title: . A Car Accident
dialogue_line: You haven't heard about it?

title: . A Car Accident
dialogue_line: No, do you know what happened?

title: . A Car Accident
dialogue_line: This truck flipped over on the 210.

title: . A Car Accident
dialogue_line: Are you serious?

title: . A Car Accident
dialogue_line: I'm telling you the truth.

title: . A Car Accident
dialogue_line: Did anyone get hurt?

title: . A Car Accident
dialogue_line: Two people were injured.

title: . A Car Accident
dialogue_line: Are they going to be okay?

title: . A Car Accident
dialogue_line: I think so.

title: . A Car Accident
dialogue_line: That's a miracle that no one was killed.

title: . A Car Accident
dialogue_line: Yes, they were lucky.

title: . A Car Accident
dialogue_line: What happened today on the freeway?

title: . A Car Accident
dialogue_line: You don't know what happened?

title: . A Car Accident
dialogue_line: What did happen?

title: . A Car Accident
dialogue_line: There was a truck on the freeway, and it flipped over.

title: . A Car Accident
dialogue_line: Really?

title: . A Car Accident
dialogue_line: I wouldn't lie about something like that.

title: . A Car Accident
dialogue_line: Were there any injuries?

title: . A Car Accident
dialogue_line: I heard that a couple people got hurt.

title: . A Car Accident
dialogue_line: Are they all right?

title: . A Car Accident
dialogue_line: The news said they should be fine.

title: . A Car Accident
dialogue_line: I'm glad to know that everyone made it out okay.

title: . A Car Accident
dialogue_line: Me too.

title: . A Car Accident
dialogue_line: I heard there was an accident today.

title: . A Car Accident
dialogue_line: Nobody told you what happened?

title: . A Car Accident
dialogue_line: Tell me the news.

title: . A Car Accident
dialogue_line: A truck turned over on the freeway.

title: . A Car Accident
dialogue_line: Are you kidding me?

title: . A Car Accident
dialogue_line: I am completely serious.

title: . A Car Accident
dialogue_line: Did anyone get hurt?

title: . A Car Accident
dialogue_line: I believe that two people did get hurt.

title: . A Car Accident
dialogue_line: Were the injuries minor?

title: . A Car Accident
dialogue_line: I believe so.

title: . A Car Accident
dialogue_line: That's great to hear.

title: . A Car Accident
dialogue_line: Yes, it is.

title: . Calling the Insurance Company
dialogue_line: How may I help you?

title: . Calling the Insurance Company
dialogue_line: I need to ask you something about my insurance.

title: . Calling the Insurance Company
dialogue_line: What's your question?

title: . Calling the Insurance Company
dialogue_line: Did you make any changes to my insurance?

title: . Calling the Insurance Company
dialogue_line: What kind of changes are you referring to?

title: . Calling the Insurance Company
dialogue_line: My premium isn't the same.

title: . Calling the Insurance Company
dialogue_line: Is there a problem with your premium?

title: . Calling the Insurance Company
dialogue_line: Did you guys raise my premium?

title: . Calling the Insurance Company
dialogue_line: Yes, we did go up on the premiums.

title: . Calling the Insurance Company
dialogue_line: Why wasn't I told of this change?

title: . Calling the Insurance Company
dialogue_line: I apologize, and next time we will make sure to let you know.

title: . Calling the Insurance Company
dialogue_line: I'd appreciate that.

title: . Calling the Insurance Company
dialogue_line: What can I do for you today?

title: . Calling the Insurance Company
dialogue_line: I am inquiring about my insurance.

title: . Calling the Insurance Company
dialogue_line: What do you need to know?

title: . Calling the Insurance Company
dialogue_line: I think my insurance was changed.

title: . Calling the Insurance Company
dialogue_line: What changes were made?

title: . Calling the Insurance Company
dialogue_line: I think there's a problem with my premium.

title: . Calling the Insurance Company
dialogue_line: What's wrong with it?

title: . Calling the Insurance Company
dialogue_line: It's higher than it was before.

title: . Calling the Insurance Company
dialogue_line: I believe that the premiums did go up.

title: . Calling the Insurance Company
dialogue_line: It would have been nice if I was notified of this.

title: . Calling the Insurance Company
dialogue_line: I'm sorry about the inconvenience, and we'll notify you next time.

title: . Calling the Insurance Company
dialogue_line: That would be nice.

title: . Calling the Insurance Company
dialogue_line: What do you need?

title: . Calling the Insurance Company
dialogue_line: I have a question about my insurance.

title: . Calling the Insurance Company
dialogue_line: What are you wondering about?

title: . Calling the Insurance Company
dialogue_line: Were there any changes to my insurance?

title: . Calling the Insurance Company
dialogue_line: What do you think was changed?

title: . Calling the Insurance Company
dialogue_line: My premium is different.

title: . Calling the Insurance Company
dialogue_line: What's the problem?

title: . Calling the Insurance Company
dialogue_line: I think that my premium went up.

title: . Calling the Insurance Company
dialogue_line: We have raised the premiums.

title: . Calling the Insurance Company
dialogue_line: You guys didn't think to notify everyone?

title: . Calling the Insurance Company
dialogue_line: Next time we'll call and let you know.

title: . Calling the Insurance Company
dialogue_line: Thanks for the favor.

title: Health Insurance
dialogue_line: I would like to purchase some health insurance.

title: Health Insurance
dialogue_line: Have you ever purchased health insurance before?

title: Health Insurance
dialogue_line: I have health insurance now, but I want to look into other choices.

title: Health Insurance
dialogue_line: Do you know if you are interested in an HMO or a PPO?

title: Health Insurance
dialogue_line: Could you explain the difference to me?

title: Health Insurance
dialogue_line: To clarify it for you, with a PPO you pay more but you get to choose your own doctor.

title: Health Insurance
dialogue_line: When I pay for a service, is the payment the same for a PPO or HMO?

title: Health Insurance
dialogue_line: The payments are quite a bit higher for the PPO, but you can go anywhere you like.

title: Health Insurance
dialogue_line: How much will an HMO cost me per month?

title: Health Insurance
dialogue_line: Go to our website and fill in the questionnaire. Once we have all of your information, we can give you a quote.

title: Health Insurance
dialogue_line: I am calling to purchase health insurance.

title: Health Insurance
dialogue_line: Do you have health insurance now?

title: Health Insurance
dialogue_line: I was on my parents' policy, but I need to start buying my own.

title: Health Insurance
dialogue_line: You can purchase an HMO or a PPO. Do you know what you want?

title: Health Insurance
dialogue_line: I don't know what I want.

title: Health Insurance
dialogue_line: Let me explain it to you. An HMO is a little cheaper, but you can only

title: Health Insurance
dialogue_line: choose certain doctors.

title: Health Insurance
dialogue_line: When I go to the doctor, do I pay the same out-of-pocket expenses for a PPO?

title: Health Insurance
dialogue_line: The payments are a little lower for an HMO as long as you go to their doctors.

title: Health Insurance
dialogue_line: How much will a PPO cost me per month?

title: Health Insurance
dialogue_line: We need to factor in many things. Why don't you come in, and we will have you fill out a questionnaire.

title: Health Insurance
dialogue_line: I need information on purchasing health insurance.

title: Health Insurance
dialogue_line: Is this the first time you have had health insurance?

title: Health Insurance
dialogue_line: This is my first time buying health insurance.

title: Health Insurance
dialogue_line: You have a choice of HMO or PPO. Do you understand the difference?

title: Health Insurance
dialogue_line: I am not sure what those are.

title: Health Insurance
dialogue_line: Just so you understand completely: An HMO is a little cheaper, but you have limited choices of which doctor you choose.

title: Health Insurance
dialogue_line: If I need to use my insurance, are the payments the same for a PPO and HMO?

title: Health Insurance
dialogue_line: By going to the providers on the HMO list, you save money in

title: Health Insurance
dialogue_line: out-of-pocket expenses.

title: Health Insurance
dialogue_line: Can you give me a comparison between a PPO and an HMO?

title: Health Insurance
dialogue_line: We can mail you a questionnaire and when we have all of your information, we will mail you a quote.

title: A Medical Emergency
dialogue_line: What seems to be the problem?

title: A Medical Emergency
dialogue_line: Oh, my God! It's my stomach. It's killing me!

title: A Medical Emergency
dialogue_line: Where does it hurt the most?

title: A Medical Emergency
dialogue_line: Right here! It hurts right here!

title: A Medical Emergency
dialogue_line: How long has it felt like this?

title: A Medical Emergency
dialogue_line: I felt OK when I woke up, and then, suddenly, I had this really sharp pain.

title: A Medical Emergency
dialogue_line: Do you have a history of stomach pain?

title: A Medical Emergency
dialogue_line: No, and I haven't done anything out of the ordinary.

title: A Medical Emergency
dialogue_line: I think that we are going to have to get you to an emergency room right away.

title: A Medical Emergency
dialogue_line: Thank you for helping me.

title: A Medical Emergency
dialogue_line: Can you tell me where it hurts?

title: A Medical Emergency
dialogue_line: I am so glad they called you. It feels like something is really wrong with my stomach!

title: A Medical Emergency
dialogue_line: Does it hurt when I push here?

title: A Medical Emergency
dialogue_line: It's mostly on my right side. Right here!

title: A Medical Emergency
dialogue_line: Have you been feeling this way for awhile?

title: A Medical Emergency
dialogue_line: I started feeling kind of sick last night after dinner, but this morning the pain got really bad!

title: A Medical Emergency
dialogue_line: Have you eaten anything unusual lately?

title: A Medical Emergency
dialogue_line: No, not that I remember.

title: A Medical Emergency
dialogue_line: We are going to take you to an emergency room right now.

title: A Medical Emergency
dialogue_line: I will feel better when I know what the problem is. Thank you.

title: A Medical Emergency
dialogue_line: Where are you feeling the pain?

title: A Medical Emergency
dialogue_line: I can't stand up! My stomach is killing me!

title: A Medical Emergency
dialogue_line: Can you put your hand where it hurts the most?

title: A Medical Emergency
dialogue_line: It hurts smack in the middle of my gut!

title: A Medical Emergency
dialogue_line: Did this just come on suddenly?

title: A Medical Emergency
dialogue_line: I felt OK until an hour or so ago, and then I just doubled over.

title: A Medical Emergency
dialogue_line: Have you exercised strenuously or played sports recently?

title: A Medical Emergency
dialogue_line: No, and I don't usually get a lot of stomachaches.

title: A Medical Emergency
dialogue_line: We need to get you to an emergency room to see what the problem is.

title: A Medical Emergency
dialogue_line: I think that that is the best way to figure out what is causing this. Thank you.

title: Going to an Emergency Room
dialogue_line: Sorry to bother you, but I was wondering if you could drive me to the emergency room.

title: Going to an Emergency Room
dialogue_line: Of course. What is the problem?

title: Going to an Emergency Room
dialogue_line: I am running a really high fever of 105 degrees, and I have a rash on my stomach.

title: Going to an Emergency Room
dialogue_line: If you can, go and unlock the back door, so I can get in when I get there if you fall asleep.

title: Going to an Emergency Room
dialogue_line: I can do that when I get off of the phone.

title: Going to an Emergency Room
dialogue_line: Do you know where your driver's license and insurance card are?

title: Going to an Emergency Room
dialogue_line: I already had them out before I called you.

title: Going to an Emergency Room
dialogue_line: Where is your nearest emergency room?

title: Going to an Emergency Room
dialogue_line: It's just a few blocks away.

title: Going to an Emergency Room
dialogue_line: Fine, I am on my way. I'll be there in about five minutes.

title: Going to an Emergency Room
dialogue_line: I hate to call you this late at night, but could you possibly help me get to the emergency room?

title: Going to an Emergency Room
dialogue_line: We will come right over. What happened?

title: Going to an Emergency Room
dialogue_line: My temperature went up to 105, and I have a rash!

title: Going to an Emergency Room
dialogue_line: Make sure that someone unlocks the back door, so I can get in if you fall asleep before I get there.

title: Going to an Emergency Room
dialogue_line: I will do that in a minute.

title: Going to an Emergency Room
dialogue_line: Make sure that you have your insurance card and driver's license where we can grab them.

title: Going to an Emergency Room
dialogue_line: I know right where they both are.

title: Going to an Emergency Room
dialogue_line: Is there an emergency room near you?

title: Going to an Emergency Room
dialogue_line: It is on the other side of town, next to city hall.

title: Going to an Emergency Room
dialogue_line: I am on my way. Give me ten minutes and I'll get to you.

title: Going to an Emergency Room
dialogue_line: I really need your help and want to know if you could drive me to the emergency room.

title: Going to an Emergency Room
dialogue_line: I will take you there right away. What is wrong?

title: Going to an Emergency Room
dialogue_line: I woke up with a rash and a temperature of 105!

title: Going to an Emergency Room
dialogue_line: I want to be able to get to you when I get there. If you can unlock the back door right now, that would be great.

title: Going to an Emergency Room
dialogue_line: I will make sure that I do that before you get here.

title: Going to an Emergency Room
dialogue_line: Also, make sure that we have your driver's license and insurance card before we leave for the emergency room.

title: Going to an Emergency Room
dialogue_line: I am getting them out while I am speaking to you.

title: Going to an Emergency Room
dialogue_line: Do you know where your nearest emergency room is?

title: Going to an Emergency Room
dialogue_line: It is near the bridge that crosses over the river.

title: Going to an Emergency Room
dialogue_line: I am driving to you even as we speak. Hang in there!

title: 4. A Stomachache
dialogue_line: You don't look so good.

title: 4. A Stomachache
dialogue_line: I have a major stomachache

title: 4. A Stomachache
dialogue_line: Did you eat something strange?

title: 4. A Stomachache
dialogue_line: I had spaghetti with clam sauce for lunch.

title: 4. A Stomachache
dialogue_line: Maybe you have food poisoning.

title: 4. A Stomachache
dialogue_line: Yes, that could have been it, but I haven't been feeling that great for the past few days.

title: 4. A Stomachache
dialogue_line: Are you under a lot of stress?

title: 4. A Stomachache
dialogue_line: Not really. Things have been going OK.

title: 4. A Stomachache
dialogue_line: Maybe you have a touch of the flu.

title: 4. A Stomachache
dialogue_line: I think that I might be getting the flu.

title: 4. A Stomachache
dialogue_line: Are you feeling OK?

title: 4. A Stomachache
dialogue_line: My stomach is bothering me.

title: 4. A Stomachache
dialogue_line: What have you been eating?

title: 4. A Stomachache
dialogue_line: I had a ham sandwich with mayonnaise for lunch.

title: 4. A Stomachache
dialogue_line: Maybe the food had something wrong with it.

title: 4. A Stomachache
dialogue_line: It could be bad food, but I didn't feel so well yesterday, either.

title: 4. A Stomachache
dialogue_line: Have you been under a lot of pressure lately?

title: 4. A Stomachache
dialogue_line: I haven't been under any more stress than usual.

title: 4. A Stomachache
dialogue_line: Perhaps you have caught that bug that is going around.

title: 4. A Stomachache
dialogue_line: I feel like maybe I am coming down with the flu.

title: 4. A Stomachache
dialogue_line: You look kind of green.

title: 4. A Stomachache
dialogue_line: I don't feel so good. I am feeling sick to my stomach.

title: 4. A Stomachache
dialogue_line: Have you had anything to eat lately?

title: 4. A Stomachache
dialogue_line: I had fried shrimp and clams for lunch.

title: 4. A Stomachache
dialogue_line: Perhaps the food was bad.

title: 4. A Stomachache
dialogue_line: Perhaps, but I haven't felt well for a few days now.

title: 4. A Stomachache
dialogue_line: Has anything been upsetting you lately?

title: 4. A Stomachache
dialogue_line: My stress level is pretty much what is usually is.

title: 4. A Stomachache
dialogue_line: Do you think that maybe you are getting the flu?

title: 4. A Stomachache
dialogue_line: It seems to me like I may have caught a bug.

title: 5. A Toothache
dialogue_line: What can I do for you today?

title: 5. A Toothache
dialogue_line: Doctor, I have the worst toothache!

title: 5. A Toothache
dialogue_line: How long have you had this pain?

title: 5. A Toothache
dialogue_line: For about a week or so, but it's gotten really bad in the last couple of days.

title: 5. A Toothache
dialogue_line: Did you do anything that might have aggravated your tooth?

title: 5. A Toothache
dialogue_line: You know, I was eating jawbreakers in the movies the other day, and I accidentally bit down really hard on one.

title: 5. A Toothache
dialogue_line: What kind of toothbrush do you use?

title: 5. A Toothache
dialogue_line: I just use a regular hard bristle toothbrush.

title: 5. A Toothache
dialogue_line: Does it bother you when you eat something really cold?

title: 5. A Toothache
dialogue_line: Yes, it definitely bothers me more when I do that.

title: 5. A Toothache
dialogue_line: So what brings you to my office today?

title: 5. A Toothache
dialogue_line: My tooth is killing me!

title: 5. A Toothache
dialogue_line: How long has your tooth been bothering you?

title: 5. A Toothache
dialogue_line: It just started hurting me last night.

title: 5. A Toothache
dialogue_line: Have you injured your tooth in any way?

title: 5. A Toothache
dialogue_line: I think one of my fillings might be coming loose.

title: 5. A Toothache

title: . Having a Blood Test in the Lab
dialogue_line: The doctor sent me over here to have my blood drawn.

title: . Having a Blood Test in the Lab
dialogue_line: Certainly, please have a seat and roll up your left sleeve.

title: . Having a Blood Test in the Lab
dialogue_line: What is this test for?

title: . Having a Blood Test in the Lab
dialogue_line: Well, today your doctor wants us to check your white blood cell count.

title: . Having a Blood Test in the Lab
dialogue_line: What does that tell him?

title: . Having a Blood Test in the Lab
dialogue_line: Well, if it is elevated, you might have an infection.

title: . Having a Blood Test in the Lab
dialogue_line: Will the blood test hurt?

title: . Having a Blood Test in the Lab
dialogue_line: It is only a little pin stick. I am going to put a tourniquet on your arm to puff your veins up.

title: . Having a Blood Test in the Lab
dialogue_line: Ouch!

title: . Having a Blood Test in the Lab
dialogue_line: There we go! I got the blood that I needed.

title: . Having a Blood Test in the Lab
dialogue_line: My doctor says that I need a blood test.

title: . Having a Blood Test in the Lab
dialogue_line: I can help you with that. Just have a seat and roll up your left sleeve.

title: . Having a Blood Test in the Lab
dialogue_line: What are you taking my blood for?

title: . Having a Blood Test in the Lab
dialogue_line: Your doctor has requested a check of your white blood count.

title: . Having a Blood Test in the Lab
dialogue_line: What information does that give him?

title: . Having a Blood Test in the Lab
dialogue_line: If your white blood cell count is off, it could signal an infection somewhere in your body.

title: . Having a Blood Test in the Lab
dialogue_line: Is a blood test painful?

title: . Having a Blood Test in the Lab
dialogue_line: I am putting a tourniquet on your arm to plump up the vein. It will only feel like a little pin prick.

title: . Having a Blood Test in the Lab
dialogue_line: My God, that hurts!

title: . Having a Blood Test in the Lab
dialogue_line: That was it! Thank you for coming in today.

title: . Having a Blood Test in the Lab
dialogue_line: I came to this lab to have my blood drawn.

title: . Having a Blood Test in the Lab
dialogue_line: You are in the right place. Roll up your left sleeve and have a seat.

title: . Having a Blood Test in the Lab
dialogue_line: What am I being tested for?

title: . Having a Blood Test in the Lab
dialogue_line: Your doctor wants to know what your white blood cell count is.

title: . Having a Blood Test in the Lab
dialogue_line: What does my white blood cell count tell him?

title: . Having a Blood Test in the Lab
dialogue_line: Usually if your white count is off, the doctor suspects an infection.

title: . Having a Blood Test in the Lab
dialogue_line: How much will it hurt?

title: . Having a Blood Test in the Lab
dialogue_line: It is only a pin prick. I have to put this tourniquet on your arm to make the vein easier to find.

title: . Having a Blood Test in the Lab
dialogue_line: Is that my blood going into that tube?

title: . Having a Blood Test in the Lab
dialogue_line: That blood that just filled the tube is all that I needed. Thanks for coming in!

title: . Having a Cold
dialogue_line: How are you feeling today?

title: . Having a Cold
dialogue_line: I have a terrible cold!

title: . Having a Cold
dialogue_line: Where do you think you picked that up?

title: . Having a Cold
dialogue_line: A lot of people in my gym have it. Maybe I got it from the equipment.

title: . Having a Cold
dialogue_line: Have you taken anything for it?

title: . Having a Cold
dialogue_line: I think that I am just going to rest and drink plenty of liquids for a while.

title: . Having a Cold
dialogue_line: Yes, staying rested and hydrated is really important.

title: . Having a Cold
dialogue_line: My mother also has this special potion with hot wine, cayenne pepper, and sugar that works miracles.

title: . Having a Cold
dialogue_line: You might want to ask the pharmacist for his suggestions if you get any worse.

title: . Having a Cold
dialogue_line: Yes, if my symptoms don't pass in a few days, I will ask for help.

title: . Having a Cold
dialogue_line: You don't look so good.

title: . Having a Cold
dialogue_line: I feel horrible. I think I picked up a bug.

title: . Having a Cold
dialogue_line: Do you know who you got it from?

title: . Having a Cold
dialogue_line: A lot of people in my dorm are sick. Perhaps I picked it up there.

title: . Having a Cold
dialogue_line: Did you take any cold medication?

title: . Having a Cold
dialogue_line: I've been taking vitamin C and zinc and trying to get some rest.

title: . Having a Cold
dialogue_line: I think that rest and liquids are what doctors recommend for a cold.

title: . Having a Cold
dialogue_line: My grandmother swears by hot chicken soup for a cold.

title: . Having a Cold
dialogue_line: A pharmacist might be able to help you if your home remedies don't work.

title: . Having a Cold
dialogue_line: Yes, if I get worse, I will definitely look for extra help with this.

title: . Having a Cold
dialogue_line: You look a bit under the weather.

title: . Having a Cold
dialogue_line: I am not feeling all the great. I think I have that crud that is going around.

title: . Having a Cold
dialogue_line: I know that it's going around the dorms.

title: . Having a Cold
dialogue_line: My boyfriend hasn't been feeling so well. Maybe he passed it on to me.

title: . Having a Cold
dialogue_line: I have some cold tablets if you would like one.

title: . Having a Cold
dialogue_line: Mostly, I feel like I need some rest and hot soup.

title: . Having a Cold
dialogue_line: Drinking liquids and getting rest is a good idea with a cold.

title: . Having a Cold
dialogue_line: My grandmother thinks that honey and whiskey is a good cure for a cold.

title: . Having a Cold
dialogue_line: You could always go to the pharmacy if it gets worse and you want suggestions.

title: . Having a Cold
dialogue_line: If things don't get better in a few days, I will look for some other solutions.

title: . Making a Doctor's Appointment
dialogue_line: I need to make an appointment to see the doctor.

title: . Making a Doctor's Appointment
dialogue_line: What seems to be the problem?

title: . Making a Doctor's Appointment
dialogue_line: I have a rash that I need a doctor to look at.

title: . Making a Doctor's Appointment
dialogue_line: Do you have a fever with that rash?

title: . Making a Doctor's Appointment
dialogue_line: No, it just itches a lot.

title: . Making a Doctor's Appointment
dialogue_line: I have openings on Tuesday or Wednesday. Which would be best for you?

title: . Making a Doctor's Appointment
dialogue_line: I need an appointment on Tuesday.

title: . Making a Doctor's Appointment
dialogue_line: Fine, I am putting you down for 9:00 on that day. Would you like to see Dr. Smith or Dr. Jones?

title: . Making a Doctor's Appointment
dialogue_line: I would like to see Dr. Jones.

title: . Making a Doctor's Appointment
dialogue_line: I can schedule you with him with no problem. We look forward to seeing you.

title: . Making a Doctor's Appointment
dialogue_line: Good morning, I would like to make a doctor's appointment.

title: . Making a Doctor's Appointment
dialogue_line: Can you describe your health concern?

title: . Making a Doctor's Appointment
dialogue_line: I have been having skin problems that aren't going away.

title: . Making a Doctor's Appointment
dialogue_line: Are you in any pain?

title: . Making a Doctor's Appointment
dialogue_line: No. Except for the rash, I feel fine.

title: . Making a Doctor's Appointment
dialogue_line: Would Tuesday or Wednesday be best for you?

title: . Making a Doctor's Appointment
dialogue_line: I would like to come in on Tuesday.

title: . Making a Doctor's Appointment
dialogue_line: I will write you in for that day at 4:00. You can see either Dr. Smith or Dr. Jones.

title: . Making a Doctor's Appointment
dialogue_line: I would like to see Dr. Smith.

title: . Making a Doctor's Appointment
dialogue_line: I will write you in on that doctor's schedule. See you then.

title: . Making a Doctor's Appointment
dialogue_line: I need to come in and see the doctor.

title: . Making a Doctor's Appointment
dialogue_line: Are you scheduling a check-up, or are you ill?

title: . Making a Doctor's Appointment
dialogue_line: I have really itchy skin and think I may have to have it looked at.

title: . Making a Doctor's Appointment
dialogue_line: Have you been feeling any joint aches with that rash?

title: . Making a Doctor's Appointment
dialogue_line: No, but I have a low fever.

title: . Making a Doctor's Appointment
dialogue_line: I have times available for Tuesday or Wednesday. Which one would work best for you?

title: . Making a Doctor's Appointment
dialogue_line: I want to come in on Wednesday.

title: . Making a Doctor's Appointment
dialogue_line: I can fit you in on that day at 10:00. Dr. Smith or Dr. Jones is available.

title: . Making a Doctor's Appointment
dialogue_line: I would prefer Dr. Smith.

title: . Making a Doctor's Appointment
dialogue_line: You can see the doctor of your choice then, and we will see you at your scheduled appointment time.

title: . Blood Pressure
dialogue_line: Have you been having any problems lately?

title: . Blood Pressure
dialogue_line: No, but the nurse at school says that I should have my blood pressure checked.

title: . Blood Pressure
dialogue_line: Do you have a history of high blood pressure?

title: . Blood Pressure
dialogue_line: No, I have never been told that I have high blood pressure.

title: . Blood Pressure
dialogue_line: High blood pressure is called the silent killer because it hardly ever has symptoms.

title: . Blood Pressure
dialogue_line: How do you check for high blood pressure?

title: . Blood Pressure
dialogue_line: We are going to use this cuff here, and it will give me a reading.

title: . Blood Pressure
dialogue_line: What do the numbers mean?

title: . Blood Pressure
dialogue_line: They tell me how much your heart is working at rest and when pumping blood.

title: . Blood Pressure
dialogue_line: Good. That will help me know how I am doing.

title: . Blood Pressure
dialogue_line: How have you been feeling lately?

title: . Blood Pressure
dialogue_line: I've been feeling a little light-headed lately.

title: . Blood Pressure
dialogue_line: Has your blood pressure been high before?

title: . Blood Pressure
dialogue_line: If I have high blood pressure, it is news to me.

title: . Blood Pressure
dialogue_line: Usually people with high blood pressure have no symptoms, so we call it the silent killer.

title: . Blood Pressure
dialogue_line: What do you use to check for high blood pressure?

title: . Blood Pressure
dialogue_line: I am going to put a cuff on you to get a reading.

title: . Blood Pressure
dialogue_line: What does the reading tell you?

title: . Blood Pressure
dialogue_line: I get an idea of the pressure in your arteries when your heart is pumping blood versus at rest.

title: . Blood Pressure
dialogue_line: I hope that the test results show me to be really healthy.

title: . Blood Pressure
dialogue_line: Have you been feeling OK lately?

title: . Blood Pressure
dialogue_line: My coach wants you to check my blood pressure.

title: . Blood Pressure
dialogue_line: Has anyone ever told you that you had high blood pressure?

title: . Blood Pressure
dialogue_line: I don't have any symptoms of high blood pressure.

title: . Blood Pressure
dialogue_line: People with high blood pressure seldom know they have it, which is why we call it the silent killer.

title: . Blood Pressure
dialogue_line: What test do you do for high blood pressure?

title: . Blood Pressure
dialogue_line: We will pump air into this cuff to get a reading.

title: . Blood Pressure
dialogue_line: When you get the reading, what information does it give you?

title: . Blood Pressure
dialogue_line: It tells me how hard your heart pumps blood and how much your arteries relax at rest.

title: . Blood Pressure
dialogue_line: I am hoping that this test goes well for me.

title: . Not Feeling Well
dialogue_line: So, how are you feeling today?

title: . Not Feeling Well
dialogue_line: I'm pretty tired. I haven't been sleeping well.

title: . Not Feeling Well
dialogue_line: Do you have enough time to get the right amount of sleep?

title: . Not Feeling Well
dialogue_line: I have enough time. I just can't seem to fall asleep and stay asleep.

title: . Not Feeling Well
dialogue_line: What time do you usually go to bed?

title: . Not Feeling Well
dialogue_line: I don't have one time in particular. I just go to sleep whenever I feel tired.

title: . Not Feeling Well
dialogue_line: Have you been under a lot of stress lately?

title: . Not Feeling Well
dialogue_line: I just lost my job, and I am unsure about being able to find another one.

title: . Not Feeling Well
dialogue_line: Have you ever tried doing relaxation exercises before you go to bed?

title: . Not Feeling Well
dialogue_line: I haven't ever tried that, but it sounds like a good idea.

title: . Not Feeling Well
dialogue_line: How have you been doing lately?

title: . Not Feeling Well
dialogue_line: Actually, I haven't been sleeping well. I am kind of out of it.

title: . Not Feeling Well
dialogue_line: Is there some reason why you can't get enough sleep?

title: . Not Feeling Well
dialogue_line: I go to bed, but I just can't get comfortable enough to stay asleep.

title: . Not Feeling Well
dialogue_line: When do you turn in for the night?

title: . Not Feeling Well
dialogue_line: I usually try to go to bed around 11:00 or so during the week.

title: . Not Feeling Well
dialogue_line: Do you have a lot on your mind when you try to go to sleep?

title: . Not Feeling Well
dialogue_line: My mother is ill with cancer, and I think about her a lot.

title: . Not Feeling Well
dialogue_line: Do you ever meditate or read before bedtime?

title: . Not Feeling Well
dialogue_line: I usually watch a lot of television before I go to bed. Maybe I should try something else to help me quiet down.

title: . Not Feeling Well
dialogue_line: Has everything been OK with you lately?

title: . Not Feeling Well
dialogue_line: I haven't been able to get a good night's sleep lately. I'm exhausted!

title: . Not Feeling Well
dialogue_line: Have you been too busy to get enough sleep?

title: . Not Feeling Well
dialogue_line: I try to go to sleep, but I just can't stay asleep.

title: . Not Feeling Well
dialogue_line: How late do you try to go to sleep?

title: . Not Feeling Well
dialogue_line: I go to bed when I finish my work.

title: . Not Feeling Well
dialogue_line: Has anything in your day-to-day life been bothering you lately?

title: . Not Feeling Well
dialogue_line: I am worried about how I am going to pay my tuition.

title: . Not Feeling Well
dialogue_line: You might consider listening to relaxing music as you go to sleep to clear your head.

title: . Not Feeling Well
dialogue_line: Doing something relaxing before I go to sleep sounds like a plan.

title: . Physical Check-up
dialogue_line: Good morning, how are you doing today?

title: . Physical Check-up
dialogue_line: I have been feeling pretty good, Dr. Smith.

title: . Physical Check-up
dialogue_line: So, I can see by your chart that you are here for your annual physical.

title: . Physical Check-up
dialogue_line: Yes, I am playing on the tennis team this year, and they are requiring me to get a physical exam.

title: . Physical Check-up
dialogue_line: We are basically going to check your heart, lungs, blood sugar levels, and eyes, ears, and nose.

title: . Physical Check-up
dialogue_line: I've kind of been having problems being out of breath. Can you look at that?

title: . Physical Check-up
dialogue_line: Yes, I will check you for asthma, and maybe we can check you for allergies later.

title: . Physical Check-up
dialogue_line: Thank you. What will the blood test tell you?

title: . Physical Check-up
dialogue_line: We will be checking for blood sugar, cholesterol, and white blood cell count.

title: . Physical Check-up
dialogue_line: I have been working hard to stay healthy. I hope the tests turn out well.

title: . Physical Check-up
dialogue_line: So how are we feeling today?

title: . Physical Check-up
dialogue_line: Things are going well for me, Dr. Smith.

title: . Physical Check-up
dialogue_line: Am I correct in thinking that you are here for your annual physical?

title: . Physical Check-up
dialogue_line: Yes, I am applying for new health insurance, and I need a physical examination to qualify.

title: . Physical Check-up
dialogue_line: Your basic physical exam will include lungs, heart, blood levels, and eyes, ears, and nose.

title: . Physical Check-up
dialogue_line: I've been having a little trouble breathing. Would you look into that, please?

title: . Physical Check-up
dialogue_line: We can do an allergy test, and later I can send you for an asthma test.

title: . Physical Check-up
dialogue_line: I would appreciate it. When you give me a blood test, what are you looking for?

title: . Physical Check-up
dialogue_line: I am going to check your cholesterol, blood sugar, and white blood cell count.

title: . Physical Check-up
dialogue_line: I am expecting the tests to go well. I have been taking good care of myself.

title: . Physical Check-up
dialogue_line: Nice to see you; how have you been feeling lately?

title: . Physical Check-up
dialogue_line: I have been feeling great, Dr. Smith.

title: . Physical Check-up
dialogue_line: I am happy that you have decided to come in for your annual physical.

title: . Physical Check-up
dialogue_line: Yes, I am going on a cross-country bike ride on vacation and want to make sure that I don't have any problems.

title: . Physical Check-up
dialogue_line: We are going to look at your heart and lungs, do a few blood tests, and see that your eyes, ears, and nose are all working as they should be.

title: . Physical Check-up
dialogue_line: I've been having trouble with congestion in my chest. Can you give me some tests for that?

title: . Physical Check-up
dialogue_line: I can do a chest X-ray to check for congestion.

title: . Physical Check-up
dialogue_line: That would be great. What is the blood test for?

title: . Physical Check-up
dialogue_line: The blood test is for cholesterol, white blood cell count, and blood sugar.

title: . Physical Check-up
dialogue_line: I have been feeling great. I don't imagine that any of my tests will turn out badly.

title: . Seeing a Doctor in an Emergency
dialogue_line: I need a doctor's appointment right away!

title: . Seeing a Doctor in an Emergency
dialogue_line: Is this an emergency?

title: . Seeing a Doctor in an Emergency
dialogue_line: I am having trouble breathing.

title: . Seeing a Doctor in an Emergency
dialogue_line: Have you had a cold lately?

title: . Seeing a Doctor in an Emergency
dialogue_line: It has been going on for a few days now.

title: . Seeing a Doctor in an Emergency
dialogue_line: You should hang up and dial 911.

title: . Seeing a Doctor in an Emergency
dialogue_line: I don't think that this is that bad, but I need to see a doctor right away.

title: . Seeing a Doctor in an Emergency
dialogue_line: Is there someone who can drive you to our Urgent Care facility on Sunset Blvd.?

title: . Seeing a Doctor in an Emergency
dialogue_line: Yes, I can get a ride to Urgent Care.

title: . Seeing a Doctor in an Emergency
dialogue_line: Good. When you get there, a doctor will be able to see you right away.

title: . Seeing a Doctor in an Emergency
dialogue_line: I need to see a doctor soon!

title: . Seeing a Doctor in an Emergency
dialogue_line: Do you feel this is an emergency?

title: . Seeing a Doctor in an Emergency
dialogue_line: My chest feels tight, and I can't catch my breath.

title: . Seeing a Doctor in an Emergency
dialogue_line: Did this come on suddenly?

title: . Seeing a Doctor in an Emergency
dialogue_line: It started yesterday.

title: . Seeing a Doctor in an Emergency
dialogue_line: If you feel this is a real emergency, you should dial 911 for the paramedics.

title: . Seeing a Doctor in an Emergency
dialogue_line: I don't want to dial 911, but I want to see a doctor right now.

title: . Seeing a Doctor in an Emergency
dialogue_line: Do you have transportation to our Urgent Care facility on Sunset Blvd.?

title: . Seeing a Doctor in an Emergency
dialogue_line: My friend can drive me to Urgent Care.

title: . Seeing a Doctor in an Emergency
dialogue_line: That will work out well. Remember, if you have major problems, call 911.

title: . Seeing a Doctor in an Emergency
dialogue_line: I have to see the doctor right now!

title: . Seeing a Doctor in an Emergency
dialogue_line: What makes you feel this is an emergency?

title: . Seeing a Doctor in an Emergency
dialogue_line: I feel like I can't breathe well.

title: . Seeing a Doctor in an Emergency
dialogue_line: How long has this been going on?

title: . Seeing a Doctor in an Emergency
dialogue_line: It started last night.

title: . Seeing a Doctor in an Emergency
dialogue_line: In the event of a real emergency, please dial 911.

title: . Seeing a Doctor in an Emergency
dialogue_line: I know that I can dial 911, but I just want to go to the doctor now.

title: . Seeing a Doctor in an Emergency
dialogue_line: In that case, can you come to our Urgent Care facility on Sunset Blvd.?

title: . Seeing a Doctor in an Emergency
dialogue_line: My family can bring me to Urgent Care.

title: . Seeing a Doctor in an Emergency
dialogue_line: Come in right away, and they will see you as soon as possible.

title: . Taking an X-Ray
dialogue_line: I was told to come to you to get a chest X-ray.

title: . Taking an X-Ray
dialogue_line: No problem. Just take your clothes off from the waist up and put the gown on, with the opening in the back.

title: . Taking an X-Ray
dialogue_line: Then what should I do?

title: . Taking an X-Ray
dialogue_line: You will stand over here up against this plate.

title: . Taking an X-Ray
dialogue_line: Should I just stand naturally?

title: . Taking an X-Ray
dialogue_line: You will raise your arms up shoulder high.

title: . Taking an X-Ray
dialogue_line: Is this all right?

title: . Taking an X-Ray
dialogue_line: Yes, you are doing great.

title: . Taking an X-Ray
dialogue_line: Where will you be going?

title: . Taking an X-Ray
dialogue_line: I need to stand behind this shield. Now you will take a deep breath, hold it, and let it out.

title: . Taking an X-Ray
dialogue_line: Is that it?

title: . Taking an X-Ray
dialogue_line: That's it. You can get dressed when the film is developed.

title: . Taking an X-Ray
dialogue_line: My doctor said that I need a chest X-ray.

title: . Taking an X-Ray
dialogue_line: Just take your clothes off from the waist up and put this gown on, with the opening in the back.

title: . Taking an X-Ray
dialogue_line: What should I do after that?

title: . Taking an X-Ray
dialogue_line: You need to come over here and face this plate.

title: . Taking an X-Ray
dialogue_line: Am I standing the right way?

title: . Taking an X-Ray
dialogue_line: I will need your arms raised to shoulder height.

title: . Taking an X-Ray
dialogue_line: Am I doing this the right way?

title: . Taking an X-Ray
dialogue_line: Everything you are doing is perfect.

title: . Taking an X-Ray
dialogue_line: Are you going to leave?

title: . Taking an X-Ray
dialogue_line: I am just getting behind this screen. You need to take a deep breath, hold it, and then breathe normally.

title: . Taking an X-Ray
dialogue_line: Is that all there is to it?

title: . Taking an X-Ray
dialogue_line: You can get dressed as soon as the film is processed. We will be all done here.

title: . Taking an X-Ray
dialogue_line: I came here to get a chest X-ray.

title: . Taking an X-Ray
dialogue_line: I will need you to take your clothes off from the waist up and put on the gown, leaving the opening in the back.

title: . Taking an X-Ray
dialogue_line: What comes next?

title: . Taking an X-Ray
dialogue_line: I will need you to face this glass plate right over here.

title: . Taking an X-Ray
dialogue_line: Should I do anything else?

title: . Taking an X-Ray
dialogue_line: Your arms need to be raised to shoulder height.

title: . Taking an X-Ray
dialogue_line: Is this OK?

title: . Taking an X-Ray
dialogue_line: So far, so good.

title: . Taking an X-Ray
dialogue_line: How come you are walking away?

title: . Taking an X-Ray
dialogue_line: I am not leaving. I just need you to take a really deep breath, hold it, and then let it out.

title: . Taking an X-Ray
dialogue_line: Will I be finished then?

title: . Taking an X-Ray
dialogue_line: You will be able to put your clothes on as soon as I have checked the film.

title: . Seeing the Doctor
dialogue_line: I have been having a lot of headaches lately.

title: . Seeing the Doctor
dialogue_line: Have you been having these headaches for a long time?

title: . Seeing the Doctor
dialogue_line: I have had headaches my whole life, but they have been getting worse lately.

title: . Seeing the Doctor
dialogue_line: Have you been under a lot of stress lately?

title: . Seeing the Doctor
dialogue_line: I've been under stress, but no more than usual.

title: . Seeing the Doctor
dialogue_line: Have you been getting enough sleep lately?

title: . Seeing the Doctor
dialogue_line: No, I only sleep a few hours a night.

title: . Seeing the Doctor
dialogue_line: Have you had any head injuries lately?

title: . Seeing the Doctor
dialogue_line: Yes, actually I fell skiing last week and hit my head.

title: . Seeing the Doctor
dialogue_line: I am going to send you for a CT scan, and I will see you again when we see the results.

title: . Seeing the Doctor
dialogue_line: I have been getting headaches almost every day lately.

title: . Seeing the Doctor
dialogue_line: Have you just started getting a lot of headaches?

title: . Seeing the Doctor
dialogue_line: I never had very many headaches before, but the last few weeks I have been getting a lot of them.

title: . Seeing the Doctor
dialogue_line: Have you had any unusually stressful situations in your life lately?

title: . Seeing the Doctor
dialogue_line: My mother just passed away last Tuesday.

title: . Seeing the Doctor
dialogue_line: I'm sorry. How about sleep? Are you getting enough rest?

title: . Seeing the Doctor
dialogue_line: I have been working really hard, and sleep has not been a priority.

title: . Seeing the Doctor
dialogue_line: Have you bumped your head or fallen lately?

title: . Seeing the Doctor
dialogue_line: No, I haven't hit my head.

title: . Seeing the Doctor
dialogue_line: I am going to send you to a neurologist for a few tests.

title: . Seeing the Doctor
dialogue_line: I have had some really horrible headaches lately.

title: . Seeing the Doctor
dialogue_line: How long have your headaches been going on?

title: . Seeing the Doctor
dialogue_line: I get headaches occasionally, but they have been really bad lately.

title: . Seeing the Doctor
dialogue_line: Any unusual amounts of stress in your life going on right now?

title: . Seeing the Doctor
dialogue_line: I am getting ready to take my GRE.

title: . Seeing the Doctor
dialogue_line: Have you been able to sleep regular hours?

title: . Seeing the Doctor
dialogue_line: It has been hard for me to sleep with a bad headache.

title: . Seeing the Doctor
dialogue_line: Has anything hit you in the head lately?

title: . Seeing the Doctor
dialogue_line: I hit my head on a cupboard door a week ago.

title: . Seeing the Doctor
dialogue_line: Let's have you come back in a few days and see how you feel.

title: . Talking to the Doctor about Problems
dialogue_line: How are you doing today?

title: . Talking to the Doctor about Problems
dialogue_line: I've been having trouble breathing lately.

title: . Talking to the Doctor about Problems
dialogue_line: Have you had any type of cold lately?

title: . Talking to the Doctor about Problems
dialogue_line: No, I haven't had a cold. I just have a heavy feeling in my chest when I try to breathe.

title: . Talking to the Doctor about Problems
dialogue_line: Do you have any allergies that you know of?

title: . Talking to the Doctor about Problems
dialogue_line: No, I don't have any allergies that I know of.

title: . Talking to the Doctor about Problems
dialogue_line: Does this happen all the time or mostly when you are active?

title: . Talking to the Doctor about Problems
dialogue_line: It happens a lot when I work out.

title: . Talking to the Doctor about Problems
dialogue_line: I am going to send you to a pulmonary specialist who can run tests on you for asthma.

title: . Talking to the Doctor about Problems
dialogue_line: Thank you for your help, doctor.

title: . Talking to the Doctor about Problems
dialogue_line: What brings you to my office today?

title: . Talking to the Doctor about Problems
dialogue_line: I've been getting really short of breath, and my coach wanted to have a doctor check me out.

title: . Talking to the Doctor about Problems
dialogue_line: Have you had the flu lately?

title: . Talking to the Doctor about Problems
dialogue_line: No, I have been pretty healthy. I just have trouble taking a really deep breath.

title: . Talking to the Doctor about Problems
dialogue_line: Have you ever been tested for allergies?

title: . Talking to the Doctor about Problems
dialogue_line: Peaches make me break out, but I don't have any other allergies.

title: . Talking to the Doctor about Problems
dialogue_line: Does this happen all the time or maybe a little more in the cold weather?

title: . Talking to the Doctor about Problems
dialogue_line: I've noticed that it is worse when I am under stress, like during finals week.

title: . Talking to the Doctor about Problems
dialogue_line: I feel that you should see a pulmonary specialist to check for asthma.

title: . Talking to the Doctor about Problems
dialogue_line: I appreciate the referral, doctor.

title: . Talking to the Doctor about Problems
dialogue_line: Good morning, how have you been doing?

title: . Talking to the Doctor about Problems
dialogue_line: I haven't been able to take a deep breath lately, and I need to know why.

title: . Talking to the Doctor about Problems
dialogue_line: Have you had any type of bug lately?

title: . Talking to the Doctor about Problems
dialogue_line: No, I've been feeling fairly good most of the time. It just is hard to breathe.

title: . Talking to the Doctor about Problems
dialogue_line: Has anyone ever told you that you have allergies?

title: . Talking to the Doctor about Problems
dialogue_line: No one has ever checked me for allergies.

title: . Talking to the Doctor about Problems
dialogue_line: Does this happen more when you are under stress?

title: . Talking to the Doctor about Problems
dialogue_line: When the weather gets really cold, it gets worse.

title: . Talking to the Doctor about Problems
dialogue_line: I am going to refer you to a pulmonary specialist who can run tests on you for asthma.

title: . Talking to the Doctor about Problems
dialogue_line: Thank you for pursuing this. I appreciate your help.

title: . Taking a Urine Sample
dialogue_line: What is that plastic cup for?

title: . Taking a Urine Sample
dialogue_line: Your doctor has requested a urine sample.

title: . Taking a Urine Sample
dialogue_line: Am I supposed to pee into the cup?

title: . Taking a Urine Sample
dialogue_line: We want what we call a clean sample. Urinate a drop or so into the toilet, and then stop the flow and urinate into the cup.

title: . Taking a Urine Sample
dialogue_line: Then what do I do with the cup?

title: . Taking a Urine Sample
dialogue_line: You put the cup in the little cubby in the restroom and close the door to the cubby.

title: . Taking a Urine Sample
dialogue_line: What is this test for?

title: . Taking a Urine Sample
dialogue_line: He is looking to see if you have a bladder or urinary tract infection.

title: . Taking a Urine Sample
dialogue_line: When will I know the results?

title: . Taking a Urine Sample
dialogue_line: Your doctor will call you in a few days with the results.

title: . Taking a Urine Sample
dialogue_line: Why are you handing me a plastic cup?

title: . Taking a Urine Sample
dialogue_line: Your doctor wants to test your urine and needs a sample.

title: . Taking a Urine Sample
dialogue_line: How am I supposed to do that?

title: . Taking a Urine Sample
dialogue_line: We need you to urinate like you normally would, and then stop and finish into the cup.

title: . Taking a Urine Sample
dialogue_line: What am I supposed to do with the cup when I am done?

title: . Taking a Urine Sample
dialogue_line: Leave the cup in the cubby in the restroom. Just close the cubby door and walk away.

title: . Taking a Urine Sample
dialogue_line: What kind of test is this?

title: . Taking a Urine Sample
dialogue_line: He wants to know if you have bacteria in your urine, which could signal an infection.

title: . Taking a Urine Sample
dialogue_line: How long will it take to get the results?

title: . Taking a Urine Sample
dialogue_line: We will send your doctor the results, and he will contact you.

title: . Taking a Urine Sample
dialogue_line: What am I supposed to do with this plastic cup?

title: . Taking a Urine Sample
dialogue_line: That cup is for a urine sample.

title: . Taking a Urine Sample
dialogue_line: How, exactly, does this work?

title: . Taking a Urine Sample
dialogue_line: This particular test calls for you to urinate into the cup after you have urinated a little into the toilet.

title: . Taking a Urine Sample
dialogue_line: When I finish, what should I do then?

title: . Taking a Urine Sample
dialogue_line: You need to leave the cup in the cubby in the restroom, and the lab tech will get it from the other side.

title: . Taking a Urine Sample
dialogue_line: What is my doctor testing me for?

title: . Taking a Urine Sample
dialogue_line: If there are bacteria in your urine, it could mean an infection somewhere.

title: . Taking a Urine Sample
dialogue_line: Will I know the results right away?

title: . Taking a Urine Sample
dialogue_line: Your doctor will be contacting you with the results.

title: . How to Stay Healthy
dialogue_line: Doctor, can you give me some suggestions on how to stay healthy?

title: . How to Stay Healthy
dialogue_line: Well, first of all, you need to make sure that you eat the right foods.

title: . How to Stay Healthy
dialogue_line: What are the best foods to eat?

title: . How to Stay Healthy
dialogue_line: You should emphasize fresh fruits and vegetables, along with whole grains and protein.

title: . How to Stay Healthy
dialogue_line: What should I avoid?

title: . How to Stay Healthy
dialogue_line: You need to avoid highly fatty and greasy foods. You should also avoid too much sugar and caffeine.

title: . How to Stay Healthy
dialogue_line: What else is important to stay healthy?

title: . How to Stay Healthy
dialogue_line: You need to get plenty of exercise every day. If you smoke, you need to stop.

title: . How to Stay Healthy
dialogue_line: Is it OK to drink alcohol?

title: . How to Stay Healthy
dialogue_line: Actually, studies have shown that people who have one-half a glass of alcohol per day do better than those who don't drink.

title: . How to Stay Healthy
dialogue_line: Doctor, what is the best way to stay healthy?

title: . How to Stay Healthy
dialogue_line: Having a good diet is probably the most important thing.

title: . How to Stay Healthy
dialogue_line: It is very confusing to know what to eat.

title: . How to Stay Healthy
dialogue_line: You need plenty of fruits and vegetables, small amounts of protein, and whole grains.

title: . How to Stay Healthy
dialogue_line: Are there certain things that I should avoid?

title: . How to Stay Healthy
dialogue_line: You shouldn't consume too much sugar or caffeine. Also, watch your intake of fatty food.

title: . How to Stay Healthy
dialogue_line: After watching my diet, what else should I do?

title: . How to Stay Healthy
dialogue_line: You need to stop smoking, and make sure that you get 30 minutes of exercise every day.

title: . How to Stay Healthy
dialogue_line: Can I have a glass of wine now and then?

title: . How to Stay Healthy
dialogue_line: As long as you don't overdo it, a glass of wine a day should be OK.

title: . How to Stay Healthy
dialogue_line: Doctor, what are some things I can do to stay as healthy as I can be?

title: . How to Stay Healthy
dialogue_line: You need to eat healthy foods and avoid unhealthy foods.

title: . How to Stay Healthy
dialogue_line: Sometimes I don't know what the best foods are.

title: . How to Stay Healthy
dialogue_line: Fresh fruits and vegetables are important, along with protein and whole grains.

title: . How to Stay Healthy
dialogue_line: What things should I avoid?

title: . How to Stay Healthy
dialogue_line: You don't want to eat food that is high in fat. You need to avoid caffeine and sugar.

title: . How to Stay Healthy
dialogue_line: Beyond diet, what else can I do to be healthy?

title: . How to Stay Healthy
dialogue_line: Getting 30 minutes of exercise a day is important. If you smoke, you need to stop.

title: . How to Stay Healthy
dialogue_line: How about having a beer on the weekend?

title: . How to Stay Healthy
dialogue_line: Less than a serving of alcohol a day can actually be good for you. Do not overdo it!

title: . Prescribing Medicine
dialogue_line: Is there a medication you can prescribe to help me with my problem?

title: . Prescribing Medicine
dialogue_line: There are various choices of blood pressure medication that we can try.

title: . Prescribing Medicine
dialogue_line: What is available?

title: . Prescribing Medicine
dialogue_line: We could start with Hydrochlorothiazide, which is a diuretic.

title: . Prescribing Medicine
dialogue_line: Are there many side effects?

title: . Prescribing Medicine
dialogue_line: There really are not many side effects. You need to drink a lot of water when you take this pill.

title: . Prescribing Medicine
dialogue_line: Is that the only medication I need to take?

title: . Prescribing Medicine
dialogue_line: It might be, but for a while I also want you to take an ACE inhibitor, Lisinopril.

title: . Prescribing Medicine
dialogue_line: What are the side effects of that drug?

title: . Prescribing Medicine
dialogue_line: You may have a little bit of a dry cough, but you will feel much better.

title: . Prescribing Medicine
dialogue_line: Can I get some medicine to help me?

title: . Prescribing Medicine
dialogue_line: For your high blood pressure, we have several choices of medications.

title: . Prescribing Medicine
dialogue_line: What types of drugs can I try?

title: . Prescribing Medicine
dialogue_line: Hydrochlorothiazide is a diuretic that helps with water retention.

title: . Prescribing Medicine
dialogue_line: What about side effects from that medication?

title: . Prescribing Medicine
dialogue_line: Most people have no side effects. You will have to make sure that you drink plenty of liquids with this medication.

title: . Prescribing Medicine
dialogue_line: Do I only need to take that one drug?

title: . Prescribing Medicine
dialogue_line: I am going to add a second drug for now, Lisinopril, which is an ACE inhibitor.

title: . Prescribing Medicine
dialogue_line: What can I expect when I take that medication?

title: . Prescribing Medicine
dialogue_line: You will feel much better except for the fact that you might have a little cough.

title: . Prescribing Medicine
dialogue_line: What about a medication to help me with my problem?

title: . Prescribing Medicine
dialogue_line: There are several types of medications that we can try for your high blood pressure.

title: . Prescribing Medicine
dialogue_line: What types of medications would be best?

title: . Prescribing Medicine
dialogue_line: For water retention, I am going to start you on Hydrochlorothiazide, which is a diuretic.

title: . Prescribing Medicine
dialogue_line: What are the side effects from taking that drug,

title: . Prescribing Medicine
dialogue_line: You need to stay hydrated on this drug, but most people experience little side effects.

title: . Prescribing Medicine
dialogue_line: Will that one medication take care of all of my problems?

title: . Prescribing Medicine
dialogue_line: For now I want you to take a second drug, Lisinopril, an ACE inhibitor.

title: . Prescribing Medicine
dialogue_line: Am I going to experience any complications with that drug?

title: . Prescribing Medicine
dialogue_line: The most you will experience will be a dry cough but you probably won't experience anything negative.

title: How to Find a Job
dialogue_line: I was wondering if you could help me use the Student Job Center.

title: How to Find a Job
dialogue_line: There are many ways; what kind of job would you like?

title: How to Find a Job
dialogue_line: I want to work in a restaurant.

title: How to Find a Job
dialogue_line: Fine! Will you need part-time or full-time work?

title: How to Find a Job
dialogue_line: I want to work part-time.

title: How to Find a Job
dialogue_line: Fine, the two best ways are to use our local listings binders over there or you can use the computers with the Internet job listing sites. See them over there?

title: How to Find a Job
dialogue_line: Yes, I know what to do.

title: How to Find a Job
dialogue_line: Well, in addition, you can schedule an appointment with a job counselor on this list. If you would like to do that, sign here, OK?

title: How to Find a Job
dialogue_line: Yes, I think that would be great.

title: How to Find a Job
dialogue_line: Fine, well the job search tools are all here for you to use. Feel free to look around and use what works best for you. Have fun with it!

title: How to Find a Job
dialogue_line: Could you help me figure out how to look for a job?

title: How to Find a Job
dialogue_line: We have lots of options, what type of job do you need?

title: How to Find a Job
dialogue_line: I want to work in an office.

title: How to Find a Job
dialogue_line: Do you want to work part-time or full-time?

title: How to Find a Job
dialogue_line: I want to work full-time.

title: How to Find a Job
dialogue_line: We have binders with local job listings or you can make use of the computers. OK?

title: How to Find a Job
dialogue_line: I am confused a bit but I am sure that I can figure it out.

title: How to Find a Job
dialogue_line: If you make an appointment with a job counselor, they can also provide you with a lot of information. Do you want to see a counselor?

title: How to Find a Job
dialogue_line: No, I don't think I need to do that.

title: How to Find a Job
dialogue_line: Well, you know that this job center is here for your use, so help yourself. Good luck!

title: How to Find a Job
dialogue_line: What is the best way to find a job here?

title: How to Find a Job
dialogue_line: There are different ways of conducting a job search. Do you know what you want to do?

title: How to Find a Job
dialogue_line: I don't know.

title: How to Find a Job
dialogue_line: Can you work part-time or full-time?

title: How to Find a Job
dialogue_line: It doesn't matter right now, either one would be OK.

title: How to Find a Job
dialogue_line: The binders have current local jobs listings and the computer jobs lists are good too. Understand?

title: How to Find a Job
dialogue_line: OK, I'll go check it out.

title: How to Find a Job
dialogue_line: Schedule an appointment with a counselor and you can get more information. Would that work for you?

title: How to Find a Job
dialogue_line: I am not sure.

title: How to Find a Job
dialogue_line: Everything that you need for a successful job search is here. Happy job searching!

title: Preparing for a Job Interview
dialogue_line: Could you help me try and figure out how to get ready for my job interview?

title: Preparing for a Job Interview
dialogue_line: The most important thing to do is to make sure you know the company and what services or products it provides. Do you know all about them?

title: Preparing for a Job Interview
dialogue_line: Yes, I pretty much understand the company.

title: Preparing for a Job Interview
dialogue_line: Well, after you've done your research, you have to decide whether the company is casual or formal. Have you decided what they are yet?

title: Preparing for a Job Interview
dialogue_line: Yes, I've been observing them.

title: Preparing for a Job Interview
dialogue_line: When you are choosing what to wear, keep all of that in mind. Have you chosen what to wear?

title: Preparing for a Job Interview
dialogue_line: I already have something to wear.

title: Preparing for a Job Interview
dialogue_line: I would always be ready to go shopping with you! Should we talk about other basics?

title: Preparing for a Job Interview
dialogue_line: I am ready to think of other things.

title: Preparing for a Job Interview
dialogue_line: You need to make sure you arrive on time, smile, be pleasant and friendly, look the person in the eye and answer all questions to the best of your ability. You'll do great!

title: Preparing for a Job Interview
dialogue_line: I am not sure what to do to get ready for my job interview.

title: Preparing for a Job Interview
dialogue_line: Make sure that you understand the company. Do you understand what it is that they do?

title: Preparing for a Job Interview
dialogue_line: No, I probably need to do some more research.

title: Preparing for a Job Interview
dialogue_line: When you've finished your research it will help you figure out whether your company is rigid in philosophy or kind of more relaxed. Does that make sense?

title: Preparing for a Job Interview
dialogue_line: I think that their attitude is rather casual.

title: Preparing for a Job Interview
dialogue_line: So all of that information will help you to pick out what to wear. Do you have something to wear?

title: Preparing for a Job Interview
dialogue_line: I have absolutely nothing so far.

title: Preparing for a Job Interview
dialogue_line: I could go shopping with you sometime if you need it, but can we talk about other basics?

title: Preparing for a Job Interview
dialogue_line: Yes, where should we go from here?

title: Preparing for a Job Interview
dialogue_line: Focus on being relaxed and open, don't forget to smile and shake hands and be genuinely interested in what their company is about. I'm sure you'll do well.

title: Preparing for a Job Interview
dialogue_line: What should I do to prepare for a job interview?

title: Preparing for a Job Interview
dialogue_line: An understanding of the basic workings of a company and the services or goods it provides is essential. Do you have that?

title: Preparing for a Job Interview
dialogue_line: Sort of, but I could know more, I guess.

title: Preparing for a Job Interview
dialogue_line: With that understanding, you can figure out what your company is looking for in terms of basic attitude. Right?

title: Preparing for a Job Interview
dialogue_line: I think that they are a very formal company.

title: Preparing for a Job Interview
dialogue_line: What you wear is important. So keep in mind what is suitable for the company and type of work you will be doing. Need help?

title: Preparing for a Job Interview
dialogue_line: I need a lot of help in this area.

title: Preparing for a Job Interview
dialogue_line: In addition to clothes we need to think about other basics, OK?

title: Preparing for a Job Interview
dialogue_line: Yes, what else should we think of?

title: Preparing for a Job Interview
dialogue_line: Be prompt. Don't forget to be friendly and interested. Listen carefully and listen to what they are really asking you. You'll be a hit!

title: Greeting by Receptionist
dialogue_line: I am here for my job interview.

title: Greeting by Receptionist
dialogue_line: Fine, have a seat. May I get you some water or coffee?

title: Greeting by Receptionist
dialogue_line: Sure, thank you.

title: Greeting by Receptionist
dialogue_line: I'll get that for you right now.

title: Greeting by Receptionist
dialogue_line: Thank you. What a nice office this is!

title: Greeting by Receptionist
dialogue_line: Yes, could you come in now? I am going to take you back to meet your interviewer, Mr. Gotcha.

title: Greeting by Receptionist
dialogue_line: I have an appointment for an interview today.

title: Greeting by Receptionist
dialogue_line: Great, have a seat. Would you like some tea or coffee?

title: Greeting by Receptionist
dialogue_line: I'd love some.

title: Greeting by Receptionist
dialogue_line: The coffee area is right over there. Please help yourself.

title: Greeting by Receptionist
dialogue_line: Thank you. What a beautiful view from this office!

title: Greeting by Receptionist
dialogue_line: Yes. Oh, here comes Mr. Gotcha now. I'll show you to his office.

title: Greeting by Receptionist
dialogue_line: Good morning. I have an interview scheduled this morning.

title: Greeting by Receptionist
dialogue_line: The interviewer will be with you in a moment. Would you care for some water?

title: Greeting by Receptionist
dialogue_line: Yes, that would be great.

title: Greeting by Receptionist
dialogue_line: Just help yourself to whatever you would like from the table in the waiting area.

title: Greeting by Receptionist
dialogue_line: Thank you. This is a very lovely office building!

title: Greeting by Receptionist
dialogue_line: Yes. Why don't you come straight through the door and we'll walk down to Mr. Gotha's office together.

title: 4. Job Interview (1)
dialogue_line: Good morning, I am here for my interview.

title: 4. Job Interview (1)
dialogue_line: Hello, nice to meet you. I'm Mr. Gotcha. Have any trouble finding the place?

title: 4. Job Interview (1)
dialogue_line: No problem.

title: 4. Job Interview (1)
dialogue_line: So why don't you tell me why you are interested in changing positions?

title: 4. Job Interview (1)
dialogue_line: Unfortunately, our company is shutting down due to the economy.

title: 4. Job Interview (1)
dialogue_line: What would you consider your strengths?

title: 4. Job Interview (1)
dialogue_line: I am probably best at researching for marketing purposes.

title: 4. Job Interview (1)
dialogue_line: What is your biggest weakness?

title: 4. Job Interview (1)
dialogue_line: I tend to get bored easily and so love to keep myself challenged.

title: 4. Job Interview (1)
dialogue_line: We have a position where that could work out well.

title: 4. Job Interview (1)
dialogue_line: Thank you for taking the time to interview me.

title: 4. Job Interview (1)
dialogue_line: Hi there, I'm Bill Gotcha, the owner of Gotcha Enterprises. Did you find your way here OK?

title: 4. Job Interview (1)
dialogue_line: Your assistant gave wonderful directions.

title: 4. Job Interview (1)
dialogue_line: Why are you switching jobs at this point in your career?

title: 4. Job Interview (1)
dialogue_line: Our company is moving overseas and I wish to stay in the United States.

title: 4. Job Interview (1)
dialogue_line: What are you best at?

title: 4. Job Interview (1)
dialogue_line: I am good at organizing systems that have been having problems.

title: 4. Job Interview (1)
dialogue_line: What is your biggest challenge in terms of skills?

title: 4. Job Interview (1)
dialogue_line: I don't like to sit around and so like to always find things to do to keep myself busy.

title: 4. Job Interview (1)
dialogue_line: That is good to hear!

title: 4. Job Interview (1)
dialogue_line: Good afternoon. Thank you for the opportunity to interview for this position.

title: 4. Job Interview (1)
dialogue_line: Hello, have a seat. I'm Bill Gotcha. I am assuming you found your way here with no trouble?

title: 4. Job Interview (1)
dialogue_line: Actually, I am very familiar with the area so there was absolutely no problem.

title: 4. Job Interview (1)
dialogue_line: I am curious as to why you want to leave your current employer.

title: 4. Job Interview (1)
dialogue_line: I am interested in switching fields.

title: 4. Job Interview (1)
dialogue_line: Do you feel that you are exceptionally good at anything in particular?

title: 4. Job Interview (1)
dialogue_line: I am good at pulling together teams of people to accomplish a task.

title: 4. Job Interview (1)
