title: 4. Asking the Concierge for Sightseeing Advice
dialogue_line: The front desk told me to ask you for sightseeing advice.

title: 4. Asking the Concierge for Sightseeing Advice
dialogue_line: Of course. I'd be more than happy to help. I am, after all, the hotel's concierge.

title: 4. Asking the Concierge for Sightseeing Advice
dialogue_line: Concierge? What exactly is that?

title: 4. Asking the Concierge for Sightseeing Advice
dialogue_line: We advise you on where to visit, eat, or shop during your stay here in New York.

title: 4. Asking the Concierge for Sightseeing Advice
dialogue_line: Great! So where should I start my sightseeing?

title: 4. Asking the Concierge for Sightseeing Advice
dialogue_line: The Statue of Liberty is always a good place to begin.

title: 4. Asking the Concierge for Sightseeing Advice
dialogue_line: I saw the Statue of Liberty on my last visit here. Can you recommend somewhere else?

title: 4. Asking the Concierge for Sightseeing Advice
dialogue_line: Hmm. What type of interests do you have?

title: 4. Asking the Concierge for Sightseeing Advice
dialogue_line: In my spare time, I really like to view art and go running.

title: 4. Asking the Concierge for Sightseeing Advice
dialogue_line: Aha! Have you been to Central Park or the Museum of Modern Art?

title: 4. Asking the Concierge for Sightseeing Advice
dialogue_line: No, but I've heard a lot about both.

title: 4. Asking the Concierge for Sightseeing Advice
dialogue_line: Well, Central Park is wonderful for running. Afterwards, you should head to the Museum to enjoy the art.

title: 4. Asking the Concierge for Sightseeing Advice
dialogue_line: Great! That sounds like a plan. Thanks a lot.

title: 4. Asking the Concierge for Sightseeing Advice
dialogue_line: I'm sure you'll have a good time there.

title: 4. Asking the Concierge for Sightseeing Advice
dialogue_line: I was told to see you about going sightseeing.

title: 4. Asking the Concierge for Sightseeing Advice
dialogue_line: It's my pleasure. I'm the hotel's concierge, at your service.

title: 4. Asking the Concierge for Sightseeing Advice
dialogue_line: Concierge? Could you explain that to me?

title: 4. Asking the Concierge for Sightseeing Advice
dialogue_line: We help direct hotel visitors to popular places to visit, eat, and shop.

title: 4. Asking the Concierge for Sightseeing Advice
dialogue_line: Very good. So where shall I begin my sightseeing?

title: 4. Asking the Concierge for Sightseeing Advice
dialogue_line: I would suggest the Statue of Liberty.

title: 4. Asking the Concierge for Sightseeing Advice
dialogue_line: Gee, I've already seen the Statue of Liberty. What about another site?

title: 4. Asking the Concierge for Sightseeing Advice
dialogue_line: Let me see. What do you like to do in your spare time?

title: 4. Asking the Concierge for Sightseeing Advice
dialogue_line: I really like to run. And I like art.

title: 4. Asking the Concierge for Sightseeing Advice
dialogue_line: Well, there you go! Have you ever visited either Central Park or the Museum of Modern Art?

title: 4. Asking the Concierge for Sightseeing Advice
dialogue_line: No, but I've been meaning to.

title: 4. Asking the Concierge for Sightseeing Advice
dialogue_line: Well, Central Park is fantastic for running. Then you can go to the Museum to look at the beautiful art.

title: 4. Asking the Concierge for Sightseeing Advice
dialogue_line: That sounds like a great plan. I'll do that.

title: 4. Asking the Concierge for Sightseeing Advice
dialogue_line: Enjoy your run and your visit!

title: 4. Asking the Concierge for Sightseeing Advice
dialogue_line: I need some sightseeing advice.

title: 4. Asking the Concierge for Sightseeing Advice
dialogue_line: That's what I'm here for, sir. Every good hotel has a concierge like me.

title: 4. Asking the Concierge for Sightseeing Advice
dialogue_line: I don't travel a lot. What exactly is a concierge?

title: 4. Asking the Concierge for Sightseeing Advice
dialogue_line: A concierge helps visitors like you find great places to visit, shop, and eat.

title: 4. Asking the Concierge for Sightseeing Advice
dialogue_line: That's great! So tell me, where should I go first?

title: 4. Asking the Concierge for Sightseeing Advice
dialogue_line: I'd suggest that you start at the Statue of Liberty.

title: 4. Asking the Concierge for Sightseeing Advice
dialogue_line: You know, I've already been there. Can you suggest another place?

title: 4. Asking the Concierge for Sightseeing Advice
dialogue_line: Maybe. Tell me what you like to do in your spare time.

title: 4. Asking the Concierge for Sightseeing Advice
dialogue_line: When I have some free time, I often spend it running or at museums.

title: 4. Asking the Concierge for Sightseeing Advice
dialogue_line: Well, have you ever been to either Central Park or the Museum of Modern Art?

title: 4. Asking the Concierge for Sightseeing Advice
dialogue_line: No, but I sure would like to.

title: 4. Asking the Concierge for Sightseeing Advice
dialogue_line: Central Park is great for just about everything outdoors. Then you can visit the Museum of Modern Art.

title: 4. Asking the Concierge for Sightseeing Advice
dialogue_line: Both places sound great. I'll try to do that today.

title: 4. Asking the Concierge for Sightseeing Advice
dialogue_line: Enjoy the views at both places.

title: 4. Asking the Concierge for Sightseeing Advice
dialogue_line: I'm going sightseeing, but I'd like to get your advice first.

title: 4. Asking the Concierge for Sightseeing Advice
dialogue_line: I'm only too happy to help. Tourists should always check with their concierge first.

title: 4. Asking the Concierge for Sightseeing Advice
dialogue_line: Concierge? I'm not familiar with that word.

title: 4. Asking the Concierge for Sightseeing Advice
dialogue_line: A concierge directs visitors to the city's great tourist, shopping, and eating places.

title: 4. Asking the Concierge for Sightseeing Advice
dialogue_line: That sounds great. Now, is there any place that I should hit first?

title: 4. Asking the Concierge for Sightseeing Advice
dialogue_line: Well, if you're like most people, you'll want to go to the Statue of Liberty.

title: 4. Asking the Concierge for Sightseeing Advice
dialogue_line: I've already seen it, I loved it, but today I want to go somewhere else.

title: 4. Asking the Concierge for Sightseeing Advice
dialogue_line: Sure! Tell me about your interests.

title: 4. Asking the Concierge for Sightseeing Advice
dialogue_line: I like to run and I like to see the works of the masters.

title: 4. Asking the Concierge for Sightseeing Advice
dialogue_line: You'll get along fabulously at Central Park and the Museum of Modern Art! Have you been to either?

title: 4. Asking the Concierge for Sightseeing Advice
dialogue_line: No, I just haven't had the opportunity.

title: 4. Asking the Concierge for Sightseeing Advice
dialogue_line: You'll love Central Park for running. Later on, you can go to the Museum of Modern Art.

title: 4. Asking the Concierge for Sightseeing Advice
dialogue_line: Thank you. That's what I'll do.

title: 4. Asking the Concierge for Sightseeing Advice
dialogue_line: This might be the best day of your visit.

title: 4. Asking the Concierge for Sightseeing Advice
dialogue_line: I need some sightseeing advice. I was told to come to see you.

title: 4. Asking the Concierge for Sightseeing Advice
dialogue_line: As your concierge, it is my pleasure to help you, sir.

title: 4. Asking the Concierge for Sightseeing Advice
dialogue_line: Concierge? Are we speaking English here?

title: 4. Asking the Concierge for Sightseeing Advice
dialogue_line: A concierge helps you find all the great places for visiting, shopping, and eating.

title: 4. Asking the Concierge for Sightseeing Advice
dialogue_line: What would you suggest that I visit first?

title: 4. Asking the Concierge for Sightseeing Advice
dialogue_line: How about starting at the Statue of Liberty? Many people like to begin there.

title: 4. Asking the Concierge for Sightseeing Advice
dialogue_line: The last time I was here, I visited the Statue. So do you have another place in mind?

title: 4. Asking the Concierge for Sightseeing Advice
dialogue_line: I think so. Tell me what interests you.

title: 4. Asking the Concierge for Sightseeing Advice
dialogue_line: I'm big on running, although maybe I like art even more than running.

title: 4. Asking the Concierge for Sightseeing Advice
dialogue_line: Then you must go to Central Park and the Museum of Modern Art! Have you been to either one?

title: 4. Asking the Concierge for Sightseeing Advice
dialogue_line: No. I haven't had a chance to go to either of them.

title: 4. Asking the Concierge for Sightseeing Advice
dialogue_line: Both places are usually crowded with natives and tourists. You'll love the Park and the Museum.

title: 4. Asking the Concierge for Sightseeing Advice
dialogue_line: Thank you. That's great advice.

title: 4. Asking the Concierge for Sightseeing Advice
dialogue_line: This might be the best day of your visit.

title: 4. Asking the Concierge for Sightseeing Advice
dialogue_line: Can you give me some advice about going sightseeing?

title: 4. Asking the Concierge for Sightseeing Advice
dialogue_line: Your concierge, sir, is the right person to ask when you need sightseeing advice.

title: 4. Asking the Concierge for Sightseeing Advice
dialogue_line: What in the world is a concierge?

title: 4. Asking the Concierge for Sightseeing Advice
dialogue_line: We direct visitors to all the great tourist, shopping, and eating spots in the city.

title: 4. Asking the Concierge for Sightseeing Advice
dialogue_line: Then what would you recommend as a starting point for my sightseeing?

title: 4. Asking the Concierge for Sightseeing Advice
dialogue_line: Definitely the Statue of Liberty. I think that that is everyone's favorite first stop.

title: 4. Asking the Concierge for Sightseeing Advice
dialogue_line: Actually, I've already been there twice. Do you have another suggestion?

title: 4. Asking the Concierge for Sightseeing Advice
dialogue_line: I think I can come up with something. How do you spend your spare time?

title: 4. Asking the Concierge for Sightseeing Advice
dialogue_line: I keep my body healthy by running and my mind active by visiting museums.

title: 4. Asking the Concierge for Sightseeing Advice
dialogue_line: Well, the Museum of Modern Art and Central Park were made for you! Have you gone to either one?

title: 4. Asking the Concierge for Sightseeing Advice
dialogue_line: No, although I've heard great things about both of them.

title: 4. Asking the Concierge for Sightseeing Advice
dialogue_line: You don't want to miss either place. Central Park and the Museum of Modern Art are big and beautiful.

title: 4. Asking the Concierge for Sightseeing Advice
dialogue_line: Sounds great! I'll get my running gear and then I'm out of here.

title: 4. Asking the Concierge for Sightseeing Advice
dialogue_line: This is a day you're going to remember for a long time.

title: 5. Asking the Concierge for Restaurant Advice
dialogue_line: I need a suggestion for a restaurant here in Manhattan.

title: 5. Asking the Concierge for Restaurant Advice
dialogue_line: Certainly! How much are you planning to spend on dinner, sir?

title: 5. Asking the Concierge for Restaurant Advice
dialogue_line: My date's very sophisticated, so I'm sure she would expect nothing but the best.

title: 5. Asking the Concierge for Restaurant Advice
dialogue_line: May I suggest our own hotel restaurant? It got three stars in the latest restaurant review.

title: 5. Asking the Concierge for Restaurant Advice
dialogue_line: No, thank you, I want to go out on the town. What other ideas do you have?

title: 5. Asking the Concierge for Restaurant Advice
dialogue_line: There's always Gramercy Tavern. They have live jazz. The food is delicious, but very expensive.

title: 5. Asking the Concierge for Restaurant Advice
dialogue_line: That sounds like a good place to take a date. Can you make a reservation for me?

title: 5. Asking the Concierge for Restaurant Advice
dialogue_line: As you wish, sir. You'll have a wonderful time there.

title: 5. Asking the Concierge for Restaurant Advice
dialogue_line: Can you tell me about a nice restaurant to go to?

title: 5. Asking the Concierge for Restaurant Advice
dialogue_line: Of course! How much would you like to spend on your meal?

title: 5. Asking the Concierge for Restaurant Advice
dialogue_line: My date is quite sophisticated. She would expect nothing less than the best.

title: 5. Asking the Concierge for Restaurant Advice
dialogue_line: Well, how about our own hotel restaurant? It's conveniently located and has a three-star rating.

title: 5. Asking the Concierge for Restaurant Advice
dialogue_line: That's a good idea, except I want to go out, not stay in. Something else, maybe?

title: 5. Asking the Concierge for Restaurant Advice
dialogue_line: Well, how about Gramercy Tavern? It's a very popular tourist spot, with great food and music.

title: 5. Asking the Concierge for Restaurant Advice
dialogue_line: That sounds good! Could you call them to see if I can get a reservation?

title: 5. Asking the Concierge for Restaurant Advice
dialogue_line: Of course, sir. You've made a good choice.

title: 5. Asking the Concierge for Restaurant Advice
dialogue_line: So, now I need your help again, if you don't mind. I'm taking a date to a restaurant.

title: 5. Asking the Concierge for Restaurant Advice
dialogue_line: I'd love to help you! What is your budget for the dinner?

title: 5. Asking the Concierge for Restaurant Advice
dialogue_line: She strikes me as being very sophisticated. Only the best will do for her.

title: 5. Asking the Concierge for Restaurant Advice
dialogue_line: Well, what do you think about our very own hotel restaurant? It is very upscale, with a three-star rating.

title: 5. Asking the Concierge for Restaurant Advice
dialogue_line: I don't want to be cooped up in my own hotel tonight. How about another restaurant?

title: 5. Asking the Concierge for Restaurant Advice
dialogue_line: The Gramercy Tavern is highly rated. It has great food and live jazz, but it's not cheap.

title: 5. Asking the Concierge for Restaurant Advice
dialogue_line: Yes, that sounds like a winner. Would you please call them to reserve a table?

title: 5. Asking the Concierge for Restaurant Advice
dialogue_line: I'm already dialing, sir.

title: 5. Asking the Concierge for Restaurant Advice
dialogue_line: I'm taking a date to a restaurant, so could you please direct me to a good one?

title: 5. Asking the Concierge for Restaurant Advice
dialogue_line: But of course! How much are you thinking of spending on dinner?

title: 5. Asking the Concierge for Restaurant Advice
dialogue_line: She deserves nothing but the best, of course.

title: 5. Asking the Concierge for Restaurant Advice
dialogue_line: In that case, I would suggest our own hotel restaurant. The chef, the food, and the service are outstanding.

title: 5. Asking the Concierge for Restaurant Advice
dialogue_line: I promised her I would take her out to a restaurant. Do you have another one in mind?

title: 5. Asking the Concierge for Restaurant Advice
dialogue_line: You can always go to Gramercy Tavern. It's quite popular, despite its expensive entrees.

title: 5. Asking the Concierge for Restaurant Advice
dialogue_line: Great food and lots of patrons? What more could I want? Please reserve a table for me.

title: 5. Asking the Concierge for Restaurant Advice
dialogue_line: Yes, sir. You're going to have a great time.

title: 5. Asking the Concierge for Restaurant Advice
dialogue_line: I'm taking my date to a restaurant. Could you tell me about one or two good ones?

title: 5. Asking the Concierge for Restaurant Advice
dialogue_line: My pleasure! How much would you like to spend on your date?

title: 5. Asking the Concierge for Restaurant Advice
dialogue_line: She will want an excellent restaurant, of course.

title: 5. Asking the Concierge for Restaurant Advice
dialogue_line: You should know that our hotel chef was trained in Paris. The service and food are world-class.

title: 5. Asking the Concierge for Restaurant Advice
dialogue_line: I wanted to go out somewhere, not stay here. Do you know of another good restaurant?

title: 5. Asking the Concierge for Restaurant Advice
dialogue_line: You can't go wrong with Gramercy Tavern. It's famous for its food, service, and live jazz.

title: 5. Asking the Concierge for Restaurant Advice
dialogue_line: I like that! Could you please call them to see if we can get in tonight?

title: 5. Asking the Concierge for Restaurant Advice
dialogue_line: At once, sir. You'll love this place, I assure you.

title: 5. Asking the Concierge for Restaurant Advice
dialogue_line: No problem, of course! How much would you like to spend to impress the lady?

title: 5. Asking the Concierge for Restaurant Advice
dialogue_line: Nothing but the best for a pretty woman!

title: 5. Asking the Concierge for Restaurant Advice
dialogue_line: Sir, the restaurant you seek is right here. This hotel has a three-star restaurant.

title: 5. Asking the Concierge for Restaurant Advice

title: 7. Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (1)
dialogue_line: I have a little problem with room 507.

title: 7. Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (1)
dialogue_line: What exactly seems to be the problem, Mr. Sandals?

title: 7. Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (1)
dialogue_line: I found cockroaches in my room.

title: 7. Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (1)
dialogue_line: Cockroaches, sir? That's unbelievable.

title: 7. Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (1)
dialogue_line: I've seen at least nine different cockroaches in my room.

title: 7. Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (1)
dialogue_line: Sir, are you sure you haven't seen the same silverfish nine times?

title: 7. Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (1)
dialogue_line: There are nine cockroaches in my room. I don't have time for your disbelief!

title: 7. Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (1)
dialogue_line: I apologize. One moment, please, while I transfer you to my supervisor.

title: 7. Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (1)
dialogue_line: I'm in 507. I have a few problems with my room.

title: 7. Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (1)
dialogue_line: What is that problem, sir?

title: 7. Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (1)
dialogue_line: There are cockroaches in my room.

title: 7. Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (1)
dialogue_line: Are you sure, sir? Flies I could believe, but cockroaches?

title: 7. Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (1)
dialogue_line: I've counted nine different cockroaches, and I accidentally stepped on another one.

title: 7. Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (1)
dialogue_line: Sir, we run a spotless and cockroach-less hotel.

title: 7. Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (1)
dialogue_line: You dare to doubt me?

title: 7. Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (1)
dialogue_line: I'm sorry, sir. Let me transfer you to my supervisor.

title: 7. Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (1)
dialogue_line: There's a big problem with my room. I'm in 507.

title: 7. Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (1)
dialogue_line: Would you tell me the nature of the problem, sir?

title: 7. Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (1)
dialogue_line: I have cockroaches crawling in my room.

title: 7. Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (1)
dialogue_line: Perhaps you saw a silverfish, sir.

title: 7. Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (1)
dialogue_line: I've seen nine more cockroaches than I wanted to see.

title: 7. Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (1)
dialogue_line: Sir, you haven't been drinking by any chance, have you?

title: 7. Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (1)
dialogue_line: How dare you question my statement!

title: 7. Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (1)
dialogue_line: Forgive me. You're 100 percent correct. Allow me to transfer you to my supervisor.

title: 7. Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (1)
dialogue_line: There's a major problem with room 507.

title: 7. Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (1)
dialogue_line: I'm sorry to hear that. Please tell me the exact problem.

title: 7. Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (1)
dialogue_line: This room is overrun with cockroaches.

title: 7. Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (1)
dialogue_line: There has been an occasional silverfish in the hotel, sir.

title: 7. Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (1)
dialogue_line: I stopped counting at nine.

title: 7. Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (1)
dialogue_line: Sir, this hotel just passed a thorough insect inspection with flying colors.

title: 7. Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (1)
dialogue_line: Your inspector needs spectacles. The fact is that cockroaches are running rampant.

title: 7. Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (1)
dialogue_line: I apologize, sir. Just a second, while I transfer you to my supervisor.

title: 7. Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (1)
dialogue_line: I'm in 507, and I have a big problem.

title: 7. Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (1)
dialogue_line: I'm so sorry. Kindly tell me what the problem is, sir.

title: 7. Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (1)
dialogue_line: Everywhere I look, I see cockroaches.

title: 7. Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (1)
dialogue_line: Perhaps you could look again, sir, to double-check.

title: 7. Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (1)
dialogue_line: The next cockroach I see will be number ten.

title: 7. Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (1)
dialogue_line: Mr. Sandals, I've worked here five years without seeing one cockroach.

title: 7. Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (1)
dialogue_line: I've already suffered enough without listening anymore to you!

title: 7. Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (1)
dialogue_line: You're right, sir. Please let me transfer you to my supervisor.

title: 7. Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (1)
dialogue_line: I have a little problem with room 507.

title: 7. Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (1)
dialogue_line: Problems are what we're here for, sir. Please tell me your problem.

title: 7. Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (1)
dialogue_line: This room is filthy with cockroaches.

title: 7. Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (1)
dialogue_line: Were you wearing your glasses when you noticed them, sir?

title: 7. Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (1)
dialogue_line: I've already seen nine of them and, as they say, eight is enough!

title: 7. Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (1)
dialogue_line: Sir, sometimes a fast elevator ride makes our guests see spots.

title: 7. Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (1)
dialogue_line: You are not in a position to question my vision or my statement!

title: 7. Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (1)
dialogue_line: I'm very sorry, sir. Will you please hold while I transfer you to my supervisor?

title: 8. Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (2)
dialogue_line: I want to change rooms. In fact, I want a refund for tonight!

title: 8. Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (2)
dialogue_line: And the problem is, sir?

title: 8. Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (2)
dialogue_line: Cockroaches have taken over my room!

title: 8. Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (2)
dialogue_line: My apologies, sir. We'll give you a new room and refund the value of your current room.

title: 8. Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (2)
dialogue_line: Thank you. I want to continue to be able to recommend this hotel to others.

title: 8. Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (2)
dialogue_line: We always try to serve our guests in the most agreeable way possible.

title: 8. Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (2)
dialogue_line: I want to change rooms immediately, plus a refund for tonight.

title: 8. Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (2)
dialogue_line: I'm sorry, sir. Exactly what is the problem?

title: 8. Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (2)
dialogue_line: I'm knee-deep in cockroaches!

title: 8. Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (2)
dialogue_line: I'm so sorry, sir. We'll give you a new room immediately, and give you a refund also.

title: 8. Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (2)
dialogue_line: Thank you. I'm glad that this hotel strives to keep its reputation intact.

title: 8. Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (2)
dialogue_line: Sir, we always try to please our guests.

title: 8. Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (2)
dialogue_line: I'm quite upset! I want a new room and a refund for tonight.

title: 8. Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (2)
dialogue_line: Forgive me, sir, I haven't been told what the problem is.

title: 8. Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (2)
dialogue_line: I'm about to be swept away by millions of cockroaches!

title: 8. Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (2)
dialogue_line: My apologies, sir. We'll transfer you to a new room at once and give you a full refund.

title: 8. Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (2)
dialogue_line: Thank you. I didn't want to have to take this to court.

title: 8. Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (2)
dialogue_line: Sir, we never want a guest to stay here mad or unhappy.

title: 8. Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (2)
dialogue_line: This room is unacceptable. I want a new one, and I want a refund for tonight.

title: 8. Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (2)
dialogue_line: Would you please tell me the exact problem, sir?

title: 8. Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (2)
dialogue_line: I'm being attacked by hordes of cockroaches!

title: 8. Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (2)
dialogue_line: Oh, my gosh, they're back? Another room at once, sir, plus a full refund, of course.

title: 8. Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (2)
dialogue_line: Thank you very much. This has been a most unsettling experience.

title: 8. Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (2)
dialogue_line: Sir, our guests are our reason for being.

title: 8. Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (2)
dialogue_line: This room is unfit for humans. I want another room, and I want a refund for tonight.

title: 8. Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (2)
dialogue_line: Perhaps if you would be kind enough to tell me the problem, sir.

title: 8. Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (2)
dialogue_line: In a word, cockroaches!

title: 8. Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (2)
dialogue_line: Oh, no, are they back? I'll give you another room immediately, sir, and a refund for tonight.

title: 8. Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (2)
dialogue_line: Thank you. I'm glad that you don't believe that your guests are liars.

title: 8. Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (2)
dialogue_line: Sir, without happy guests, we are nothing.

title: 8. Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (2)
dialogue_line: I want to change rooms. In fact, I want a refund for tonight!

title: 8. Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (2)
dialogue_line: If you tell me the exact problem, I can be more helpful.

title: 8. Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (2)
dialogue_line: Cockroaches have declared war on my room!

title: 8. Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (2)
dialogue_line: Allow me to apologize. I'll give you another room right now, and a full refund for tonight.

title: 8. Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (2)
dialogue_line: Thank you for not asking me to collect the roaches in a jar as evidence.

title: 8. Calling to Report a Cockroach Problem (2)
dialogue_line: Sir, only your mother wants to please you more than we do.

title: 9. Asking about the Hotel Gym
dialogue_line: Excuse me. Does this hotel have a fitness facility?

title: 9. Asking about the Hotel Gym
dialogue_line: Yes, we try to accommodate all needs of our patrons, including fitness.

title: 9. Asking about the Hotel Gym
dialogue_line: Where is your fitness facility located?

title: 9. Asking about the Hotel Gym
dialogue_line: The gym is just below the lobby. Take the elevator or the stairs. You can't miss it.

title: 9. Asking about the Hotel Gym
dialogue_line: Is there an additional surcharge for the gym?

title: 9. Asking about the Hotel Gym
dialogue_line: No, the gym is free to guests. Take your room key, however, so you can get in.

title: 9. Asking about the Hotel Gym
dialogue_line: What time is the gym open, and what time does it close?

title: 9. Asking about the Hotel Gym
dialogue_line: The gym is open seven days a week, twenty-four hours a day.

title: 9. Asking about the Hotel Gym
dialogue_line: Do you offer trainer services along with the gym?

title: 9. Asking about the Hotel Gym
dialogue_line: Unfortunately, no. If you want a trainer, you'll have to use another gym.

title: 9. Asking about the Hotel Gym
dialogue_line: Pardon me. Does your hotel have a fitness facility?

title: 9. Asking about the Hotel Gym
dialogue_line: Yes, sir. We try to anticipate all our guests' needs, including fitness.

title: 9. Asking about the Hotel Gym
dialogue_line: Great! Where is it?

title: 9. Asking about the Hotel Gym
dialogue_line: Sir, the gym is just below the lobby. You can take the elevator or the stairs.

title: 9. Asking about the Hotel Gym
dialogue_line: Do I have to pay extra?

title: 9. Asking about the Hotel Gym
dialogue_line: No, sir. It's gratis. Just take your room key so you can get in.

title: 9. Asking about the Hotel Gym
dialogue_line: What are the gym hours?

title: 9. Asking about the Hotel Gym
dialogue_line: You'll be happy to know that it's open 24/7.

title: 9. Asking about the Hotel Gym
dialogue_line: Great! Is a trainer available?

title: 9. Asking about the Hotel Gym
dialogue_line: I'm sorry, but no. We used to have a trainer, but then he had an unfortunate accident.

title: 9. Asking about the Hotel Gym
dialogue_line: Does this hotel have an exercise facility?

title: 9. Asking about the Hotel Gym
dialogue_line: But of course! We have a great exercise facility.

title: 9. Asking about the Hotel Gym
dialogue_line: Good. Now exactly where is it?

title: 9. Asking about the Hotel Gym
dialogue_line: It's located right under our lobby. Just take the elevator or the stairs one flight down.

title: 9. Asking about the Hotel Gym
dialogue_line: Is this going to cost me anything?

title: 9. Asking about the Hotel Gym
dialogue_line: No, sir. The gym is absolutely free. However, be sure to take your room key with you.

title: 9. Asking about the Hotel Gym
dialogue_line: When does the gym open and close?

title: 9. Asking about the Hotel Gym
dialogue_line: The hours couldn't be better, 24/7.

title: 9. Asking about the Hotel Gym
dialogue_line: Very good. Now, is there a trainer down there?

title: 9. Asking about the Hotel Gym
dialogue_line: I wish I could tell you yes, but no, there isn't.

title: 9. Asking about the Hotel Gym
dialogue_line: Do you have a place where I can exercise?

title: 9. Asking about the Hotel Gym
dialogue_line: Yes, sir. We have a fine exercise facility.

title: 9. Asking about the Hotel Gym
dialogue_line: I'm happy to hear that. Now, would you tell me where it is?

title: 9. Asking about the Hotel Gym
dialogue_line: You're actually standing above it. Just take the elevator or stairs down one level.

title: 9. Asking about the Hotel Gym
dialogue_line: Is the hotel going to charge me a dollar a minute for gym use?

title: 9. Asking about the Hotel Gym
dialogue_line: No, sir. There's no extra charge. All you need is your room key to open the door.

title: 9. Asking about the Hotel Gym
dialogue_line: And the gym hours are?

title: 9. Asking about the Hotel Gym
dialogue_line: Sir, you'll be pleased to know that our gym never closes.

title: 9. Asking about the Hotel Gym
dialogue_line: One more question: Do you have a trainer?

title: 9. Asking about the Hotel Gym
dialogue_line: We might be getting one in the near future. But at the present time, no.

title: 9. Asking about the Hotel Gym
dialogue_line: Excuse me. Do you happen to have a gym here?

title: 9. Asking about the Hotel Gym
dialogue_line: Yes, sir. I think you'll find our gym quite satisfactory.

title: 9. Asking about the Hotel Gym
dialogue_line: So, where do I go to exercise?

title: 9. Asking about the Hotel Gym
dialogue_line: It's only one flight down, sir. Just take the elevator or the stairs.

title: 9. Asking about the Hotel Gym
dialogue_line: Am I going to be charged extra for using the gym?

title: 9. Asking about the Hotel Gym
dialogue_line: Sir, you can use the gym for free. All you need is your room key.

title: 9. Asking about the Hotel Gym
dialogue_line: Great! Now tell me, what are the hours of this gym?

title: 9. Asking about the Hotel Gym
dialogue_line: Sir, our gym is open around the clock, every day of the week.

title: 9. Asking about the Hotel Gym
dialogue_line: Do you have a trainer to help me work out?

title: 9. Asking about the Hotel Gym
dialogue_line: I'm sorry, sir, but we have no trainer.

title: . Asking for More Amenities
dialogue_line: I'd like to request some more amenities.

title: . Asking for More Amenities
dialogue_line: Amenities? What do you mean by amenities, sir?

title: . Asking for More Amenities
dialogue_line: The free stuff, you know, the soap, lotion, shampoo, etc.

title: . Asking for More Amenities
dialogue_line: I see. Sir, if I may ask: Have you used up all the amenities in your room?

title: . Asking for More Amenities
dialogue_line: Not at all. I still have enough for the next few days.

title: . Asking for More Amenities
dialogue_line: Then what is the problem, sir?

title: . Asking for More Amenities
dialogue_line: I need some to keep as souvenirs!

title: . Asking for More Amenities
dialogue_line: Souvenirs?

title: . Asking for More Amenities
dialogue_line: Yes, souvenirs. Trinkets to remember my trip by!

title: . Asking for More Amenities
dialogue_line: We do have a souvenir shop on the first floor, sir.

title: . Asking for More Amenities
dialogue_line: That's not the same. I never pay for hotel souvenirs!

title: . Asking for More Amenities
dialogue_line: I'll call housekeeping. Someone will be up with more amenities shortly.

title: . Asking for More Amenities
dialogue_line: I need more amenities, please.

title: . Asking for More Amenities
dialogue_line: Could you be a little more specific, sir?

title: . Asking for More Amenities
dialogue_line: To be more specific, the free stuff, like soap, lotion, and shampoo.

title: . Asking for More Amenities
dialogue_line: I understand. Now, you're saying that you've already used up all your amenities?

title: . Asking for More Amenities
dialogue_line: No! I've got all I need for my stay here.

title: . Asking for More Amenities
dialogue_line: So, what's the problem?

title: . Asking for More Amenities
dialogue_line: I need souvenirs!

title: . Asking for More Amenities
dialogue_line: You want some souvenirs!

title: . Asking for More Amenities
dialogue_line: Yes, yes. Souvenirs.

title: . Asking for More Amenities
dialogue_line: But, sir, our souvenir shop carries all those items.

title: . Asking for More Amenities
dialogue_line: That's not the same thing. If you buy hotel souvenirs, they have no sentimental value.

title: . Asking for More Amenities
dialogue_line: I understand, sir. I'll call housekeeping. You'll have your souvenirs shortly.

title: . Asking for More Amenities
dialogue_line: How do I get more amenities?

title: . Asking for More Amenities
dialogue_line: I'm sorry, sir. I'm not sure I understand.

title: . Asking for More Amenities
dialogue_line: I'm talking about the free stuff, like soap and shampoo.

title: . Asking for More Amenities
dialogue_line: Oh, I see. So, you're saying that you've already run out of your amenities.

title: . Asking for More Amenities
dialogue_line: No, no. I've got plenty left.

title: . Asking for More Amenities
dialogue_line: Now I'm confused again! What is the problem?

title: . Asking for More Amenities
dialogue_line: What am I going to do about souvenirs?

title: . Asking for More Amenities
dialogue_line: Oh, I get it! You want souvenirs!

title: . Asking for More Amenities
dialogue_line: Yes, I've got enough soap for my use, but no extra soap for souvenirs.

title: . Asking for More Amenities
dialogue_line: Sir, our souvenir shop carries all those items, and as a guest you get a discount.

title: . Asking for More Amenities
dialogue_line: Please! Free souvenirs are the only true souvenirs.

title: . Asking for More Amenities
dialogue_line: I understand completely, sir. Housekeeping will bring you souvenirs in just a moment.

title: . Asking for More Amenities
dialogue_line: Yes, I need more amenities.

title: . Asking for More Amenities
dialogue_line: By amenities, exactly what do you mean, please?

title: . Asking for More Amenities
dialogue_line: You know, the things that are free, like the soap and the shampoo.

title: . Asking for More Amenities
dialogue_line: Okay, I got it. You've already run out of all your amenities?

title: . Asking for More Amenities
dialogue_line: No, I still have plenty left, even if I took three baths a day.

title: . Asking for More Amenities
dialogue_line: I'm more confused now than before. How is there a problem?

title: . Asking for More Amenities
dialogue_line: I need to take home some souvenirs!

title: . Asking for More Amenities
dialogue_line: Okay, finally I understand. You would like souvenirs!

title: . Asking for More Amenities
dialogue_line: Yes, souvenirs that I can take home and add to my collection.

title: . Asking for More Amenities
dialogue_line: If it's souvenirs you want, sir, just visit our souvenir shop. It has everything.

title: . Asking for More Amenities
dialogue_line: Are you kidding? Whoever heard of paying for hotel souvenirs?

title: . Asking for More Amenities
dialogue_line: No problem at all, sir. Housekeeping will deliver you all the amenities you like in a bit.

title: . Asking for More Amenities
dialogue_line: I need some more amenities, please.

title: . Asking for More Amenities
dialogue_line: I'm not sure I'm following you, sir.

title: . Asking for More Amenities
dialogue_line: Specifically, I'm talking about the little things, like soap and shampoo.

title: . Asking for More Amenities
dialogue_line: Oh, now I understand! So, you've already used up all your amenities?

title: . Asking for More Amenities
dialogue_line: No, I'm not even halfway through my supply.

title: . Asking for More Amenities
dialogue_line: I'm losing you, sir. What's the problem?

title: . Asking for More Amenities
dialogue_line: What's the use of going to a hotel if you don't take home souvenirs?

title: . Asking for More Amenities
dialogue_line: Okay, I got it. You're collecting souvenirs!

title: . Asking for More Amenities
dialogue_line: There you go. My friends expect me to bring home souvenirs.

title: . Asking for More Amenities
dialogue_line: Have you visited our souvenir shop, sir? It's loaded with all kinds of items.

title: . Asking for More Amenities
dialogue_line: I've never paid for a hotel souvenir in my life, and I don't intend to start now.

title: . Asking for More Amenities
dialogue_line: Sir, housekeeping will bring you a basketful of amenities momentarily.

title: . Asking Where to Make a Copy
dialogue_line: I need to copy a document immediately.

title: . Asking Where to Make a Copy
dialogue_line: We have a copy machine in our computer lab, located on the first floor.

title: . Asking Where to Make a Copy
dialogue_line: Great! How much is it for a copy?

title: . Asking Where to Make a Copy
dialogue_line: The price per copy is ten cents.

title: . Asking Where to Make a Copy
dialogue_line: That sounds reasonable. I'll be down there immediately.

dialogue_line: Great! How much per copy?

dialogue_line: Sir, one copy is ten cents.

title: . Asking Where to Make a Copy
dialogue_line: I'll be down there shortly.

dialogue_line: You probably won't have to wait for anyone, sir.

title: . Asking Where to Make a Copy
dialogue_line: I need to make a copy of something at once.

dialogue_line: There's a copy machine on the first floor in our computer lab, sir.

title: . Asking Where to Make a Copy
dialogue_line: Fantastic! Is there a charge?

title: . Asking Where to Make a Copy
dialogue_line: It's ten cents a copy, sir.

title: . Asking Where to Make a Copy
dialogue_line: I'm only making one copy, so I guess I can afford it.

title: . Asking Where to Make a Copy
dialogue_line: A dime is still a bargain, sir.

title: . Asking Where to Make a Copy
dialogue_line: I need to make a copy of a document as soon as possible.

title: . Asking Where to Make a Copy
dialogue_line: No problem, sir. There's a copy machine in our computer lab.

title: . Asking Where to Make a Copy
dialogue_line: Very good. How much does each copy cost?

title: . Asking Where to Make a Copy
dialogue_line: Each copy will cost you a dime, sir.

title: . Asking Where to Make a Copy
dialogue_line: A dime? I remember when copies used to cost a nickel.

title: . Asking Where to Make a Copy
dialogue_line: There aren't many things you can get for a nickel, sir.

title: . Asking Where to Make a Copy
dialogue_line: Can you tell me where I could make a copy of a document right now?

title: . Asking Where to Make a Copy
dialogue_line: Sir, you can come downstairs right now to the computer lab.

title: . Asking Where to Make a Copy
dialogue_line: That's great. I don't suppose the copy machine is free for guests?

dialogue_line: Sir, each copy is ten cents or one dime, whichever you prefer.

title: . Asking Where to Make a Copy
dialogue_line: In the good old days, it was only five cents a copy. I'll be right down.

title: . Asking Where to Make a Copy
dialogue_line: Those were the good old days, sir, indeed.

title: . Calling to Report a Medical Emergency
dialogue_line: You're right, I'm beside myself with worry.

dialogue_line: Hold on, sir. I'm connecting you with 911.

title: . Asking about the Swimming Pool
dialogue_line: Is there a swimming pool in this hotel?

title: . Asking about the Swimming Pool
dialogue_line: We don't have a full-sized swimming pool, but we do have individual swim stations.

title: . Asking about the Swimming Pool
dialogue_line: What exactly does that mean?

title: . Asking about the Swimming Pool
dialogue_line: Basically, a swim station is like a treadmill, except instead of running, you swim.

title: . Asking about the Swimming Pool
dialogue_line: That sounds really neat. Is there an extra charge for these swim stations?

title: . Asking about the Swimming Pool
dialogue_line: If you're a registered guest, you have free access to our swim stations.

title: . Asking about the Swimming Pool
dialogue_line: Are the swim stations open 24 hours, like the rest of the gym?

title: . Asking about the Swimming Pool
dialogue_line: To conserve electricity, the stations operate only from 7:00 a.m. till 10:00 p.m.

dialogue_line: I'll go down there as soon as I can!

title: . Asking about the Swimming Pool
dialogue_line: I don't think you'll be disappointed. People really seem to like the swim stations.

dialogue_line: Does this hotel have a pool?

dialogue_line: I'm sorry, sir, we don't have one. However, in our gym, we do have swim stations.

dialogue_line: I'm not sure I understand.

dialogue_line: Think of a deep bathtub that you can swim in, but against a current.

dialogue_line: Cool. What will they think of next? How much are they?

title: . Asking about the Swimming Pool

dialogue_line: Excellent! Now what are the hours?

title: . Asking about the Swimming Pool

title: . Disputing the Bill

dialogue_line: Randolph, Rudy. Let me hit one button, sir, and now your reservation is cancelled.

dialogue_line: Thank you. I'll make another reservation as soon as I can.

title: . Calling to Cancel a Reservation
dialogue_line: It's been my pleasure to help you.

dialogue_line: My wife is sick, so I have to cancel a reservation I made.

dialogue_line: If you'll just give me your name, phone, and date of visit, I can cancel your reservation.

dialogue_line: Mr. Randolph. Okay, one second, sir, and there you go. Your reservation is now cancelled.

title: . Calling to Cancel a Reservation
dialogue_line: I wish everything in life was so simple, thank you.

title: . Calling to Cancel a Reservation
dialogue_line: Not a problem, sir. Please remember us in the future.

title: First Meeting with a Realtor

dialogue_line: Yes, of course. What area are you interested in?

title: First Meeting with a Realtor
dialogue_line: I am interested in Pasadena or Arcadia.

title: First Meeting with a Realtor
dialogue_line: What size house would you like?

title: First Meeting with a Realtor
dialogue_line: We need a medium-sized house with at least 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms.

title: First Meeting with a Realtor
dialogue_line: Are you interested in being in a particular school district?

title: First Meeting with a Realtor
dialogue_line: Yes, we want to stay in the ABC School District.

title: First Meeting with a Realtor
dialogue_line: Would you like a home near the lake or would you prefer a view?

title: First Meeting with a Realtor
dialogue_line: I would love to have a home with a view.

title: First Meeting with a Realtor
dialogue_line: Fine, I will begin a search for the perfect home for you. I will call you in a few days.

dialogue_line: I would like to discuss purchasing a home with you.

title: First Meeting with a Realtor
dialogue_line: I can help you. What location are you looking for?

title: First Meeting with a Realtor
dialogue_line: I would like to live in Pasadena or Arcadia.

title: First Meeting with a Realtor

title: First Meeting with a Realtor
dialogue_line: Is living in a particular school district important to you?

title: First Meeting with a Realtor
dialogue_line: No, we don't really care because they are all pretty good around here.

title: First Meeting with a Realtor
dialogue_line: Are you interested in purchasing on the lake, or would you like a home with a view?

title: First Meeting with a Realtor

title: First Meeting with a Realtor
dialogue_line: Now that I have an idea of what you want, I can begin my search.

title: First Meeting with a Realtor
dialogue_line: I have been thinking of buying a house and would like to speak with you.

title: First Meeting with a Realtor
dialogue_line: I am most interested in Pasadena or Arcadia, but would be open to other suggestions.

title: First Meeting with a Realtor
dialogue_line: How many bedrooms and bathrooms do you need?

title: First Meeting with a Realtor

title: First Meeting with a Realtor
dialogue_line: Do you need to be located in a particular school district?

title: First Meeting with a Realtor
dialogue_line: It doesn't matter, as we do not have any children.

title: First Meeting with a Realtor
dialogue_line: Is a view important to you, or would you rather be located on a lakeshore lot?

title: First Meeting with a Realtor
dialogue_line: In a perfect world, we would like a home with a view of the lake.

title: First Meeting with a Realtor
dialogue_line: Thank you for all of the information. I will help you find the perfect house for you.

title: Pre-Qualifying for a Loan
dialogue_line: I need to see if I qualify for a home loan.

title: Pre-Qualifying for a Loan
dialogue_line: I can help you. How much money do you make per year?

title: Pre-Qualifying for a Loan
dialogue_line: I make around one hundred thousand dollars per year.

title: Pre-Qualifying for a Loan
dialogue_line: How long have you been on your current job?

title: Pre-Qualifying for a Loan
dialogue_line: I have only worked at this job for 6 months, but I have a longer job history elsewhere.

title: Pre-Qualifying for a Loan
dialogue_line: Do you have any other outside income from rental property or a trust?

title: Pre-Qualifying for a Loan
dialogue_line: No, I only receive my salary.

title: Pre-Qualifying for a Loan
dialogue_line: Do you know your credit score?

title: Pre-Qualifying for a Loan
dialogue_line: I think that it is around 600.

title: Pre-Qualifying for a Loan
dialogue_line: By crunching the numbers and putting in your expenses, I estimate that you can afford a house of around five hundred thousand dollars.

title: Pre-Qualifying for a Loan
dialogue_line: I am trying to see if I can afford to purchase a home that I wish to buy.

title: Pre-Qualifying for a Loan
dialogue_line: We can figure that out right now. How much do you earn annually?

title: Pre-Qualifying for a Loan
dialogue_line: My wife and I earned one hundred and fifty thousand dollars last year.

title: Pre-Qualifying for a Loan
dialogue_line: How many years have you held your current position?

title: Pre-Qualifying for a Loan
dialogue_line: I have been at my current job for 10 years.

title: Pre-Qualifying for a Loan
dialogue_line: Is there any extra income that you receive other than salary?

title: Pre-Qualifying for a Loan
dialogue_line: I collect one thousand dollars a month from a rental property.

title: Pre-Qualifying for a Loan
dialogue_line: Have you ever figured out your credit score?

title: Pre-Qualifying for a Loan
dialogue_line: I try not to think about it!

title: Pre-Qualifying for a Loan
dialogue_line: Adding in your expenses, I calculate that you can spend three hundred thousand on a house.

title: Pre-Qualifying for a Loan
dialogue_line: I want to go house shopping, and I want to know what I can afford to buy.

title: Pre-Qualifying for a Loan
dialogue_line: There is a formula that can help us figure that out. What is your annual salary?

title: Pre-Qualifying for a Loan
dialogue_line: I earn sixty-five thousand dollars per year.

title: Pre-Qualifying for a Loan
dialogue_line: What is the length of time that you have worked at the job you have now?

title: Pre-Qualifying for a Loan
dialogue_line: I have been at the job I now have for 2 years, and I have been with the company for 6 years total.

title: Pre-Qualifying for a Loan
dialogue_line: Do you receive any other income?

title: Pre-Qualifying for a Loan
dialogue_line: I own a small rental unit with a partner, and I receive five hundred dollars a month from that unit.

title: Pre-Qualifying for a Loan
dialogue_line: Do you know what your credit score is?

title: Pre-Qualifying for a Loan
dialogue_line: I don't know, but the last time I checked, it was very good!

title: Pre-Qualifying for a Loan
dialogue_line: You are in good shape. Figuring in your other expenses, you can easily afford a house costing seven hundred thousand or maybe even a little more!

title: Setting up an Appointment to View Houses
dialogue_line: I would like to make an appointment to look at houses.

dialogue_line: Sure, would you prefer looking in the morning or afternoon?

title: Setting up an Appointment to View Houses
dialogue_line: I would prefer mornings.

dialogue_line: Can you go during the week, or can you only go during the weekend?

title: Setting up an Appointment to View Houses

dialogue_line: Where would you like me to pick you up?

title: Setting up an Appointment to View Houses
dialogue_line: I will meet you at the real estate office.

dialogue_line: That sounds good to me.

title: Setting up an Appointment to View Houses

dialogue_line: It is best if we can go during the week; does that work for you?

title: Setting up an Appointment to View Houses
dialogue_line: Because of work, I can only go look at houses on the weekend.

title: Setting up an Appointment to View Houses
dialogue_line: Would you like to meet at the real estate office, or should I pick you up at home?

title: Setting up an Appointment to View Houses
dialogue_line: If you could pick me up at home, that would be great.

title: Setting up an Appointment to View Houses
dialogue_line: We could spend most of the day looking at houses to see all that we have to see.

title: Setting up an Appointment to View Houses
dialogue_line: That might be a little too much, but we'll see how it goes.

title: Setting up an Appointment to View Houses
dialogue_line: I will fax you a schedule as soon as I contact the owners to confirm the times.

title: Setting up an Appointment to View Houses
dialogue_line: Can we choose a time to look at houses together?

title: Setting up an Appointment to View Houses
dialogue_line: Can you do that in the mornings, or would the afternoons be best?

title: Setting up an Appointment to View Houses
dialogue_line: Either way is good for me.

title: Setting up an Appointment to View Houses
dialogue_line: There are a number of open houses this weekend in your area. Would that okay with you?

title: Setting up an Appointment to View Houses
dialogue_line: I can take a little time off work, or I can go on a weekend, also.

title: Setting up an Appointment to View Houses
dialogue_line: We could meet at the real estate office, or I could pick you up at your home.

title: Setting up an Appointment to View Houses
dialogue_line: I am leaving from work, so maybe I could just meet you at the first house that we will look at.

title: Setting up an Appointment to View Houses
dialogue_line: I can think of five houses that we should look at. It will take most of the day.

title: Setting up an Appointment to View Houses
dialogue_line: I would like to see as many as possible.

title: Setting up an Appointment to View Houses
dialogue_line: When I have confirmed the times with the owners, I will e-mail you our plans for the day.

dialogue_line: I really like the way this house looks.

title: 4. Viewing Houses with a Realtor

title: 4. Viewing Houses with a Realtor

title: 4. Viewing Houses with a Realtor

title: 4. Viewing Houses with a Realtor
dialogue_line: I see what you mean!

title: 4. Viewing Houses with a Realtor
dialogue_line: The carpeting and paint are all new, as well as the window treatments.

title: 4. Viewing Houses with a Realtor

title: 4. Viewing Houses with a Realtor
dialogue_line: I am happy that you like the house. We should write down what we like so that we can remember it.

title: 4. Viewing Houses with a Realtor

title: 4. Viewing Houses with a Realtor

title: 4. Viewing Houses with a Realtor
dialogue_line: The best part is the bedroom and attached bathroom.

title: 4. Viewing Houses with a Realtor
dialogue_line: I love the relaxing colors in the tile and floor covering!

title: 4. Viewing Houses with a Realtor
dialogue_line: Let's take a few pictures so that we can remember what we like about this house.

title: 4. Viewing Houses with a Realtor
dialogue_line: This looks like a very nice house.

title: 4. Viewing Houses with a Realtor
dialogue_line: You know, I fell in love with this house the first moment I laid eyes on it.

title: 4. Viewing Houses with a Realtor
dialogue_line: The style of the exterior is just what I've been looking for!

title: 4. Viewing Houses with a Realtor
dialogue_line: The exterior is only half of the story. The interior is incredible.

title: 4. Viewing Houses with a Realtor
dialogue_line: This home is gorgeous on the inside!

title: 4. Viewing Houses with a Realtor
dialogue_line: Everything that you see on the walls, floors, and windows is brand new.

title: 4. Viewing Houses with a Realtor
dialogue_line: The wall colors totally suit the style of this house.

title: 4. Viewing Houses with a Realtor

title: 4. Viewing Houses with a Realtor
dialogue_line: I love the bamboo flooring and granite countertops.

title: 4. Viewing Houses with a Realtor
dialogue_line: There is plenty of room for our king-sized bed, and I love the light in this room.

title: 4. Viewing Houses with a Realtor

dialogue_line: I am not sure I even want to look at this house!

title: 5. Not Liking the Houses
dialogue_line: It is a bit of a fixer-upper. Let's take a look inside.

title: 5. Not Liking the Houses
dialogue_line: It doesn't look much better inside this place.

title: 5. Not Liking the Houses
dialogue_line: You know, with a little elbow grease and paint, you could spruce it up a bit.

title: 5. Not Liking the Houses
dialogue_line: There are hardly any windows in here, and that makes it really gloomy.

title: 5. Not Liking the Houses
dialogue_line: Let's go check out the kitchen. The printout says that it is quite large.

title: 5. Not Liking the Houses
dialogue_line: Look at those broken tile countertops and the peeling wallpaper.

title: 5. Not Liking the Houses
dialogue_line: Maybe the master suite has some redeeming qualities. Follow me, please.

title: 5. Not Liking the Houses
dialogue_line: What's that smell?

title: 5. Not Liking the Houses
dialogue_line: Perhaps we should move on to the next listing.

title: 5. Not Liking the Houses
dialogue_line: This house is not looking all that great from here

title: 5. Not Liking the Houses
dialogue_line: You can't really tell everything about a house from the outside. Let's go inside.

title: 5. Not Liking the Houses
dialogue_line: I don't think that it is looking any better inside here.

title: 5. Not Liking the Houses
dialogue_line: I think that fresh paint and cleaning would help it look a little better.

title: 5. Not Liking the Houses
dialogue_line: It is just too dark in here with so few windows.

title: 5. Not Liking the Houses
dialogue_line: I hear that the kitchen is quite large. Let's go check it out.

title: 5. Not Liking the Houses
dialogue_line: The kitchen may be large, but it doesn't have any storage space.

title: 5. Not Liking the Houses
dialogue_line: The master suite is supposed to be quite elegant. Maybe it will be a little better.

title: 5. Not Liking the Houses
dialogue_line: How many dogs live in this house?

title: 5. Not Liking the Houses
dialogue_line: I think that we have seen all that we need to see here. Let's go look at another house.

title: 5. Not Liking the Houses
dialogue_line: From the looks of this house from the outside, I don't really think that I want to go inside.

title: 5. Not Liking the Houses
dialogue_line: From here, it does look like it could use a little work. Let's see what the interior looks like.

title: 5. Not Liking the Houses
dialogue_line: I am not impressed by the interior of this house.

title: 5. Not Liking the Houses
dialogue_line: Sometimes all a place needs is a little bit of cleaning and some fresh paint.

title: 5. Not Liking the Houses
dialogue_line: With so few windows, how can you even see what the problems are?

title: 5. Not Liking the Houses
dialogue_line: Where are you supposed to store things without any cabinet space?

title: 5. Not Liking the Houses
dialogue_line: The picture in the listing shows a lovely master suite. I think that we should go look at it since we are here.

title: 5. Not Liking the Houses
dialogue_line: Is there a dead animal somewhere in here?

title: 5. Not Liking the Houses
dialogue_line: Well, I think that it is pretty safe to say that this is not the house for you.

title: 6. Making an Offer through a Realtor
dialogue_line: I would like to make an offer on this house, but I don't know much about the process.

title: 6. Making an Offer through a Realtor
dialogue_line: As your realtor, I am here to take care of this process. How much were you planning on offering?

title: 6. Making an Offer through a Realtor
dialogue_line: I really like the house and will pay the full asking price of three hundred and fifty thousand dollars.

title: 6. Making an Offer through a Realtor
dialogue_line: We want to leave ourselves some bargaining room. Let's offer three hundred and twenty thousand dollars.

title: 6. Making an Offer through a Realtor
dialogue_line: That sounds good, but I don't want this house to get away from me.

title: 6. Making an Offer through a Realtor
dialogue_line: The market is fairly down right now, so the offer is a realistic one.

title: 6. Making an Offer through a Realtor
dialogue_line: When will we know if they accept the offer?

title: 6. Making an Offer through a Realtor
dialogue_line: The owners usually respond to an offer within a few days.

title: 6. Making an Offer through a Realtor
dialogue_line: Should I be contacting my bank in the meantime?

title: 6. Making an Offer through a Realtor
dialogue_line: You are already pre-qualified for your loan, so you are in good shape.

title: 6. Making an Offer through a Realtor
dialogue_line: I have never bought a house before and don't know how to make an offer.

title: 6. Making an Offer through a Realtor
dialogue_line: The process of actually making the offer is something that I will take care of for you. What price were you considering offering?

title: 6. Making an Offer through a Realtor
dialogue_line: I love this house and would be willing to pay the full asking price of three hundred and fifty thousand dollars.

title: 6. Making an Offer through a Realtor
dialogue_line: Let's leave some room on this offer. I think that three hundred and twenty thousand dollars is a fair offer in this housing market.

title: 6. Making an Offer through a Realtor
dialogue_line: We could try that, but I really want this house!

title: 6. Making an Offer through a Realtor
dialogue_line: It is common practice to offer and then have a counter-offer.

title: 6. Making an Offer through a Realtor
dialogue_line: How long will it take to find out if they are going to accept the offer?

title: 6. Making an Offer through a Realtor
dialogue_line: The sellers are usually fairly quick to respond. They want to get things moving.

title: 6. Making an Offer through a Realtor
dialogue_line: Should I tell my bank that I have made an offer?

title: 6. Making an Offer through a Realtor
dialogue_line: There really isn't anything else to do right now except wait. You are already pre-qualified for your loan.

title: 6. Making an Offer through a Realtor
dialogue_line: I have never done this before and don't know where to begin as far as making an offer on this house.

title: 6. Making an Offer through a Realtor
dialogue_line: Leave the details of making the offer up to me. What were you thinking you should offer?

title: 6. Making an Offer through a Realtor
dialogue_line: I absolutely must have this house and will pay three hundred and fifty thousand dollars or more.

title: 6. Making an Offer through a Realtor
dialogue_line: It is best to start a little low on the first bid to allow for a counter-offer. How about offering three hundred and twenty thousand dollars?

title: 6. Making an Offer through a Realtor
dialogue_line: I hope that the owners aren't insulted by that offer.

title: 6. Making an Offer through a Realtor
dialogue_line: Your offering price is not out-of-line. The owners will either take it or make a counter-offer.

title: 6. Making an Offer through a Realtor
dialogue_line: Does it usually take very long for the owners to get back to you with an acceptance?

title: 6. Making an Offer through a Realtor
dialogue_line: It usually doesn't take very long for owners to respond to an offer.

title: 6. Making an Offer through a Realtor
dialogue_line: Should I be in touch with my bank to tell them to get the loan papers ready?

title: 6. Making an Offer through a Realtor
dialogue_line: The only thing you should do now is relax. You already are pre-qualified for your loan.

title: 7. Discussing Counter-Offer with a Realtor
dialogue_line: Have the owners come up with a counter-offer to my offer to buy their home yet?

title: 7. Discussing Counter-Offer with a Realtor
dialogue_line: The owners have counter-offered three hundred and thirty-five thousand dollars.

title: 7. Discussing Counter-Offer with a Realtor
dialogue_line: Should I accept their offer?

title: 7. Discussing Counter-Offer with a Realtor
dialogue_line: There are two ways to respond. You can either come back with another offer or go with their counter-offer.

title: 7. Discussing Counter-Offer with a Realtor
dialogue_line: What if I make another offer, and they don't accept it?

title: 7. Discussing Counter-Offer with a Realtor
dialogue_line: No one else has made an offer, so you could make another offer if you want to do so.

title: 7. Discussing Counter-Offer with a Realtor
dialogue_line: I think that I would like to offer three hundred and thirty thousand dollars as a counter-offer.

title: 7. Discussing Counter-Offer with a Realtor
dialogue_line: OK, I will present your counter-offer to the owners tonight.

title: 7. Discussing Counter-Offer with a Realtor
dialogue_line: How long before I find out what their decision is?

title: 7. Discussing Counter-Offer with a Realtor
dialogue_line: By now, the owners probably have a pretty good idea of what they will accept. It will go quickly.

title: 7. Discussing Counter-Offer with a Realtor
dialogue_line: Your office called and said that the owners had made a counter-offer to my offer to purchase their house.

title: 7. Discussing Counter-Offer with a Realtor
dialogue_line: To your offer of three hundred and twenty thousand dollars, the owners have counter-offered three hundred and thirty-five thousand dollars.

title: 7. Discussing Counter-Offer with a Realtor
dialogue_line: I think that maybe I should accept their offer.

title: 7. Discussing Counter-Offer with a Realtor
dialogue_line: You, of course, have two ways of responding. You can say yes or come up with another offer.

title: 7. Discussing Counter-Offer with a Realtor
dialogue_line: I want to make another offer, but I am afraid that they will decline and I will lose this house.

title: 7. Discussing Counter-Offer with a Realtor
dialogue_line: There is always a chance that someone could outbid you, but you could try one more offer if you like.

title: 7. Discussing Counter-Offer with a Realtor
dialogue_line: I would now like to offer three hundred and thirty thousand dollars as a counter-offer.

title: 7. Discussing Counter-Offer with a Realtor
dialogue_line: After the owners get home from work tonight, I will approach them with your offer.

title: 7. Discussing Counter-Offer with a Realtor
dialogue_line: Can you tell me how long it will take them to get back to me?

title: 7. Discussing Counter-Offer with a Realtor
dialogue_line: I don't think that it will take as long as the response to the first offer.

title: 7. Discussing Counter-Offer with a Realtor
dialogue_line: Have the owners answered back with a counter-offer for my offer to purchase the house?

title: 7. Discussing Counter-Offer with a Realtor
dialogue_line: In response to your offer, the sellers have decided to counter-offer three hundred and thirty-five thousand dollars.

title: 7. Discussing Counter-Offer with a Realtor
dialogue_line: That sounds pretty good to me, but I am not sure what to do.

title: 7. Discussing Counter-Offer with a Realtor
dialogue_line: You can accept this offer or decline it and come up with another offer.

title: 7. Discussing Counter-Offer with a Realtor
dialogue_line: If I make another offer and they refuse, then what?

title: 7. Discussing Counter-Offer with a Realtor
dialogue_line: Personally, I would consider making one more offer, but it is up to you to decide what to do.

title: 7. Discussing Counter-Offer with a Realtor
dialogue_line: Let's try going with three hundred and thirty thousand dollars for a counter-offer.

title: 7. Discussing Counter-Offer with a Realtor
dialogue_line: I will contact the sellers with your current offer.

title: 7. Discussing Counter-Offer with a Realtor
dialogue_line: Do you think that this will move along fairly quickly?

title: 7. Discussing Counter-Offer with a Realtor
dialogue_line: Usually the response to the second offer moves along a bit more quickly than the first one.

title: 8. Re-offering and Acceptance
dialogue_line: Did you get a chance to speak with the sellers about my counter-offer?

title: 8. Re-offering and Acceptance
dialogue_line: Yes, and I think I have good news for you.

title: 8. Re-offering and Acceptance
dialogue_line: Did they accept the counter-offer?

title: 8. Re-offering and Acceptance
dialogue_line: Yes, they accepted your counter-offer, but they want you to pay for the home inspection.

title: 8. Re-offering and Acceptance
dialogue_line: How much will that cost?

title: 8. Re-offering and Acceptance
dialogue_line: It will cost you around five hundred to one thousand dollars for a home inspection.

title: 8. Re-offering and Acceptance
dialogue_line: Can I choose the home inspector?

title: 8. Re-offering and Acceptance
dialogue_line: Yes, you are paying for it, so you get to choose. I would pick the best one.

title: 8. Re-offering and Acceptance
dialogue_line: So, when are you going to inform the owners of my acceptance?

title: 8. Re-offering and Acceptance
dialogue_line: I will call the owners right now. They will be happy to hear the good news.

title: 8. Re-offering and Acceptance
dialogue_line: I was anxious to find out what the sellers had to say about my counter-offer.

title: 8. Re-offering and Acceptance
dialogue_line: I was able to contact them so, if you'll step into my office, we'll talk.

title: 8. Re-offering and Acceptance
dialogue_line: Did they go with the proposed counter-offer?

title: 8. Re-offering and Acceptance
dialogue_line: They want you to pick up the cost of the home inspection, but they accepted your offer.

title: 8. Re-offering and Acceptance
dialogue_line: Is a home inspection very expensive?

title: 8. Re-offering and Acceptance
dialogue_line: It can cost between five hundred and one thousand dollars.

title: 8. Re-offering and Acceptance
dialogue_line: Do I get to choose who inspects the home?

title: 8. Re-offering and Acceptance
dialogue_line: Yes, you get to choose. I would spend a little more to get a really thorough inspection.

title: 8. Re-offering and Acceptance
dialogue_line: Can you call the owners with my acceptance right away?

title: 8. Re-offering and Acceptance
dialogue_line: I am going to contact the sellers immediately. They were looking forward to your acceptance.

title: 8. Re-offering and Acceptance
dialogue_line: Were you able to contact the owners about my counter-offer?

title: 8. Re-offering and Acceptance
dialogue_line: Yes, please have a seat, and we'll discuss this right now.

title: 8. Re-offering and Acceptance
dialogue_line: I hope that they accepted the counter-offer.

title: 8. Re-offering and Acceptance
dialogue_line: The counter-offer was acceptable to them, but they want you to pay for the home inspection.

title: 8. Re-offering and Acceptance
dialogue_line: Will the home inspection cost me a lot?

title: 8. Re-offering and Acceptance
dialogue_line: It can cost as little as five hundred dollars and as much as one thousand dollars.

title: 8. Re-offering and Acceptance
dialogue_line: Is it my choice as to who inspects this house?

title: 8. Re-offering and Acceptance
dialogue_line: Yes, it is your choice as you are paying for it. Make a wise investment and choose the best inspector you can find.

title: 8. Re-offering and Acceptance
dialogue_line: How long until you contact the sellers with my acceptance?

title: 8. Re-offering and Acceptance
dialogue_line: Let's call them right now. I am sure that they will be happy to hear that you have agreed to pay for the inspection.

title: 9. Going to an Open House with a Friend
dialogue_line: Let's pull over and look at that house over there.

title: 9. Going to an Open House with a Friend
dialogue_line: Yes, that looks great! Is it on our Open House list?

title: 9. Going to an Open House with a Friend
dialogue_line: Yes, it is on our list.

title: 9. Going to an Open House with a Friend
dialogue_line: Well, it looks great from the curb. Let's go on inside.

title: 9. Going to an Open House with a Friend
dialogue_line: Let's sign the registry. The realtor looks kind of busy right now.

title: 9. Going to an Open House with a Friend
dialogue_line: OK, let's go check out the kitchen next.

title: 9. Going to an Open House with a Friend
dialogue_line: look, they have some refreshments in here.

title: 9. Going to an Open House with a Friend
dialogue_line: Make sure that you pick up a flyer with the information about the home.

title: 9. Going to an Open House with a Friend
dialogue_line: Does it say how much they are asking for this house?

title: 9. Going to an Open House with a Friend
dialogue_line: Yes, it seems to have been discounted from two hundred and thirty-five thousand to two hundred and twenty-five thousand.

title: 9. Going to an Open House with a Friend
dialogue_line: I see an Open House sign over there, and I think we should go check it out.

title: 9. Going to an Open House with a Friend
dialogue_line: I think that looks like a very nice house. Is it on our Internet listing for Open Houses?

title: 9. Going to an Open House with a Friend
dialogue_line: Yes, I see it listed on the printout we got off of the Internet.

title: 9. Going to an Open House with a Friend
dialogue_line: I love the beautiful lawn. What a great front entryway!

title: 9. Going to an Open House with a Friend
dialogue_line: We need to make sure to put our names in the registry so the realtor knows we were here.

title: 9. Going to an Open House with a Friend
dialogue_line: That works for me. We can check out the kitchen next.

title: 9. Going to an Open House with a Friend
dialogue_line: On such a hot day, it is thoughtful to have water out for potential buyers.

title: 9. Going to an Open House with a Friend
dialogue_line: Check out the flyer with all of the home's information on it.

title: 9. Going to an Open House with a Friend
dialogue_line: What is the price of this house in the flyer?

title: 9. Going to an Open House with a Friend
dialogue_line: They have changed the asking price since it first went on the market. It is now two hundred and twenty-five thousand.

title: 9. Going to an Open House with a Friend
dialogue_line: I want to take a look at that home with the Open House flags out front.

title: 9. Going to an Open House with a Friend
dialogue_line: What a wonderful neighborhood! Can you find that house on our Open House list?

title: 9. Going to an Open House with a Friend
dialogue_line: Yes, that is one of the houses that we have on our list.

title: 9. Going to an Open House with a Friend
dialogue_line: They always make the front yards look so great for Open Houses. Let's see what the inside looks like.

title: 9. Going to an Open House with a Friend
dialogue_line: I am going to go sign my name in the registry to let the listing agent know that we were here.

title: 9. Going to an Open House with a Friend
dialogue_line: Signing the registry is a good idea. I think I want to see the kitchen next.

title: 9. Going to an Open House with a Friend
dialogue_line: I really appreciate that the listing agent provided water on such a hot day.

title: 9. Going to an Open House with a Friend
dialogue_line: I need to pick up a flyer with the information about the house on it.

title: 9. Going to an Open House with a Friend
dialogue_line: Is the current asking price listed on the flyer?

title: 9. Going to an Open House with a Friend
dialogue_line: The asking price has recently gone down to two hundred and twenty-five thousand dollars.

title: . Discussing Home Inspection with an Inspector
dialogue_line: I heard that you finished my home inspection, and I was wondering how it went.

title: . Discussing Home Inspection with an Inspector
dialogue_line: First of all, we need to understand what I was looking for. Do you know what the purpose of an inspection is?

title: . Discussing Home Inspection with an Inspector
dialogue_line: I am not sure what a home inspection is all about.

title: . Discussing Home Inspection with an Inspector
dialogue_line: I went there to check for problems with the home, so you aren't surprised when you move in.

title: . Discussing Home Inspection with an Inspector
dialogue_line: Wouldn't the owners have told me about any problems?

title: . Discussing Home Inspection with an Inspector
dialogue_line: Sellers aren't always truthful, and there might also be problems that they aren't aware of.

title: . Discussing Home Inspection with an Inspector
dialogue_line: Can I require the owners to fix the problems?

title: . Discussing Home Inspection with an Inspector
dialogue_line: You can make the sale of the house contingent on them fixing the problems.

title: . Discussing Home Inspection with an Inspector
dialogue_line: What did you find out when you did the inspection of my new home?

title: . Discussing Home Inspection with an Inspector
dialogue_line: There were no major problems. One leaky pipe under the sink and two broken roof tiles was all that I found.

title: . Discussing Home Inspection with an Inspector
dialogue_line: Can you tell me the results of my home inspection?

title: . Discussing Home Inspection with an Inspector
dialogue_line: Before I answer that, I want to make sure that you know what I was looking for. Are you clear on what I was looking for?

title: . Discussing Home Inspection with an Inspector
dialogue_line: I never had a home inspection before.

title: . Discussing Home Inspection with an Inspector
dialogue_line: I inspect the home for problems that might not be all that apparent in a quick walk-through.

title: . Discussing Home Inspection with an Inspector
dialogue_line: I asked the owners, and they said that everything was great with the house.

title: . Discussing Home Inspection with an Inspector
dialogue_line: The owners might not be aware of everything wrong with the house. Some things are hidden, but might still be a problem for you in the future.

title: . Discussing Home Inspection with an Inspector
dialogue_line: I heard that the owners must fix all of the problems before the escrow closes.

title: . Discussing Home Inspection with an Inspector
dialogue_line: I inform you of the problems. If there are major problems, you can decline to buy the house or they may wish to fix any problems.

title: . Discussing Home Inspection with an Inspector
dialogue_line: What kinds of things did you discover in my home inspection?

title: . Discussing Home Inspection with an Inspector
dialogue_line: I found some fairly major problems. A major support beam in the roof is broken, and the shower floor leaked and rotted out the second-floor joist.

title: . Discussing Home Inspection with an Inspector
dialogue_line: I came in to see how my home inspection went.

title: . Discussing Home Inspection with an Inspector
dialogue_line: First of all, I need to share what the purpose of a home inspection is. Do you understand what I was doing there?

title: . Discussing Home Inspection with an Inspector
dialogue_line: I had a home inspection before, but didn't really understand it.

title: . Discussing Home Inspection with an Inspector
dialogue_line: I help you spot potential problems with the home before you purchase it.

title: . Discussing Home Inspection with an Inspector
dialogue_line: The owner said that the roof had leaked, but that he got it fixed last month.

title: . Discussing Home Inspection with an Inspector
dialogue_line: Sellers aren't really all that objective. They may have gotten used to a leaky faucet, but it is still broken.

title: . Discussing Home Inspection with an Inspector
dialogue_line: Are the sellers responsible for fixing the problems with the house?

title: . Discussing Home Inspection with an Inspector
dialogue_line: The owners may wish to pay to have the problems fixed, or maybe the price of the house can be reduced.

title: . Discussing Home Inspection with an Inspector
dialogue_line: Did you find a lot of things wrong during the home inspection?

title: . Discussing Home Inspection with an Inspector
dialogue_line: The house has a very outdated electrical system. Many of the switches and outlets do not work and are unsafe.

title: . Signing Escrow Papers
dialogue_line: I am here to sign my escrow papers.
